Roy had been one of the best host I have ever had. He was friendly and welcoming. He gave me some really great tips in Ireland and we had some really good chat.
Roy was really helpful all the time, making the stay very easy and we recomend you to stay at his place....
Roy was very accommodating and the place was great.
Good place to stay
Extremely friendly and helpful host! Very accommodating and they make the stay feel homey, almost like youre visiting family!
Roy is a very nice host, caring about the guests. It was a real pleasure talking to him about the city and the best places to visit. Certainly the best host I've had so far!
Good room quite next to Dublin centre
having a fridge in the room is a great idea!
Very good location to access the city.
The place is very nice quiet and safe area. Roy is very helpful everytime
Warm welcome, clean, but the room was really very small and  the bathroom very very small.

The apartment is wonderful. The sea view is breathtaking. The location, unique. Valerie was the perfect host: warmly welcoming, ensuring a bounty of basics - bread, butter, eggs, milk tea and coffee. I couldn't have been received in a more friendly way. I felt totally relaxed from the moment I arrived. Book early!
Die Lage ist echt genial!! Tolle Tips bekommen. Wohnung ebenso einfach Top. Kann I b auf jedenfall empfehlen!!!
Valeries seaside cottage is stunning, tranquil and warm. In addition Valerie is welcoming and an attentive host. Skerries is a vibrant village with gorgeous walks, activities, restaurants and cafes.
Valeries place was a great beach getaway. Such a perfect spot within walking distance of everything in Skerries.
Nice views and great rooms, you wont regret it.
Lovely place with an amazing view.
Good value for money. Great location. Well equipped and self contained.

You won't regret staying in Valerie's sea side apartment, Sunset Crag. The views are amazing and Valerie will make sure you have everything you need and then some. Please be aware that the apartment is on the top level of the family home so you will hear noise from time to time.
Stunning apartment within reach of the beach, shops and fantastic restaurants. Will definitely return.

Valerie is a fabulous host! Very friendly, lots of local tips to share. The space was perfect! Loved being right on the water and hearing the ocean at night. Very clean space! The bed was so cozy! Everything we needed and more for a 2 night stay and within walking distance to many shops and restaurants. Would definitely stay again!
Amazing view, great location, wonderful welcoming host, comfortable apartment right on the water. It was perfection.
The house was phenomenal. Loved the small touches in the house and the view was great. Valerie was a great host.
Valerie's place is lovely, situated right on the ocean and an easy walk into Skerries for groceries or dinner out.  We can highly recommend staying here.

Valeries place is amazing. The view is really hard to capture in words or even pictures. Everything was clean and easy to use. Valerie gave us suggestions for local spots to eat and drink and she was always quick to respond if i had questions. Its about a 20 min walk to the train and then about a 45 min ride into Dublin. Excellent location. We loved being close to the city but also away from the busyness. If I return, Ill be staying here again!

The place is wonderful, in a peaceful and quiet location. We were greeted by Valerie, along with her helpful little helper. All the necessities were provided to make your stay a good one, including a few things for breakfast. Valerie is a great host and the place itself is great. I recommend this place.

You wont regret staying here. Waking up in the morning without headache and going to bed in peace should be perfect description of holidays, but there are more the view is as it is in the (Website hidden by Airbnb) its actually much better. Go out to the balcony in the evening and find the Big bear and Sagittarius! 

One piece of advice, rent a car. Dublin is just half and hour away. The road view is just additional token!

Valerie downstairs gives absolute privacy, but great help when you need her! :)

This place is a little outside of the citycentre which I think, is good becuz you get better sleep. The house is cute and Roy and his wife are supernice and helpfull! The beds were very nice and the place is clean. The rooms are not like 5 stars hotelrooms but if you are not expecting that it is all good.
Only problem we had was that the room was first very cold and the radiator was not working. There was another radiator to plug in the wall so we used it. During the night the other one turned on and we woke up to be like sausages  but everything else was super!
Very good location. Very easy to get around as bus stop is quite close. Very comfortable stay - cosy bed. Lovely kitchen space to chill out in & cook own meals.
Amazing host!
Fabulous location. So close to everything. Really accommodating host. Will be back, please God
Roy is a very nice person  and answers quickly.

Roy offered a clean and spacious room. He shared his enormous knowledge of the city and is one of the most friendly, communicative and convinced hosts I have had the pleasure to stay at. Will come back. Highly recommended
Roy is a friendly host with great local knowledge. Ideal location for visiting Dublin city.i would recommend you stay .Great value for money.
Perfect stay at Roy's Airbnb. On arrival he showed me the place and then the neighborhood which was nice. Room was great and bed was comfortable. Can't complain.
Awsome host!

Roys Guest House was great, close to shops, pubs, transport, and only a 15 minute bus ride into the city centre. Quiet location as well. Roy was helpful, offered recommendations of things to see and do. Would definitely recommend staying here if you enjoy your own space.
Private bathroom was great to have
Nice people and have their act together. Everything was very straight forward and worked. No luxury, but then we didn't expect that. Easy to get around. Thanks!
Roy is a very friendly host that provides great local recommendations. If youre ever in Dublin, I recommend staying with him!

Great location, lot of pubs and services in the area, and close enough to Dublin. Roy was great, he told us everything we needed to know, such as the bus we must get or were to go either to experience local or to get some party.
Both a great location and a kind host. The accommodations are within walking distance of Dublin and good amenities are provided. I really enjoyed my stay!
A comfortable place with useful amenities and in a great location.
Roy is a very supporting person to make sure your stay is very comfort

Roy is a superb host, brimming with warm Irish hospitality. He shared a wealth of local knowledge and top-tips with us which enabled us to squeeze in so much during our brief stay. The accommodation is perfectly situated to explore both the city centre and further afield, with excellent transport links. Extremely clean with well equipped kitchen, if you need it (we chose to enjoy all the delicious local food!) Highly recommended!
100 puntos
Nice and tidy rooms. Great host. Roy told us what we wanted to know and when we arrived he went straight to the bar with us. We enjoed our stay very much.

Roy is a very friendly and helpful person. His little hotel was perfectly located for me (going to DCU campus). A bus take you directly there from the Airport.
The room is small but tiny and clean. Thanks Roy!

Roy was a great host. He was friendly, warm and welcomed my mates in as I was arriving much later. Good facilities for everything you need with a complete communal kitchen and en-suite with a shower. Not too bad getting into town, its only a short bus trip. Definitely would stay here again, just make sure you label your goods in the fridge ;).

This was a fab place to stay while in Dublin. Easy to get in to the city centre and great value for money. The bed was super comfy and Roy was a perfect host, giving us some great tips of places to go in the city and even a bottle of wine for my friends birthday! Would recommend staying here :)
clean place and good hospitality.

We had a great time at Roy's hostel. Roy was very flexible with the check-in as we arrived late at the hostel. We never met Roy but his mother and wife. They were all really nice and helpful! The communication couldn't have been better! The location is great, the city and the airport are both not far away. Really can recommend it!
Fantastic stay 5*
nice hostel in good and quiet neighborhood. Easy to go to the city as well as to the airport. Roy was very friendly
One of the rooms was rather small with nowhere to sit and bunk beds rather small, but the location of the place is good - 20 minutes from Dublin city centre by bus.
Roy is an exceptional host. I highly recommande his housing. I was very well welcomed and the room was perfect, really well located between the center and the airport.
Great place to explore Dublin. Bus is around the corner. 15 minutes to get to the centre of Dublin. Roy is a great host.
Great space & location! Roy was super helpful and responsive!

Roy is an excellent host, he has a lot of suggestions for making the most out of a trip to Dublin. 
The location is really close to busstops that take you into the city centre as well as directly to the airport.
Very satisfactory, thanks roy
Great place ! Roy is one of the best host I meet :)

Roy is super nice and helpful and you can tell he genuinely cares about making sure you have a good trip. He was always very quick to respond with any questions we had and gave us lots of great local suggestions.  The hostel was a great space in a good location. Definitely recommend!
Roy is a really kind and helpful man. And the place it's perfect. Location and money wise the best we could have found in Dublin!

Lovely apartment and Daragh was a wonderful host. Very comfortable and clean room and very clean bathroom with a good shower. Also located in one of the best areas of the city for food and drink, with only a short walk into the city centre. Couldn't recommend it more! Thanks very much Daragh

Daragh's home is a treasure of hospitality and privacy. He's willing to chat away or give you your space. Away from the noise of Temple for quality sleep yet still close enough if you wish to partake! Simple checkin/out, clean and welcoming.
Toller Gastgeber und super Lage!
Lovely hosts, great recommendations for travelling around Dublin. Very clean and tidy and artistic! Would stay again if able to.
Excellent place! And very nice hosts! Always willing to help us moving around the city.

The space was absolutely beautiful, there was amazing art everywhere. The flat is super close to so everything and is conveniently located. Daragh is a fantastic host and I would highly recommend staying here!
Daraghs place is perfectly located for exploring Dublin and he offers lots of helpful tips!
It was perfect! We like to come back to Daraghs place.

Daragh and Sara were great hosts. Daragh left very detailed instructions with pictures of how to pick up the keys and how to find the place. He arrived about 10 minutes after we did to give us a tour of the space and showed us how to use everything. He also pointed out a bunch of great sights in the city as well as places to eat. As it was our first time in Dublin this was very helpful. 
The location is amazing! We only took the bus twice in our 9 day trip as city center and sights were all close to a mile away and a quick 20 minute walk. The street itself also has a bunch of great pubs and restaurants (I highly recommend Bunsen, the chocolate shake is one of the best I've ever had) and both St Stephens Green and Iveagh Gardens are a 5 minute walk from the flat. Daragh and Sara were around if we needed anything or had questions but were also very respectful of our space and privacy.
Overall a great experience!
We had a nice stay at Daraghs place. Good Location, lots of pubs and places to eat.  Daragh gave good tips about all the things we could do in Dublin.

hi, if you are looking for a bedroom in city centre, well comunicated with the diferent ways of transportation ( luas, train and bus straight to the airport ) at a very reasonable price this place actually fit for the purpose.  I recommend the place.
Nice and clean room in the heart of Dublin. Daragh is very friendly and helpful.
Amazing location! Cozy room, friendly, very helpful hosts! Totally recommend!
We had a brilliant trip to Dublin and the apartment was lovely. Great location close to fun bars and restaurants. Daragh was really hospitable and gave us some fab tips.. Would highly recommend.
Daragh was very kind to allow us to drop our luggage off early. He has lots of fantastic suggestions and the location was great!
Daragh's apartment is an absolutely perfect base to explore Dublin. Daragh could not have been more accommodating and helpful whilst still ensuring we had our own space. Would 100% recommend.

Daragh and his girlfriend are very nice. Although, we did not quite enjoy our stay. Our "bed" cannot be called a bed anymore. The mattress is so bad I cannot even describe. Haven't slept so badly in years. You literally feel every single spring. Two nights there felt like nightmare.
Also, we didn't expect to be 6 people using the same bathroom. We knew that we will have a shared bath, but it was not only Daragh using the shower/ toilet but also his girlfriend and another couple he rent a room at the same time. Being upstairs you need to be very lucky to get an empty spot, otherwise you're walking down to the toilet/ shower and back to the room several times before you can use it...
Excellent location and very friendly host who provides loads of suggestions about where to go and what to do! Lively road - 'Frank's pork shop' is actually a trendy wine bar!
Great location, you can walk anywhere in Dublin. Daragh responds quickly and will help you with anything you need. Thanks! Yes, bring earplugs :)

We had a great time at Daragh's place, perfect location for walking to the city centre. Charming appartement with beautiful interior.  Keep in mind that Camden street is busy at night so it could be a bit noisy. Brilliant restaurants and breakfast places nearby, just ask Daragh for recommendations.
Nice stay to place in Dublin with a central location
This place had everything we needed and wasnt too far from the city center. We loved that it was right across the bus station. Daragh was very helpful and friendly.

The place is good and well located (25 mins walking from city centre), lots of pubs in the neighborhood (one of them is a bit noisy until late night) and Daragh was super nice and gave us a lot of useful tips for our trip.
Daragh is a great host!!! Gave excellent recommendations for local eats/things to see ect!
Thanks Daragh, great location, great explanations, bus stop close, you can get a cheap bus to the house from the airport, cozy room and house, grocery store close.
Perfect place to stay during our short trip to Dublin! Daragh and Sarah were very friendly and gave us great recommendations on where to eat and visit. Would highly recommend staying here!
We stayed at Daraghs for 3 days. Excellent location, cool place and very kind host. We surely recommend this place.

Great location, walkable to most sites. Daraugh was very accommodating with our super early check in  and letting us store our bags on the last day. He offered great local tips, and communicated very promptly. Only thing to note is that there are a few flight of stairs if you have larger luggage.
We had a very nice stay at Daragh's. His apartment is very well located and he has a lot of good adresses to go to. Thank you again Daragh!
I cant imagine you will find a better host than James!! It was awesome

What a lovely place to stay. JP was such a gentleman to deal with. He gave us great recommendations for local places to eat. Lovely welcoming touches on arrival. The apartment was spotless and warm. I would definately recommend this place. We will definitely be back when are in Dublin.
Everything very good in the apartment, very comfortable and comfortable, very quiet in the area of apartment location.

JP is as described by Airbnb a super host. He has perfected the art of hosting , offering service on a personal level , quick responses and going above and beyond in making his place homely to his guests . He left food and fresh linen and shampoos as well as a Incase you forgotù box at our disposal . As for the accommodation. It is situated in an upper class area near Dundrum centre . Ideal for travelling in and out of the city and is a very safe and friendly place . The rooms themselves scream character; you could tell this place is more of a home then a couple of beds and four walls. We really enjoyed our stay and hope to be back in the future . Definitely would recommend.

excellent hospitality. JP couldn't have been more welcoming and provided lots of communication in days and weeks running up to our stay. The apartment is fantastic, really clean, homely and great size for our family and Goatstown is a really great location with easy access to both city centre and the m50.
Very nice place convenient to transportation, well stocked with supplies
A great apartment in a great location with an outstanding host!
Great hospitality and wonderful place

A great stay! JP is a gentleman, easy communication and check-in. Some thoughtful touches throughout the apartment which make arriving and settling in a breeze :) 
The place is spotlessly clean and in a great location for what we needed.
The apartment is as advertised, clean and very comfortable.  JP met us and led us through the whole place. Its a lovely part of the city, safe and with good restaurants nearby.

JPs apartment was perfect for us looking a relaxed stay in Dublin before running the marathon the next day. The thoughtful touches with the wee welcome sign, full use of the whole place, it was absolutely brilliant!! Thank you so much for letting us stay at your apartment. It was perfect for the weekend! Will definitely stay again next time we are down in Dublin.
Great accommodation, good hospitality. Such a nice atmosphere!
Great host, couldn't be nicer, and very helpful. Always looking out for things to make your stay better. And you can't beat the price. Check out his record collection too.
Great stay . Everything went well . I can recommend a stay :)
Had a great time at James place! Its only a 20 min bus ride from the city center and he was a great host!

Staying at James was a good experience. James helped with questions we had (providing us a leap card for the bus, adapter for our mobile phone, ordering a taxi). The apartment is 15 min walking to the bus station and 20-25 min to the city centre by bus. You have a room and your own bathroom + you can live food in a fridge or cook something in a joint kitchen. Maybe we expected a little bit better conditions but Dublin is expensive so maybe we demand too much for the price we paid.

James's place is exactly as described. Even if you are staying in the same house with the host, you have your privacy. James is very kind, he gave us local tips and recommended places to go.
You can get to the city center by bus in about 20 minutes and the area is nice and quiet.
Would definitely recommend this place.

James house is 10 min walking from the bus to the center or the airport.
It's a quiet neighborhood with parks and nice houses.
James explained to me the buses and also nice places.
Good location for the airport, best if you're driving because bus line is a bit of a hike

Excellent! James is a great host. Friendly and always giving great tips of things you can do in and around the city. His house is comfortable, in a quiet neighborhood  and the perfect place where you can relax after a busy tourist day in the city.
His room is very cozy and clean and James is a very gentle man in my mind.

James is a very caring and helpful host. He knows the city very well and will give you great tips about things to do and see.
The place is very quiet, the bed comfy. After a 10 min walk the bus gets you to the city centre in aprox 20 min. 
I enjoyed my stay at James and will definitely stay here again.

James is very kind and helpful.
He proposed several times to bring us to the bus station and gave us some good pubs location.
James is so nice~ I highly recommend to live here
It's a bit far away from the center of Dublin, but it's a really quiet neighborhood and James is a great and helpful host.
Loved it.Nice and clean, cozy house in really quite and safe neighborhood.James is great host :)
Great hosts, Sharon and Michael are very welcoming and very communicative. They went the extra miles with welcoming us from picking up at airport to booking our taxis. Great personality.

Sharon and Michael were lovely hosts . Very welcoming and laid back. Our ferry was cancelled so we arrived after midnight , but Sharon was so understanding and welcoming when we did arrive. ( we had messaged our ETA , once we knew what our alternative travel plans were) . Sharon also made us delicious pancakes for one of our breakfasts . We were also told to help ourselves to tea , coffee , orange juice., Toast , eggs,  fruit and conserves every morning. We could also come and go as we pleased as Sharon gave us a front door key. 
We had a family room with en-suite shower room. The beds and pillows were comfortable and the room was quiet. 
We would certainly stay here again . Excellent position for attending concerts at Malahide Castle as its only a short walk away. 
Thank you Sharon and Michael for a very comfortable stay.
Sharon and Michael were wonderful hosts. We felt completely at home. Highly recommend staying with them,

What an outstanding hospitality that Sharon gave us, and make us feel like home. She picked us up at the airport almost midnight. We enjoy the breakfast and chitchat too(she even make us pancakes on the weekend). The house is amazing, we were very lucky to be able to enjoy the garden with such a wonderful weather. The location is great! very easy to go everywhere. Walking distance to Malahide center. Highly recommended!!! Thank you Sharon & Michael.

Sharon and Michael were wonderfully welcoming and helpful. They made our stay absolutely lovely. The house is beautiful and the room clean and spacious. The garden is also a wonderful place to hang out. The nearby village of Malahide is charming and buzzy with lots of nice restaurants and pubs. We would definitely stay there again. Thank you!
All great.

Great location and value! Sharon and Micheal are lovely folks who were wonderful to hang out with. Nice family - very family atmosphere so if going with the flowù of a family life is not your thing, move on (the room is very private). But if you are open to the experience of meeting and hanging with new friends, youll love it!
It was a lovely space, and we felt welcomed by the whole family. They  even offered us a lift into town and lots of pointers on their city.

Sharon and Michael were warm and welcoming hosts.  We enjoyed talking with them and their family.  They had helpful suggestions and hints for our time in Malahide Village and Castle, and we appreciated that they could hold our luggage until checkin time since we arrived early.  We had just completed a 2-week tour and so spent most of our time resting or sleeping when we were at the house and the space served our needs well.
Place is worse than a hostel.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Roy is a very hospitable host. The apartments are small but theyre perfect for big groups that are looking for a place to stay all together. The location is also good, a safe zone and near a supermarket and bus stops that take you to the center in 10 minutes. I highly recommend Roys apartments.
Ideaal voor een weekendje met vrienden!

Clean rooms. Everything was fine. Roy can give you good advises for a great stay.
Thanks!

Absolutely spot on for groups. We went on a stag weekend with a large group of lads and this b&b is exactly what we wanted. Not from from town centre and great spot to chill and socialise during the day.

Great place, especially for the cost! Nice and clean and a good place to stay for a stag do. Host was excellent; helpful about any problems and knowledgeable about the local area. 

We personally feel the pictures undersell the place, a lot more room when you see it in person! 

Great place to stay, would highly recommend it.
Great place to stay in Dublin.
If you're with a group looking for a great experience of Irish hospitality and party is on your agenda, this is the place for you!
Highly recommended!
Brilliant
Fast, friendly and knowledgable great host. Great for stags and large groups.

Great place for a large group that doesnt want to break the bank, close to local pubs, grocery stores, and public transportation.  Walking distance to the downtown area as well if you dont mind the 30-45 minute walk and want to enjoy the local culture.  Roy and Ellen were very hospitable, sharing tips on places to go and things to do that were very helpful.
The host canceled this reservation 231 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Roy was a very warm and kind host who responded promptly to our questions. Unfortunately, this is the first property (in 4 years on Airbnb) I have felt compelled to give a critical review. (1) Airbnb should never have listed this under 'entire place'. The description says it is only 'entire place' if 10 people book. We had nine, and although Roy didn't host anyone else, his description claims he could have. Further, there was someone walking through the halls late at night talking on the phone, which has never happened in another 'entire place' booking. (2) I would recommend clearly reading the whole description more carefully than normal. Even so, I feel some of what is said (and not said) is misleading. The 'kitchen come sitting room' is really a small kitchen with a small table. He never mentions that there is no living room. (3) He also never mentions that the property is disjointed. My in-laws stayed in one section of the house, and they had to walk outside to the kitchen. The rest of us stayed in another part of the house, and we also had to walk outside to get to the kitchen. It was an Airbnb built around three sides of a house, not a single unit. (4) The upkeep of the property was not great, and we felt more like we were in a camp than somewhere 'warm and cozy'. The hot water system was not equipped to handle a large group taking short showers, and Roy advertises enough beds for 5 more people. (5) The price was out of proportion to the value. If you are having a Stag party, this property works well, but I would not recommend it for other groups.
Lovely, clean accommodation. Roy is a great host and nothing was too much trouble. Great value for money we will definitely be back

Roy was very nice and gave a lot of informations for our trip to Dublin.
Excellent house for stag or hens party.

My family and I stayed during 3 nights in Susan's appartment. She is the most friendly and thoughtful host we could have hoped for! The appartment is spaceful, clean and the fridge and cupboards were already filled when we arrived! There are several pubs close to the place where it's possible to eat and have a drink and the bus stop is only 10 min away. I would definitely recommand it for whoever wants to have a unique time in Dublin. Thanks from all the family! Thomas

Susans home was perfect and as advertised. Weve used Airbnb for years, but have never had a host make us feel like neighbors. Ingredients for breakfast were included in our stay, and that was extremely helpful for a large group of people. Our 81 year old grandfather was struggling with the jet lag from traveling from the states, and she went out of her way to make sure he was comfortable settling in, and even checked in on him over our stay. We loved Hole In The Wall, and she had wonderful recommendations for sightseeing and restaurants. Hands down, 5 star host, 5 star home. Well be back! Thanks again, Susan!

Susan is amazing! Great place to stay and a great location to stay. Susan is super helpful from pre-booking right through your checking out. She went out of her way to make my family feel comfortable. Her home is super clean and has a great layout for a family or group. She helped with local transportation which was amazing!! While we were staying here she sent text messages with suggestions for touring and where to dine. This was incredibly helpful.  This was our first Airbnb and Susan made it unforgettable! 
Highly recommend booking with Susan shes great. Well be back. 
Steve

Host was amazing and made our stay more enjoyable.

Thank you!!!

Wonderful Experience! My group of four had differing arrival and departure times, and Susan was very flexible and helped all of us arrive and depart easily. With her help, we were able to have transport arranged with Bob and other cabbies (more about Bob in a minute.) That was a tremendous help. Each person had their own space, and the common areas (kitchen and living room) were quite large and comfortable. Susan provided a few groceries in the refrigerator for breakfast items, and that was very helpful on Day One.   Susan was available and nearby, and helped us Americans with using the washer/dryer. While in the neighborhood, be sure to visit the nearby bakery, and, of course, The Hole in the Wall pub.
More about Bob: Susan works with a couple of cab drivers, and by all means, you MUST use them. Bob in particular, was a great Dublin host, showing us all of the highlights, and offering suggestions on what to do, and when. Bob also helped us arrange a dinner for 35 in less than 20 minutes, using his local connections (WOW!) But most of all, his unfailing good cheer, good humor and generous hospitality really was an extra special layer of person-to-person connection which makes any journey special. Be sure to ask him to see pictures of his dog! If you are looking for an immersive experience in Dublin life, then book this place. This is a great place for families or large groups, and you are sure to be well cared for by Susan.

A nice home....Susan couldnt have been more accommodating and helpful in acclimating our group to traveling in and around Dublin.  The walk to the train was a bit farther than expected but otherwise very convenient in the City Center and generally a short taxi ride to anywhere in the city.
Host was nice and place was stylish. 2 lovely big dogs. Really enjoyed my stay
Una familia muy agradable y hospitalaria.
It was really a clean and nice room with lovely scent.
This is a great location just outside Dublin centre with all amenities within 5minutes walk of your doorstep, 3 minutes walk to the dart and your in to Tara street station within 15-20mins. Loved it.
Sheelagh is Amazing and also the apartment. We had everything we need in and out!!!

Sheelagh's place is a wonderful spot for relaxing and unwinding.  We stayed for a week and fell in love with the area - Malahide has everything you'd want and then some.  We loved the location of the apartment with a small park right out front, and groceries, coffee, and a pub mere steps away.  The train station is a 4 block walk, and on the way there you'll pass multiple restaurants, pharmacies, and a cab rental.  Everything is so easy and convenient to get to that it really is the perfect location for a getaway.

The apartment is bright and airy, and we loved the extra room and amenities like a washing machine and dinning room table.  One thing of note: the apartment has a shower and no tub.  While this wasn't an issue for us at all, it might be something to consider if you're traveling with small children.  

We loved Sheelagh's place, and will hopefully be back to visit!
Great place in the heart of Malahide village. Fully equipped kitchen was perfect for self catering although there are so many restaurants in Malahide to choose from that you may not want to cook

Our stay at the fabulous Malahide Marina home hosted by Sheelagh was a welcome respite from the hurly burly of Dublin. Not only was the space just right for two it would easily hold 3 more. The kitchen had what we needed to do simple meal prep, and the shower was fantastic. All of that pales however when I think of the excellent location in Malahide. We could easily walk to the train station and using our LEAP Card, purchased in a machine at the train station, get into Dublin in about 20 minutes. We also used our LEAP card to ride local buses. 

This listing has what you need, including a hair dryer, washer/dryer combo, comfortable beds AND the sea/marina to your left of the front door when facing The Green. To the right of The Green is Tesco Express and Starbucks. Up on the next corner is Marios Pizza, where we shared a pizza. On another day we stopped into Gibneys, a pub, where we had excellent fish and chips. On our last day we found Thats Amore on Townyard Lane where we had a delicious and reasonably priced lunch.  

We enjoyed our excellent and informative visit to Malahide Castle and the Gardens. To see the Castle one must take the guided tour which provides the history of the castle and the Talbots who owned the castle for hundreds of years until fairly recently. This ticket includes the gardens and the Butterfly House. Do like we did and take a picnic lunch and enjoy whilst sitting on a bench in the Garden. We continued, after our lunch, exploring all the remaining garden areas. After we rewarded ourselves with tea and delicious cake in the Avoca Cafe which is in the Visitors Center. 

Quite by accident we learned about Toots,  a Tram/Train one can get at the Malahide train station and ride right up to the Castles Visitors Center as well as return to the train station or other stops in Malahide. This was much easier than the long walk from the bus stop to the Castle. 

Sheelaghs place represents the best of both worlds in my opinionîaccess to exciting Dublin and a quiet, restful place to unwind after Dublin or to just relax on a day off from the city. Thank you Sheelagh!

Spacious, bright, comfortable, spotlessly clean, warm. Very handy for bus into town. Lidl and Aldi just around the corner. On street parking  right outside. Good value given we felt very much at home. Appreciated the breakfast supplies and freshly ground coffee. Thanks Aida.

We were very happy to stay in this apartment. Stylish! Different zones for personal space. We can watch Tv, read books ( many great art books), cook or sleeping and everybody has own place. And I forget mention small garden with terrace and two beautiful pigeons in trees...Great place where to stay in Doublin

Aidas place is a stunningly renovated Victorian row house. It is very spacious with two separate lounge areas, a well equipped kitchen and comfortable beds in the bedrooms. We found parking readily available on the street outside, which is not easy to find in Dublin properties. Although buses are available to the center of Dublin, it is only a 20-30 minute walk. There was also a lovely garden outside, with a country feel. Aida was there there to welcome us when we arrived and made us feel at home. We also appreciated the breakfast supplies that she left for us. We would highly recommend Aidas property to other guests.

Aidas place is perfectly locate for Dublin.  A quick 5 minute ride on the bus gets you into town.  Easy access to expressways gets you everywhere else.  This is a beautiful home and wonderful host!  I highly recommend Aidas for a group of 4 people.  Easy car park in front.  Beautiful home! Lovely host!

Really classy and stylish
Not everyone will get on with the steps!
Only one toilet (and that downstairs) not ideal

Great apartment in residential area. Clean, quiet, very roomy, and comfortable. Nice patio in backyard, and great light from large windows into the eat-in kitchen. Stylish decor comfortable bed. Great patio/yard. One of the best airbnbs we have stayed at (of probably 30 or so). So comfortable that we didnt want to leave it. Highly recommend. One drawback is that bedroom is upstairs, and toilet is downstairs.

Aidas place is really clean and comfortable with a really nice architecture together with all the cosy details! And.... we could sit in the ‚òÄÔ∏è in the garden even in Dublin. 
The welcome and communication was really fine. Aida left us some fresh food in the refrigerator and it was really nice we could check in earlier and check out later without any problem.
Its about 20 minutes walking to the centre. Close there are many busses to Howth or the pubs in the centre!
Thank you Aida fore your hospitality! We really can recommend your place

A wonderful unique house, quietly hidden behind a traditional Dublin terrace front. It is surprisingly spacious and full of daylight. A stylish home with a well landscaped garden too. We mainly used an app for taxis but the bus stop is just at the end of the street. Also its an easy enjoyable walk to Clontarf or the other way to the City centre. Locally is a good Italian restaurant, pub and surprising Japanese take away.

The house is very much as detailed in the photos, very spacious with a really nice patio area.  It was spotless and very well equipped
Parking was no problem the three days we were there, road is very quiet
Great stay!
The host canceled this reservation 174 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

We had a great weekend stay.  Restaurants and bars are located nearby.  House was sparkly clean.  Aida very helpful and answered all our questions fast and comprehensively.  Five star accomodation.  Thank you
Great place, great host, a pleasure to stay at this property.
Aidas place is awesome! Definitely one of a kind. She was a great host.
Great room you can find for your layover in Ireland, highly recommend this space.
Great location near the airport. Sandra is very willing to give tips how to get to the airport/ city centre on a budget.
Very accommodating, lovely room. Very easy access to airport. Sandra was very easy to deal with. Would highly recommend.
A genuinely sincere person in Sandra, she has a heart of gold

Esperienze da dimenticare. Spero che a nessun altro capiti lo stesso.
Dopo aver fatto il check in  , mi sono trovato a condividere l'appartamento  con un altra persona, mentre la famiglia con una bambina dormivano sul divano in salotto. Ho detto all' host che sarei andato fuori per cena quindi mi hanno accompagnato alla porta senza lasciarmi le chiavi , affermando che mi avrebbero aspettato e che avrebbero aperto loro. Gia' alle 9.45 p.m. ha iniziato con messaggi per chiedermi quando tornavo a casa e di sbrigarmi. Fatto cio' alle 10.15 p.m. alla porta viene ad aprirmi il marito , con fare tutt'altro che gentile anzi molto seccato. La colazione come da annuncio doveva essere dalle 9.00 a.m. alle 10.00 a.m., con successivo check out alle 11.00 a.m. Indovinate un po' , alle 6.40 a.m. Lei mi sveglia con messaggi dicendo che dovevo lasciare la stanza perche dovevano andare a lavoro e portare la bimba a scuola. Colazione? Non mi spettava , il marito in continuazione a bussare alla porta . Un fastidio unico . Volevo dormire , ero in vacanza xon un aereo di pomeriggio. Alla fine mandavo via
Me ne sono andato con tutta tranquillita' e spero che dopo aver scritto , altri pensano 100 volte prima di prenotare da queste persone. La chiave della camera niente, la camera della bambina non avete privacy . Spero non succeda mai piu'
Sandra,thanks for hosting.

It was a pleasure be host from Dave we really felt like home. The house is in a perfect position is very comfortable cosy and clean. We highly recommend it! Also Dave is a very good host even if he was traveling he gave us lots of tips about Dublin and he help us a lot. 5 star for Davee and his helper Steve:)
Dave is very responsive and the location is in the heart of temple bar. Everything was walkable, which made our trip so accessible!

If youre considering booking Daves place, dont hesitate for one second! It is in the absolute BEST part of Dublin, central to all the good clubs, bars, restaurants, etc! I booked a lot of tours on my trip as well and all of the meet up points were only a 5 minute walk from the apartment and considering these tours start generally at 7AM, its a major bonus to get that extra sleep, especially if youre experiencing jet lag! The apartment is fully stocked with absolutely everything that you could possibly need and even things that you wouldnt have thought you needed haha Dave is very detail oriented with every aspect of the trip, from checking in and things to do and checking out. I honestly cant rave enough about my experience. Would 110% recommend and I would definitely be staying at his place, when Im in Dublin again.

Daves place was in the perfect location to see all the sights of Dublin. We were in the heart of Temple Bar, but on the quieter sides We also were a few minutes walk to Trinity College and the Christchurch cathedral. Great spot for exploring Dublin for a few days.
The apartment is very well located and the own bathroom is a big advantage. Steve was very helpful und friendly. I enjoyed my stay

Dave's place was really clean, spacious, and centrally located to nearly everything we wanted to see in Dublin. I appreciated his great resources for navigating the city, and he replied to any inquiries very promptly. He also provided a plug adapter and phone charging cables, which was really appreciated. I would definitely stay at his place again!
Dave was a gracious host! He was very communicative, the room was clean and the apartment had everything we needed for outlet 5-day stay. Close to everything you could need as well.

You cant beat the location of Daves place. Right above a great breakfast spot, 5 minute walk to Temple area, it was great. I had room B I believe which had the bathroom in the room which was really nice. The bed is a bit hard as its 2 twin beds put together. I always felt safe as you go through a few locked doors to get into the building. Dave was great about communication and sent lots of recommendations. I do recommend this place!

Daves place is lovely and within walking distant to many restaurants and tourist attractions in the core of Dublin. Dave is also super fast with his responses prior and during our stay. Overall we enjoyed our stay at Daves place.

More than perfect. Even though his absence, he has arranged the check in process in a perfect way through his co-host. And he was very prompt answering all my questions from US. I would highly recommend Dave's place.
Thank you Dave!

We would not recommend this place for the following reasons :
- too expensive for what you get despite the location. Dave is banking solely on the central location but doesnt offer a comfortable space
- too cluttered with personal belongings
- not clean and welcoming, mouldy bathroom, dirty stained carpet
- poor facilities : poor quality threadbare old bedding and towels, shower wasnt working and wasnt being fixed while we were there for 4 nights

Dave and Dwaine were really kind. The appartement have a really good location. Very good week ! 
See you soon
Great location and helpful trip advice.  Would stay again.

Dave is awesome! He responds fast and he has many tips to the city and to his apartment. It was clean, the place is amazing, and it is very central to the city. Although Dave was out of country at the time, he has companions that help with everything and he is still quick to respond. I would recommend this place to anyone and I will stay again next time I can visit Dublin!
Our stay was great. The location is excellent,  only a 5 minute walk to Temple Bar and we were away from all the noise.

Home was lovely and in a super great location. David and Dwain were super easy to communicate with and helpful. Room is a good size for two people and I appreciated I was able to do laundry as I packed for two weeks in a carry on. Room was clean and bathroom was larger than most Ive seen in Dublin apartments.
Great location, good host, and a very cozy apartment. We would stay there again for sure.

I loved the days I spent at Dave's apartment.  My suite was spacious and very comfortable.  All clean.  And the location is really excellent!  Just one day I had trouble getting into the building due to a lock problem.  I was lucky because someone in the building was on the porch and opened the door so I could enter.  It was already midnight.  Despite this incident I would return to the same place in Dublin. I recomend!

Great location! Walkable to pretty much everywhere in the city and very close to a bus stop. There is a lot of city noise through the windows which is not surprising considering the location, but my husband and I were woken up several times every night. Would recommend ear plugs. It was so nice to have a washing machine and dryer so we didnt have to carry too many clothes. The master suite was large and the bathroom was very nice. Our greeter was excellent as well.
Daragh is a great host. His tips are great. This avoids the typical tourist hot spots. Everything was just great! Dublin and Daragh's house are always worth a visit.
Loved staying here and would definitely recommended to other travelers.
Thank you for being so flexible! Really enjoyed how walkable everything was from the home. Wish we had more time to enjoy the rooftop patio and Dublin.

We had a lovely stay at Daragh's. Everything was as advertised but the hospitality was above & beyond. We really appreciated how helpful Daragh is and the help with what to see and do. The location is excellent and we'd definitely stay there again.

Daraghs place was perfect for our stay in Dublin. The location couldnt be better- located within walking distance to everything but on a quiet street. Daragh gave us wonderful suggestions about places to eat and drink and made us feel right at home. The apartment was absolutely spotless and had everything we could need. I would highly recommend staying here if you find yourself in Dublin!

We had a perfect time in Dublin. Daragh is a great host with lots of recommondation for eating and drinking. He was super friendly and helpful. His place is a lovely und clean. The apartment is located in the city center from where you can explore all the good spots in Dublin.

Great compact two bedroom house, with lots of character,  incredibly close to Temple Bar and the best of the city center, yet extremely quiet.  Well-designd and stylish, with books and art--highy recommended.  Cool small roof terrace.  I hope to return.  Thanks, Daragh!
The hosts and the house were great! Perfect location, walking distance to everything and the terrace was the icing on the cake. We would definitely stay again!

Perfect retreat: so quiet after a day in the city and yet right on the doorstep for everything we wanted to see in Dublin. The outside space was a real bonus and the safe parking right outside. Thank you

Daragh's home was wonderful and homey.  It is located in absolutely the best neighborhood for those wishing to see all of the main attractions.  We were able to walk everywhere - Christchurch cathedral, Grafton Street, Trinity College and the Guinness Storehouse.  It was perfect for our family of four!  Daragh also provided us with many recommendations and tips which was very helpful as it was our first trip to Dublin.

Friendly hosts with a great place close to Christschurch - we walked all over Dublin from their place! Edgar and Daragh both gave us lots of recommendations of places to go while we were there. The rooftop deck is an awesome place to relax with a beer after a long day of sightseeing. Would absolutely stay here again!

Daraghs townhouse was lovely. Its centrally located, within walking distance to all the things you need. Daragh provided a fantastic list of cafes, bars and restaurants, which was very helpful to us. Thanks for letting us stay!

Location was perfect!  Walking distance to every tourist spot in Dublin.
The rooftop deck is a great touch to have a drink on a nice night before heading out to dinner.  We were two couples traveling together and this fit our needs perfectly.
The home is in a perfect location. In a quite zone 5 minutes walk to the center. It is clean and comfortable. Absolutely suggest!
Perfect location, beautiful home and super helpful hosts. Highly recommend staying in this property! Youll be in for a treat

We absolutely LOVED our stay at Daragh's!  This place was perfect for us! we had two couples and there was plenty of room to cook dinner, enjoy the outdoor terrace, and relax.  The location was also perfect! I didn't realize before booking how perfect the location would be. It's so close to everything. When we checked in Daragh left us the most delicious lemon tart cake which we drooled over for two days and he also gave us so many recommendations for our short stay. Only downside is we didn't get to stay for longer!
This spot is everything you could want! Close to the city, great amenities and very clean. I would highly recommend staying here.
We can only recommend this accommodation. The host is really friendly and helpful. We enjoyed the time there very much. Everything was clean and neat.

Daragh isnt kidding when he says perfect locationùî it doesnt get more perfect than this! We only stayed 1.5 days in Dublin, but everything we visited was between a 7-18 minute walk from the townhouse. We felt like locals! Daragh also provided a tremendous list of recommendations (definitely eat at Queen of Tarts!), and is so friendly and accommodating. Highly recommend to anyone hoping to get the most out of their Dublin stay!
Unique experience. Outstanding location. Thanks Trish!
Excellent location with plenty to do on your doorstep. The king size bed was very comfy. Would definitely stay again.
We had a great time, very well located, all the required amenities and a great cosy feel to it. Wholeheartedly recommend.

Ashton and Caitriona were extremely hospitable and amazing hosts! Ashton gave me his city bike card to use the public bikes in Dublin, had plenty of recommendations, and even made me some breakfast in the morning! Loved staying here.
Best host in Dublin, you will not go wrong with them. Ask anything of them and they will try to accommodate without any issues. Thanks again for everything

Ashton's stylish home is bright, warm and welcoming.  His breakfast was nourishing and health-laden.  The linens and bed were lovely, and the private bath was fully stocked with soft, absorbent towels and all amenities.  It is a great location for walking along the Grand Canal and reaching most sites of City Central by foot, such as St. Stephen's Green, Guinness, Trinity College and Teeling Distillery.
Good location and clean space. Easy connection from airport and walking distance to city centre and attractions.

Loved Ashtons place.  Unfortunately didnt get to meet him in person as he ended up being out of town for the weekend so I had the place to myself!  However, he was in touch with me all throughout my stay to make sure I had everything I needed and to provide some great recommendations.  The location was in a newer area of the city and just a 20-30 minute walk to the center.  Would highly recommend a stay here!

Excellent hosts with numerous and great recommendations. The place was really clean and tidy with access to a very well stocked kitchen. Flat is probably 10-15 minutes from the centre of town and really easy to get to from the airport.

I'd 100% recommend staying with them!
Beautiful apartment, good location and lovely host.
The location is perfect, the appartment was so nice and the hospitality even better. We highly recommand this place.

My friend and I really enjoyed our stay here! The apartment was very clean and welcoming and our hosts were very hospitable. They provided a lot of tips for navigating the city and about local places to try! We would definitely recommend staying here!
Place is as advertised
A full five star review! Everything was perfect. Would recommend this flat without hesitation.
Ashton and Caitriona were really kind and helpful hosts and also the flat was as cozy and nice as it looked in the pictures. Highly recommendable. Thank you again!

Ashton was very helpful and the communication was great. Both Ashton and his partner are lovely people and made us feel like home in their lovely apartment. I highly recommend his place to anyone staying in Dublin!

Perfect is the only word that comes to my mind. We ¬¥ll come back thats for sure. Caitriona and Ashton made everything they could for us and we had a wonderful weekend at their appartment. Thanks again !
It couldn't have been better! I totally loved staying there. Thanks for having me!

So nice apartment! All places are cleaning and you feel like home , Aston is so kind , he give us some instructions and we can take wherever we want ! 
The distance to the city center is so close, 15 minutes by food
Very welcoming hosts and great location for exploring the city. Thanks for a great stay - definitely recommend!

Ashton and his girlfriend are very friendly and the apartment is amazing. Very clean, comfortable and very good located. 
100% recommended!

Ashton's flat is perfect to discover Dublin: near to everything but also a quiet place to rest. Ashton gave us very interesting tips, always answering very fast and trying to make us feel comfortable. Great host!
Everything was great! They picked me up from the airport on time and were very kind! Went above and beyond! I recommend staying here!

You mightve felt your past Airbnb experiences were great, even unbeatable. Unfortunately you are wrong. Des and Sinead have created a new standard for hospitality. It is OUTSTANDING. They always had food, tips, and quick responses. They picked us up from the airport and looked out for us, giving us printouts so we would know how to get around town. Not to mention they are friendly and great conversationalists. They are exceptional, and I wish I were there for the rest of my trip.
We arrived strangers and left family. These are some of the kindest people you will ever meet. They helped us plan things to do in the city and along the cliffs. Would recommend to anyone!
Great hosts, very helpful and knew the local area well. Would recommend to anyone

The epitome of great hosts! I was somewhat concerned staying there as they also live in the home. Mainly because I know my crowd is loud. And they accommodated 11 of us. 11 different personalities for 7 nights. They handled us like pros. Such attentive hosts, they were kind, and were always making sure that we got what we needed. They are phenomenal. Cheers! Stay with them, you wont regret it.

Very close to the Dublin Airport in a quiet little town.  If you like a bed and breakfast this is the place for you.  Des & Sinead are there in the home with you during your stay and are very helpful.

I know Im not the first to say it, but Des and Sinead are amazing hosts! Their place is warm and cozy and they are the most welcoming hosts Ive ever stayed with. They made everything easy, like picking up from the airport and dropping me off at the bus stop to get to the city center. We had a great time in their kitchen talking and sharing a drink, and I wish I couldve spent more than just a night here. Stay with these hosts while you still can, theyre fabulous.
Life saver for an overnight layover at Dublin airport.  Clean and comfortable rooms.
Highly recommend.  Excellent accommodations and hospitality.
This place is perfectly located for a night near the airport with a late arrival or an early morning departure. The pick-up and drop off was made very easy by Des and Sinead.
Superb hospitality, room was fab and ideal for a stay prior to an early flight out of Dublin!

Sinead met us at the door and took us on a tour of the home. She made sure everyone was being respectful of each others space. The bedroom and bathroom were lovely and modern, well equipped with a good amount of storage. In the morning we got a full breakfast! Very lovely hosts.

Des & Sinead definitely know what they are doing! They were extremely warm, caring, and hospitable. They made sure I knew where I was going and how to get there. They made sure I was comfortable. I would stay with them again! And the puppies were also pretty great :)

Many other reviewers have talked at length about how welcoming and helpful Des and Sinead are, so I can only echo what has already been said. Its all true; they are spectacular hosts and I feel lucky to have found them!

Lovely place. The room had a large comfortable bed and came with a hairdryer and a large mirror and shelf. It was quiet area and a bus ride into Dublin. The hosts were friendly and helpful with knowledge of the buses. Breakfast included and airport lifts for a small cost. Enough hooks in the bedroom and bathroom and shower was powerful. Have two adorable well behaved dogs.

Sinead was so helpful in making sure I had everything I needed and that I knew how I was going to get from one place to the next.  I was traveling alone and she seemed genuinely interested in making sure I was able to enjoy the beautiful city without getting myself lost in it!  The airport pick up was a nice perk and the bus stop is a short walk.

The room was perfect and was close to the airport which was great for our flight. Although breakfast was included, other guests were permitted to smoke right outside the kitchen and the smell of smoke was so strong we couldn't stay to enjoy breakfast.

We had a great stay at Des's place! She's an extraordinary host, communicative and her cute dogs were a joy for pet lovers like us! She prepared us breakfast (yummy scrambled eggs) and made us feel at home! Also offered some useful travel advice. Her place is in a village just near the airport, a perfect location for people on the go who want to avoid the crowded Dublin city.

The best airbnb!!!

Laura
A conveniently located place to rest between flights.
Des & Sinead are so welcoming and warm. We felt right at home and everything we needed was already set up for us!!! Perfect place to stay when in Ireland!!!
Sinead and Des were amazing hosts with a lovely house in a perfect location! Would certainly recommend

We had a wonderful stay in Des and Sineads! They could not have been more accommodating, going as far as to drive us to our venue for the evening, even picking my sister up on the way, which was just above and beyond anything I could have expected. The accommodation is beautiful and had everything we could have wanted or needed. Thank you both so much and I wish you all the best in your new venture!
Excellent hosts, and very friendly.
These guys are amazing. Dont hesitate- book them.
Great location for quick access to Dublin Airport. Des and Sinead are fantastic hosts.

Thanks so much for hosting me overnight, lovely company, Sinead gave me tips for the delicious scrambled eggs ! I recommend staying here if you would need a place as I did, next to the airport, to not miss your connection flight. Peaceful and cozy, and comfortable bed.

A true Irish B and B experience!  Sinead and Des were great hosts, they picked us up at the airport, drove us into town to enjoy a festival, and then drove us back to the airport. All for a nominal fee.  The room is sparkling clean and perfect for our family of four it had its own dedicated bathroom and shower. Sinead and Des served a nice Irish breakfast in their big Sunny kitchen in the morning for all of us, just like in the Irish B and Bs I remember from back in the day. They even had traditional Irish music playing. We had a fabulous stay and we would highly recommend them!!

Des & Sinead are lovely people. They took me and my family (with 2 young children) in at short notice when we had no where else to stay. Sinead & Des made us feel extremely welcome and were thoughtful with the kids. They both gave us useful suggestions of what we could do in the local area. The room and accommodation was extremely clean and nicely done out, and only 5mins from the airport. I would highly recommend them to anyone.
Ottimo b&b
I had a short and lovely stay, the place is so comfy, Des, Sineads and the dogs are adorable. Thanks for all the help.

Really good communication. Please read emails - as Sinead is very efficient at picking up from THE DEPARTURES at Dublin airport. Des and Sinead are really welcoming. The dogs are friendly and the rooms are spotless.
Located North of Dublin, taxis back in the evening are 20-30euro, there's also Buses which Sinead will talk you through - they're easy too. 
As a family we've not used airbnb before, I hope that all hosts are in Des and Sineads calibre. Thank you to you both.

Des and Sinead are awesome!  The house and facilities are incredible.  Cleanest AirBNB I've stayed at.  Bed is exceedingly comfortable.  I had an 18 hour layover in Dublin and wanted to get into the city center for a few hours.  I wouldn't have been able to do that without their kindness and aid.  Absolutely recommended.  Perfect!

I briefly stayed with Des & Sinead and very much appreciated the efforts they go to to make your stay as easy as possible. They picked me up from the airport and dropped me off for my flight back home! They also made it incredibly easy to figure out how to get into Dublin and offered many recommendations. The room was clean and quite large.
Perfect !
Very, very helpful and accommodating. Above and beyond expectation. Very spontaneous and thoughtful; anticipating our needs, often before wed  mention them.
We had an excellent stay at Des & Sinead. The hosts are very friendly, the house is perfect, the rooms are 5 *,  and the neighbourhood too!

10/10 couldn't fault. Des and Sinead were lovely hosts. Very friendly and welcoming with a lovely home. We were only staying with them 1 night before heading off on a weekend trip, and they even let us park our car at their house until our return!
Des and Sinead was a awesome and hospitable couple. We needed some special arrangements because of our early flight and it wasn't a problem for them. Good and calm place to stay if you go to Dublin.

Des and Sinead and very generous, kind, helpful, and flexible. Without their help, our final day touring the beautiful Howth and Malahide fishing villages would have been very difficult. Sinead dropped us off at the best spot on the cliffs of Howth, showed us which paths to hike, and even took pictures of our family. Later that evening, Sinead picked us up in Malahide. In the morning, Sinead made our family a lovely breakfast and coffee before sending us off. They also assisted with arranging transportation for our family and luggage for our morning ride to the Dublin airport. Thank you very much!

What a perfect way to start my
Holiday! Super quiet, being picked up at the airport made me feel super safe and for my
Week started off properly! Sinead has a bus card there for me and explained how everything worked! Thank you!

Very nice and careful people! 
I recommand it strongly
The beds are big and comfortable, the rooms are clean, and the hosts are incredibly helpful. Don't be surprised if you stick around longer just to have drinks with them!
Great room very close to the airport...we just needed a place to sleep before an early morning flight. We slept well...nice and quiet!

Me, my wife and my brother in law spent a night at this place.
We arrived around 10pm and left 4am to catch the flight at the Dublin airport.
We did not stay for a long time but it was enough to find the place and host are great.
Everything was super clean and she was kind and nice for any requests or questions.
In most case, I got a reply from her in few minutes.

Amazing hosts, Des and Sinead stand head and shoulders above any of the other six AirBNB hosts we experienced on our Ireland-Italy-Switzerland tour. They were all very good, but Swords was by far the most comfortable and accommodating without question. Our hosts were at the ready and very generous with their time and knowledge to help us have the trip of a lifetime. Thank you so much. We would book again without hesitation and recommend unreservedly to others.

Sinead and Des were a very welcoming and friendly couple! We loved staying with them and their little doggies.  Sinead made us a delicious breakfast the morning and gave us a ride to the airport.  Wonderful couple, we would love to stay with them again.

Great hospitality! 
Perfect airport location - close to picturesque Malahide and many shops and restaurants.

This jewel of an AirBnb is run by a wonderful couple who will do everything possible to make your stay a great one. Their willingness to pick you up / drop you at the airport is a real boon for a weary traveler, and the breakfast that Des cooks up can't be beat! Premises are pristine - really lovely. Highly recommended!
Wonderful hosts! They really care about their guests and are always ready with information and help. If you have a choice, choose them!!
You can expect nothing less then quality, staying with these two wonderful people!
Fantastic hosts, with great assistance and support, as well as a wonderful place- comfortable, clean, stylish and very good location, especially for getting to the AirPort.
Best place out of the 3 I stayed at in Ireland. They were very hospitable and the bed was so comfy! I had an early morning flight and they left out breakfast for me. Absolutely wonderful people!

Des & Sinead are lovely - very warm and engaging. Their home is comfortable and clean and just perfect for what I needed - a nice place to stay the evening before my flight home. They are generous and very kind :)
Spokojnost

Could not have been happier with every aspect of our stay with Sinead and Des. They are true super hosts. We felt safe and happy in their townhouse and they overextended themselves by providing transportation to the bus stop and into Malahide.
Great hospitality! They went above and beyond to make sure we had the best stay possible
Des and Sinead are amazing, friendly hosts who made our last night in Ireland relaxing and very enjoyable.

Although our stay was short, we had a good experience staying at Des & Sineads place. They are a personable couple who were very welcoming to us and gave us a great recommendation for a local dining spot. Our room was clean, stylish and comfortable for the night. We were only a 5 or so minutes from the airport which was very convenient since we had an early morning flight. We did not get to have breakfast but were welcomed to fix coffee before our early departure. We recommend Des and Sinead for a comfortable stay when in the Dublin area.

Hospitality was outstanding. Sinead picked us up from the airport, drove us to town, and dropped us back to the airport the next day. Proximity to the airport is perfect for layover travelers like us. Couldnt have been a more perfect stay.

We just saw the lady which was really nice with us. She waited for us to arrive late but still open us the door. Also not so easy so sleep with young baby but everything was OK all furniture . And she made the most perfect eggs I eat in my life

Des and Sinead are The Best.   !!!  Lovely people, extremely friendly and hospitable and perfect place to stay.  Comfortable bed, nice conversation....I could go on... Highly recommend to any travelers.
A stay with Des & Sinead is an amazing experience. I really dont think youll find any more welcoming and helpful hosts.

Top notch. The most down to earth and genuine people Ive ever met.
By far the best Airbnb experience Ive ever had. Great convos, super helpful, and went above and beyond. Des even made me a quick sandy before heading out to enjoy a few Guinness with some lads.
Cheers Des & Sinead.

Im not usually stuck for words, so this is a first. We stayed with Des and Sinead on the last night of our month-long holiday in England, Scotland, and Ireland. I could not have picked a better place to stay. Their hospitality is simply outstanding; they both went above and beyond at every opportunity. We arrived as strangers and left the next morning as friends. It was the last night of my 86yo mums last trip overseas and she loved every minute of it. I cant recommend a stay with Des and Sinead highly enough. I will go out if my way on future trips to stay with them again.
Des & Sinead were exceptionally accommodating for the last leg of our honeymoon. They have a sparkling clean, warm home and theyre super close to the airport!

This B&B is the perfect location next to Dublin airport. Des and Sinead are top-notch hosts and go out of their way to be very helpful. The room was clean and nicely decorated and the beds were comfortable. This was the only B&B on our trip that had a counter with the bathroom sink. Very handy. We stayed in the double room which was on the 3rd floor- lots of stairs. We could hear the airplanes in the distance all night, but it wasn't too loud. They made sure to have breakfast ready for us even though we left early to catch our flight. A great place to stay.

Des & Sinead were fantastic, my plane was scheduled to arrive after the check in time and was further delayed, Des was happy to wait up to acomodate my arrival. Sinead then made a cracking breakfast and made sure I got to the airport on time. The place was also really nice, clean and welcoming. Would definitely stay again, hopefully for longer in the future!

Sinead and Des-  Were very hospitable. Sinead greatted us at the door and Des was available with tips of local entertainment and taxi services. We enjoyed very much the chat in the kitchen the night we stayed.  Rooms and bathrooms were clean with fresh botted water on hand. Beds were very comfortable. Tea was available for your morning wake up. Dublin airport is just minutes away. I highly recommend this Airbnb for your next stay in Dublin, keeps you out of the city but minutes to get there when you want.

Des and Sinead are very welcoming and open to spending time with you.  The two dogs are sweet too!  Very close to the airport which was perfect for us.  Would definitely recommend and stay there again.
Des and Sinaed were lovely, took great care of us, perfect communication, a lovely place, a fantastic breakfast and a really helpful airport transfer :)
Some of the best hosts I've ever had. The kindness of good friends, the comfort of a home with the professionalism of a 5 star hotel. Simply the best!!!
The best house and hostesses. 100 % recommended
Great place and very fun accommodating hosts.  Awesome stsy

We were picked up so quickly by Sinead from the airport it was amazing and found ourselves welcomed by two great dogs when we arrived at the house.  We did not have the pleasure of meeting Des, but enjoyed conversation with Sinead who took great care of us during our brief visit.
The breakfast was delicious and the beds so comfortable!   It was very quiet at night even though in a neighborhood.  An excellent place to stay!!  Thanks!

Sinead waited for us and welcomed us in this beautiful b&b, really convenient, just next to the airport.

Everything was super clean and tidy. We also have a really good breakfast on the morning before catching our flight.
I would definitely recommend anyone to stay at Sineads place if they need to be close to the airport!
Great stay. Des and Sinead provide awesome hospitality, and its in a great location if trying to stay near the airport. Thank you again Des and Sinead!
The house is nice and the bed was soft and the room was clean. The local pub is a 5 min walk away and we enjoyed it very much. Hosts are nice and accommodating!
Great location for a 7am flight at the airport; only took 8mins! Friendly host and good chat with other guests. Comfortable bed and nice dogs :)

Des and Sinead were so nice. we had been accidentally been over charged. ( That i was totally unaware of) and as soon as we arrived Des explained and he returned the money to us on Airbnb. Such a  welcoming house with 2 beautiful friendly dogs. We were in the area for a concert and Sinead was nice enough to bring us and other guests to the venue.  When we arrived home they had a bottle of water in the bedroom waiting for us which unfortunately didn't stop me getting a hangover but definitely helped. would definitely stay here again.

A comfortable and cozy place to stay that is convenient to the airport.  Very welcoming hosts who do everything possible to make sure youre comfortable.  They sent us off with a delicious breakfast in our bellies.

Such an incredible stay! I have never met a couple more hospitable, caring and fun. The place was great; clean, spacious, has everything you'd want and more. Great location if needing to stay next to the airport. Also great to go visit Malahide. I will absolutely stay with Des and Sinead on my next adventure.
Fantastic place to stay, great location.  Sinead was very helpful.
Foi muito bom ficar com eles

my stay was only meant to be a convenience stay due to proximity to the airport. But apart from a nice clean room and everything one could need it turned into a really nice experience with lovely, helpful hosts and the company of other guests around the table. It just felt like a home away from home.  Cannot recommend more highly.
Very nice, clean and supper convenient.

As described, Des and sinead,s place is just 10 minutes from the airport. They allowed us to check in early to keep our luggage and dropped us to the bus stop with a free pass to and from the city. they made our stay very homely. sinead also dropped us to the airport at 3 AM!

Des and Sinead are the warmest and kindest people. They were very helpful and giving. The breakfast was amazing! They drove us from and to the airport and helped us with the bus to Dublin (which isnt a long way). We would most definitely like to come again. They are the best hosts. It felt like we were friends.

I really enjoyed my stay at Des and Sinead's.  As soon as I arrived, I was welcomed with warm hospitality. Des and Sinead were very friendly and they made me feel right at home.   The bedroom and bathroom were clean and very comfortable.  The airport is just a few minutes away. This was the perfect quiet retreat before my flight the next morning. Thank you for a great stay. I highly reccomend booking with Des and Sinead.
The accommodations and hospitality Des and Sinead provided were wonderful! Sinead picked us up at the airport and also cooked a great breakfast.
Great stay. Very close to airport.
A great welcoming place to stay.  It is close to the airport. Very clean place.  Thanks Des & Sinead for your hospitality.

Excellent location, close to the airport.  Sinead picked us up at the airport and when we were ready for dinner she drove all six of us to Town.  Their hospitality was excellent.  Very helpful.  Cant wait to visit them when they open in Scotland.
Had a great stay with Des & Sinead. Was made extremely welcome and felt very comfortable during my stay. A great location a short distance from Dublin Airport and the lovely town of Malahide.
Very friendly and helpful hosts. Sinead and Des really go the extra mile to make their guests feel at home. I would not hesitate to stay there on my next trip to Dublin.

Wonderful stay with Des and Sinead.. We booked with them based on close location to the airport and esp their offer to pick up or drop off at airport. That was a big help to us. Sinead helped us with bus info into Dublin City which we appreciated.

I was in Swords just overnight on a layover, and I can't emphasize enough how amazing this air bnb is!  Incredible hospitality, wonderful accommodations, and they picked me up and dropped me back off at the airport as well. I was able to explore the little village of Malahide a few minutes down the road, too. They also served breakfast prior to my departure the next morning. Do yourself a favor and stay with Des & Sinead, what a fun and authentic experience!  Thank you so much!
Lovely couple.  Great hosts.
5 out of 5!
Great flat in central location. Thoughtful and responsive host. Highly recommended.

The house is very nice and clean and in about 15 minutes by foot we were at the city centre. The cleaning was perfect and in the kitchen there was everything we could need, with very new furniture. Ashton was a perfect host.

You can expect an easy check-in to a sparkling clean apartment with an abundance of amenities, grocery stores and restaurants nearby - and a short walk to the heart of Dublin.  Ashton is quick on replies and his recommendations are spot-on.

My first time using Air bnb and based on this experience I will definitely use again. We didnt get to meet Ashton, but his partner greeted us when we arrived and gave us plenty of recommendations based upon our interests. His communication throughout our stay was much appreciated, helping us with the public transport etc. The apartment is fantastic. Extremely clean, very modern and only a 15 minute walk from the city centre but also have restaurants on the door step.  They provided breakfast for the mornings and the whole range of amenities to make you feel right at home.  If we ever go back to Dublin, we will 1000% be looking to stay here again, it really made our weekend having such a nice apartment to stay in.
Nice stay in a well equipped apartment
Excellent apartment! We had such a lovely stay. Ashton was such a good host. Would definitely recommend!
Excellent stay, this condo is beautiful and clean. Located around great restaurants and the river. Walking distance to all must see locations.

5* aren't enough to describe Ashton apartment! The place is amazing, everything is super clean and confortable. Ashton left us lots of food for breakfast, which we really appreciated! We had a perfect stay and we are coming back again.

Ashton is such a great host, he went above and beyond to help us have an amazing stay! His apartment is stunning and I would recommend anyone to book with Ashton! Would definitely return if in Dublin again! 10/10!!
Small but cozy house with everything you need, perfect for two persons. Amanda was quick to answer all our questions. Only inconvenience: it's quite cold in the bathroom.
Very sweet acomodation, well connected with a city center!

Best place to stay while visiting Dublin. The city center was  easy to reach by the bikes they provided for us. Also free of charge!! Very nice neighborhood and nice place to rest. Very warm, two heaters if needed!!! Thank you for everything again! xx
Bis auf das total durchgelegene Schlafsofa alles o.K

Clean, private place to stay in a quiet neighborhood. Have to pass through some tighter places to reach the apartment which can be a tiny bit challenging with luggage or bodily heft. Very kind and accommodating hosts!

Takes about 40 minutes between the walking and bus ride to get to the city center. Make sure you have 3 euros in exact change!

Amanda and Paul are very friendly hosts, that provide a little flat in their garden. The place is self-contained and if you are staying here you will definitely have time for yourself. The place is comfy but a bit cold. 
The bus and train station are further away then described.
Great host, easy checkin and very private. Would definitely recommend.
Nice place, conveniently located - decent bicycles at disposal

Good hosts , only see the fella 2 times so if you want to be left alone it's great . Location is a bit of a distance from Dublin town but tbh we found our way around easy enough with buses.
