The view is nice from the top and you dont get any noise from the places below you. Pantibar, a gay bar, is right below the apt. and its actually quite a nice spot for a drink. Also helps that youll be staying right above itîjust remember youve got stairs to walk up after those cocktails 

The space itself left me wanting a bit more, but its a studio so Im not sure what else I expected. 

We had a few questions and some issues with communication through Airbnb messages, but Im unsure if it was an issue with the app itself. 

Overall, we didnt stay inside most of the time anyway, so the location made this place key. For the price, I would stay again!

The location was really good. Early check in time was one of the main reasons we chose to stay there after coming in the red-eye from overseas. The place is pretty noisy, but thats to be expected given the very central location. It needs a good cleaning but was manageable.

James' apartment was in a great location and is a no frills apartment. My only complaint was how uncomfortable the bed was. I stayed there 3 nights and don't think I could have slept there any more. Overall it was a great experience
Great stay! Beautiful apartment in perfect location. I would highly recommend it to visit Dublin city center.

James was really communicative from first booking and gave us great travel tips on both getting to the place, checking in and ideas for what to do whilst in the area. The place was nice and clean, with interesting decor (cow radio anyone?!)

Two things to consider before booking though: 
1. The place is on the top floor and there is no lift and 
2. The place is above a gay bar, which means It could be a little bit loud, but we loved it and found the bar a great place to go for a drink. 

Would 100% come back, thanks so much for having us!
Well-situated, brilliant for the Luas and for exploring Dublin without paying an arm and a leg. Great for the traveller on a budget!
James place is so central to everything it's a great place to stay! It is a few flights of stairs up so be ready for that, but it's worth it for the price and location.
Cozy place in a great location. Everything is walking distance aways.

Fantastic place, perfect for couples, and it's an absolutely amazing location. The place was so clean and comfortable, and James was super in his responsiveness and his tips. We had an amazing time. We will definitely be back!!
The location is great! Close to the the night life (Temple St) and walking distance to all that Dublin has to offer. We walked from the apartment to St Pats Cathedral within 20 minutes.

As others have described. Excellent location. Clean. Has your basics. Others complain about the bed, I had no problem. Stairs, which aren't an issue for most. Some noise from the street but we stayed on a Saturday night.  Great value,  perfect location. Parking garage a block away for around 30 euro for 24 hours. I would choose to stay at James place again
Perfect spot for exploring Dublin for a few days. Good value, and easy to get to all "tourist" attractions.

This loft is in a perfect location to tour Dublin by foot. Central, across from Temple Bar, and extremely quiet.

This is located directly above a fantastic gay bar which we had great drinks at and enjoyed the atmosphere.

It is on the 4th floor with no elevator, but this was well noted on the listing so we were fully prepared to climb the stairs!

Wonderful place to stay, and would definitely stay again.

The location is very good, just a quick walk and you are at the main spots, a supermarket directly is at the next corner.
The apartment was clean and typically for Dublin standards. 
James wasnt around but he replied very quick so everything worked out well.
We can definitely recommend a stay at the flat!
Great space for two people in a super convenient location, was walking distance to center city dublin. The host was also very easy and quick to communicate with. Overall a great stay!
Central location, clean apartment!
Great location, quiet at the weekends. There are quite a few flights of stairs to go up but all in all a great little find.

The  house is in the best location. A part from the location, I really like the big windows. But the house needs renovation. The mattress is really uncomfortable, the paint has to be redone and the forniture needs to be renovated. The price is lower than other solutions I have seen in that location, but still expensive. At least a good mattress should be provided.

James is a very good communicator and check in was easy. However, it was our last night in Ireland and we were looking for a nice centrally located flat and were disappointed. The location of this flat is good but we were disappointed at the unfinished state of the flat, the stark decor and the front halls/entrance to building.
Great location!

The location can not be beat, central to everything. I walk everywhere when visiting a new city, and James place made that so easy to do. I didnt have an issue with the stairs, but the bed was a bit trying in the back after the first night.

This place is an absolute dynamite location! Can't argue that. I was a bit miffed at how absolutely terrible the mattress was and the fact that I got locked out because of a malfunctioning key fob. Again the fob, not James's fault and he was really good with communication. But ya, dude, mattress..... I think it was older then me.
Overall, great spot to party in the city center.

Cons: The toilet tank takes around 40 minutes to fill with water, the ceiling was cut for some repairs.
Pro: Center location, quiet place
It was a lovely apartment in a very central area. Really good price for the location. The only downside was walking to the top floor to get there. It was a great quirky apartment
I didn't have any problems with hosting!  The location is very good!

Our stay with Lia was very good, she was very warm and welcoming and we felt at home since the beginning of our stay. We could use the kitchen as we pleased and she provided us some things like bread, juice and jam to make breakfast for ourselves. There are two buses that connect with the city centre running each every 30' so there's a bus every 15' (during the day only).
Very comfortable and an excellent host.
Lia`s Hospatality was great. Excellent place to stay when visiting South County Dublin for business or short break. Marie
Lovely, comfortable stay. Close to good amenities and lovely to be able to park on premises! Lia is very hospitable and always available to help with any questions. Will be back!
Lia was a lovely host and everything went smoothly.
Great place , great hospitality
Great place.  Thanks again :)
Great.
Lia's place is great and I would strongly recommend it.

Pros:
- Convenient location for both Dublin and nearby countryside.
- Comfortable room including a desk (and an early edition of The Lorax by Dr Seuss!)
- Lia was friendly and helpful (including doing some laundry for me while I was out!)

Cons:
- The hallway had (to my nose) a significant smell of cigarette smoke. Thankfully it was barely noticeable in the bedroom, and not at all in the kitchen.
- The bathroom had a non-frosted window.

Lia is very warm, welcoming and easy going. She made me feel  comfortable and at home. She also  helped me with my mobility scooter and made the access to her garden where i parked it as easy as she could. I really enjoyed chatting to Lia and would definitely stay again. Her home is colpurful and arty which i loved with a lovely garden. V impresed!
Lia is a lovely and hospitable host. Beautiful quite clean house in a very nice part of Dublin.

Lia is a wonderful host and I always have a very comfortable stay on her home. She goes out of her way to make you feel welcome but is also respectful of your privacy. I will most definitely keep returning to stay!

Arrived early and Lia was more then willing to have me check in early. Her place is out of Dublin, but very easy to get to and not far from the water. She was very friendly and offered me some tips about things to do in Dublin and locally and how to get around. Even though her place is outside of Dublin, I had no problem finding places to eat. There is a Lidl and Aldi right up the road and cafes and shops in the local town as well. Lia made sure to check in every day to see how I was getting on and consistently asked if I needed anything. I will definitely be coming back!
Lia was a lovely host. I had a long day and it was nice to get a comfy bed and a good sleep. Will be back
Lia is a great host, I thoroughly recommend her place
Nice and convenient to all the major attractions with bus transportation very close.
Nice room with a spacious bed and a good desk for working/studying. Lia has a really nice garden, which is perfect when the Irish sun is shining:)

Lia was very friendly and helpful. The main downside was that the room smelled of stale cigarettes but after I aired it with the window open a few hours it was fine. Not super close to the coastline towns but walking or bus there was pretty easy, and the price was good.
Had a lovely stay with Lia. She is a fantastic host and very caring, ensuring you have everything to make you comfortable. I will certainly be back!

Great location for the sea front, and hills. 
Nice room and lovely garden. 
Very welcoming host.
At a very good location. There is a big Aldi and Lidl near the house. The connectivity is good with bus 7A. Overall value for money spent.

Lia is a delight and staying with her way great! Her place felt comfortable and homey, and had everything I needed. I really enjoyed my stay!  It's close to buses that can easily take you to Dun Laoghaire and Dublin, but do your homework about the area, as it is quiet and residential. It's great value and I'll be back again.
Lia was an extremely friendly host and the room was spacious and clean. Would definitely stay here again!

A lovely little room in a nice house. A stone's throw away from Dun Laoghaire and the Dart, and with easy access to local bus routes taking you into the city. It was a pleasure to stay here, and Lia was a fantastic host.
Lia was a complete joy and made my stay wonderful! I highly recommend for house!!
Lia was a wonderful host. Very helpful & responsive
Lia welcomed me warmly to her colourful home. Might not be the best place if you are a light sleeper or sensitive to cigarette smoke.

Lia is a great host with a great home! Great value for money in an area which can be pricey to stay in! Lia made me cups of tea, washed my clothes and made me feel very welcome!  Great location to walk in to town and all necessary shops within a couple minutes walk. I travel to Sallynoggin frequently and will be staying here again!
I booked the same day & it was a wonderful experience for my guest who popped in unexpectedly. They were quick to respond & very accommodating.

Fiona was an absolutely delightful host. The house is in great location - not too far from the city centre and in a quiet location. A few nice touches like milk and breakfast items upon arrival. Thank you!

What a perfect home! Located in Clontarf, you will be a quick bus ride in to city center -  about 12 minutes. Theres a Nolans grocery 10 min from the home, and an Aldi and Lidl about 25 min walk from there. With the location being very close to the ocean, anywhere you walk will be quite lovely. 

The home was cozy, furnished with everything you need. Kitchen was loaded with all the essentials, and quite stylish. 

My wife and I had the opportunity to stay 2 months here and we loved every moment of it. We will definitely be back if we can! Fiona was quick on the responses, and took great care of us when we had questions. 

All in all, this was what you would expect from a stellar Airbnb!
Fiona's place was great. We stayed for 3 weeks and it has everything you need. It's a cozy, sunny place in a great neighbourhood

Fiona's apartment is located in a great neighborhood, very close to the sea and well connected by Dublin Bus network. We could recommend this place for a couple or a family. Fiona was a great host, very responsive and was flexible with check in and checkout.

I booked Fiona's place for my parent's 2 week visit to Dublin and could not be happier.  Nice clean, spacious and bright apartment in a beautiful part of Dublin by the coast, it is close to Clontarf's fabulous local eateries and amenities and only 15 minutes into town  by bus.  Fiona was a great host and a pleasure to deal with.  Highly Recommended!!

Great place for a week of work in Dublin. Easy access in and out of Dublin and its very quiet. They had nobody checking in the day of my departure so let me decide on my check out time. Outstanding hospitality. Well definitely be back.
Fionas townhouse is in a perfect location. Clontarf is so nice lots of stores, bars and restaurants .  We had a great time.

Beautiful townhouse. We loved the conservatory! Plenty of room for our family of four. 
Amazing treats ready for us when we arrived. Thank you so much! 
Lovely area too - great for sea walks along the prom and nice restaurants and parks nearby. 
Sparkling clean. The photos dont do it justice. 
Fiona was really helpful and very understanding when we encountered a problem. 
Really recommend and will be back!
It was an amazing experience and a beautiful space, I loved the communication between Fiona and I. I surely recommend this place.

Eamonn is a great host and a great person. Super friendly, always willing to help even for the little needs, and he knows how to make you feel welcome and at home. The house is lovely, and my room very large and comfortable. The location is amazing, the area is very elegant, peaceful and at reasonable walking distance from everything. Highly recommended. Thanks a million, Eamonn!
No Thanks

Ellie is a wonderful host - she stocked the fridge for us, provided laundry tokens, and gave us lots of tips in binder format. The apartment has everything you need for a pleasant stay and is close to many restaurants and pubs but is still quiet at night. We did have some problems with the tap water (was told not to drink it for a day), but that was a neighborhood-wide problem. Ellie is also renovating the apartment soon, so Im sure it will be even nicer in the near future!
Small but convenient flat which felt like a real home

Ellie could not be a better super host! She is incredibly thoughtful and offers such a warm and genuine welcome. Easy access to the apartment and thoughtful amenities like simple groceries and local recommendations. Her home is a lovely respite from the fun and busy city center. I highly recommend her home and we would definitely reach out to her again!

We really enjoyed our stay at Ellie's apartment.  She is an excellent host and provided us with many great suggestions for the neighborhood upon our arrival and during our stay.  The apartment is in a great neighborhood and close (walkable) to many of the attractions of Dublin.  The apartment was very clean and Ellie provided us with many little 'extras' for breakfast and for snacks.  We highly recommend the apartment and Ellie as a host!!
Ellie is a super host. She really makes you feel at home. And her apt is well situated and well stocked to fine you the feeling of being a resident of Dublin. Its a great place!!

Great location, cleanliness was 10/10, extremely cozy and breakfast items in the fridge were just some of the little touches that Ellie does to ensure your stay is perfect! Would definitely recommend and would definitely stay again.

Ellies house is wonderful, the room is clean and comfortable. her house is easy access. Also Ellie is very nice, she gave us information when our car was broken, and she even prepared some food for our breakfast. Highly recommend to everyone:)!

Everything was perfect at Ellies place. She met me upon my arrival, explained how everything worked and even filled the fridge with lovely staples (bread, OJ, cream, coffee, butter, cheese, eggs) so I was well set to fix myself a lovely breakfast the next day. Location is far enough away from the hustle and noise at the city center, but close to a bus line that goes directly there or if youre up for a nice walk thru Stephans Green, its about 30 minutes to the city center of Dublin. Directly across the street is a pub and restaurant, it can be noisy at night when the patrons stand outside and have their beers, but Ellie has gone beyond and installed sound-proof windows which work like a charm.  I would definitely recommend Ellies lovely apartment and would stay again should I travel to Dublin in the future.

Ellie was lovely and very willing to make suggestions on how to get around and did her very best to get me in early.  Much appreciated!  She made her place very welcoming and made me feel at home right from the start.  Thank you

Beautiful modern apartment with every amenity you need. This host has raised the bar on our expectations for future trips - the FIRST one to actually put the NBù in AirBNB!  We enjoyed being outside the hub of tourist activity - this ones in a posh neighborhood.  We liked walking to downtown attractions- allowing a nice stroll through St. Stephens Green each morning and evening. Also, super easy connection to airport bus 1/2 block away.  We loved this spot - the host provided excellent tips on transportation options.
Exceptional value.

Ellie was a fabulous host - we couldn't have asked for more.  The apartment was very clean and she left plenty of snacks for us in the fridge which was quite a nice surprise.  The pub across the street was great, too - one of our favorites and we visited it more than once!  The sheets and towels, furniture, etcetera were all of very nice quality, too.  This place is an excellent value.  We would definitely stay here again.

This place does not disappoint. We were so happy we booked it and loved it. Ellie is so responsive and an amazing host. She leaves food in kitchen for an easy breakfast and gives great recommendations. The area was great it was quieter which is what we needed. I would recommend this place if you love a little get away and want to stay off the beaten path from tourists.

Ellies apartment is amazing. I stayed here in August 2019 with my cousin and we had an incredible time. The apartment is small but so well decorated and feels very comfy. It is an easy walk to St Stephens Green and Grafton Street. Also , there is a great AirCoach service that goes almost right to the front door from the airport for about ‚Ç¨9 per person each way. Very reasonable. We also did three bus tours (Cliffs of Moher and Belfast with Paddywagon Tours, and the Dublin Hop on Hop off tour) and we were able to walk to the meeting places from the apartment.
Ellie goes above and beyond. The bed was very comfortable and she left us some beautiful fruit, cheese, bread, and salami which was very appreciated.
Unfortunately we were not able to meet Ellie in person but that was because our flight was delayed. However, Ellies communication with us was great and she was extremely helpful in ensuring we had everything we needed, as well as helping us with getting our keys. We would recommend this apartment to any two people interested in exploring Dublin. Perfect for friends or couples!
All perfect. Thank you very much!

If you stay here, you will not be disappointed.  My mom and I stayed here for 3 nights and were happy to call it our home base.  Ellie was there to welcome us and give us tips on seeing Dublin as well as great places to eat.  She also graciously provided some groceries that went way above our expectations.  The location of the place is great, as it is easy access to lots to see and do.
Excelente servicio!

Very nice place. Clean, quiet, yet within walking distance of central Dublin. Very nice to have some food/breakfast items stocked for our use when we arrived. We never met Ellie, but she was within easy reach via messaging app and super helpful when we had questions.
The location is very good, but the apartment is very small for a family of three though!

Ellie is an amazing host. Very good communication and she makes you feel very welcome. The apartment is beautiful and has everything you need, even breakfast. If I will come back to Dublin I would definitely choose to stay at this apartment again. Everything was perfect, thank you!
A lovely apartment within easy reach by tram of Dublin city centre.
Everithing was perfect!

Jose and Vadym's place is a nice and clean place to stay! The great thing about their place it's that only a 20-minute tram ride into the center of town and it's close to a lot of great places in Dublin!
We had such a wonderful stay! Easy to get into the city center and Vadym was very welcoming and helpful!

clean, safe, comfortable, stylish, calm, modern, quiet apartment, very close to the fatima tram stop.
highly recommended!
i loved my two nights there and slept very well.

Great place! Immaculate and cozy.. nice fresh open space. Vadym was very helpful with specific usage of space which made things very easy.  The shower was roomy and perfect. We slept well and enjoyed being very close to everything:) we highly recommend anyone to stay here! 
Hang dai Chinese food and Legit coffee are a must.
Very nice and confortable acomodation!
Cosy, quiet, clean, conveniently located, reasonably priced, attuned host; what more could you want? Great decor, guys.
Super clean room with balcony, great bed and really nice to have our own bathroom and access to kitchen. Would recommend :)
This is an excellent shared space. Hosts are very helpful. Great location near Dublin city tram (luas) and Guiness Brewery. Cleanliness at high standards.

Luogo molto tranquillo , leggermente fuori mano a piedi ma molto ben servito coi mezzi .
Casa accogliente e molto pulita con i padroni di casa davvero discreti e gentili

As a Single, Senior, Female traveler, I am very particular where I stay and with whom. I can honestly say that staying with Vadym and Jose has been this time, as well as the last 5 times been part of the best experiences I have had in Ireland. The location is great for getting around the city and connecting with places outside the city using public transportation. The apartment is lovely, comfortable, very clean and welcoming. They work hard to make sure their guests have everything they need. I would recommend them to any of my family or friends.
Thank you for a great trip to Dublin!

Warm hospitality, kindness and respect to  guests.
Nice flat, a private bathroom and free access to all equipments.
Very clean apartment, very friendly host, modern and tastefully decorated. Only a few meters to the luas station. Very quiet location, as room with balcony aligned to the courtyard. Gladly again.

The place was clean, very comfortable (slept like a baby) and well connected to the city. Had no trouble getting around or to the airport. Vadym was very very friendly and helpful (Jose was in Spain during my stay). It had everything I needed and made me feel right at home. For this price a true jewel.
Very very nice home, owner is more than friendly and everything is clean and tidy. Perfect
Precies zoals op de foto . Alles goed geregeld
We highly recommend Jose $ Vadyms Air BnB. They provide a very clean, safe and convenient to all touristic destinations.

Fabulous hosts in a lovely, well kept apartment. Really close to a tram stop.
We would highly recommend this AirBnB.

We had 3 nights staying in Jose and Vadyms apartment meeting both of them while we were there. The place is exactly as the photos show and while a little away from main city centre it is so easy with luas only a minute away and the leap visitor card was good value (we purchased the 72hr for ‚Ç¨19.50).  It was an easy 10 min walk to Guinness Storehouse and the arch cafe is just across from apartment for a good value for money breakfast (‚Ç¨3.50 huge bowl of porridge). The apartment was very quiet so we slept well and very informative information on their profile for public transportation etc which was all accurate.

Jose and Vadym were very welcoming and accommodating. The apartment is very updated and is as clean as a hotel room. The place is very close to public transportation and is located in a safe neighborhood. Would definitely stay again!
Nice host, and lovely apartment.
Wonderful hosts, fantastic location and a great place to stay. I would definitely recommend to others.

Great location, right next to the tram stop and guiness factory for stop at hop on hop off bus. Great communication from Vadym throughout and very welcoming as well. Place was spotless and the balcony was a fab little extra.

We had really awesome time and felt welcome for the whole stay. Vadym and Jose are the kindest hosts and their cat Linda is a beautiful lady! Clean, cozy, comfortable, great location (super easy to get to the centre) - perfect place to stay in Dublin :)

We could not expect a better welcome from our host, Vadym, who not only spoke great English, he also spoke out mother tongue! He gave us excellent recommendations for meals and places to visit and the house was sparkling clean! He was a true sweetheart and we're definitely staying with him when we come back to Dublin!

We had a great stay in Dublin here! We only met Vadym but he was very helpful in making sure we found the place and giving us everything we needed. Easy access to the Luas right outside the apartment. Highly recommend!

A lovely space, very clean and tidy.  A short walk from the city centre and right next to a tram stop. Really generous hosts who offer good recommendations and information about the area and sights of Dublin. Great communication and really helpful.  It was a really super stay.

Vadym and Jose's home was lovely, and so was Vadym. 
I really enjoyed my stay there (check out the art, it was stunning) and I hope to visit again. I appreciated all the little touches (usb charger) and how comfortable everything was.

Note: I had to take a taxi because the LUAS didn't operate in the early morning of Saturday, so check your travel times before you book. Taxi fare ran me about 30 euros for a 5:45am pick up. 
Otherwise, it should be an easy trip via the 747 airport bus and then the place itself is very close to the LUAS station. 
Note the check-in time is stated as 5pm, so bear that in mind!

Vadym is a wonderful host. Very considerate and so welcoming. The apartment is spotlessly clean, private and very stylish. The kitchen had all you could want and the bathroom is for your sole use. Close to public transport and some of Dublins best sites.

Jose and Vadyms place exceeded all of our expectations. It was a 2 minute walk to the LUAS station (Fatima) and that helped us a great deal, as my husband is currently on the mend from a broken leg. The room and apartment was sparkling clean and very stylish, yet very warm and inviting. We felt right at home and even enjoyed coffee on our private balcony. I would highly recommend staying with Jose and Vadym during your stay in Dublin. We enjoyed it so, so much!!

The apartment is well connected to public transport. In addition the apartment ist very clean. 
The two guys are great hosts and give great tips for our stay in Dublin. Thanks a lot :)
Highly recommended once you get your bearings. Its a close walk to the Guinness Brewery.

Very nice and stylish apartment. The directions were perfect, Vadym met us and gave us some good tips for the city. The apartment is immaculately clean and the neighborhood is quiet! It is about a 20-35 minute walk into town center, but take the tram, it is worth it, so convenient.

Another tip, while Dublin is lovely, we particularly loved getting out a bit. Malahide Castle and the town near it are a quick and affordable Dart ride out of town (so is Howth), and you get to see and smell the sea before tucking into a cozy pub.
Very friendly and welcoming host :-)

We had a lovely stay and Vadym was very welcoming. Good communication for arrival and the location of the apartment is very easy to get to. Thanks for making things easier and letting us leave our luggage later than normal.

Thank you! It was a nice Trip. 
Vadym was very nice and we felt comfortable. Everthing went well.

A lovely warm and homely place to stay with style and immaculately presented throughout. Bed very comfortable. Vadym was very polite, friendly and hospitable. On my way to work he left fresh filter coffee for me in the kitchen, was much needed. This little thoughtful touch made such a difference to my stay. Highly recommend this place!
Lovely host. The apartment was just as advertised and a good location.

We had a great stay at Jose and Vadyms Airbnb! The apartment is very clean and modern and is in a good location close to the Guinness storehouse as well as other bars, restaurants, grocery stores, etc. definitely recommend!
It was just like the pictures and really clean. They provided everything I needed and more, and it was a generally pleasant experience, the host were so nice and welcoming !!

Jose & Vadyms space was beautiful and perfect for what we needed for the night. Its right next to a tram line that is very convenient to get to the city center, but still walkable (~20-30min). They were wonderful hosts and communication and check in were a breeze. Would definitely recommend :)

It was an amazing stay in Dublin. The place is very well situated, the room is very stylish, clean and cosy with all the amenities and extra thoughtful items and information (like the map of Dublin, a list of emergency numbers and tips, and breakfast like coffee, tea, fruit etc). The communication with the hosts was quick, very clear and thoughtful. On arrival, I felt very welcome and well accepted. I would highly recommend staying at Jose and Vadym's Dolphin Barn. It was a five-star stay! Many thanks for a wonderful stay in Dublin, all the best, Erica
Great stay! Vadym was super nice.
Es war alles perfekt! Super Lage, sehr gut zu erreichen und dank der hilfreichen Wegbeschreibung des Gastgebers gut zu erreichen. Gerne wieder!

Vadym and Jose were brilliant host. They communicated excellent and very accommodating to my last minute change of plans due to family circumstances. The Apartment is really nice clean modern with tea and coffee facilities. The bed is very comfortable and has a balcony you can sit on. This is a quiet peaceful part of Dublin easy access to the city centre via the Luas or 30-40 minute walking. Thoroughly recommend this place.

Jose and Vadym's place is amazing, very clean, lots of light, a comfortable bed and a warm welcome.
They provide clear instructions to find the place and tips to see the city. 
Thank you again, loved my time there!
Excellent location and excellent host. Would book with her again for my next trip to Dublin for sure!

Helens place is in a prime location - footsteps away from all the action in Dublin. Helen was also a great host and she let us drop off our bags well before check-in time so we could roam the city freely. 

I was really fond of her place like the water pressure in the shower - hey, its the little things that go a long way!
Helen is very helpful and attentive. Her apartment is in the perfect spot in the center of the city yet quiet.
Great location and very nice host! Would definitely stay there again. We didn't meet Helen in person but everything was well organised. Although very centrally located it's quiet at night, perfect!
The location is very convenient. Helen is a gracious host and responds quickly to questions. She checked in on us to make sure everything was well.

Helen is a very good host, she always in very quick response,  starting from my enquiry before booking until we leave. 
The location is perfect in Temple Bar area and the street of apartment  is very safe which is suitable for us even with a small baby. The building looks new and the apartment is clean which includes all you need.  I love to stay here and hope can stay here again.

Helen was an amazing host who was readily available by phone to answer any questions we may have had! the apartment was super clean and in a great location. The beds and pillows were also very comfortable! Helen didnt even ask us to clean up on the last day and made sure everything transitioned smoothly. Thank you Helen!

Helen was warm and very communicative. The apartment has a great location--close enough to Temple Bar to be convenient (lots of restaurants and pubs),  but not right in the middle of what can be a very noisy area. The windows also face a courtyard  and not the street, which makes it quieter. Check in and check out were a breeze. Definitely recommend.

Helen's place is in a fantastic location and very comfortable.  Her communication was great with us was phenomenal.  The apartment worked very well for my family of four.  I would highly recommend it.
Great location! The pullout is in the living room separated by a door so it has more privacy than expected.

My daughter and her friend had a wonderful stay at Helen's place. Helen's communication was fabulous and she was an extremely welcoming and accommodating host. The apartment is beautiful and sparkling clean with a superb location close to all of the popular areas of the city.  Highly recommend!

Helen is echt een super host. Zeer gastvrij en behulpzaam. Bij vragen kregen we elke keer gelijk een antwoord. Het appartement is niet heel groot, maar voldeed prima voor vier personen. Zag er erg netjes uit en bevond zich aan de rand van het Temple Bar District op een geweldige locatie.

The place is seriously in the best location. It's a minute walk to restaurants and all the bars and it's on a quiet street so it's not noisy for sleep. The place is well kept and very stylish. The host is very considerate and responsive. She was great!

Helen was an excellent host with a fantastic, centrally located apartment. Great place for exploring Temple Barr and beyond. Great tips on where to go locally to eat and drink. Wonderful stay overall.

Helens apartment is perfect for a stay in Dublin.  It is located on the edge of the Temple Bar neighborhood which is the primary area for bars and restaurants.  The apartment faces an inner courtyard, though, and is quite quiet.  Helen is also super friendly and helpful.  Highly recommend!
Excellent location.  Was able to walk to all the sites from this location.
Helen was very prompt with her replies. Her place was in a great area and very clean

The location of the apartment is unbelievable. Its in the heart of Dublin. Its a great and spacious apartment with everything you need. Helen is exceptional in making sure you get answers to any questions you have immediately! This is a definite go!!
Perfect place to stay if you want to be in the heart of the Temple Bar district of Dublin. Close to everything you want to experience. The host if fantastic and very responsive.

Our stay in Helens apartment is wonderful. Everything is just as described and we had a perfect weekend. It is right in the Dublin Centre, yet so quiet and cosy that you can absolutely relax inbetween your activities. Helens hospitality is great and communication is quick and uncomplicated. Thank you again Helen for making our stay so special.
Helen is a very nice and available host. Her appartment (clean and cosy) is located very well ! I recommend the adress !

The location of Helens place does not disappoint. You can walk to all of the main sites within 1-15 minutes. And although in the center of it all, the apartment is very quiet and overlooks a courtyard. Helen herself was very sweet and gave us wonderful local food tips. The lift was also nice as we had a stroller for our 6 month old.

My daughter and her two friends stayed at Helens apartment and had a wonderful trip to Dublin the location is perfect walking distance to Temple Bar and the historical/cultural sights. Helen and her friend Rachel were great hosts and provided some fabulous recommendations for local restaurants. Communication was great and everything went very smoothly Thank You

Helen was very quick to respond to my messages and even helped with a secretive check in to keep our Dublin visit a birthday surprise for a friend.

The flat is in an excellent city centre position as well as being secure and comfortable. Highly recommended for a visit to this friendly and vibrant capital!

We pretty much enjoyed our stay in Helens flat. It is ideally located, very central. 
The flat is cosy, in a very quiet building. Helen was very accommodating, and welcomed us with wealth of advices. 
We strongly recommend it!
Thank you for this great place and hospitality. They really take care of you and you will feel comfortable at any time. For my next trip to Dublin I will book this again for sure!

Very nice apartment. Fiona and Liam are very friendly and you get great insider tips. The location is also very close to the city and its easy to go to the sightseeing points in Dublin. We hope we will come back again.
Great location, clean open space, all in all a perfect spot to stay in Dublin.

Wow what can I say!  This place is amazing. Perfect in every way.  Adequate kitchen and furnishings to cook at home.  Gorgeous decorations.  Attentive hosts that truly care for your enjoyment of your trip!  Pizza delivery quick!   Easy taxi ride to downtown Dublin!   Highly recommended!

We had a great stay at Liam and Fiona's beautiful victorian apartment. It's just north of the hip Stonybatter neighborhood where we found a lot of great food and loved their recommendation for breakfast. They were wonderful hosts!
Very nice appartment, good location, good communication. with Fiona and Liam.
Clean, convenient and had everything you need. Also lots of great information about local things to see and do. I would certainly stay there again.

The apartment was beautiful and slightly outside of the city noise. Fiona was a wonderful host- excellent communication before and during our stay and offered wonderful suggestions. The apartment and host were perfect!

We were close enough to walk to all the attractions we wanted to see.  The neighbor was nice and staying in an old, but very clean and updated, room was exceptionally nice. Amazing sunset views from the front windows!
This apartment is big and beautiful! We loved the location and were able to walk to so many places of interest. It was also very nice to have the free street parking.

Liam and Fionas place was beautiful! Its a quick 20 minute walk to the main city center, or a short cab ride. They offered great recommendations, conveniently offered transportation to and from the airport. Our driver, Garry, was so nice and offered even further recommendations. 100% would stay again.
Beautiful space. Lots of local tips and thoughtful touches. Perfect introduction to Dublin!

The flat has been nicely renovated (at the expense of some original features) and provides a good base location to explore Dublin.  Grocery stores and a good pub are just minutes away on foot.  Bus stops could not be more convenient.  Advertised for up to 6 guests, this place is not very big and has only 1 bathroom.  Would be much more comfortable for 3-4 people. Still, our family of 5 had a wonderful time there.
Liam and Fionas place was great! Amenities are nearby along with the big park and zoo within 1km.
Beautiful apartment, spacious centrally located and sparkling clean

Great value for stay in Dublin. This flat really feels like home! Kitchen including washer/dryer very convenient. City center very accessible by public transit or even 30 minute walk. If you are unfamiliar with the area, you can take advantage of an airport pickup (small extra charge), where the driver will take you to the flat and provide an orientation.
Great apartment. Actually, bigger than we expected. Easy access to everything we wanted to see.
Beautiful apartment near the city!We loved it!
Beautiful apartment. Very close to the park. Local pub down the street is great.

Great communication. Very special place. Like going back in time. Too far to walk to city center but the park is just epic. 

Thanks!!

Liam and Fiona's flat was beautiful and they provided very detailed and easy follow instructions for check in and check out. It was the perfect size for our family and we really enjoyed our stay. We were a quick taxi ride into the city center and an easy walk to Phoenix Park, the local grocery store and a local take out that was delicious. We would definitely recommend this place to others.
Great place to stay, clean and bright, perfect host A+
We had a great time. Amazing place and good communication. Also best cookies in the world for breakfast :')

Stayed at Robyn's place for 3 nights over St. Patricks Day weekend. 
Ensuite was very clean and stylish. Towels were very thick and nice and the comforter was cozy. Beautiful outside garden which was lovely to look out at each morning.
Robyn was a lovely host who met me upon arrival. She provides a nice complimentary breakfast of cereal and fresh blueberries, as well as coffee and tea. 
Easy transportation to the city via bus or taxi. 
Highly recommend staying at Robyn's.

My second stay at Robyns. Really comfortable with everything you need and only a short bus ride from the city centre. I didnt meet Robyn this time but she responded immediately to messages and made me feel very welcome. Would definitely recommend
This stay is everything they say it is. Spacious and tidy room, loved the view of the backyard and right next to the bus stops. Perfect for what we needed!

Had a great stay in Robyn's home! The room was so lovely and spacious and location really great for the airport! Robyn was so thoughtful providing cereals and coffee for breakfast which were greatly appreciated!
Amazing location, amazing room with garden as well as an amazing host, would definitely recommend. Will be back without a doubt, thank you Robyn!
Robyn is a terrific host.  Our accommodations were very clean, very comfortable and included many thoughtful extras.  We really enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend Robyns place.
Great location for getting the airport. Robyn was a great host and ordered a taxi for us to the airport.

Lovely room with comfy bed and great bathroom. We didnt stay long as were only stopping over after a flight but Robyn was very hospitable and good with communication. Thank you very much for letting us stay! Definitely can recommend.
Wonderful and lovely host, we have enjoyed a lot our stay. The room is very nice and clean. We absolutely recommend it.

Ontvangst goed. Ruimte perfect. Keukentje volledig en een gevulde koelkast. Badkamer goed. Water lekker heet. Slaapkamer perfect. Bed goed. Lekkere grote tuin. Sitje buiten. WiFi goed. Parkeerplaats op het privestukje. Bus naar het centrum voor de deur. Hebben we gebruik van gemaakt. Duurt ongeveer 20 min voor 3 euro. Komt om het kwartier. Huisje een aanrader.

I loved being at Robyn's house.  She is a kind thoughtful lady and there is everything you need, including a small kitchen that has a microwave and fridge.  The room is so peaceful looking out onto the garden. The No. 9 bus stop is right outside the door and they run every 15 to 20 minutes.  I bought a Visitors Leap Card which was very useful.  I would highly recommend Robyn's place to stay.

Really beautiful home with a gorgeous garden. Lots of really lovely extras like slippers and hot water bottles to coffee and yoghurt for breakfast. Would highly recommend, and will definitely be back.

Robyn was very hospitable.  We had an afternoon in Dublin and took the bus to town.  She recommended a great place to eat.  We had an early flight the next day and her place is in a great location near Dublin Airport - very convenient.  The room was perfect - quiet and comfortable.  Thank you!

Excellent place. Very clean and comfortable. Everything from booking to check-in and check-out went very smooth. Better value than many other options in Dublin. Hot and cold drinks as well as breakfast included which was much appreciated. A bit of a trip into the city but well located in relation to airport. 
Would recommend this place.
Robyn made our experience in Dublin great. It was easy to get around with the bus (bus stop right across the street). We had our own entrance and the airbnb was sparkling clean. Thanks again!

Robyn is great, friendly and helpful. Easy parking, great bedroom and private bathroom. 

The place is great and will highly recommended.

We really enjoyed our stay here! The place was very clean, and Robyn thoughtfully changed our towels, changed the garbage and cleaned a little halfway through our stay. It is conveniently located on a bus route into downtown Dublin but in a nice quiet neighbourhood. Breakfast items were also provided which we very much appreciated!
Lovely, clean and cosy place. Would definitely stay again. Great location close to the city centre. The host Robyn was very friendly and welcoming.
Great spot with easy access to the City centre and the airport. Robyn is a wonderful host.
Excellent!! Highly recommend stay here. Short bus ride and drops you 1 blk from house. Relax and get out of downtown Dublin
Robyn's place was clean, stylush, and comfortable. The back yard was a little oasis. We really appreciated having some breakfast foods and coffee and tea provided.

We were pleasantly surprised with Robyn's place. It is situated on a busy road, but once inside it is extremely quiet. There is everything you need and it was spotlessly clean. There was also a lovely table and chairs overlooking the pretty garden, which was nice to sit at.
So lovely and clean
Robyn is a kind person. Her place is very special, with a wonderful garden and terrace. It is a real Bed & BREAKFAST as she has it all available. Very comfy.

Robyn's place was exactly how it appeared in the photos, sparkling clean and modern. Robyn was a great host and responded quickly to all our questions. Our taxi from the airport was about 25 euro, but there is a bus to the city centre that is conveniently located. Thanks Robyn for a great say, sorry we couldn't stay longer! Would definitely recommend staying at Robyn's

This room is absolutely perfectly located (close to tourist spots and the airport), such a comfortable and cozy (and spotlessly clean) place to stay in Dublin.  Its very close to the botanical gardens, but I didnt go because the backyard garden is so lovely and I preferred to stay and relax rather than rush through sights (I only had a 22 hour layover).  Robyn has thought of everything - stocked the fridge with yogurts and waters and milk, provided fluffy towels and even a hot water bottle.  She is so responsive and caring and generous.  You wont be disappointed if you stay here.  Highly recommend!

Robyn was a charming and thoughtful hostess.  She went out of her way to make our stay in her home a pleasure.  Her home is in a great location ...easy access to both the airport and the centre of Dublin.  The bus stop for downtown is virtually on Robyns door step.  And the bus ride itself was fun; the view from the top deck gives you an excellent tour of the neighbourhoods.

Robyns Airbnb is beautifully decorated and spotlessly clean.  Having access to the delightful garden is a wonderful bonus.  Robyn has thought of all the details that makes a stay in her home a memorable and luxurious stay.
exceptionaly clean and comfortable

We only spent one night here to be close to the airport and did not meet Robyn.  The space was perfect for our needs and would have been a good spot for basing to explore Dublin. It is a cozy bright space with beautiful gardens in the back with a patio.
Great location (bus stop is just outside the house, direct connection to Dublin City Center, yet in a tranquil  neighborhood), the room is modern and clean, nice terrace and garden.

Robyn is absolutely lovely and made the start of our Ireland road trip a breeze. Her home is located conveniently near the airport and a bus stop right outside her door gets you to the city centre in 20mins (so easy!). Her place is sparking clean and the look out to the garden was so pretty (as was her cute little cat!). She provided fresh berries and yogurt for breakfast as well as coffee and tea. I highly recommend a stay here as the neighborhood is also very nice and quiet. She even offered a lift to the airport but we had already booked a taxi -- so kind! Thank you again for your lovely hospitality Robyn :)

Clean and modern. I didn't stay long in the place and left at 4.30am, however it was a pleasant stay. Nice and spacious room with everything you need. Bus to the city was just out side and less than 30 mins to the city. Recommended.

Stayed here over the weekend and Robyns place did not disappoint! Everything from booking to actually leaving were faultless! Kitchen area as stated by previous guests is great-fresh milk in the fridge and really nice biscuits in the jar!! We met Robyn and she is the perfect host. With so many positive reviews you can be assured this is a first class rental. Mark and Cath June 2019.

Robyns place was wonderful. She is an excellent host. She provided us breakfast of cereals, yogurt, and other sorts of quick foods. She had coffee, tea, bottles of water, cookies, frozen waffles, and more for self catering. The room was sparkling clean, and the view out on the backyard was amazing. It was as good as Hawaii with all of the flowers blooming. The shower stall was a little bit small, but it was good water pressure and heated up instantly. There is not a place to sit and have breakfast inside, and if the weather is nice, the back patio has a table and some chairs. It is right next to the bus stop and easy to get into the city, but it is somewhat of a long ride. It wasnt problematic, so I would say this would be more excellent for somebody wanting to stay closer to the airport. The neighborhood was nice. I would definitely recommend this place and would return. Robyn seemed like a very kind, warm, helpful person. Thank you Robyn.

Beautiful room, beautiful back garden. Stylish, sparkling clean, and all the amenities.  I was doing a conference at DCU and this was a perfect stay. Robyn took great care of me. I would definitely recommend and come again.

Very friendly host, superb room approx 20 mins from city centre and 15 mins drive to the airport.  Spotlessly clean, fresh towels, clean linen stylish room. Nice ensuite private and a lovely kitchenette area for a complimentary cuppa , cookies or cereals . Lovely lady .

Robyn thank you for your hospitality, the room was perfect for us and if were ever back in Dublin we would love to stay with you again. Its far enough out of the hustle and bustle but still only a few minutes in on the bus. Dont think youll find better for the price stylish room with a lovely en-suite and view into the garden. Great stay.
Idea location for city centre and croke park. Very clear. Excellent amenities. Outstanding host. Definitely will be back. Love ever minute of my stay. A must if you are thinking of staying in Dublin.
Very short stay due to an overnight layover in Dublin. Place was clean, stylish and comfortable.

Unfortunately we just stayed for one night but we have enjoyed it very much. Robyn is a very nice host. 
The room was great and very clean. The location is perfectly situated and the city is easy to access by bus from there.

Robyns place is lovely. Its the perfect location if you need to be close to the airport.
The apartment is very clean, and has a beautiful little patio off the room for you to enjoy. 
I would highly recommend this place!
Sparkling clean and modern! Bus right outside the door.
Good location close to airport, comfortable big bed, space well organized
Robyns studio really is as amazing as advertised, I had a lovely  and relaxing stay !!
Great place to stay,  especially heading to airport. Great host!
Great stay!!! Would highly recommend
Robyns place is lovely and tranquil. We got a good nights sleep after a late flight and enjoyed a much appreciated breakfast in the garden. Wed definitely stay again!
Great value and beautiful room!  King bed was very nice since you dont see that much in EU. Would definitely book again!

Robyns place was perfect for our final night in Dublin with an early flight out out the next morning. The space is clean and modern and the breakfast goodies were a great addition! The back garden is quite lovely as well. Would definitely recommend a stay here!

What a lovely introduction to Ireland. After 30 hours of travelling, Robyn's warm welcome, lovely home, hot shower and super comfy bed where perfect. Then a healthy breakfast and local tips set me up for the next part of my journey. Robyn is the perfect host - there when you need her and giving you privacy when you want it. Thank you, Robyn. See you soon.
This place is just perfect. Once youve visited the crowded and busy Dublin it is really nice to come back to this quiet place and just relax in the garden.
This was my second stay in Robyn's lovely home. It was like coming home. A beautiful room in which to relax and a great base for exploring Dublin. Robyn is a thoughtful and gracious host.

Such a cool place to stay! Robyn and her sister are both lovely. The house is right across from a bus stop that takes you right into the city which is very convenient. Loved being able to sit outside to eat the cereal breakfast that was provided. Would stay here again if ever back in Dublin!
Clean, stylish space.  Proactive communication.
Everything about Robyns was so fantastic!!! She was warm and welcoming, and the backyard garden is superb! ‚ò∫Ô∏è
Robyn was a amazing host and very friendly. Beautiful and clean room. Would definitely recomend.
Robyns home is so chic - right down to the cute matching soap pumps! extremely comfortable and clean. Good location for a short drive into the city.

Robyn is a gracious and welcoming host. She provides a delicious breakfast and the green space in the backyard is a delightful view. It is conveniently located near a bus stop and a short walk from a great pub. It was a nice place to start our Irish adventures.
Great location to bus and airport. Clean and functional space. Beautiful garden.

Robyn's place is nice modern and comfortable. The bus stop to downtown Dublin is conveniently right in front of the home and drive to the airport is only a short distance. We tried the pub nearby for dinner that Robyn suggested and the food was fantastic. We would highly recommend Robyn's place.

We loved staying at Robyns! She was so hospitable and greeted us so warmly when we arrived! Her place was pristine and just what we needed! Great location close to Dublin city center and the airport. She had a beautiful patio/garden and as a pet lover missing our fur kiddos at home, we loved watching her cats play in her yard! :)
Robyn's room was the perfect place for our last night in Dublin. Absolutely beautiful! She also called a taxi for us and provided recommends for the area. Thank you again!
Perfect stay before morning flight from Dublin airport. Last Irish dinner in a pub 5 minutes walk from Robyns  place. We will be back!
Very clean. Good location and facilities. Quiet despite being on main road. Frequent bus service into City. Off-road parking. Just what we wanted.
This is a great value, and Robyn is a wonderful host. Id highly recommend a stay here. Thanks for everything, Robyn.

Robyn offers a wonderful place to rest from the hectic rush. Hands down, Id choose her place over a hotel any day. It was immaculately clean and comfortable. Nice, quiet area. Parking. Beautiful accommodations. Exceptional hostess.
Zeer nette en ruime kamer met grote tuin. Robyn communiceerde duidelijk en snel. Zeker een aanrader!
Beautiful home and backyard!

This place was absolutely spectacular. Superbly clean better than photos. Beautiful garden super easy to get to. Honestly the only place Id want to stay when I come back. It was the highlight of my stay seeing it for the first time. The place smelled clean looked clean and was just a lovely spot. Look no further than this place for your stay in Dublin. Id give it  10 stars if I could

Robyns place is perfect ! So many little touches like drinks and chocolate bars waiting for us, yummy yoghurt and muesli, lovely backyard garden, and large spacious room with large bed and extra heating if needed. Robyn is so friendly and kind and gave us great tips for walking and pub food! Its very close to the airport and yet also close to town which is handy and we could park our car safely by the house off the road which was really handy. Thanks Robyn for a great stay !!

A lovely, restful, beautifully appointed space with good facilities. Robyn was a great host and very accommodating. Out back, there's the most beautiful garden we've ever seen in an Airbnb rental. Highly recommended.

Very nice and quiet room with a patio and a kitchen.  The bus to the city of Dublin is just across the street. Also not far from the airport. Robyn is a very nice person, she made us feel at home. We will definitely go back on a next trip.
This is a strikingly beautiful place, from bathroom to garden!  Host Robyn is very helpful and provides everything you need for an enjoyable stay.  Very spacious and spotless!
Clean, modern, and private room with access to a lovely backyard. Easy check-in instructions from the host as well as good communication. Would highly recommend!

My husband and I were passing through Dublin and needed a place to stay. Robyn's place was great! We felt right very comfortable during our stay at Robyn's. It is very spacious as well and she has a beautiful back patio view!

This my second stay at Robyn Place and first time I had the pleasure of meeting her. She is wonderful host. The room is sparkling clean. Amenities are excellent. Location is ideal. I love this place so much I'll be staying again in December. Recommended to all who want to explore Dublin. Botanical Gardens and croke Park are not situated far from the accommodation.

Its almost better than it appears on the website and Robin is so responsive and communicative it made our last night in Dublin worry free! The backyard with the deck is gorgeous and her own little private and peaceful space in a city!

Robyn was an excellent host; we found everything exactly as mentioned in the listing!  The site was spotless and had all we needed!  She was gracious enough to allow us an early check in as our flight arrived early morning!  Outstanding!

Our one night stay before flying out was great. Quiet room and our host was excellent with a tip on where to eat dinner. Clean room. Would definitely stay again. Could use a slightly more comfortable mattress and shower is tiny but adequate.
Great time and amazing host! Communication was perfect and super down to earth! Recommended!
fantastic place - well stocked, spotless and handy to everywhere! robyn is such a helpful host and we genuinely couldnt have asked for more

This spot is amazing. 
1. It's stylish
2. Super clean
3. Quiet
4. Gorgeous
5. Robyn is an excellent host, very communicative and helpful

Very friendly host! Place has all the amenities needed. Spacious and stylish space suitable for any type of stay and perfect location to explore Dublin with a bus stop on the doorstep! So clean and so many nice touches left for guests which added to a perfect stay
My stay was very comfortable. Location is very good, easy access from airport and city centre. Room size was very good, clean and nice view of the garden.

Susan is amazing as was the house and her service. 

Thank you so much ‚ù§Ô∏è

We would like to thank Susan for her hospitality.  We spent a great WE in Susans House. 
The house is very well equipped.
A short taxi drive from the center and a few meters from a great pub called Hole in the Wall.
We recommend Susans place.
Richard
Susans home was absolutely perfect for our family of 7 - great location and amenities - we had a great time and survived St Patricks day in Dublinù - thanks from your new Canadian friends.

Everything about Susans home is exceptional - clean, beautifully decorated, in a stunning location virtually inside the Phoenix Park! I loved it. And its really convenient for the city Centre. Susan thinks of everything and I could not have been more impressed by her warmth and friendliness. She puts a lot of time and effort into ensuring her guests are comfortable and that they enjoy their visit. Thank you Susan - it was a top class experience!

This place is amazing, lots of space, great view and convenient location to stay outside of the temple bar area. But what makes this place extra special was the host, Susan. She goes above and beyond! She is so thoughtful and thinks of everything to make your stay comfortable. She left breakfast food and juice in the fridge since she knew we were flying in first thing in the morning. She lent us her guide book and had maps and brochures that she happily to walked us through. She was super responsive. I can go on and on. Highly recommend any place ran by Susan.
This was my best Airbnb experience. Everything you could possibly need was there. It looked awesome and being right next to the park was so nice.

My oh my what a pleasant stay! Susan was an absolute joy to meet and stay with. The house is beautiful and very accommodating even for large groups. Our host helped us out with local tips and getting around the city. She was available at a moments notice and even provided toiletries and other necessities including baby items for my infant: Wow!! The place was perfect and I would recommend it to any family looking for a great stay in Dublin.

Susan ist fabulous host who also did a very good job at designing the apartment without putting in the money for expensive designer furniture. If you need lots of space and prefer not to stay in the city center this apartment is nearly ideal. You have views into the Phoenix Park and an excellent pub nearby. But you must also know that the city center is a 15-minute-cab-ride away (which didn't bother us)¶ it is not posh, but very nice with a big living room and a fully equipped kitchen - Susan even put sausages and eggs and beer in the fridge¶

We had a fabulous time in Dublin and Susan was an amazing host!  Whenever we needed anything, she was there!  It was my daughter's 21st birthday and we were heading on a day trip so we ordered a cake at the bakery near by (amazing!!) and Susan picked up the cake for us while we were out sightseeing that day.  So many special extra touches she did for us to make our stay more enjoyable.  (doing laundry, getting us ice, getting extra pots & pans for our dinners and so much more!)  And Robbie & Bob - talk about 2 great guys to take us wherever we needed to go!  I just can't say enough about how well we were treated.  We can't wait for our next trip back to Ireland.  The hospitality was beyond our expectations.  Also, the "Hole in the Wall" and "Cumiskey's" restaurants were so close and convenient.  Great food and Guinness everywhere!!  There were 12 of us - sometimes even 13 and we tend to be the "loud family" - we hope we weren't too much of a bother!  We now have new friendships with Susan, Robbie & Bob.  Phoenix Park out our back door was beyond beautiful... many long walks through the part and the Dublin Zoo was fun too!  It was a trip of a lifetime and Susan made it that much more enjoyable.  So many memories, laughs and funtimes.  Thank you Thank you Thank you!!!  Betsy & Crew xoxox

Warm hospitality and great location. Susan is very welcoming and thoughtful. You wont need a car î we walked, used public transportation (both train & bus), and used taxis. Bob (taxi driver recommended by Susan) was great. Lovely pub/restaurant (Hole in the Wall) close by. Park runs behind home and access is close. Bakery - yum - right around the corner. Our family group (7 of us) had a great visit.

Our experience at Susans property was fantastic. She couldnt have been more responsive, stocked the fridge, and even dropped our laundry off at the laundress when there were concerns about the washer and dryer. Susan was a fantastic host and made our time in Dublin truly special.

Loved staying here! Great location, and had all the amenities we needed! Plus it was walking distance to hole in the wall (super yummy food & great drinks) Susan was right next door so if we needed anything she was close by to help out! She was super nice and responded quickly to any questions I had

Susan is a gracious host and very responsive to all questions. Her place is beautiful and perfect for a family looking for more room than a hotel. The townhouse is located next to a beautiful park and a wonderful pub with amazing food.  Its a short taxi ride to all the central Dublin attractions.
Very nice house, clean and well maintained.  Susan is very friendly, and provided a lot of local tips and information. We very much enjoyed our stay.

Myself and 7 friends stayed at Susans for 2 nights, and Susan was an amazing host. It was my 30th birthday and when I arrived Susan had laid out decorations and a lovely cake! The communication from Susan was excellent and she made sure we all had a great time! She had even arranged for Bob her taxi driver to pick us up from the airport when we arrived. The house was lovely and clean and we had everything we needed and more! Including a fridge stocked with breakfast which lasted us the 2 days! We couldnt have wished for anything more. Thank you so much Susan!

Susan is a fantastic host. She truly wants you to feel at home in her place. She goes above and beyond in making sure you have everything you could possibly need. 

The beds, however, seem to be old. We all did not sleep very well on them. The bathrooms could also use some updating.

Susan is a fantastic host, she arranges early check in if possible arranges taxi's through Robbie and Bob who were also fantastic. Nothing was too much trouble for them.
Susan was hand if we had any queries and also informing us of all the local attractions.
I would highly recommend Susan to anyone looking to travel to Dublin.
Thank you to you and the boys as you made our stay very memorable and we will certainly be back.

Susan was a wonderful host! Very thoughtful and helpful with local hints. The apartment has everything you will need. Very close to downtown and the airport. Nearby street parking available. Several close bars and restaurants withon easy walkin distance. The park in the back is wonderful for walking.

Spotlessly clean and excellent value for money. The bed was very comfy too and a short taxi drive into the town centre. Susan was easy to deal with and nothing was too much trouble. Thank you for a great stay, we would definitely stay here again. Many thanks Andy
Absolutely fantastic house with a great host.  Just perfect couldn't fault a thing plus great location  10/10
Such an amazing stay, very attentive the whole way through. Loved every minute, would definitely recommend.

I can not express how perfect this experience was for me and my family. Susan is exceptional. She was very communicative from the beginning and all throughout our stay. She helped us organize transportation to all our various activities. She was very responsive to anything we needed. The location is great. The home is PHENOMENAL. My family and I had a PERFECT TRIP to Dublin and a large part of that is thanks to Susan!

Suzan is not just a superhost, she is probably the best host in the entire AirBnB!! Great attentions, thoughtful touches, always quick to respond and take care of you. If you go to Dublin, rent her place and youll have a fantastic time. The place is very cozy and well located right next to Phoenix park. There is a great pub around the corner serving great food and beers. You can also use the service of Suzans great buddies Bob and Robbie to drive you anywhere. An amazing experience. Suzan is simply the best!

We were cancelled the day before by our initial booking.  We found this booking and it ended up being awesome. Susan was kind,  friendly, and assisted us with everything.  The hidden gem!  Our group gained a friend ! We would recommend this location to anyone.  At home feeling !

Sheelagh is a great host. She's knowledgeable about great locations to see/eat/tour. She's friendly, caring and respectful. She lets you be, unless you need her for anything. (And she put's up with A LOT, such as five 20 something year old's for parade day!). 
Sheelagh keeps a lovely home. It is spacious, clean, and warm. The views are amazing and it is a great location; close to Dublin, Malahide. I would definitely recommend her and her home for your stay!

Absolutely perfect location by the Irish Sea. We rented a car to get around and had plenty of street parking. But the bus lines will easily get you to Dublin and the surrounding areas with lovely towns within walking distance as well. 
Sheelagh was an exceptional host. We had some travel issues and she was there to help from start to finish. She offered wonderful tips on places to eat/visit and the apt had a large collection of brochures and site information that proved very helpful. We would absolutely stay at Sheelaghs apt again. Really cant say enough good things about the host and the location, just wonderful!

Sheelaghs place is well described in the advert. She is a lovely person very friendly and helpful. The flat is airy and bright. Good wi-fi and all you need for your stay. Not far from the sea. Lovely view from the Kitchen window.

Sheelaghs place was perfect for anyone who wants to be in Dublin but in away from the busy city center, only a short walk from the beach. Sheelagh was there to greet us when we got there and is extremely helpful when it comes to suggesting where to go and what to see! I loved staying in this apartment and would definitely love to stay here again if I was in Dublin!
Fantastic apartment, near the best beach of Dublin area. The apartment has everything you need and a very well equipped kitchen. Couldn't ask more

Everything was nice and clean. Sheelagh was very nice and gave us informations concerning what to do in the city or in the neighbourhood. The flat is perfectly connected to the airport and the city (via bus ca 40 min). I can only thank Sheelagh for our wonderful time in Dublin! :)
Ottimo alloggio in splendida posizione. Appartamento dotato di tutti gli accessori necessari, soprattutto in cucina.

Shellagh is a very nice person, she is very helpful and friendly.  The apartment is very clean.  Very good public transport to Dublin.  Near the beach with great views.  I highly recommend the place and greetings from the whole family for Shellagh.

Sheelagh is a warm and welcoming person who really care for the visitors. The appartment was perfect for me and my 3 kids. Perfect location, good size, comfortable beds, clean and quiet and with all the facilities we could ask for. A short walk to the beach or the local store. Or a short walk to the busstop and you can go everywhere you want. I reallly recommend this place!
Very nice place, next to beach 5 mins away, near bus stops to Dublin.

I was delighted to stay at Bairbre's lovely house! Everything in it is unique and arranged with great taste. Bairbre is a fantastic hostess who can recommend you places for food and drinks, as well as for your cultural nourishment. She was very accessible for any questions, from booking to leaving the place. The house is located in a cute neighbourhood, easily accessible by foot or bus from the city center. There are also some pubs/restaurants closer by that seem nice (I tried a bar around the corner that serves pizza and had some musical quiz going on). I highly recommend Bairbre's place and will certainly stay there again (if it's not already booked)!

Great little house in the heart of Dublin, Bedroom is downstairs next to kitchen. The house is uniquely decorated which adds to the charm. Easy to walk to city center or opposite side of town. Bairbre is a great host and goes out her way to make you feel welcome and provides great info for attractions around the area.
Bairbre is an amazing and welcoming host who happily gives tips about the city.The house is sweet and charming.
Great, clean and friendly. You get the real Irish experience and we even got breakfast :-)
Bairbre's place is a great value and very eclectic. It was one of the most interesting experiences and Airbnb's I've ever stayed at.
Barb was easy to communicate with and the house clean and tidy. Quirky/cool little spot. Quick little walk into the city. I would stay here again.
Bairbre offers you a Dubliners experience and view of the city, what a lovely person and cozy place! Highly recommend it.
Bairbre is a great host, very helpful and more than happy to answer any questions you have! Would recommend

Excellent place in an excellent location. Far enough away from city center, but also at the same time extremely close. 

Highly recommend!
Mary's place was lovely! Thanks for a great stay. Perfect location for my work.
Well-located house with a cozy bedroom and a good host. Really enjoyed my stay

Mary is a very polite host with a lovely house. She is also a nice partner to have a chat with.

The area has a lot to offer. Quick travel to to city center via Luas.

Had a very pleasant stay. The location is ideal with public transport just around the corner, lots of shops and restaurants around and a 20-30 min walk will get you to the city centre. I would definitely come here again and can fully recommend it to anyone thinking about visiting Dublin!
Great house, great location, great host
Mary's place is lovely - perfect location and super homely house that really feels like a home away from home. Would highly recommend!

Very accurate to listing! Easy walk to town and cute area with lots of shops. Only would have wished to have a lock on my room, given there were a couple other travelers in the house during my stay. Given there was no safe, I felt a little worried about my expensive belongings/passport being left in my room. Though I felt safe and loved the space, it was in the back of my mind that anyone could enter my room at anytime if they chose to.
A no-fuss, fabulous and cosy Airbnb experience- was perfect!

The house is located in a pleasant and dynamic area not far from the center of Dublin. It is very well served by the public transportation,  pharmacy, restaurants, supermarkets are at 2 minutes walk. Even though the house is large and very pretty, I wouldn't recommend it for travellers that like cleanliness and privacy (no keys to lock the room)
Mary was a lovely host and the room was clean, quiet and the house was conveniently located. I highly recommend. :)
A lovely comfortable stay
Nice spot for a private room. Close to the train & busses
Mary was a wonderful host, her home is so clean and well kept. Excellent location and so close to all public transport.

Mary is a lovely and very welcoming host. I highly enjoyed the chats we had together and she made me feel like at home immediately. The appartment is perfectly situated to reach city center in no time either by foot, bus or tram - that was very convenient.

Mary is a wonderful host. Perfectly and appropriately  communicative in each stage of the Airbnb experience. I lived there for 4 weeks - I walked to the centre of the City every day except for three - for those three I took the Luans - extremely convenient - 4 stops to St Stevens Green. Buses too are plentiful and frequent. And, no exaggeration  - many excellent restaurants / pubs / cafes / food shops within a few minutes walk - while also being on a quiet and friendly street. The best of all worlds! The bedroom was very comfortable - everything clean and ready for my arrival! This was an excellent experience for me from  every perspective.  Added bonus - Mary knows Ireland very well. !00% recommend Mary's Airbnb!

Nice little room, ventilation of a building nearby was a bit noisy.

One can get to the city center by bus or luas very quick, but it also not far by foot.

Couldn't recommend this Air bnb enough. Very clean and quiet, Mary is a great host, replied to any queries very quickly. Ranelagh is the perfect location too, short walk or luas trip to the city Centre

A very clean single bed bedroom and comfortable enough for single traveler. Good location, a step and a hop to transits both bus and tram. In a good day it would take you 15min to main tourist centre but prepare for traffic heading back. Mary is quick to response on any queries, thank you letting me stay at your place.
Ranelagh is a great locationîcity Centre is easily accessible by foot or public transportation. Very reasonably priced

I stayed at Mary's place for a few nights. The room was clean and nice as was the bathroom. There are a lot of cafes and restaurants nearby and you walk about 25-30 minutes into the city center (St. Stephen's Green). Mary was a nice and friendly host.

My son and I were visiting Dublin for the first time, attending the World Science Fiction Convention at the massive futuristic Convention Centre. Mary's comfortable multi-level terrace house was ideal for us. The local area near Ranelagh has plenty of coffee shops, restaurants and bars. The local Tesco Express also came in handy. We found we could easily commute into the centre by using the modern tram system. You can purchase a 7 day Leaf travel card for 40 euros which allows travel by tram or bus, including the ride to and from the airport. Mary's place also provides handy and modern kitchen facilities so we were able to make our own breakfasts and usually an evening meal when we got back each day. All in all, a clean house reasonably priced in a good location.

The house is fantastic, great quirky style lovely, probably the cleanest Airbnb Ive ever stayed in. Location itself is close to a lot of nice cafes, bar/restaurants and supermarket amenities with bus routes and luas to the centre. Check-in was seamless too!
Awesome location, and Mary is a phenomenal host!

I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at Mary's house.  Her instructions on check-in and house were very clear and made my stay easy.  She also takes an interest in her guests and is helpful in giving local suggestions regarding eating or any need.
Nice apartment! Easy to get to the city center by train and bus! many shops and restaurants around the house. Mary also was very nice and kind!
Mary is a very helpful woman. Verry friendly. In the Street are much Pubs and Restaurants. To the city center its just a short trip by the tram (10 min). Was a lovely trip to Dublin.
Top host
Nice place, very central to restaurants, bars and communication. Very quiet at night in the rooms. Loved it.
Fine room to stay in ranaleagh
Nice well-kept accommodation in a lively area of Dublin. Public transport and city center are within walking distance.

It was my first solo travel to Europe and Mary was an excellent addition to that trip. She was a great host! Very responsive and welcomed me at the door. She was great to talk to and had excellent recommendations and even better directions, for the directionally challenged like me. I didnt have any problems. The room was very cozy and very clean. The house was very quiet and I had no problems getting in and out. Great location, only 20 min by metro to city centre and a 2 minute walk to the metro station. One day I even decided to take the stroll and walk from city centre to the B&B, it took me about 30 min. Did not disappoint! Definitely would recommend to anyone on their trip to Dublin.
Great stay. Very reasonably priced and well-suited for single travelers.
Sehr nette und unkomplizierte Gastgeberin. Tolle Lage.
great
