Absolutely delightful couple who go out of their way to make you feel welcome! Easy access to the house so you can come and go as you please, with bus stops to the city centre and shops close by. Charming rooms and all the amenities you would need if spending a few nights in Dublin. Will definitely be back again!
I stayed here for work and hopefully will be able to get back

A fantastic experience in a beautiful home with two of the most welcoming and helpful hosts you could ever meet! I was sorry to leave but will definitely be (Website hidden by Airbnb) only worry is there may be no availability as Ger and Jeans home is so popular!

Ger and Jean are both phenomenal and warm people. Their home is lovely and very tidy. They were so kind and charming. From the moment I arrived they felt like distant family, I could have easily adopted them as my Irish parents! They ensured I had lunch by offering a great recommendation. Breakfast was on my time and filled with conversation about plans for the day and what I did the night before. They helped with directions and bus planning. They offered suggestions of places they thought I would be interested in then went through the trouble of looking up proper directions and planning for me.  Before I left, they wanted to ensure I had another place booked for the next leg of my journey and helped me do so. They are truly caring and kind people.  I hope one day I can meet them again!!

If you stay here, you get more than a room; you get a home and temporary family. This place is a must stay!!
Lovely stay - had such a great nights sleep

Ger and Jean are perfect hosts: kind, helpful, nice and very friendly. Their house is big , beautiful and extra clean!  The bus stop is not far and the bus service is ok. Very good price for the servises. Very good bargain . I surely recommend It!
Great place to stay and excellent hosts!
Such a lovely stay in Ger and Jeans home! Both so welcoming and friendly! Thanks for having me

The home was very clean and quiet.  A continental breakfast was included and got us on our way in the morning.  The location is ideal if you have a car.  A short ten minutes and youre in the heart of town.  We highly recommend this home for your next Dublin visit.
Nice stay
Perfect. Will return again.
Spotless clean. great location. lovley hospitality  and breakfast was a bonus.  I be back.
Ger and Jean have a lovely home which is sparklingly clean. Their home is located in a very safe area with parking

Super host! I arrived very late due to the boat schedule coming from Holyhead but Jean and Ger did not make that a big point, just knock on the Porch and we will let you in! Great breakfast, very clean house with beautiful garden view from the kitchen and great conversations. I really liked the stylish quality house and others in this quiet neighbourhood. This would be my preferred place next time in Dublin.
Bilderbuch-Gegend von Dublin. Sehr beeindruckend. Tolle Anfahrt mit der DART am Strand entlang.
Very close to everything.  The apartment was nicely done,  but rather small.  Chris is very responsive and helpful.
Chris was a pleasure to deal with, straightforward, simple check-in.  Facilities excellent and a great location. Happy to recommend.

The apartment is so nice, very clean and has everything and anything you could need while staying away from home.  It's in a great location, easy walk to most tourist spots you'd want to see.  We would definitely stay again when we visit Ireland again.

We enjoyed our stay in Dublin.  Chriss place was the perfect location, within walking distance to all the attractions. Chris met us at check in and gave us recommendations to places we should visit.  The apartment was comfortable and Chris arranged for us to have parking just across the street.  
If you are visiting Dublin, this apartment is the perfect location! We would definitely stay there again.
Would recommend 100%. Our favorite Airbnb yet. Clean, helpful, and thoughtful. A few minutes walk to everything in the city. Chris was an amazing host.

Absolutely perfect location and experience. Chris is a fabulous host who made sure we were well taken care of. The apartment is right in the middle of everything anyone would want to see on a trip to Dublin, and we walked everywhere. We didnt want for anything other than more time to enjoy more of Dublin. We highly recommend Chris and his apartment for anyone who wants to have an amazing, unforgettable stay.

We are repeat customers for this flat so needless to say that we are great fans! It is clean, comfortable,  FANTASTIC location (within 15 min walk of almost anything you want to do, see, need). Chris is a wonderful host, very charming and accommodating. We had a couple of questions and he answered very quickly. We HIGHLY recommend this flat.
Charming, cozy, comfortable apartment in a safe, convenient location. Walking distance to most areas of interest. Very clean. Not a huge space, but bigger than a typical hotel room and half the cost.
Incredible experience!
This is just what we needed: central location to walk to everything quiet and comfortable

Great location and easy to find. Quaint apartment for two people with the extra items you may need. Helpful list of restaurants to check out. Chris was very helpful in securing parking and letting you know of options near the apartment to park. Would stay again!
Loved the location and the apartment. Easy walking distance to all things we wanted to do. Lots of great tips. Prefect for two people.

We just checked out of Chris place. Communication was easy with a close meeting place from the bus stop near Christ Church. This location is excellent for sightseeing whether you are walking or catching the hop on hop off bus. Close to plenty of pubs and restaurants. We would certainly chose it again for our stay in Dublin and would recommend!
Very cute place. Chriss place is in a fantastic location. We were able to walk to all the sites we wanted to see in Dublin.

Excellent location, you can walk to everything. The apartment is small but comfortable with many thoughtful touches - such as plenty of shelves in the bathroom and an umbrella in the hallway. Good base for one or two people in Dublin.
Great location. Nice amenities.  A bit noisy outside on weekends, but the flat itself was nice and comfortable.
Exactly what we needed for our two nights in Dublin! Perfect location! Chris was extremely welcoming, and made himself available during our whole reservation! We really appreciated it
Brilliant location. Comfortable,clean well equipped apartment. Chris is an excellent host, his local tips were very helpful. I would highly recommend staying here if you are visiting Dublin.

Fantastic apartment in the heart of Dublin. Chris was an awesome host; he waited for us as our flight was delayed and he gave us tons of recommendation on the best of what Dublin has to offer. He even offered us his personal bike share card! Thank you for a short but sweet stay in your fantastic apartment, we will be back!
Fab location - nice clean bathroom - coffee and choc !!! Helpful host too
Fantastic apartment in a perfect location. Chris was excellent and meet and greet perfect. Extremely clean with everything we needed for our stay.

We stayed at Chris's apartment for 3 nights in June.  Not having been to Dublin before it was far more convenient and central to all that we wanted to see and do than we realised, you can walk everywhere and everywhere we did in sunshine too with no rain!
The apartment was very clean with plenty of towels and had everything we needed, including tea and coffee and a few other things should we have needed them.
Would thoroughly recommend for a short or longer stay.
Cozy and comfortable.  Within 1 minute walking distance to the castle.  You can walk easily to many attractions.  Very comfortable bed.  You will love it!

I cant say enough nice things about Chris and this apartment. Absolutely perfect for a couple or two close friends. Chris included all the necessary and bonus touches. Coffee and tea, plenty of towels, all the toiletries you may have forgotten or didnt even know you could have. He included so many things I was inspired to leave a present for the next guests with some chocolates. 

Well located away from the crowded Temple Bar area but close enough to go there whenever we wanted. The street traffic was a bit noisy at times but I cant imagine any street in city center would be without some noise or traffic. 

Chris offered so many wonderful local recommendations and even helped us navigate to our next spot. If you have any questions at all reach out to him in advance and that will make your stay in Dublin even better.
This location was clean, comfortable, and in a perfect spot in the city. Super convenient and walking distance to everything. Highly recommend!

Chris is so professional to deal with.  His apartment is extremely well located and full of nice touches. His local tips are spot on. 

We would not hesitate to recommend a stay at Chriss place

The apartment was perfectly situated for exploring Dublin City centre. Very close to Grafton street, temple bar and all the attractions Dublin has to offer. The apartment was a little gem and so homely. The tiny balcony was a bonus to take in the sun with a coffee- though its a squeeze for 2 people to sit out on. Plenty of amenities in the apartment, literally all you need is a pint of milk as everything else was available eg tea, coffee etc.
Chris was a lovely welcoming host and we would definitely recommend the apartment.

Chris apartment is in a great location and is absolutely lovely . We will definitely return if we stay in Dublin again. Communication with Chris was very timely and check in was really great. Chris had also left some great recommendations as there are lots of places to visit, eat and drink nearby. He also left some essential- chocolate!!
I would definitely recommend Chris apartment.
Great location, great apartment and very helpful host, would definitely recommend.
Great location! Clean and comfortable place, we walked everywhere in downtown Dublin from Chris's place!
Fantastic host and nice apartment within walking distance from everything!

AWESOME LOCATION*****5 stars for location alone, unit was super tiny-smaller than expected, needed xtra linens and pillows, need more fans readily available, very stuffy at night. Otherwise great-prompt-courteous communication with host, great suggestions, easy access to unit. Thank you Chris for your hospitality

This apartment is great! Super close to lots of things, restaurants, bars, attractions, etc. Chris was out of town for our stay so his nieceù Evelyn let us in. She was a doll! On top of this, his apartment is absolutely filled with information on what to do and see in the area which I found super great! 
Unfortunately my cell service was being very flaky, so I struggled to get messages to Chris, and I feel bad for that, however he was quick to respond when I could get through and very easy to work with. Ive never had an Airbnb host go so far above and beyond to make sure we had recommendations on where to go and how to get around!

The owner Chris is very hospitable and helpful in quickly returning email messages and providing a package of useful information prior to our arrival. We actually were not able to meet with him in person as we had to take a later flight from London and Chris was heading out of town before that so he arranged a very personable contact person to meet us when we arrived and show us the apartment. Parking is usually an issue to minimize the time to move between car and apartment but this propert has a small car park right across the street that Chris was able to arrange our rental of a spot in the park. We were on the second floor but there is a lift so bringing up luggage was effortless. The apartment had all what my wife and I needed during our stay; there is a sleeping room with a double bed and a door that can be closed if someone wants to stay up late. The combination kitchen, bar counter, living room is comfortable with all standard amenities. After a long day I was happy to find CNN on cable to wind down. The location to local restaurants and pubs is excellent - as attested to by my wife who went around the corner to hear a local band and get a good dinner while you-know-who was winding down listening to recent developments in the news. 
Overall I'd rate the apartment as excellent for the location and price. The location is just down the street from Christ Church and pick up stations for city buses and a Hop On/Hop off bus route which were very helpful for us. There are also grocery stores nearby within walking distance. The unit itself is compact but had all the space and amenities we needed for a comfortable stay. It has a small balcony with a table and chairs to sit outside.
We would certainly return for a future stay.
Very convenient location. Chris as a host was excellent. Helped us to get our bearings and gave us tips on sightseeing and dining. The apartment and car parking were both very secure.
Cozy apartment with everything you need and right in the doorstep of the best places in Dublin.
This is a little gem of a find fantastic location close to all you would ever need when in Dublin

Chris,s place is ideally situated and was handy for all the attractions. Apartment was clean ,shower was very easy to use and the bed was comfortable. Living room had comfy seats . A little disappointed there was no regular TV but again we were in that much Would recommend.
Great apt., perfect location.  We walked everywhere.  Highly recommended.

We had a great stay in Dublin. Chris was welcoming, and accommodating to our early check in. The place was clean, and comfortable and quiet at night which we appreciated! Would recommend to anyone visiting Dublin!!

A cosy little flat, perfect for two. The location was great, easy walk to attractions, shopping and restaurants. Chris has prepared a very detailed guide including some great restaurants and pubs. We were met on arrival despite our flight being delayed and given a detailed orientation. Would thoroughly recommend.

Chris chic apartment is a great place to stay if you want to be within walking distance to many of Dublins top sites, such as Christ Church Cathedral, Dublin Castle, and the Temple Bar area. There are many restaurants and pubs nearby, and Chris gives several recommendations. The apartment is very clean and stocked with most anything you would need during your stay. Chris is a wonderful host and answers any questions you may have. I highly recommend! 
Christine in MN, USA

Chris's apartment has everything you could hope for. A real home from home. Perfect for a couple. Within walking distance of all of Dublin's highlights. Chris gave us a map and carefully explained where everything was and how to get there. Can't recommend it highly enough. I wouldn't hesitate to go back.

Wonderful stay at Chriss place! The location is exceptional, with us being able to walk to 99% of the things we wanted to do or see. A full kitchen is fabulous, however we barely used it due to all the delicious food options available.
Great host, pictures are what you get, and a comfortable bed.

This apartment is outstanding.  It's beautiful, clean, great location and there's nothing that the owners have left out so that you have a wonderful stay in Dublin.  
If you want to stay in Dublin, this is the place to book.  Everything is in walking distance.
Great location! It was easy to walk to most locations in the city.

Loved the location of Chriss place. It was close to everything but was very quiet. Tons of amenities and the apartment was very comfortable. Check in was very smooth and Evelyn gave us a thorough walk around the place. Would stay here again if we come back to Dublin!

This place is brilliant - the perfect location for getting around Dublin, everything is accessible by foot. It is a very safe neighbourhood with many amenities close by. Chris was a gracious host, met us and walked us to the apartment and made some recommendations to us for sightseeing, etc. Would stay here again in a heartbeat!
Great location, great tips on the local area and places to go.  Chris was easy to communicate with and responsive.  Made accomodations for our late arrival.

The 2nd floor apartment is central and within walking distance to everything.  
We walked everywhere. 
The Apartment was perfect for 2, no issues with staying at Chriss place. I would recommend to anyone who is visiting the City Center to book if available.
The apartment is very well locater within walking distance of many of Dublin's attractions.
Fantastic flat, warm, comfortable and in a great location. Only a few minutes walk from Temple Bar! Highly recommended.
Great place in a great location! Thanks Chris!!

This is the second time we stayed at Chris's place.  We are extremely sad to learn that due to Dublin City rules, this cozy little place will be delisted soon.  It has been a joy to stay with Chris over the years.
Exactly as advertised! Perfect location, clean, and well equipped. Chris was extremely helpful, accommodating and friendly.

This is a great apartment for anyone wanting to check out the main sights and attractions in Dublin. It is easily centrally located so if you feel up to it you can walk to pretty much everything! The apartment is clean and well kept, and Chris gives excellent recommendations for food places to check out!

Ken and Maeve are wonderful host! Very hospitable and helpful! They give you a personal list of where to go for the best pubs and take the time to explain how to make the most of your trip. We would highly them to anyone!

This is a wonderful bed and breakfast. Very comfortable room, easy access from airport and into central Dublin. More than anything is the marvelous welcome and friendliness extended from Maeve and Ken. Top flight folks!  Thank you both.
A wonderful place to stay!! Clean and comfortable, and Maeve and Ken were so helpful and kind to us during our stay.  Breakfast was also very good!

Incredible hosts! Knowledgeable of great local activities and the history, so easy to talk to, and went above and beyond to make sure we were comfortable. I wish we started our vacation with Maeve and Ken. Best stay yet!

Maeve and Ken are wonderful people who are genuinely interested in their guests' experience. I had everything I needed upon check in. I slept through breakfast time the first morning, so I didn't expect anything, but Maeve still had everything laid out. She pulled out a map and showed me the best places to stop in Dublin. I really appreciated her help.

Like all other reviewers, all I have is highest praise for Maeve and Ken as top-notched hosts. From the moment you arrive at their well-located doorstep, you know you are in good hands. They have parlayed their own vast travel experiences into their offerings of unmatched hospitality and service that travelers to Dublin need and want. Without a doubt, my favorite aspect of my stay was the time spent in conversation with Maeve, Ken and the other guests around the breakfast table--a very good breakfast, indeed!

Maeve and Ken were wonderful hosts! They had a lovely spread for breakfast and the conversation was lovely. Upon our arrival, Maeve gave wonderful tips about getting around the city and allowed us to use the bus passes that made getting in an out of the city much more convenient. The room was very comfortable and we really liked having a sink in the room :) We would definitely stay there again and recommend them to anyone looking for a quiet home-away-from-home stay in Dublin
Excellent accueil, nous recommandons vivement.

If you are looking for a place where you will be hosted by 2 lovely people, this is the place to stay ! The welcome is really nice (even if you arrive like us at 00:00), the breakfast delicious, and all the talking and advise given by Maeve & Ken perfect ! They propose you a card for the journey (bus, tram), so you just have to put some money on it, you will have a nice city map with all the great places to see ! 
So dont hesitate and book your stay in here !
If youre looking for a great, friendly, welcoming place  to stay, book with Maeve and Ken now! They were warm,welcoming and so knowledgeable. Great place and location. You wont be disappointed!

Ken and Maeve were outstanding hosts. The perfect introduction to Ireland and Irish hospitality.  Ken and Maeve shared Irish history, great tips on places to visit, and simply wonderful conversation. Great location, clean, comfortable, and a great hot tub! A perfect stay, Thanks to you both.

I stayed for a second time last week with Maeve and Ken for work purposes.  It felt like coming home with the warm welcome and hospitality I received.  Maeve and Ken could not do enough for me.  I thoroughly enjoyed my stay at their beautiful home that offers all comforts for your stay.  I would highly recommend saying in this home.

Absolutely wonderful hosts!! Best Irish hospitality ever...because there were 3 groups of Canadians staying here Ken went out of his way to whip up pancakes with maple syrup for our breakfast.  
Easy bus transportation into the city....Maeve was a fount of knowledge for where to go and how to get there. We would absolutely stay with them again.

Maeve and Ken work hard to make sure their guests have a clean, nice space to spend the night and have as much knowledge as possible about navigating Dublin. This includes helpful transportation tricks and tips, favorite local restaurants, and suggestions for things to do. The fact they make breakfast is amazing and it was way more fun to stay with them than trying to get a hotel.

Such a clean, welcoming home. Mauve and Ken are a wealth of information and are super helpful with Dublin and area. Their place is convenient to bus stops and close to airport. We enjoyed visiting with them as well as the two other couples that stayed while we were there. From the moment you walk thru the door you will feel like you are at home !!

About 15 minutes away from the airport and 25-35 minutes from the center (depending on traffic), Maeve and Ken's place has a great location in the northern part of Dublin. The bus stops are right there, there are a convenience store, a great pub and a bunch of other stores and restaurants next door. So the location is perfect. But what makes this home great to stay at are the hosts. With a lot of experience behind their back, they know exactly what information to offer visitors. They respond quickly to any questions and make you feel welcome even before you show up. Once you are in their house, you are their house guest (not a customer). We had lovely chats over delicious breakfast (that offered Irish staples) and sometimes in the evening, as I sipped the evening tea they made for me. The room I stayed had everything I needed and more. And there are these personal touches that make you feel happy. When Maeve learned that another of the visiting guests had a birthday that day, she brought out a little gift, kept just for such occasions. They provided a card for the public transportation system that made  fares cheaper. And their business cards included information on the buses one needed to get back and forth to their place. They are simply generous, lovely people who make you feel at home.

Maeve and Ken made us feel right at home. Their warm hospitality was second to none and it was clear that they genuinely care about their guests' experiences both at their home and around Dublin. They have a lovely home which they keep immaculately clean and there are places for guests to unwind. We enjoyed a soak in the hot tub on our first night and relaxed in the guest lounge on our second. Listen to their advice on local transit and attractions and you will have a wonderful time in Dublin.

Absolutely wonderful hosts.  Ken and Maeve were hands down the most hospitable hosts we could have asked for.  They were a wealth of information and were always available to help if you needed it.  Their home is beautiful and the location is perfect for those coming to visit Dublin.  Theyre so great were coming back to finish our stay with them and were super excited to see them again!!!
We started our vacation with Ken and Maeve and couldnt have asked for a better way to finish it.  They were amazing hosts and wonderful to chat with about local culture and history.
Great location with easy access to the city and airport. Maeve and Ken truly are super hostsù!
Very helpful and obliging hosts.  Helped plan our itinerary and our stay in Dublin.  Would definitely stay here again.

This was my first Airbnb stay and I have to say it was a wonderful experience. 
Maeve and Ken where great from the moment I arrived and so very welcoming. They have a lovely home and make it feel like its your own . The bedrooms and large and comfortable, the breakfast in a morning was plentiful and offered a good variety.
They gave me handy little tips on how  to get around the city via public transport. They provided me with a map of the city and suggested places to go , things to do and the best pubs and restaurants to try. 
I would highly recommend staying with them and they will be my first choice on my return to Dublin 
Thank you to you both

Maeve and Ken are wonderful hosts! We felt really welcomed into their home and they had wonderful tips for us for our very short trip to Dublin as well as leap cardsù for all their guests, which made getting around the city much easier. A definite added bonus is the breakfast as well as their location, which is close to the airport and city center with both easy to reach with the bus stop in front of their house.
You will get all the best attributes for a perfect stay and visit to Dublin.  The location, bus service availability, and especially your stay at the best host and hostess around!

Stay here! You won't find a better price, a more welcoming host or a more convenient city stay. Maeve and Ken are outstanding people who go far beyond what you would expect from a host. They were very understanding when my flights were delayed by a day; the room was ready and they gave me hints about local places to stop and things to see. Thanks again Maeve and Ken!
Strongly recommended!!

Absolutely amazing people! They were wonderful, helpful and gave lots of advice on what to do. The morning breakfast conversations were the absolute best. :) 
Thank you so much!

Ken and Maeve are exceptional hosts. They made us feel welcome and were extremely helpful. We enjoyed sharing a traditional Irish breakfast with them and getting acquainted.  Their home displays an intriguing collection of Ethiopian art.  I highly recommend a stay at Maeve and Ken; they have contributed to make our stay in Ireland an unforgettable experience.
Go go go, Maeve and Ken are wounderful hosts, and the breakfast is superb:-)
Nice place.Lovely friendly hosts.
Maeve and Ken's place and hospitality are the ideal that Airbnb should hope to be. Absolutely wonderful stay. Could not ask for more.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay in Dublin and the hospitality. The bus lines are convenient for in town transportation. Maeve and Ken had great tips for places to see, things to do, and the best way to get there.

We strongly recommend this house! We passed 3 amazing days there. We were well welcomed and advised. Every day we appreciated the big breakfast as well as the jacuzzi in the evening. The house is conveniently located, next to a bus stop where you can go to the airport or city center easily, about 20min each. Dont hesitate book it !

We enjoyed staying with Ken and Maeve very much. They were amazing hosts and more than helpful during our arrival (we were in a big rush and everything was a bit chaotic). We felt right at home and enjoyed listening to all their stories, the ones on Irish history in particular. Our room was spacious and clean, and the breakfast was great. So to sum it up: we highly recommend staying with them, especially if you like it quiet and enjoy talking to locals.
Thank you Ken and Meave for letting us stay with you. We appreciated especially the warm welcome and the many tips about Dublin.

Mauve and Ken were outstanding hosts. They immediately made us feel welcomed in their home. We received wonderful advice from them. Their home was very comfortable. We would stay with them again. This was our first time at a bnb and we  were very pleased with  this experience. They were so kind to acknowledge our 30th anniversary with a little Dublin keepsake. Thanks again Mauve and Ken for a wonderful stay. We now have  new friends in Dublin!

Maeve and Ken are really warm and welcoming people and made us feel at home right away. Everything was clean and looked like in the pictures. The breakfast was amazing. Maeve and Ken gave great tips on what to do in Dublin. We will be back!
Very friendly hosts who are very quick at solving problems and are great to talk with. The room was very clean and so was the bathroom.
Beautiful home. Ken and Maeve are wonderful hosts and make you feel right at home. They were extremely helpful in getting us about and answering our questions about the neighborhood and Dublin.
A great AirBnb, fantastic hosts, highly recommend
Maeve&Ken are very warm, loving and helpful people. We enjoyed our stay a lot and will definitely come back. The breakfast is wonderful, the place is very cosy and well located. We highly recommend!
Warm welcome, hospitality, very friendly couple who made you feel like home!
Wonderful place to stay. Very warm and welcoming hosts. Highly recommended.
Greay location. Great host. Perfect tips. Great room.
Very nice place and friendly hosts
Hosts were welcoming and helpful. Located near public transportation. They had great suggestions and were fun to be around
Nette und offene Leute, gute Tips. Sehr Gastfreundlich.

Great host and very personable, made us feel like were the most important people there. Made us feel like we were with family. Highly recommended this if ever traveling to Dublin or anywhere around Dublin

Maeve and Ken are the friendliest, most knowledgable, warmest and simply the most fantastic hosts we could have asked for. The location is very convenient as their home is close to the city center but away from all of the crowds. Breakfast was lovely, the room was very clean and we got some amazing recommendations for places to visit in Dublin. 100% recommend staying with them - it was our first time staying in an airbnb but with hosts like Maeve and Ken we would not even consider staying anywhere else if we ever return to Dublin! Better than we could have wished for.

Ken and Maeve were great hosts! They greeted us upon arrival, gave us local tips and cooked us a great breakfast! Their house is convenient for the bus but they're also happy to get you a taxi. I would highly recommend staying with Ken and Maeve!

Maeve and Ken are such wonderful hosts.  They made us feel like family.  The property is just a 15 minute bus ride from the airport.  We hope to return to Dublin, and when we do, we will definitely be contacting Maeve and Ken.  We will also be recommending this airbnb to others.

Amazing hosts, friendly, knowledgeable, approachable. I came to visit my friend but made friends along, my best Airbnb experience ever! Would definitely recommend to anyone and stay with them again if I come back to Dublin one day!

What a wonderful home and what a wonderful couple. Maeve and Ken were soooo helpful. The home was immaculate, clean and comfortable. Breakfast was simple fare but filling. Location was close to Dublin airport and downtown bus routes. But the sweet spot was this couple. Unforgettable. 
Make your stay in beautiful Dublin extra special here.

This was a great place to stay when visiting Dublin! There is a bus stop right outside the house which made it easy to get into downtown and get back. The house was beautiful and the hosts were generous and made us feel very welcome. The breakfast was also a great touch!
Great place with a great host!

Fantastic apartment.  Camden street has it all - live like a local but right in the heart of Dublin.  Lexs place is decorated very eclectically and it has a fun vibe.  Lex has a lot of local knowledge and started our trip off with a warm welcome.  The street parking is clutch if you are renting a car.

We were four people arriving at 3 different times and Lex handled it with aplomb.  He was gracious and very accommodating in all requests.  
We all loved his house.  The location was amazing.  Bustling Camden Street with its restaurants/pubs/stores is literally a one minute walk away, yet the house is quiet and comfortable.  There is a cosy back patio area, but sadly we didn't have the time to utilize it.  It really felt like home and everything we needed was there. 
The walk to the touristy areas (St. Patrick's, Brazen Head, Christchurch Cathedral, Dublin Castle, Temple Bar, O'Connell Street, Grafton Street) are all less than 20 minutes.  
Really a great place to stay and we couldn't have been happier.  
If it's available, I would just book it.
Beautifully decorated - great kitchen -backyard space and spacious townhouse - one of my favorite airbnb experience

Lex is a good guy and the location is fantastic.  Unfortunately , the place is darker than the photos indicate and it is quite cluttered.  Our biggest problem was the cleanliness of the apartment.  

Rick & Diane

Lexs funky, quirky place was awesome. Very cosy and inviting, and so close to everything. The street itself is quiet and low traffic, but One street over there are several restaurants and stores, and within a 15-20 min easy walking distance from downtown Dublin, Grafton Street, and Temple Bar. Lex also gave us several good  recommendations including restaurants, bars, and things to do and see. Highly recommend this place.  This was our first AirBnB experience and it couldnt have been better.

We stayed with four people at Lexs funky house - couldnt recommend it too much. It has a very special, cool interieur (everything in the look of the 70ies) and its super located in a calm environment - at the same time you are only a stones throw away from pubs, restaurants and shops (we recommend ûThe Cake Cafe right on the back of Lexs house for breakfast and teatime). Lex was a helpful host and always available for us. Definitively five stars from us.
Super fun and stylish home in a great neighborhood! Lex is a great host!
Lexs place is great and in a great part of the city!

Perfect house and perfect owner! In a vibrant part of Dublin, full of cafes, pubs, restaurants and clubs, Lex s house is  stylish and warm. It is a big old charming Dublin house in two floors and plenty of space and light. The two bedrooms are on a private garden within a serie of other closed gardens. So your sleep wont be disturbed by any noise.
Dont forget to ask Alex tips on the city life as he knows everything about Dublin. All the coolest places but also museums and fine restaurants. He is welcoming and caring. Simply the perfect host!
Great location. Great host. Really great Dublin experience

Our stay was fantastic, the best Airbnb of our multi-city trip. The location is great, on a quiet street, but literally one block from tons of great restaurants, bars, shopping - and totally walkable to St. Stephen's Green, Temple Bar, and other popular sights. Lex gave us great restaurant recommendations and we were impressed by every one of them that we tried. The house has tons of charm and really feels like a home.

Lex's home was a great base for our trip in Dublin. Easy walk or quick taxi ride to all the places we wanted to go. Quirky, retro decor made it a fun and unique place to stay. Great restaurants and cafes in the neighborhood as well. Lex was very accommodating with an early check in for us and left a delicious fresh baguette.

This home is PERFECT for a trip to Dublin.  It's centrally located but your street will feel quiet and homey.  The house itself is incredibly comfortable and a great place to spend a few nights while exploring Dublin!
Everything was OK and as stated in the description and pictures.

Lexs place was exactly what we were looking for in location walking to St Stephens green to start out to Trinity College and sights. Wonderfully quiet with soft beds and beautiful outdoor sitting area. Do not miss Camden Kitchen seems pricey but we paid the same for a pub dinner at catch 22. Amazing duck and chicken. Highlights were street musicians on Grafton st, pigeon guy in park, book of Kells and long room with our hilarious tour guide a local. Great neighborhood. Thanks for the hospitality Lex
Host is very friendly and well informed about the general neighborhood and offers lots of local tips.  Great location to the heart of Dublin.

we travelled in a group of friends and really liked the place. It has a lot of interior details, stylish and enough space for 6 ppl. the location is quit but a lot of bars and restaurants are just arround the corner like 3min walk.

thanks for the lcal tipps, too

We loved staying in Lexs home!  Hes in a great locationî a shockingly quiet street just a block away from great coffeehouses and restaurants. Youve got easy access to the light rail and the bus lines. We were comfortable in all four beds (one of them a sofa bed), and the wooden window shades kept the light out in all bedrooms effectively. The shower has an electric adapter that ensures you never run out of hot water, and there is also a washer, a dryer, and a dishwasher. Lex himself is a kind and friendly host. If Id known he was a DJ, I would have brought him a record from my hometown. Thanks, Lex!
Cool DJ and cool place.

Walking into this house was like walking into a 70's/80's dream come true. A little vintage radio playing French music; Fresh gourmet cheese and bread laid out for us in the kitchen; Nostalgic colors and posters enforcing a stylish and relaxed vibe. Open windows to the back gardens let the rooms breathe. All the bits and bobs around the place seemed to be carefully chosen and placed with technique. Every little thing in the house was a cool vintage version of what it would be at any other spot. This place really was a dream house and we ended up spending more time inside it than outside. 

Lex was a fantastic host as well. He sent us several amazing recommendations about the surrounding area, which ended up being the cooler part of Dublin (we'd stayed in Temple bar a few days before). His recommended restaurants were some of the best food we'd eaten on our trip, and checked in the morning to see if we needed anything. 

Overall, this was certainly the coolest Airbnb we'd ever stayed in and was a major highlight of our entire vacation. This place will be the first thing that comes to mind if we ever come back to Dublin.
Loved our stay here.

Lexs place is an incredibly hip, warm, and inviting home in the heart of everything Dublin has to offer.
We were able to walk to all the best restaurants and sights in 15 minutes or less, and it was great to return to a place that genuinely felt like home at the end of each day.
Lexs hospitality was also top notch, and for anyone looking at a weekend away in Dublin, this one should absolutely be your winner!

Very friendly and patiently when teaching us how to use the key correctly and helped me to find the crushed car. All rooms are very good and quiet.there is good quality food. very convenience place .Thank you very much!
Lovely place with a homely feel. Close to everything and super comfortable.
Nice house, good location, Lex is a great host. Very interesting decor

We were three persons staying from friday to sunday. Lex was a perfect host, he answered very quick and gave us a lot of useful information about the neighbourhood. The place was very nice and quiet with a little patio and very close to restaurants, pubs and shops. We will definetly stay there on our next trip to Dublin!

Lex was helpful and approachable
The house is small but stylish 
A lovey area

What can we say? This was the best start to a 10 day Ireland Trip. From the very beginning when Ken came out to help us park to the extremely helpful tips on what to do and where to go. We arrived after a long flight, slept 10 hrs the first night without even realizing how long we had slept, took the train down to the city both days (less than 15 min), and had a fantastic breakfast with them one morning. We couldn't have asked for a better introduction and start to our journey. We highly recommend and would absolutely stay with them again.

Maeve & Kens place is a wonderful location - close enough to Dublin for easy access but far enough that its peaceful and quiet. Their helpfulness for things to see and do really add an extra level to your trip, and you couldnt find kinder or more thoughtful hosts!

We have traveled a lot, but Maeve and Ken are by far the best hosts we have ever had.  On arrival, Maeve met us for check-in, gave us a tour, made us a cup of coffee, took out a map, and began to label all the best places in town with thorough reasons why we should see them.  The room was clean with a large bathroom and she and Ken were the most hospitable people I have ever met.  We spent hours our last night just talking with them!  You can tell they love having people in their home.  She makes an excellent family style breakfast, and offers you cookies and coffee every time she sees you.  They love Dublin and are very knowledgeable about the place.  We would stay with ONLY them if we are ever in the Dublin area again!
Extremely nice and very very caring. Also very helpful in finding way around the city.

Our stay with Maeve and Ken was really enjoyable. They gave us lots of information on places to visit, most of which we probably wouldn't have seen without their recommendations! They are very friendly but also respectful of the guests' space.

We had a fantastic time during our stay at Maeves & Ken's home. Both were very helpful and friendly. The room and the entire home is just amazing. Really liked the garden and the great breakfast. Thanks a lot!!
Loved them! Great play to stay in a good location near the hot spots.

Maeve and Ken are fabulous, interesting hosts who welcomed us into their lovely home with all creature comforts. They provided amazing tips and help from the moment we landed in Dublin and a 15 minute bus trip later, we were greeted with coffee and a warm welcome. All facilities were top class and we loved a soak in the jacuzzi after a day of exploring the sights. The breakfasts and sitting at their table mingling with other guests was a highlight.

From our arrival until our departure on day 3, we were afforded the highest level of welcome, comfort and practical local tips to move easily about the city. Our accomodations were very clean and efficient and the breakfasts so hearty and delicious. Extra perks like Leap cards to add value to for local buses and information papers with essential lodging pointers and city suggestions made our days more relaxed and enjoyable. Ideal hosts and home!

Maeve & Ken bring hospitality to a new high. They were welcoming  & always ready to assist with any need. Their home is close to bus stop for quick  ride into Dublin or minutes to airport. Thanks for a lovely stay.
Ken and Maeve are lovely people and their place is amazing.

Maeve and Kens house was the best Airbnb we have ever stayed in and when we go back to Dublin we will definitely be staying with them again! Everything was great from the check in process, amenities included, local tips and hospitality. When we got there, they were there to greet us, give us our keys, provide local tips and show us a map of the center city of Dublin as well as places to visit and where things are. They had a list of different restaurants to try and provided Leap cards for using the bus (which was the easiest and most affordable way to get around the city). Maeve and Ken are the nicest people ever and they really care about the people staying in their home. They also provided breakfast which was so nice because we got to take time in the morning to chat with them and the other guests. 100% recommend staying with Maeve and Ken if youre visiting Dublin. They are the absolute best and my husband and I cant say the best things of them and thank them enough for a great stay!!

Not only is the Air BNB lovely, Ken & Maeve are the most delightful people to be around. They made us feel comfortable right away, like we were part of the family. They always checked in on us at the end of the day to make sure we were getting on okay. They were extremely helpful in navigating the area and offered many recommendations. You can tell they enjoy hosting as they put so much thought and care into it. The room and the house were very clean and comfortable. All in all it was a great stay. Nothing but good things to say.

Very comfortable and spotlessly clean place to stay in a perfect location on the bus route between the airport and city centre. Maeve and Ken made us feel very welcome in their home and catered to all our needs. A wealth of local knowledge, fabulous breakfast and their easy going nature made our stay with them a pleasure from start to end.

Maeve and Ken were welcoming hosts and helped with ideas for exploring Dublin. Very clean and organized place and all details are outlined on their notes in the room. Right on a bus route for both Dublin and the airport so no car is needed! Thanks for everything.

Ken and Maeve were very nice, and very helpful in giving details about Dublin and the places to go. They were incredibly friendly and always interested in our adventures so that they could help or give suggestions.

If you are looking for a clean, continent, comfortable Air BnB this is one for you.  If you are looking for friendly people, great Dublin/Ireland travel tips, and good times Maeve & Kens home is the only place for you!
Cant begin to describe how awesome this was. Great location. Maeve and Kevin were amazing hosts. Very helpful and a joy to talk with. 100% recommend!

We had stayed at Ken and Maeve's place in the beginning of our trip and returned here at the end. Like the first time, they were very welcoming and pleasant. Very good hosts to stay with and very helpful. Would stay here again.

Our stay at Maeve and Ken¬¥s house was really a pleasure. As it is not directly in the centre of Dublin, it is really quiet. The connection to the city centre by bus is excellent. The bus stop is right on the other side of the street. Maeve and Ken are fantastic hosts. We got a full overview about what to do in Dublin with a lot of helpful information. The breakfast in great! Although we need to leave really early for our flight, everything was prepared for our breakfast! Maeve and Ken really take care! Thank you so much!

Our stay at Maeve and Kens house was absolutely wonderful! Within walking distance from Dublin City University (where our work conference was). The bus stop to the city is just across the street and the pub (the Comet) is almost next door. We had dinner there a couple of times. Maeve and Kens hospitality is amazing, they gave many local tips to visit and they invited us for a BBQ in their lovely (tropical) garden. Maeve and Ken are very nice, interesting people and interested in their guests. We had good talks. I absolutely recommend staying at their place!!
Very good hosts to stay with and very helpful. Gives a lot of good idea of what to see in Dublin and always ready to help. Home is cosy and just across the bus station. Would definitely recommend it.
The room is adorned warmly and privately to endues me with the comfortable and homey feeling. Maeve & Ken are very nice, everything was great! I would definitely choose the house again!

Maeve & Ken were incredibly thoughtful, kind & welcoming from the moment I made my booking to driving out of their drive. It was my first time doing Air BnB and I could not have had a more accommodating experience. Breakfast was lovely, the room was so cosy & a fresh robe awaited me. They really do go above and beyond to make sure you have a lovely time whether you are travelling from near or a far. I will hopefully be back to them soon! Fantastic trip.
Stop looking! This is the place to stay... wonderful, kind, loving people. Beautiful place, very clean. Would never hesitate and stay again.. incredible, open minded human beings.
Maeve and Ken provided thoughtful local tips, great breakfast, and everything we needed. I definitely recommend to stay with them!

Our stay at Marve and Ken was really nice. The room is confy, the area calm. The place is ideally located between the airport and the city center. Our hosts are pleased to recommend the good spots to enjoy the city. We enjoyed our stay very much.

Great hosts, very friendly and hospitable, nothing was too much for Maeve and Ken. I loved chatting over breakfast, such lovely lovely people, I wish I could have stayed longer but I would definitely come back. As a single woman travelling alone, this was my first experience of an Airbnb in someones house, I would definitely recommend this Airbnb. Room was spacious and clean, bed was very comfy and great to have use of a sitting room in the evening. A great experience x
Maeve and Ken are very welcoming hosts and their house is very well situated, either to visit Dublin city and to reach the airport.

Very nice and welcoming people. Good location. Place was very clean. Very little privacy and many house rules. Lots of extra charges if u want anything above or beyond a place to sleep. Might be good for social people but I would not stay again.
Maeve and Kens place was such a delight! They were very accommodating and helpful to any questions you have. Book them and you wont regret it!

We had a very good stay at Maeve & Kens place. They are really helpful (and recommend you to travel to the city centre by bus, which was easy with their help) and they gave a lot of useful tips where to go. The room is nice with a really comfy bed. Breakfast was excellent. Maeve and Ken are two really sweet people who love to host. We would recommend.

My best friend and I stayed with Maeve and Ken for two nights, but we wished we could have stayed longer! They are both incredibly warm and welcoming people, and right away they offered many great suggestions for exploring Dublin. The pub we went to for dinner at their suggestion was absolutely perfect. In the morning, we had a chance to chat with both Maeve and Ken, as well as some other guests, over a lovely breakfast. Their home is also directly across the street from a bus stop where you can catch the bus to the city center, which we found very convenient. They were also kind enough to lend us their bus cards, so all we had to do was put money on them. I would love to have the chance to come stay with them again in the future!

Maeve & Ken are two of the loveliest, most hospitable people weve ever met! Always up for a chat, keen to show us all the sights; just fantastic!

Everything is taken care of, from breakfast to the bus cards.

Wed give them six stars if we could!

Kind regards,

Wouter and Grace

Maeve and Ken were absolutely wonderful hosts! Their home in so beautiful and our room was comfy, super clean and decorated with delightful taste. The bed wouldn't let us out of it! ;) Both Maeve and Ken were more than nice to us, we had very interesting conversations and they recommended lots of good things to do in Dublin. What to say about their breakfast? I'm already missing it!!!! FANTASTIC! Would definitely stay again in Maeve & Ken's home

Ken and Maeve are excellent hosts. Every morning a lovely breakfast with a nice chat. The busstop is just across the street. 
We got great tips for out stay in Dublin.

Ken and Maeve are kind and lovely hosts. Being seasoned travelers themselves, they anticipated a lot of our questions and needs. Their home is well situated to get into Dublin and to the airport. Plenty of places to eat and shop within walking distance too. The accommodations (bedroom, bathroom, sitting room) were great as well.
Great place to stay, exactly as advertised. Clean and everything has been thought through.

Maeve and Kens place was one of the highlights of our trip. They were warm and welcoming, making us feel at home and providing us with so many great tips! We even received Leap cards for the public transport - the bus was a 20 metre walk across the road and takes you directly to the centre! Thank you Maeve and Ken, our stay was lovely!

Maeve and Ken were nothing short of amazing hosts. They welcomed us into their home like family and made sure that we had everything we needed. Additionally, they gave us very clear resources and directions. Maeve even went out of her way ans wrote out specific directions for a day trip to Malahide Castle and Howth. My only regret is that we didn'tstay with them the whole trip (we stayed in a hostel previous to them)! I would recommend them highly to anyone travelling near the Dublin area.

Maeve and Ken were delightful, contentious hosts.  They were always happy to provide hot water, tea, or coffee and were happy to help with everything from transportation to recommending insider places to explore in Dublin.  The room was clean, and they thoughtfully provided extra towels and bathrobes.  If you like African art, they have a large collection of both traditional and modern Ethiopian work on display which I enjoyed admiring.  I'd definitely stay with them again.

Claudios place is in a great location, super easy to get to from airport. The place has everything you need on a daily basis, clean, and comfortable. From check in to check out I had no issues, and will come back here, I had a blast in Ireland. Thanks Claudio!
Claudios place was at a very convenient location - everything was 20 min walkable distance. It had everything we needed and it was clean! Thank you for opening your space for us!

Our stay was great. The apartment was small, but find for what we needed. We only stayed  there to sleep, so perfect for vacationers. The bathroom was a bit small and was tricky not to get water everywhere!
Great location and exactly what we needed for a long weekend in Dublin
Claudio was very flexible, we could check in early, apartment itself is fine, nothing special
Great locations ideal for city stay :)

Very convenient location to Guinness Storehouse, Jameson Bow St Experience (Smithfield), with several other pubs and restaurants within a 15-20 minute walk. We parked our rental car in Q-Park Four Courts which was very close and worked out well. The private gated entrance into the apartment complex ensured that we felt safe during our stay. The amenities were just a bit underwhelming because of the size of the shower/bathroom, and the soap and shampoos seemed to be leftovers. Aside from that, I would recommend for those traveling to Dublin on a budget!

What a lovely place to stay as either a solo traveler or couple. The space is stylish and very clean. The host is incredibly reliable, quick to respond, gracious, and accommodating. Im thankful to have stumbled upon this place and would happily recommend it to anyone else!
Claudios place is not fancy but definitely as advertised. He was very responsive and flexible. We appreciated his help. Great location!  We walked everywhere.
I have stayed in Claudios place for one week. It was a very pleasant time and helped me to get trough the first phase of my longer stay in Dublin. I highly recommend this apartment.

I was pleasantly surprised because the studio space was bigger than it appeared in the pictures and there was more storage space to unpack and hang clothes. I think it is perfect for two people and it didn't feel cramped. Theres 4 or 5 flights of stairs though and the door key hole could use some maintenance/updating. I'd say it's a great value and I felt like the space had everything I needed.

I especially appreciated the fast responses from our host and he was always available when we needed anything. Very kind and thoughtful. We had a stressful arrival because it was so late at night and dark. It was difficult to find the place but we called our host and he helped us. I appreciated the flexibility for checking in and there was a lock box for us with an extra set of keys upon request. We were sooooo happy to have complimentary milk and cookies ready for us when we arrived! Other amenities like soap and olive oil and seasonings helped us save a lot of money as we like to cook at home.

The location is convenient because the airport bus is a 2 minute walk away. There is a bus that takes you to temple bar area in 5 minutes but it doesn't run after midnight so it's a bit of walk coming home (15 minutes?) or an 8euro taxi. But we felt safe in the neighborhood and I felt safe walking alone at night I didn't have any problems. The walk along the river liffy is beautiful. 
Also note don't spend too much time at temple bar try to check out other party areas like Camden street for less touristy experience and more reasonable prices. Temple bar is the most expensive. I liked The George bar on monday there was a fun free drag show and dancing after. 'No name bar' and 'workmans' were also great finds for the nightlife.
Great base of operations. Claudio had excellent suggestions for what to do while in Dublin. Perfect studio stay for the two of us, the apartment had everything we needed.
Tidy little studio between Heuston and Temple Bar. Very comfortable bed, great communication from Claudio, and a well-stocked kitchen.
We had a great time walking around. The apartment is near a lot of tourist sites.

Really enjoyed our stay at Claudio's place. It's location was perfect -- walking distance from Temple Bar, Trinity College, and the airport bus. The kitchen was well equipped which was very helpful. Communication was good too!
Amazing stay in a great location!  Recommend to everyone!
I really enjoyed the time spend here : the apartament was big, clean and in a good location. Good beds, nice kitchen (we didn't use it too much but it looks like you have everything you might need).
Lovely apartment and great location! We loved staying here.
This is a great apartment for 2 days or longer; it is a home and allows you to do things with your family like sit around the living room and chat, or make coffee without having to go out.

Very well designed apartment with plenty of space for 4 adults or a family. So nice to have two full, spacious bathrooms! There's a small grocery store half a block away and a nicer one just a little further, along with several restaurants. We had everything we needed for a relaxing, enjoyable holiday in Dublin.

Nice apartment with all amenities. Location is good with many nice pubs and restaurants close by or easy access to taxis to go further. Temple Bar about a 30 minute walk. Great value and responsive host.
The location is wonderful.  The condo lacks nothing.  Host leaves detailed information.

This was my first experience of an Airbnb stay, I didn't know what to expect. From the moment my friends and I arrived we were blown away. Spacious accommodation for 6 people in a stylish and very comfortable apartment. Location was superb, central to everywhere and a few great places to eat & drink just around the corner. We had a great stay would highly recommend a stay here.
Cathals place is beautiful and was the perfect size for a family of 4 (2 teenage boys who like separate beds!). A quick and easy walk into the city and many great restaurants! It was perfect.
Perfect, clean, great location
Todo perfecto
Very nice and comfortable place to stay.

We spent a night in Dorothy s stunning house. Dorothy was a fantastic host, she made us feel at ease from the very beginning. The house is stunning with beautiful  features. The location speaks  for itself sandy cove is at a short stroll and the city centre easily accessible by bus, or dart.
Great!!!
The host canceled this reservation 17 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
extremely atmospheric classic house on a beautiful old world square

We had a very pleasant stay in Dorothys house. The house is beautiful and well located. Dorothy suggested restaurants and pubs for our last night in Ireland and we had a good time! The breakfast was delicious! We recommand this Airbnb!

Such a lovely host. Dorothy was very thoughtful during our stay and was more than helpful when we were planning our visit.
Fabulous home.
Fantastic house, beautiful interior, great view, lovely breakfast. And Dorothy is a wonderful host. Very much appreciated and recommended!
A stunning home in a beautiful area, hosted by a wonderful woman. Would highly recommend.
Dorothy is charming, up beat and helpful.  Her home is lovely and we felt it was perfectly located for our needs.
A great place to stay!
Warm, welcoming and very clean. Great location and helpful tips from Dorothy!

Dorothy is an absolute GEM! My mom and I had the most wonderful time and we were sad to leave! Beautiful home, lovely location, and a very comfortable room. Excellent recommendations and tips for where to eat in town as well! I hope to stay any time I can visit Dublin again! :)
Dorothys home is lovely and she adds such thoughtful touches - like leaving a pitcher of drinking water in our room. A wonderful hostess - we will definitely book again sometime. Thank you, Dorothy!

Number 18 Crosthwaite Park is a lovely Victorian house, beautifully restored into a comfortable and charming home.  Guests are encouraged to use all the main rooms, which are full of interesting paintings and art works.  It is situated in a quiet, leafy square but very close to all the attractions of DunLaoghaire, Dalkey and Blackrock, with good parking.  Dorothy, the delightful owner, is most hospitable, and nothing is too much trouble;  she keeps everything spic and span.  We would heartily recommend No. 18, and hope to see Dorothy again some day.
Fabulous host and house! Dorothy was so friendly and welcoming. She was so kind in allowing my daughter to come for breakfast eveey morning too.  We will be back again!
Great host. Perfect location. Many thanks.

Dorothys stunning home is in a fabulous location just outside Dublin and really close to the Dart as well as some good local restaurants.  We found our beds super comfortable and the room cosy and quiet.  Breakfast was delicious with many tasty and well thought out healthy options and Dorothy is a wonderful and very helpful host.  In particular allowing a very early check-in on our arrival day was a real blessing after our very long plane journey.  We would definitely recommend a stay here, and would stay again ourselves, but would like to see the bathroom updated a little; being an older house the water pressure in the shower is quite low and I dont think much can be done about that, but its good to be aware before you visit.  It would be good to see more towel rails, some better lighting and a sturdy shelf or two in there, along with some more hooks or place for clothing.  Just little things but it would make the stay even more memorable.

Dorothy was a lovely host! She lives in a wonderful house and is offering a georgious room with private bathroom! Dun Laoghaire ist a nice place to spend time and we definitely recommend to stay at Dorothys place!  She was a lovely person with lots of helpful and special advice! In case of another trip to Dublin, well immediately choose Dorothys home!

The apartment was perfect for us. The second bedroom was much appreciated because our granddaughter was traveling with us and it was wonderful that she could have her own space. We were able to walk to all the sites we wanted. It was a quiet neighborhood, easy to locate and Gina was on hand to meet us
Great location!  Very responsive and helpful!
This apartment was close to everything in Dublin. It was very clean, well-managed, and the hospitality was great!
Great place in a great location!
Location, location, location perfect spot to walk your way around Dublin.  Take day trips up and down the coast.  Quiet safe place.
Lovely apartment a walkable distance from city centre. Cathal responded quickly to messages. Apartment was clean and comfortable. We had a lovely trip in Dublin.
It was a pleasure to stay! Lovely apartment and excellent customer service! We had a really early check-in - thx a lot for making this possible!

It is a perfect accommodation, which is situated in the centre of Dublin. Everything is near to the flat. The hospitality is excellent and Cathal is a very kind person. If we will return to Dublin, we will book this accommodation again. 
Magdolna from Hungary
The host was great, the location was perfect and we had an amazing time! Would definitively recommend

Cathal & Ginas apartment offers fantastic base to enjoy your trip to Dublin ... very central and within walking distance to every single one of the citys tourist attractions including eateries and pubs
The host canceled this reservation 16 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Great stay here, good location for exploring Dublin, cosy apartment that was clean and had everything we needed.
A great place in a great location for town and the 3Arena. Good communication throughout from Cathal. Id book again
Great apartment, great host and great location in Dublin. Would definitely use this accommodation again.
Jason was a great host and very helpful throughout the process!
Top location, close to all local attractions

This apartment is an amazing space right in the middle of Temple Bar. The apartment is surprisingly spacious, and well thought out. If you are like my wife and I, we like to pace ourselves and like to spend time to ourselves. This apartment allows you to do that, but also run to some popular pubs/restaurants without having to venture far. The bedroom was very quiet at night, and we heard no street noise. We will stay here again if we need an apartment around temple bar!
Absolutely wonderful. Cant beat the location and Jason is extremely helpful. Highly recommend.
If you're looking for a great location in the heart of Dublin, look no further. Jason is a wonderful host and the apartment perfectly suited my needs.
Good apartment right in the middle of Temple Bar.
Jasons place was great. Its a fantastic location and Jason is a well deserved Superhost.

Jasons place is perfectly situated for stop in Dublin! Great location in the middle of all the heavily trafficked areas, and an easy walk to great spots outside the touristy areas. Additionally, Jason was a fantastic host and promptly responded to any messages we sent out. Great time all around, and we would definitely stay here again!
Jason gave a ton of travel suggestions as well as responded quickly to our messages.  Great host!

Jasons place is everything promised.  It is clean and in a fantastic central location, close to everything. In spite of being in a very busy area, it was quite quiet for sleeping. Earplugs are a great suggestion to ensure a good sleep.  Bring your own soap for the bathroom but otherwise many amenities! 
Jason is a great host and his apartment is great!
Our stay at Jasons place was great! Great location and a very clean and tidy place. We loved his recommendations on food and pubs in the area. Would definitely stay here again!
Jasons place is a great way to experience Dublin. Short walk to anywhere you want to be. Loved the vibe in the area. The apartment is super cozy and Jason is a fantastic host.

Jason's place is in a fabulous spot in Dublin.  Great restaurant and entertainment choices are just beneath your feet and all around his place.  Jason does a great job of providing insight into the local scene and he's also an excellent communicator.  

We also found other Dublin attractions easily attainable via walking from Jason's place.  Depending on your conditioning, he's also conveniently located for short cab-rides to just about anything in and around Dublin.

Jason's common areas are nice and bright.  

I have recommended to Jason that he upgrade his pillows.

Definitely Super Host material! Quick responses, clean and stylish apartment, and most importantly, location! Walking distance to all the famous pubs, restaurants, and attractions. The balancing was a great place to relax with a drink and people watch before a night out on the town. My new go-to place whenever Im in Dublin!
A simple, elegant clean flat in the heart of Temple Bar
Fantastic location and a beautiful space. We loved staying here and would absolutely book it again!

Great apartment in the temple area of Dublin! Jason was very responsive and gave plenty of local tips for the city and Ireland as a whole. Apartment was clean and spacious, a good place to recharge. Be mindful that since you are in the heart of the temple area, youll get a lot of noise through the night from people walking from bar to bar. Would definitely stay here again on our return to Dublin.
Great location and wonderful space for our time in Dublin. Jason was a great host and very attentive to detail!
Amazing location, nice clean place with bay window looking down on the street. Jason was very helpful and check-in couldnt have been more convenient. Thanks!
Great stay, right in the heart of Temple.

Great place! Stay in heart of temple bar area, convenient to walk anywhere youd like to visit in downtown Dublin. That being said, know you are in a noisy area near pubs/temple bar. Bedroom in back so we did not have trouble sleeping with noisy streets below. Great spot to stay!

This place was perfectly located if you want to get out and see some of the trendy restaurants and pubs that Dublin has to offer! 

We walked to both Guinness Storehouse and the Jameson Distillery from this location without any issue or worries. 

Jason was very helpful and accommodating with our requests and providing tips and suggestions. 

I had read that the area was noisy however, we were there over a weekend and didnt find it to be noisy at all. 

Perfect place for a couple night stay in Dublin!

If youre looking for the perfect apt in the center of all the action then this is the place for you. Cute, modern apt in the heart of Temple Bar. Restaurants and bars are literally steps away. The bedroom is spacious and the bed was really comfortable. It didnt get too bright in the morning either. Favorite thing was walking into the living room every morning and opening the doors to the terrace and watching people walk by while listening to the beautiful sounds of Temple Bar. In the morning you heard breakfast being served, in the evening it was more of a party atmosphere. You can definitely hear people on the street while youre sitting on the couch...but come on...youre in Temple Bar and you stay here for the atmosphere. Highly recommend this apt and Jason was great with communication.
Would stay at this Airbnb again in a heartbeat!! Not only is Jason a great host, but the place is clean, stylish and the location was PERFECT. Highly recommend!!
Jason is very thoughtful and generous with his time. We had a seamless check in and had a great time visiting.

This is an outstanding location for exploring the Dublin sights! This place is literally right around the corner from TheTemple Bar. The neighborhood is loud, but the noise surprisingly isn't an issue for sleeping in the bedroom. I highly recommmend this location especially if you want to enjoy a night or two enjoying Temple Bar. I walked everywhere including to Guinness and the gaol. Jason had great recommendations. My favorites were Rustic Stone and Queen of Tarts (their scones are amazing.. and addictive!)! Thanks Jason!
Jasons place is incredible! Its centrally located to great bars and restaurants. Very walkable. Jasons notes and recommendations are thorough and extremely helpful. Communication was superb.

This is a great apartment right in the heart of the Temple Bar area, so it is surrounded by fantastic restaurants and Bars.
Jason is a great host responding quickly to messages and providing a very comprehensive list of places to eat, drink and visit during your stay.
The apartment is an ideal base to explore the City as it's in a very central location providing easy access to buses, shopping and nightlife!!
I would definitely recommend this as a place to stay on your next visit to Dublin
Great place to stay. Would recommend to anyone wanting to walk around Dublin. Can see all major sights and be at temple bar in under 3 minutes walking.

We had a wonderful stay at Jasons place! It was very clean and he provided extra information for the best places to eat and visit. He was great at communicating and answering all of our questions before our visit. We would definitely visit again!!
Great location and a great space!

Very central location and fair price. Check-in was easy, and apartment had amenities like Nespresso machine. We were pleasantly surprised by the limited street noise but we did hear birds and cats outside so recommend bringing earplugs if you aren't a heavy sleeper.

Jason's place was in a great location, as described, and Jason was easily reachable with fast response times. Would definitely recommend. 

A TIP THO: bring ear plugs. Not that it can be helped but there were some vicious gulls outside, screeching all night. Something must have been up, hopefully that's not the norm.

Great apartment! Centrally locates ion one of the quieter blocks of Temple Bar, within walking distance of many of Dublins sights. Jason communicated regularly and clearly, and he offered many helpful tips about things to do and see. The space was clean and comfortable, and it really contributed to my overall excellent experience during my Ireland visit.

Jason's apartment is spacious, stylish, comfortable, and ideally located. And, as others have reported, the bedroom is incredibly quiet for being in such a lively part of town since it's in the very back of the apartment and you can close both the bedroom and living room doors for extra sound installation. Also, Jason was a great communicator... very quick response with lots of local tips and answers to our questions. Highly recommended!

If you want to stay in Temple Bar and participate in the somewhat crazy nightlife, this is the place for you. It's safe and secure with lovely windows overlooking Temple Bar but a back bedroom that is extremely quiet. Jason was super helpful and communicative. And everything in the place was really nice, nice coffee maker, decent shower, decent sized bed, etc.
Jasons place is great! Amazing location. We enjoyed our stay in the heart of Temple Bar and will hopefully visit again in the future!
The best location ever! Right in the thick of all the excitement!

Awesome location if you're looking to stay in Temple Bar. Juliette window was a great feature as was the Apple TV, Nespresso machine and weekly cleaner if you have a long stay. Jason was super helpful and responsive. Recommend 100%.
Super Lage, sehr freundlicher Gastgeber und es hat alles im Apartment was man braucht!

Nice place to rest your head while being in the heart of the city!
The coffee supplied was a great touch, and it was nice to have use of the washing machine. 

The apartment was clean and nice.

I would recommend this place to stay in Dublin!
The apartmen is awesom, the location is perfect, all the recomendations from Jason were great, he was very nice and always answer very kindly our questions and needs.
Great location. Fun!  I could walk everywhere.
My daughter and her friends stayed there and loved it. My daughter said Michael was hands down the best host she has experienced at an airbnb
Great place in a wonderful location, 15 minute walk max from almost everywhere I wanted to go.

Such a wonderful place to stay, right in the heart of the city. Micheal and his wife were very accommodating and communicative throughout our whole trip. You can also basically walk to all of the tourist attractions. I will definitely be back, thank you!
Michaels place is really nice, centrally located, and comfortable. We would definitely stay again. Thank you for a wonderful stay!
Micheal was a great host and the apartment was very nice. Great location!
We really like the location & Micheal is very responsive. It was great having the whole place to ourselves and every amenity you'd need is included. Recommend!!
Great communication, easy check in and the location was perfect for my first trip to Dublin.

This is a really nice and well kept place in a very very central location. Everyrthing is within touching distance and the apartment itself is very clean and convenient. Loved the stay and wished we had more time.

Michael's place was literally in the best location! It was right in the center of everything. We didn't need to use public transportation at all. (Although we do like to walk) The kitchen and bathroom were both fully stocked. Lots of extra toilet paper/paper towels/napkins/bath towels. The bed could be a little more comfortable and bigger (double bed), but we were so exhausted at the end of the day it didn't really matter. I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and would love to stay here again!
This AirBnB is phenomenal. The location can NOT be beat. The amenities and the space are just lovely! This was a great home away from home while exploring Dublin, which was a fantastic city!
Great place to stay  and be in Temple Bar area and also close to walk to Trinity College, St Patricks, and Christchurch.
We are traveling from the US and this place was perfect! It was an awesome location!! Great weekend
Superb location. Easy to walk to just about anything you would want to see in Dublin. We were 3 travelers (1 couple and a spare) and it was perfect for us.
Delivers on what is promised -- and more. This is a very good apartment in every respect, in a location that could not easily be bettered. Great value for money!

Micheal is a fantastic host and is very attentive to guests needs.  He went over and above with offering a series of recommendations on where to eat and drink int he city.  The apartment is very centrally located and was clean and well maintained.
Great location in temple bar and all the other attractions in Dublin. Excellent apartment and Miicheal was fantastic. Highly Recommended
Great location, very clean, valuable information, very friendly and welcoming host. Perfect stay!
Great place to stay and wonderful hosts. Location is fantastic, right in the heart of Dublin
A beautiful apartment in an amazing location with fabulous hosts!
This is a great place, very clean and close to all the action and tourist spots. 30 min walk to Heuston station. Nice apartment with a good layout.  Would recommend to others.
Perfect for us; just close enough to Temple Bar. Perfect location to see the sights. Great hosts.
Great hosts and a great location, an easy to walk to many sights.  The apartment was spacious enough for three of us.

Michael and Marlene were outstanding hosts. They had many great recommendations of where to eat and what to explore. They responded very quickly with any questions that we had. The apartment is within walking distance to all of the major sites of Dublin and there is a delicious breakfast place right next door!
Great hosts, and location. Ill totally stay again next visit.
A great deal- steps away from many major churches, the palace, Trinity, and Temple Bar. Beautiful, clean, open space for you to love!
A great location in Temple Bar.  Countless pubs and restaurants close by.  Walk to Trinity College and museums.  I highly recommend Micheals place
