We had a wonderful time in Dublin and could not have asked for a better location. Very safe building, clean and quiet. Micheal was a great host, his detailed directions and recommendations were very helpful and made for a stress-free experience.

Michael's apartment is the perfect spot for an epic weekend in Dublin. It is 10 mins walk to all the sights, lovely restaurants and hot spots in Dublin. It was awesome we never had to uber anywhere and had so much fun getting lost in the wee cobblestone streets around the apartment.
Michael's apartment is spacious, would fit 4 people no problem and the chdck in was a dream. He provided detailed instructions on how to find the apartment and heaps of local tips
Thanks for a fab stay guys. We will be back and woukd recommend Michael and his lovely wife to anyone
Perfectly located for an easy walk to most places of interest. And lots of handy eating choices. Washer/dryer was a huge bonus.

A very comfortable and spacious place for a couple to spend a few days in, right in the middle of fabulous Dublin.

We appreciated the fact that we were able to cook a few meals, good for the budget, and the location is excellent. 

The host was super helpful, and an interesting chap to chat with as well.

I cant really fault the place.
Could not emphasize how great this location is! It is in walking distance from everything! Micheal was extremely accommodating ! If we visit Dublin again we will defiantly stay in the same place!

We were beyond pleased with everything about this space - from thoughtful touches to comfortable spaces to a great location right in the heart of everything yet stunningly quiet, as it faces a pedestrian street. Thanks so much for sharing your space with us - highly recommend.

The location was great for us - close to restaurants and bars on both sides of the river.  I was there partly to do a bit of work at the National Library and National Archives and found it a pleasant walk to both places.  The apartment itself was as depicted in the owners description and pictures.  Very pleasant place to stay.
This apartment is in a great location, near many restaurants, bars, and bus stop. The place is clean and roomy.

This is a wonderful little apartment in the center of all the action.  We go to Dublin for the theaters and most are in walking distance as are more  great restaurants than you could ever eat in.  The apartment is so well-equipped and sparkling clean, plenty of linens, soap, etc.  This is our favorite area in Dublin but it can be noisy so pack some ear plugs but definitely go!!!!

Thanks for a great stay in Dublin! First Airbnb experience and it over exceeded our expectations! Michael was quick to respond and the place was exactly as it was indicated to be. In a great location central to anything you would want to see and do in Dublin.
Great, safe and well lit location. Lovely place to stay!

Fantastic place!  We got into Dublin from the states earlier then our check in time and luckily enough for us we were able to get in before check in! Everything about the apartment is perfect for adventures through Dublin.
The sray was great, the location is promee real estate. Was very clean with many amenities. Close to shops and downtown. HIGHLY RECOMMEND
Conor is a friendly and helpful host, I felt cosy and comfortable in his thoughtfully decorated and sparkling clean home, I would definitely recommend his place. Thanks Conor!

'Small but perfectly formed' is very accurate, but fails to convey the stylishness and elegance of Conor's lovely house. 
I was really pleased with my (Website hidden by Airbnb) worked really well for what I needed; it was great value for money and Conor was a relaxed and easy host with whom to communicate and share living space .
I definitely recommend this choice of location.
It was fab to return to a familiar cosy place before flying out. A great little place, thanks again Conor

Conor was a great host. His place was clean and very comfortable. Despite the cold weather outside, the guest bed was warm. His house is conveniently located next to the bus stop with fast access to the city. Would definitely recommend to those who want to stay at an airbnb in Dublin.
Conors place is great! Hes incredibly stylish, his home is clean, and its easy to get into city center from his place. Definitely recommend staying at Conors if you have the chance!

Conors' place is a 20mins bus ride outside Dublin, easy to reach with public transport as the station is around the corner. The neighborhood is quiet, you only hear some gulls from time to time. The guest room has the perfect size for one person, and also the bed is super comfortable. Conor was really interested if I enjoy my time in Dublin and gave me some insights about the city. I would definitely stay with him again!

Conor is a charming Irish gentleman with a wonderfully whimsically decorated pad. His knowledge of Irish culture and heritage is impressive and I enjoyed many interesting chats about the history of Ireland and its people.
Conor is a great host to have!

A cute little stylish but also very cosy home with a easy going host Conor. It is located in a 2 minutes walk near the bus station where they will take you into town in 15 minutes and will bring you back home at night.
Great space for a one night stay; Conner was superb and really helped me out of a last minute accommodation bind!

Conor's place was very clean and stylish. The room is cosy and comfortable. Location is easily connected to the bus services into the city centre and walkable distance to the Guiness storehouse. Would stay again .
Conor is a great host, very friendly and gave me some local tips. The place was great for me with good value as well.

Fabulous place î lovely and peaceful and beautiful, well located for a convenient bus to and from town.  Conor is very welcoming and helpful and generously shared his beautiful home!

Would definitely stay here again!
Great!
Home was very nice and clean. Location was great, 1-2 minute walk from a bus stop that gets you into town within a few minutes. Conor was really nice and welcoming.

Great private room to use as a home base while you explore Dublin. The room is small but cozy and you have all the space you need. There are several busses at the stop 2 minutes away that can take you into central city in about 15-20 minutes and its very easy.
Conor was very nice and friendly, and always available, attentive and helpful with my needs.

Conor's place is incredibly clean, remarkably stylish and he was a very gracious host. He communicated well and helped guide me with transportation. Check in was easy, the bed was suuuuuuper comfy and all the lovely artisitc touches around the place make it such a fun experience! The location is great too, close to city center via bus. Would definitely stay again.
Very cozy and nearly walking distance from the main city

As a solo female traveler I was worried about feeling safe where I was staying but Conor definitely made those worries go away, great location nice and quiet (super cute too) easy to get into the city right by a bus stop, bed was super super comfortable I must add. Extremely tidy, Would definitely recommend.
Conors place was clean, stylish, and easy to get to from the city centre. Conor is a wonderful host. I had a great stay and would definitely recommend!

Conor is a very friendly host and he can give some tips on what to do in Dublin.
His place is clean, the bed is comfortable and the communication was precise and fast. 

It takes about 20 minutes to get there by bus from Temple Bar with a bus pricing of about 3‚Ç¨. Therefore you can reach it quite easily and be able to get anywhere quite fast. 

Just in general a good place to stay. Recommend it!
Very beautiful and lovely apartment. Conor was very helpful. The room is comfortable, beautiful and cosy. I really recommend the room!
Conor's home was great!  I can honestly say if I come back to Dublin I would look to stay here. Perfect location to hop on the city bus and be in town within minutes!
Good, tidy accomodation with all basic necessities. Easy bus access to town with cash or bus card. Would recommend!
Lovely friendly person who obviously loves to share his home with others. Really attractive layout and great use of space. An easy bus ride from the city centre.  Thoroughly recommend.
I highly recommend Conor's place to stay in, very stylish, clean, easy to get to with public transport.

Conor's place was exceptional! Not only is he a gem, but his apartment is put together so thoughtfully. The bus stop is located just down the street and takes you right into city center. 
I can't recommend staying here enough!

Conor is an excellent host. He is very kind, funny, understanding and responds to messages very quickly. The latter is great since I had to coordinate with him my check in time as I was arriving from Edinburgh. The room is tiny, but has some great eccentric touches. There is some sort of a shelf/clothes rack where you can store your bags. The only reason I am giving Conors place 4 stars is due to the spiral stairs. Whilst I was aware of that before booking, I wasnt expecting it to be this brutal. I am speaking for myself (a heavy and chubby boy), it was quite a hassle to go up and down especially with my bags. I really felt like I was gonna break the stairs at one point and thank god I didnt. This is something to keep in mind if you are a bit heavier like me, are carrying loads of bags or claustrophobic. The location is great if you want to go into the city. There is not much in the area, since its mostly residental. However, there are buses that take you through important areas of the city centre or you can take a bus to Heuston station (theres places to get food in there) and get on the Luas (tram). Overall, I recommend this place if you are staying in Dublin!

Staying at Conors was a wonderful experience. The location was fab! Right around the corner from a bus stop and access to the beautiful Liffey river trail. Conor couldnt have been more accommodating and gracious. Will definitely try to stay here again when Im back in town.
Would definitely recommend staying at Conor's. Great host and the place is perfectly clean!
good place. clean and organized

Conors place was amazing! Its a very cute and stylish apartment with everything you could need! The bathroom was especially nice and modern. The room was cute and the bed was comfortable. Its very close to the bus station that will take you into the city in about 15 minutes so super easy to get around! Conor was very nice and allowed me to leave my luggage after check out time so that I didnt have to carry it around until my night flight. Everything was great, highly recommended!
Conor was a great host with excellent communication and a stylish home. His place is also very close to the bus stop.
Conor was a great host with excellent communication and a stylish home. His place is also very close to the bus stop.

This house is very close to bus stop.
The room is small, but it's cozy and clean.
The kitchen is full-equipment and easy to use. 
I had good time during the stay at Conor's house.
Recommend to the Dublin travelers.   : )

Its very easy to find the house. Its in a quiet street, its easy to park a car in this street. 
The house is very cosy. The bedroom is small but there is all you need. 
Theres a common bathroom but its very clean and cosy. 
Connor is a great host, hes very available and flexible.
Conor is very kind and thoughtful. The house is excellent decorated and is 5-star super clean. The bus to city center is 1min walking. Excellent stay!
Easy check-in instructions. I loved the decor of the place. 5/5

It's a really good choice to be Conor's guest, because you will meet a very friendly, open and supporting man and stay at a place with a charming atmosphere in an area of Dublin, from where it is easy to get into the center and where you can relax from the noise and haste there. Lucky you!
Conor is an excellent host. I really enjoyed my time staying in his home. The listing is exactly as described. Very convenient bus ride into anywhere you could want to go. I would stay again!

Everything was fine and like described. The room is small, but cozy. The house has a stylish interior and sweet details. It is well located to reach the city center in a longer walk or via a short bus ride. Thank you Conor for being such a welcoming host! :-)
good landlord with good service.
Conor is a great host. His place is lovely, stylish and comfortable. The room is small but cozy and beautiful, with especial details. Really close to city center by bus. A great place to stay!!
Conors place was stylish, clean and well furnished. Bus stop is less than 5 minutes away and gets you to the city centre within 20-30 minutes. Very comfy bed as well!
Connor is a very kind host and the accomondation is very clean and fitted very beautifull.

Loved this home and my stay here. I walked about 20 mins (I'm slow) to Tesco grocery up the road where I purchased fruit and snacks for the week. I love food! The bus stop was literally right by his complex. Try and know the bus system better than I when trying to get back. Conor's home is super cute with a great shower and toilet and the bed provided great comfort. I slept soundly. Conor himself was a great host and was clear on check in instructions (don't forget to read them) and was helpful with suggestions on Dublin and things to do. I definitely recommend staying at Conor's.

Conor was a lovely host! His cute townhouse is located around a 20min bus ride from the town center. The room is located on the second floor of the house at the top of a spiral staircase. It is very thoughtfully decorated and very quiet. Lovely stay, thank you Conor!
I had a great stay, I loved the place and Conor was perfectly nice, I really recommend his place!
conors place is super nice and really cute! everything was very clean and the bed was probably the comfiest thing ever. conor is easy to talk and get along with, definitely recommend this place!
Lovely house
Really nice apartment, very clean and friendly host.
Conor was very friendly and responded quickly o my messages. His place is nice and cozy and very reasonably priced. Would definite stay again .

Had a great stay. Conor was a terrific host.  Great at keeping in touch and making sure I could get in when needed. He was very accommodating and welcoming. Charming wee room where I slept very well indeed! Also asy to catch the bus into Dublin and the airport the next morning.

Conors place is just as advertised. Its an adorable space, that just feels welcoming. Its a small and colorful room perfect for the solo traveler. My schedule was so opposite of Connor, that I kinda felt I had the place to myself. Its about a 5 minute walk to the bus stop, which takes you directly to the city center. I would definitely stay here again.
My partner Liza stayed in Conor's place. She was very happy with her stay, very clean and great location. Conor was also an excellent host.
I really enjoyed my stay at Conor's place. Great host!
Great place to stay.
Have used Conor's place as a base for work. Very happy to continue doing so.

Great stay! Everything as described. Easy access by public transport. 
Keep in mind there is a narrow winding stair to get the room!
Conor is a great host.
Lovely little house, clean, stylish and a top host. Thanks so much Conor. Will be back
My second time staying with Conor and as expected it was a 1st class stay. Thank you again
Conors place was exactly as described - cozy, clean, well-equipped. I had no issue with finding my way there and getting to the city centre from the house. Can totally recommend!
Great
A very nice stay, thank you.

What a lovely stay! Ted and Gina provided us a warm welcome, they are really great and so lovely people. We instantly felt like home. The room was nice and clean, breakfast incl self-made scones delicious. Howth is a nice and quiet place to stay, you can walk to Howth harbor and railway station in 10min, train to Dublin city is about 30min for 3,50‚Ç¨. Great stay, 100% recommendation! :-)
Irish hospitality at its finest!  And yes, Ted's scones are everything they're cracked up to be.

Ted and Gina are such kind, welcoming, lovely people and it was a pleasure to stay in their home. Their home is on a very quiet street, so I slept exceedingly well, and a highlight was drinking morning coffee in Gina's fabulous garden. Everything is comfortable and sparkling clean. The location could not be better for exploring Howth, and Ted and Gina went well beyond the call of duty in welcoming me & giving me a lift to the train when I was leaving. Gina even made me a Lemsip on the first night when I'd arrived with a rotten cold!

The room and facilities are spotless. Ted is very accommodating and nothing is too much trouble and should you wish to have your breakfast in the garden during the summer then you may do so.  A lovely place to stay.  I shall return when I can.
Ted and Gina are amazing!  You will love them!  Teds scones and soda bread are fantastic!!!!!!  Howth is beautiful and the pubs are wonderful.
This is a wonderful place to stay as its not only centrally located, but its also a very charming and enjoyable apartment to stay in. I very much enjoyed my stay here!

Absolutely loved this place! Rayne was a terrific host, and there were so many thoughtful touches. The kitchen was great for cooking, and we made a meal on our last night. It was wonderful to have a washer a dryer as well! The apartment was so well decorated, the bed was so comfortable, and the location literally could not have been better. The building was secure and felt very safe. Overall, I could not have been more happy with this Airbnb. 

The only downside (and this has absolutely nothing to do with Rayne or the apartment), is that on the last night of my stay, I went to bed with my new Claddagh ring on, and when I woke up it was no longer on my finger. I really think it was misplaced somewhere in the apartment, but I had to check out the next morning and did not have any luck finding it in the short amount of time I had to search for it. 

If anyone chooses to stay at this apartment (which I HIGHLY recommend you do), please reach out to me via Airbnb if you find it. I would be happy to pay to have it mailed to me and would be so so appreciative. 

Other than that, I loved my time in Dublin and in this apartment. Thank you, Rayne, for being such a great host!!!
The apartment is great, cosy, comfy bed, nice decor, well located, had everything we needed. Would definitely recommend! Very happy with our choice.

Really pretty and comfortable place! Terrific location, it was so easy to walk anywhere we wanted, I also want to add that we didnt really notice the street noise and we stayed here right before St. Pattys day so although its central it isnt noisy! Thanks again Rayne.
Rayne's home was amazing! The location honestly cannot be beaten. Rayne is fast to get back to you and she'd decorated her place beautifully. Would definitely stay again!
Great location. Central to everything & only a short walk to major sites
Les deux principaux points forts : Emplacement exceptionnel et appartement ultra confortable

The location of this place couldnt be beat - right over HaPenny bridge. A bit of an unusual check in process, but nothing unreasonable. 
There were two reasons we deducted stars: first is that it was very noisy; you could hear everything from the street. We looked and it appeared the bedroom window didnt shut all the way, so it made for some difficult sleeping at times. 
Second is that we were notified during our stay that we needed to leave a key for a handyman to come and fix a vent (nothing that we had noticed a problem with). I was rather uncomfortable with the idea of someone entering the property while we werent there with all of our things there, but was not given an option. We were only there two nights and I felt that any work should have been scheduled when guests were not anticipated. 
We did not spend much time in the apartment so cannot attest to many of the amenities, but worked well enough for our purposes.
Great location, easy check in process, and Rayne was so easy to communicate with!

Really recommend this place! Location was perfect, right across from all the action at night. Slept well in the comfy bed and didnt mind the noise of the partying people. The apartment is spacious and offers a lot of comfort and overall just feels like home. Get yourself in a plane to Dublin already :)

Beautiful cozy place in the middle of everything! We loved staying there and enjoyed every bit of the trip! Contact was great and super quick response to the questions we had. Lovely guide for things to do and places to eat - would come back anytime!
We had a lovely stay, location is perfect, the apartment was really nice and clean, Raynes little book of tips was really helpful also!

Rayne's place was absolutely perfect for our stay. Just across the bridge from the hustle and bustle of Temple Bar, it allowed us to easily head in to the nightlife to enjoy dinner, a drink, and some music, and just as easily allowed us to return home to get some good sleep away from too much noise (good, fun noise... but noise nonetheless!) Rayne provided great suggestions for food, music and shopping in the area that was super helpful. We spent only 2 nights at her lovely apartment, but it felt like home the moment we stepped through the front door. Needless to say, we hope to return back to Dublin one day and will be looking for Rayne's place for availability when we do :)
Raynes place was exactly as advertised. A wonderful space. Check in was easy and clear. No complaints!

I absolutely loved staying at Raynes place. The location is perfect, the space available was just right, and she even accommodates her guests with international power converters! It does get noisy from the nightlife at night, but that didnt bother me and honestly it was something I found  endearing about the place. I would definitely stay here again if the opportunity comes for me to visit Dublin in the future!
Excellent location, very clean and tidy.
A great little place. Amazing location!

Our stay was wonderful! The apartment was well appointed, and the bed was very comfortable.  It was in a perfect location close to a lot of restaurants and pubs.  There is some street noises on busy nights, but It was not enough to keep me awake, and I am a light sleeper.  The apartment was beautiful and comfortable.  Would definitely recommend.

Nice, very centrally located apartment, and Rayne is easy to communicate with. The place is a very good basis for a stay in Dublin, right on the river and close to everything. The apartment is cosy, not luxurious but comfortable, and Rayne, although she is not in Dublin herself is a pleasant host and the flat has some nice personal touches. Theres no TV, not that thats important and the noise from the street can get a bit loud. All in all a nice place to stay in the heart of the city.
Location is great. So close to Temple Bar. Everything in walking distance. Communication is good too

We had a great stay at Rayne's apartment, it is in a really central location and was the perfect base for our 2 nights in Dublin. The apartment is spacious with some really nice touches, Rayne's tips about places to visit were great. Would definitely stay again next time we are in Dublin.

PROS: Rayne's apartment is PERFECTLY located near many shops and restaurants in Dublin. We walked everywhere we needed to. The home is beautifully decorated and as charming as any artist's retreat could be. The bed was comfortable and warm, as was the space itself. She has every kitchen gadget necessary, which helped keep food costs lower than expected. Overall, I would definitely stay at Rayne's apartment in the future! (P.S. Make sure you visit Queen of Tarts!! We went there three different times and brought some scones back to Rayne's place to enjoy with breakfast the next morning.) 

HICCUPS: I missed the memo when booking that there is no parking at the location. We rented a car (which I highly recommend you do-- it allowed us to get to Bray, Howth and Galway during our visit fairly easily). I emailed Rayne's team to find out their suggestions, and they named two applications that weren't very helpful. Ultimately, we ended up in the Jervis parking garage, which was conveniently located near the apartment. However, it was nearly $200 to park there on and off for a week. Worth the expense, but I hadn't anticipated it when booking. Also, finding the apartment can be a bit tricky. The lock box isn't where you'd expect it to be and the directions weren't entirely clear. BUT we called Rayne's team and they helped navigate us to it right away! The apartment is located across from a fairly noisy bar. My boyfriend and I sleep through pretty much anything so it was in no way a "con" for us, but bring earplugs if you are a light sleeper. Rayne was also kind enough to supply us with some!

Great apartment in terrific location to pubs, restaurants and key attractions.

Very clean, good cooking facilities, good local tips.

Bedroom is noisy as is across from late night venue but was nice to hear the locals enjoying themselves.
Great location and stylish apartment. The restaurant recommendations were incredible, and we would stay there again.
Perfect location, easy walking distance to so many places.  This place was just perfect!

Rayne's apartment is wonderful, and its location cannot be beaten. It is in the center of everything, with easy walking access to everything.

If you are a light sleeper, I would recommend bringing earplugs to be on the safe side,  but we didn't have any and were fine (we even overslept one day due to jet lag).

The apartment is beautiful and perfect for two people, and Rayne provides a bunch of useful recommendations for great places to go for food and drinks. 

We would definitely stay here again!
Perfect location. Temple Bar just across the bridge. Short walk to all the sights. Good restaurants nearby. Spacious apartment. Easy checkin. Noise not a problem, at least during the week.
Wonderful place, very cosy and exceptionally clean. We had a lovely weekend break here. Felt very safe and bed was comfy. Thank you for a wonderful stay. Will definitely return :)
Great apartment. Great venue. Overall fantastic. Thank you! :)
Great location to experience downtown (Website hidden by Airbnb) can get a little noisy as noted by Rayne in her description.

We stayed at Rayne's place for 4 nights and found the apartment very clean and spacious. Location wise, it's perfect and provides value for money and the insider tips was much appreciated. To be honest, on Saturday night the pubs were a bit rowdy but that is to be expected in the general area. For a young couple such as us, this exceeded all our needs.
Great location, spacious flat.

Easy to find; great location right at the base of The HaPenny Bridge - easy to get around. Nice apartment and nice building. Others have commented on the noise outside at the bars. Wasnt a problem for me but I could see it would be if a light sleeper or not used to city sounds. Highly recommend.
Cute place, great location. Central to everything.

A central location, a calming and lovely apartment and a brilliant base to experience Dublin from. 
Rayne was a superb host with quick responses and a fully equipped apartment that is both relaxing, comfortable and right in the centre of all things Dublin.
The hubbub on the street only added to our experience and with the windows closed, allowed for a good nights sleep.
We wouldnt hesitate in recommending this apartment and host!

Great, cozy space close to everything! We had a great experience staying at Raynes and would definitely recommend to family or friends and come stay again! Even with close proximity to temple bar district, the noise levels were not a problem at all!
Great location to enjoy central Dublin ... action. Everything close.

Very good location in the center of Dublin, at weekends very noisy, but we slept very well anyway. There is a little organic foodstore right beneath the apartment, and Raynes tips for restaurants are worth trying.
Great place to stay in Dublin!

A really nice flat, very central to most of the tourist sights. Rayne also leaves a booklet with many excellent suggestions on sights, and places to eat and drink. We had no problem checking in. The neighborhood is right in the middle of things, so it can get a little noisy, but keep the windows closed and it's no problem, at least it wasn't for us.

Fabulous location and really thoughtful tips on what to do and where to go to find some local gems. We didnt find it noisy at all the first couple of nights but very noisy on the last night. Luck of the draw I guess depending on who is frequenting nearby bars or restaurants. But otherwise it was so good to be central and we could walk everywhere. Would absolutely recommend Raynes place!!

The apartment was as described and as expected.  We enjoyed the location very much.  It does not have ac bit I opened the windows at night. The noise of the street did not bother us. I would recommend this place!
Amazing location! A tad bit noisy if you have the window open but its not awful. Great place to stay!

This is an excellent place to stay; clean, comfortable and in such a vibrant location. The guide Rayne put together on the table with little tips for restaurants and daytrips and things was also really helpful (and it also seems like she has a first rate taste in books).
Great space within walking distance to all the major spots in Dublin.
Great location and lovely space. We walked everywhere. We would recommend and stay again. Thank you
Amazing location
Charming apartment and very convenient location.
Amazing place, hard to imagine I could have picked anywhere better.
Very comfortable apartment with all the amenities youd need, and above all else a FANTASTIC location. Easy walk everywhere, and right in the middle of a vibrant, bustling area.
Great location.
Great apartment, centrally located.

Host: very responsive and friendly
Location: in the heart of the city but nestled just enough to give you peace and quite and a good nights sleep
- There was an abundance of extras in the apartment such as towels, blankets, toiletries and plug converters
- Looked just like the photos: cute, clean and cozy

A great apartment in central Dublin, only a short walk to Dublin Castle, City Hall and  Christ Church Cathedral. The host was very helpful, providing tips on local restaurants and attractions. Excellent flexibility with check-in and check-out. Overall a great stay!

Great apartment in safe and fashionable neighborhood.  Kate was an excellent communicator leading up to the rental period.   She also has added some nice touches around the apartment including a compilation of sites and restaurants to visit and a cupboard full of necessities.

Kate has a lovely space and has really gone above and beyond with making it feel homey. It is well decorated and centrally located to all the hot spots in Dublin. Kate was very quick to respond and met us to show us the apartment. I definitely recommend this place to anyone traveling to Dublin!
Reviews  are really good for a reason. Lovely host, lovely apartment, and perfectly situated.

Stop reading reviews and just book it! We could not have asked for a better location and Kate was only a quick text away with questions. I would 100% stay here again and recommend  it to friends. Easily walkable to Guinness, Trinity, Christchurch and Temple Bar (among many other attractions). There was plenty of shampoo and other personal care items and the towels were soft and fluffy! Thanks for a wonderful stay Kate!

Kates place is in a beautiful location of Dublin right by the Temple Bar area with lots of things to do and see. Her place is so clean, stylish and cozy and she makes the check in process so quick and easy. She also provided some great tips for dining and exploring! Our favorite was the Queen of Tarts! Thank you so much Kate!

We absolutely loved our short stay at Kate's place.  She is quick to  communicate and was absolutely great!  Loved the location- just perfect for exploring Dublin's major sites.  Our stay could not have been better and we hope to make it back to Dublin and stay at Kate's place again soon!

Location, location, location! You are in Temple Bar, but not in the thick of it. I made the mistake of staying at a hotel in Temple Bar two years ago and regretted it. The noise was horrible. This apartment is in an ideal location. You can be in the heart of Temple Bar in a matter of minutes.
This was the last place we stayed after two weeks in Ireland. All at Air BnBs. What we loved? Top sheets, luxury towels, a functioning washing machine, an elevator and many mirrors! That may sound odd, but three women and one bathroom? It helped to have several options for getting ready. We didnt find that at most places. Kate also met us when we arrived and was very quick to respond to messages.  I will be returning!
Staying at Kate's place was lovely! The location was fantastic, the place was wonderful, and she let us check-in early.

This is such a great Airbnb! The location was amazing - easy to get to/from airport, walkable, easy to find and great restaurants/pubs around. It is right in the heart of Dublin with all of the major sites within walking distance. Kate was so easy to work with and gave great descriptions of directions and recommendations. The apartment was very quiet when we were there and had everything we needed - even extra adaptors! Clean, comfortable and close to everything... what else could you ask for?
I would definitely stay here again!
Awesome location Separate bedroom was nice   It was great having a washing machine awesome clean everything worked plenty of plug-ins

Kates place is a wonderfully cosy apartment in the heart of Dublin. We took the Airlink from Dublin airport, which took us to a bus stop directly opposite the apartment. Everything was fabulous - a comfortable bed, very clean and lots of nice little touches. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay and will definitely be back. Thank you, Kate!
Kate did everything and then some to make the stay enjoyable. Would definitely stay here again.

The best Air BnB experience Ive ever had! Stayed at Kates place during my trip to Ireland to celebrate my 30th Birthday and the location was perfect. So central to everything- you can walk pretty much everywhere. Kate is the most amazing host. She met us at the cafe downstairs (try it!) and showed us to the apartment. She was genuine and personable and felt like an old friend in 5 minutes. The apartment has everything you need- shampoo, hair dryer, iron, washer, some snacks. Stay here!! She even went out of her way to leave me a cupcake when she found out it was my Birthday. Thank you for making this trip so special, Kate!!
Kates apartment is in a good location. Its very clean and has everything you need! The area was safe and Kate is very nice.

What a great place to stay! Very central and walkable to all of the main sites. The apartment had everything you would ever need (and more). These include toiletries, iron, blankets, cooking appliances, washing stuff and so much more. When we arrived, the kettle was boiling and a box of chocolates in the fridge! We wouldnt stay anywhere else if we return to Dublin in the future. Thank you Kate!
Really cute place in temple bar Dublin
Great place and location. It is so close to everything you want to see in Dublin and short walking distance if you are doing any tours out of town.
Kate's flat was perfect. We had everything we needed and the location was ideal--we were able to walk everywhere we wanted to go. Check-in was simple and she was very responsive. Cheers, Kate!

Apartment is in a great location to walk to many sights in Dublin (3 min to Christ Church or Dublin Castle, 1 min to Temple Bar area).  The apartment is small but clean and efficient.  Kate has included many toiletries in the bathroom.  She was also excellent at responding to communications.  The Airlink 747 stops right by the apartment.
Great location in the centre of everything, easy to get too, and really quiet and comfortable.

Our flight in was more than 5 hours late. Fortunately Kate was understanding, flexible, and quick to respond to my messages. She met us right when we arrived and showed us everything we needed to know about the apartment.
Kate's place was great!  Location was also perfect!
If available book asap. Great location. Kate was great super hospitable. Place was really cute with an amazing courtyard. Location is close to everything.

As the saying goes, its all about LOCATION! This flat is absolutely located in the best parts of Dublin. Mins from the Temple Bar district, Trinity college and many other Dublin sight seeing spots. 

And to add the icing on the cake, this flat is fun and fabulous to stay in. Its clean and has many convenient tips and touches to make your stay enjoyable. Lastly, the host goes out of the way to make sure you are comfortable and communicates very well.

This Airbnb was amazing! This was our first trip to Dublin and the location of this apartment was perfect!. We were close to all the major attractions plus all the good pubs to go to. The apartment was really cute and cozy. I will be staying here again for my next trip to Dublin. I highly recommend staying here!
Great location, we enjoyed our stay in Dublin
Kates place was in a great location. She met us when we arrived and walked us through the apartment. Great recommendations for dinner and breakfast.
Very well located, very cosy, elevator in the building, market close to the appartement and pub within 2minute walk!!. Perfect place!!
Great Location!
Kates place is in a great location, its clean and fit our needs perfectly. Kate communicated with us prior to the arrival and everything was great. I would stay there again. Thank you Kate!

This apartment is a prime location 10 minutes walk to almost anything you would want to see. We spent 2 days and were able to accomplish everything on our list and still have time to sleep in and have nice sit down meals. Kate is a fantastic host who was extremely friendly and helpful. She was also very responsive to any issues we had. I would highly recommend staying here.
Highly recommend this apartment, the location was perfect, very central but just outside the lively bar area. Kate is an excellent host and looked after us very well.

Had an amazing time in Dublin while staying at Kates place. Everything you need including a small kitchen (although we didnt eat in at all for our 4 day stay). Location is amazing as we were close to almost everything including the 747 bus from the airport and a stop for the hop on hop off bus. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Great location, perfect flat for a short stay in Dublin, with everything you need.
Perfect location for your stay in Dublin! Central to everything . Kate is extremely hospitable
Kates place is in a great location in Dublin. My husband and I enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend staying at Kates. She had great recommendations as well.
Super convenient location. So much to choose from regards restaurants and cafes. Kate was a breeze to deal with; made it easy fine tuning plans etc.
Amazing location, sparkling clean great host

Our stay at Kates place was great! Excellent location, so close to the sightseeing (Christ Church, St. Patricks, museums, etc.). Also a step away from Temple Bar and a bunch of pubs on the river. The place looked exactly like the pictures, and the self check-in was detailed and easy. I would definitely stay at Kates place again should I make my way back to Dublin!

Kates place was great!! Perfect location to get all around Dublin.  There was plenty of towels and toiletries available.  Kate greeted us upon arrival and gave some great recommendations. The thing I liked most was the location to all the best spots in Dublin. I would highly recommend you stay here.
Kates space is perfect while visiting Dublin. Walking distance from temple bar most of the other top Dublin site. Id recommend.
Great apartment great location. Kate was a super host !

Great location, walking distance to all the good attractions in Dublin. 5 Minute walk to Temple Bar area, close to Dublin Castle, Christ Church, shops, and not too far from Guinness or Jameson. Kate was so easy to work with, and was very hospitable!

Kates place is in a great location. Nice and close to some great restaurants and within walking distance of a lot of the things we wanted to do and see while in Dublin. Kate was also super easy to communicate with and we enjoyed our stay immensely!

Kate was great about communicating with us before we arrived, and promptly met us for check-in upon arrival. She was a kind and gracious host. The place was just what we wanted. Quiet, clean and very comfortable in an excellent location to explore Dublin. Although short, we enjoyed our stay very much and would highly recommend it for other travelers to the area.

If youre looking for a place to stay in Dublin, this is the place! Perfect location for walking to everything Temple Bar, St Patricks Cathedral, Trinity College, Dublin Castle and so on. Kate was an amazing host as she accommodated us for our check in and she was always easy to get a hold of. Her place also has a list of must-dos for Dublin as well as transportation information. Place was clean and even came equipped with fans which was awesome for us. We hope to stay with Kate again on our return trip. Cheers!

Kate is a great host and the appartment is great for 1-2 persons.  She suddenly split the doublebed into two singlebeds when she understood we were two friends renting. She wants whats best for you. And the appartment is clean and in quiet locations even though so close to the lively pubs in the area. Recomended.
Amazing place to stay and outstanding host. The location of the apartment is perfect and Kate is amazing. She is quick to respond and offers great amenities.

Kates place is absolutely incredible! The location is AWESOME! The heart of Dublin is literally at your doorstep (which is super helpful in not having to worry about transportation). Kate was so helpful and responsive and she made the entire process easy, and more importantly, stress-free. Theres no doubt that Ill be staying here again.

Kate is a fantastic host: helpful, quick, she has good idea for programmes and travelling. The flat is really to close everything. You will find everything in the apartment what you will need. We enjoyed the stay here and our lovely host, Kate.

Thank you for the personal touch of picking us up from the bus stop!! The place was fantastic, clean, and an absolutely great location. We appreciated all the of little things: converters/adapters, fans, fluffy towels, washer/dryer, having fresh milk for coffee and tea, and mini chocolate snacks in the fridge.
Kates Place is in a fabulous location and Kate was a very responsive and helpful host.

Apartment is well-stocked.  Bedroom has a very comfortable bed.  Bus-stops to major Dublin attractions all around.  Pull-out couch is not comfortable or easy to set up.  We were lucky to have great Dublin weather but this made for a warm apartment.  The noise (construction, seagulls, garbage bins, car alarms) and lighting coming in from the alley was an issue for us at night.
Kate is a great host and her apartment won't disappoint. Great location in the centre. Fantastic bakery nearby and a Queen of Tarts too. Would most definitely visit again.
Awesome location!

Kates place was awesome. She met us at our bus stop and even helped us with our luggage as she led us to the apartment. Kate showed us where to go for fun, sight seeing and shopping. The apartments location was incredible. Everything was perfect for our stay in Dublin!
Great spot.  Location is close to the action but not in the middle of it.  Unit is spacious (2 of us), clean, and well appointed.  Communication with Host was excellent.
Kates place is adorable and in a great location! Kate was very responsive to our needs. I highly recommend staying with Kate
Great location, great value, good apartment and Host Kate it the best.

Kate was very friendly and responsive to all of our questions. She gave us some good recommendations of near by bars and restaurants. Her apartment was in a great location and super close to Temple Bar.  Highly recommend!

Kate is a great host. Meeting us at the apartment was greatly appreciated and very welcoming. 
The location of the apartment cant be better. You are in the heart of Dublin close to everything. 
The apartment its self is very comfortable and welcoming and has everything you need ( and then some )  to make you stay easy and relaxing . 
The bed is comfortable and the hot water was never an issue. 
Would i stay here again? 
Yes I would and you should too.
Was a stunning place to stay, cozy and comfortable. While being central to the city of Dublin and nearby many temple bars which was great!
Kate was very welcoming. The flat was sparkling clean and we were greeted with a cup of tea !! It was such a warm and well kept place, ideal for a weekend stay with your partner.

Kates place exceeded expectations. The location is excellent for seeing all the sites in Dublin. The apartment was clean and she even left cookies and milk in the refrigerator. Kate was very responsive when we had questions and helped us navigate public transportation. Even though it was in a busy area, Temple Bar, the apartment was very quiet and comfortable.

We really enjoyed our stay at Kate's place.  The location was perfect!  You could walk to so many areas.  It was also an easy place to grab a taxi.  We always felt safe as well.  I would definitely stay at Kate's place again if we get a chance.

Kate contacted us before our arrival, providing information on how to get from the airport to her apartment which made a smooth start to our break. Lovely apartment with everything you need. Milk, coffee and biscuits on arrival are a lovely, welcoming touch. Perfect location for exploring the city.
Great location, great host, great stay!

Terrific space in a very nice neighborhood areaîclose to everything you want to go see!  Kate met us at the bus stop and is a terrific hostess. We cant wait to go back to Dublin and we will definitely stay here again.

Kates flat is in the perfect location. Less than 5 minutes from The Temple Bar but without the noise. The space was clean and lovely, great value and within walking distances to many wonderful attractions. For dinner and drinks we recommend Klaw and the Vintage Cocktail Company, both on the same street within 5 minutes walking and such unique experiences. So grateful for Kates hospitality, we hope to visit Dublin again soon!

Kate is the sweetest and the place is absolutely amazing !!
Great location we walked everywhere!!

Kate was extremely responsive and gave us a warm welcome and went as far as meeting us on the street and helping us with our bags. The apartment was in a great location, within walking distance to many good attractions, bars, restaurants, etc. In the room Kate was prepared with maps, directions, and instructions on how to use appliances within the apartment which was really thoughtful. The apartment has definitely been lived in and maybe the photos should be updated to reflect the current state particularly the bathroom.
Excellent location and very friendly and quick response from host!

Mary is a wonderful host and will answer questions and/or make suggestions based on what you are looking to do it where you want to go during your stay in Dublin. The location was perfect for my purposes as it was close to where I needed to be.
Great location
It was a perfect place to stay, comfortable and relatively close to the center of the city.

Mary was a lovely host ì¬†outstanding hospitality and lovely to have a chat to (but the accommodation is quite independent too with a separate bathroom etc, so it's quite possible to stay out of each other's way). The area is also really nice with plenty of good coffee shops and restaurants nearby, as well as buses and the light rail. Would recommend!
Perfect access to center ciry
The house is just the same as the descrption say and is well located for visiting the city center by walk or by public transportation.
Really nice hostess and location very near to everything

Beautiful place in a great location! Very close to the team and city center. Host is really nice and had great suggestions, but we got the impression that she had some bad guests before and that was a little stressful. Also not sure if the bathroom was shared or not. Over all very lovely!
Great stay with Mary. Could not find a better location, immaculately clean, very comfortable, she really made me feel at home. Highly recommended, hope to come back soon.

Great place to stay since its out of the city center but has great transportation into city center.  Also, great places to eat near by.  Mary is very helpful with anything you need to know about Dublin and/or how to get around.  Large private bathroom and comfortable bedroom.
Great location convenient to Ranelagh village which offers an abundance of eateries. Local dart stop for transport to city centre
We were under the Impression we had the place to ourselves but the host was there the whole time

Mary's house is located in a lovely neighbourhood, about 20 min away from the city center. The bedroom and bathroom were perfectly clean, light breakfast was provided, and Mary gave us some very good tips about things do around Dublin. We had a great time!
Thank you very much for having us, we enjoyed a lot! Self check in instruction were perfect, location was great, not far from the city center but in a nice and quiet neighborhood!
Mary was a wonderful host, lovely to deal with. She has a warm and welcoming home and I would love to stay again.
Very convenient location close to pubs and restaurants and an easy walk to the city. We were warmly welcomed by Mary and will stay again.

Extremely friendly, welcoming host. The place was comfortable and stylish. Located in a lovely suburb, close to trendy shops and University College Dublin, with easy access to public transport and city center. Thorough enjoyable stay!
Mary's home is well situated and we felt very welcome.  Stayed twice so that says a lot. Mary is a charming host.
Really good

Mary is a very nice person and I am glad to stay at her place. I really liked . It felt so good to stay at her place. Especially, the small touches made to her home are so good. For example, the smart mirror, fountain tap, stacked appliances in the kitchen are all so striking. I recommend anyone to to stay at her place.
Sehr gut

Mary was super sweet and made us feel so welcome! Her home is very stylish and close to town with plenty to do within walking distance. While we thought we would have the place to ourselves like in the description, Mary was there along with us, but we are so glad to have met her. Would love to stay again if we ever get to return!

Mary was a wonderful and kind host and we felt immediately welcome in her cozy and clean home! On top of that she provided us with great recommendations for our stay! The house is located in a beautiful neighborhood with restaurants and bars not far away and in 30 minute walking distance from the city. We really enjoyed our time and would definitely stay with Mary again.
A lovely home, with an even lovelier host. Very welcoming stay, would definitely stay again.
Great accommodate, wonderful bathroom. Highly recommended
Nice place. Great location! Easy communication with host.
The apartment is as advertised, easy check-in and checkout, bigger than it looks too. Great location.

Ken is an excellent host! He was there to give excellent advice and his vast knowledge of Dublin and history of the city was a big help in deciding where to spend time during my short stay.
I highly recommend his place and would stay there again when visiting Dublin.
Great location less than 10 minute walk to Stephens Green, very nice/clean/spacious place, and Ken is very friendly and helpful! Definitely recommend and would stay here again

Ken was a great host! He responded quickly to the booking request and his place was exactly as described. It was clean, spacious, and in a wonderful location. He even brought us some Guinness to welcome us to his home!
The host canceled this reservation 83 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Good location. House has lots of character. Kitchen ceiling is a bit low for tall people.  The host (Ken) was really helpful with quick response to queries/requests.  Ken also gave good advice for things to do.

This place is in such an amazing location. It was so easy to walk to great spots. Ken was extremely communicative and did a great job letting us know how we could check in even if it was in the middle of the night that our flight arrived. The home is really unique and an incredibly comfortable place to sleep at...best nights sleep for an exhausted traveler. I would definitely stay here again.
AVOID

Gorgeous flat, easy to get to from the airport bus, nice and central and so much bigger than we expected!
We came to Dublin for a wedding and everything was within walking distance (even in heels!)
Ken had great communication and helped us when needed!
Ken is helpful with local insight into the orientation of Dublin City.

Fabulous location within walking distance to everything.  Shops and restaurants nearby.  Huge and luxurious bathroom. Very quiet at night on a beautiful street near Merrion Square. Comfortable bed.  Kitchen is large but under equipped for preparing even simple meals- no sharpe knife, stirring spoons, spatulas, etc. that we could find.  No water glasses or plates except two small saucers.

Very pretty spot and youll especially love the bathroom.  Great location to the city, museums, galleries and Grafton Street.  Would stay here again when I return.  Everything was exactly as advertised and Ken is a very friendly host with lots of information!

So....Ken is possibly the best Airbnb host Ive met.  He was gracious, funny, helpful and a blast to hang out with.  His place is in the PERFECT spot for touring and seeing lots of Dublin.  
He is a true Irishman.  Loves to tell a good story and if youre nice enough he may even grab a pint with ya.   
If you get the chance to stay at his place you will not regret it.

Kens place is in a great, quiet, neighborhood, on a street of old beautiful Georgian townhouses. Its only a couple of blocks from services including grocery stores, coffee shops and  some must visit bars, as well as the 2 great city parks of Merrion Square and Stephens Green. At the same time its only about a 15 min walk from the tourist hot spots and shops. 

The place itself is huge and comfortable. Its an apartment that as a New Yorker I would live in full time. The bathroom alone is practically the size our bedroom at home. There was also a foyer, which  Im not sure was pictured, that was great for leaving wet shoes and jackets. It is a basement apartment so do be aware that there are only windows in the living room if thats something you care about.

Ken was great. He came out to welcome us and was communicative and responsive. He gave us some great local recommendations.
Great location, big space, kitchen poorly equipped, comfy bed.
Great location and easy check in!! Ken was friendly and helpful.
Standard accommodation. Ideal location.
Ken's place is situated exactly where you want to be in Dublin!

Nice basement apartment in a Georgian house within 15-20 min walk of most of Dublins highlights. Pubs, grocery stores and bakeries are all close, but the location was still quiet and restful. Two of the citys most atmospheric pubs are 3-5 minutes away. (Doheny & Nesbit and Toners). Easy airport access on the #757 Dublin express bus. (11 euros return ticket). The owners family lives upstairs but they honor your privacy.

The flat was ideally located to the fun parts of Dublin, all within walking distance, Stephens Green, Temple Bar, Grafton street, Trinity College, St. Patricks Cathedral, Christ Church, etc. The kitchen needed a few more dishes, flatware and pots but it was still functional. Stove, fridge, microwave, kettle but I wouldnt try cooking any big meals. The bed took up the entire bedroom requiring one to scramble over the bed lengthwise in order in get in and there was no room to store your unpacked luggage. On a positive note the bathroom was exceptional, newly renovated, super large with relatively new toilet, shower, sink and a large soaked tub. Decent Wifi as well. Id recommend this place for shorter stays. Overall it was okay.
Excellent spot - so close to everything, and a really lovely apartment! Had a great stay - thanks!!
The host canceled this reservation 234 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
As described, easy to find, easy check in. Ken is a great host and is there when you need him. he bought us homemade scones!! Fabulous location for exploring Dublin!

Ken's place was such a welcome refuge while trying to find long-term accomodation. The location is excellent and he was so very helpful during check in and throughout my stay. It's hard to find a bathroom as nice as this one anywhere in Dublin!!

The location was perfect and felt central to everything we wanted to see. The check-in process was seamless and Ken met with us outside to let us in, which was very helpful considering our jet-lag and disorientation. Ken was also very helpful with recommendations and gave us a good and swift tour of the space with information about the amenities, which was really appreciated. The space was large (as expected from photos) and it had everything we needed. 

There were a couple less than satisfactory components to our stay; one being Ken's responsiveness/communication during our stay (there were a couple issues that needed to be addressed and we were unable to get ahold of Ken when we needed to). The bathroom (shower and tub) wasn't as clean as we would have liked, but this wasn't a major issue for us. Lastly, there was a lot of noise/music from the host's apartment above us until about midnight (or later) one of the evenings, which wasn't ideal. 

Ken was very kind and we enjoyed most of our stay.  Ultimately, the space provided what we needed.
Superb! So comfortable and relaxing and convenient to downtown Dublin.
The apartment was clean, spacious and in a great location. Ken was really helpful and the check-in process was nice and easy

This basement flat is a great place to stay if you're looking to be in walking distance to all the sights but not be in the noisy Temple Bar area.  There are lots of pubs and restaurants nearby and a Spar just around the corner. As other reviewers have pointed out the sleeping space is very tight, but once you get in the bed is comfy with a firm mattress.    The kitchen could do with a refresh but is adequate for a quick breakfast. Both the Airlink and Aircoach express buses from Dublin Airport have stops very close by. We used Airlink and had only a 10 minute walk to the flat. Ken is very friendly and will offer suggestions on places to visit and where to eat if you ask

Huge apartment with great location. Easily a ten to twenty minute walk to most places in Dublin. Ken was available to answer any questions we had very quickly. Free street parking available on Saturday and Sunday, but metered during the week (could get pricey for parking if staying during the week- unsure if better alternatives exist for that). Had a wonderful stay here!

The apartment has a certain amount of charm like it's owner. As much as I like to recommend it  i would not stay again. The apartment has no ventilation is old has musty smell. Small bedroom and no way to make coffee. Not a good value at all.

Wonderful location in walking distance that everything in Dublin has to offer. A quiet place to stay in on a beautiful street. The apartment is spacious and well maintained. The bathroom is huge, the bed was comfortable and the outside sitting area was great! The biggest bonus was meeting Ken. Truly a wonderful host! Irish hospitality at its best. His kindness, wit and Irish humor made my stay. I absolutely recommend his place.

A great apartment in a great neighbourhood. Was here for over a week and it really felt like a home away from home. It's perfect î right in the coolest part of Dublin, and everything seems like just a short walk away, and public transit is right there too. That Georgian architecture never gets old. And I just gotta say î that bed was really comfortable.

We had a great time staying at Ken's apartment. It's centrally located for easy walking to Trinity College, the National Gallery, Merrion Square and so many other attractions. The apartment was quiet and perfect for resting after a long day of running around. When we arrived Ken even took us for a coffee and a pint to welcome us. We'll definitely be back again.

Great location and phenomenal host. Ken is the absolute best - he was so generous with his time and conversation. Roomy flat, huge bathroom, and comfy bed. I almost want to go back to Dublin just to stay here again!
Great location...  large spacious room  (bathroom is 16 by 18)  very functional

Ken was amazing. The place was great and it only took me five minutes to walk to the city centre. It was cute, cozy, and looked even better than the pictures. Ken was a fantastic host and was there to help me every step of the way!
We had a great stay - accommodation was in a fantastic location and ken was always around to help us out - thanks for a great stay!!!
Great stay, good location most hospitable host
Fran is a kind, thoughtful and accommodating host. She could not have done more to help. I highly recommend her place, most especially as it is so convenient to airport.
Fran is a welcoming and friendly host.  Near the airport,  so handy if you need to get there early.
Very friendly and helpful host and cozy room. Good breakfast, as well
Fran is very kind. Close to the airport and short walk to the bus stop that will bring you there quickly for only 3 Euro.
Excellent Service! Superb Hospitality & more cultural knowledge of the current affairs of Ireland as much as pictures you'll take yourself ;) I loved it!
A confortable place to spend one or few nights.

Fran is a great host! She is very helpful and kind. She made it very easy to find her house with great instructions before arrival. She was very accommodating and her house is very close to a bus stop that is an easy ride to the airport!

Very attentive, friendly and lovely family. I was given precise instructions on how to get there from the airport. It is very easy to find the house. I loved the signs on the door indicating where the toilet was and which doors were private. Kettle, water, coffee  inside the room. Tidy. There's a place nearby worth a visit which is called Swords Castle. Great place to take photos. I totally recommend this accomodation. Fran and her family are great.
Excellent value and friendly people
Need a place to stay before flying out in the morning, Fran was more than welcoming. I had a lovely stay there for the night and felt very comfortable.

If you want somewhere that's near the airport, with a friendly hostess, a warm and friendly environment, a really comfy bed AND a pretty decent pub within easy walking distance then this is the place for you!

Fran is one of the sweetest hosts Ive ever stayed with. She makes you feel like youre staying at home with family when youre there. She helped me with information on how to get to the airport via bus which was super useful. Thanks for everything Fran.
Fran is lovely and helpful, especially with regards to taxis from the airport! It's very close to the airport so was ideal for what I needed.
A warm welcome, a comfortable bed, breakfast and literally 10 minutes from the airport.......everything a weary traveller needs plus a handy place at which to start and end your travels.

Amazing host, very friendly, with very quick responses to any questions, as well as travel options on how to get there. Very clean, comfortable bed, water, tea and coffee available in room and as an added bonus a light (continental) breakfast is available. Would highly recommend to anyone, particularly those who have issues sleeping with noise, as it was very quiet!
Fran is a lovely lady and will do everything to help make your stay as easy as possible.
Fran is a very helpful and friendly host who goes out of her way to make your stay comfortable. Very convenient to the airport.
Fran is a very pleasant host. She responded quickly to our queries. We had an early flight and we were very pleased that she could advise us on taxi. All was perfect for us.
It is a great place!
Fran went out of her schedule to receive me and left prepared a breakfast knowing I had to leave early to the airport. She's a warm lovely host. Looking forward to staying at her place again.
Fran is great to communicate with, and the place is clean and quiet.  It is close to the airport!
Great Location to spend a night if you have a early flight .   It is only $3 Euro for bus ride to Fran's place and about 10 stops.

Clean, comfortable quiet accommodation in private room, easily accessed by public transport and yet within comfortable walking distance of the village.  Friendly and welcoming host, with prompt response to any enquiry.  Ideal for a stopover en route to or from Dublin airport.
Great location, close to the airport if you have another flight the next day.
Great location and Fran is a congenial and helpful host.
I did not meet Fran, but communication was super easy. She prepared breakfast for me. The place is just a few min from the busstop bringing you to the airport. Perfect for my trip!

Fran is a really good host. She was really responsive beforehand and made sure I find her place okay. She gave a lot of useful information about travel to her place from the airport and finding shops nearby. She made sure that I have a nice stay  and helped me wherever she could.

Great place to stay. 
Fran is a very helpful and generous host and her son was very welcoming too. 
The house is in a nice quiet neighbourhood and handy for the airport. 
Would definitely recommend and hope to stay again.
Fran is a very lovely person and this Place is Perfect to discover Dublin. The room was a Little bit small but it was ok and we get a breakfast with toast, cerials and fruits. It was a perfect Stay!
Great place to stay if your flying into or out of Dublin Airport. Comfortable stay with a lovely friendly host.

The perfect layover after a late flight. Fran went out of her way to accommodate me, considering my flight was quite delayed. She looked out for me and made sure I knew where I was going the next day. A very comfortable stay.
Fran is a superb host who pays attention to every detail.

The stay at Frans home was the perfect beginning for my hiking tour in Ireland. I arrived late at the airport and Fran waited up for me and made sure that I arrive safely at here home! She always replied super fast to my messages and send me all the information I needed to get to her place from the airport and back! There was also a very nice breakfast in the morning and the bed was very comfy! Thank you so much for everything, Fran!!
Its a nice quiet clean space with a great host
This place is beautiful!

Fran's place is really close to airport, so you can get the 102 from airport and get off at River Valley heights if you are coming from Airport. The place is excellent for a layover flight, or early flight. Unfortunately my flight got cancelled, but I have to say Fran was an excellent host and we had good communication, as she helped me with the bus info for dublin airport and city center. The room was warm and cosy, and Fran was very welcoming and was kind enough to make me some breakfast in the morning as well as a good bit of conversation. I really recommend Fran's place as its in a great location in Swords and 10/15 mins away from airport. The bus stop is at the bottom of her street, 2/3 mins walk. Will use Fran's place again, recommended!
Fran is a great host and her home is very lovely. Close to the bus stop that can take you downtown Dublin or the airport
I had such a wonderful stay- Fran was exceptionally kind and was able to accommodate me at last minute notice.  She provided breakfast and the room/home was clean and comfortable. I had a great stay!
I can definitely recommend this place. Fran is a great host, super helpful. And the location being near the bus stop to and from the airport is especially convenient.
Nettes Zimmer, nahe Flughafen
Fran is so sweet, always caring about her guests confort and well being. The bedroom is very confortable and the whole house is clean. Felt like home! I 100% recommend!

I was looking just for an ordinary place where to spend the night close the Dubln airport for catching a early flight in the morning. Instead I have found a "home" where the great host Fran made me feeling as a very special guest, welcoming me with a big smile and assisting with everything I need. I will definitely come back! Thanks Francesca for having me in your beautiful accommodation

Fran's place was a cozy home at a perfect location for a stopover for early morning flight. Straight from the very comfortable bedding to great shower, the place is perfect in all ways. Fran herself was very kind and generous.
Simple but fine for a night. The breakfast was a nice bonus!
A bit pricey for one person,  but the location is good. I recommend the place for if you have an early flight the next day that you need to catch
Fran is very friendly and helpful.
Great location 10 mins away from the airport. The room was very comfortable and clean. Fran is amazingly kind and helpful, she even scheduled a cab for us.
Close to airport. Supremely convenient if youre arriving or departing.  My stay was brief. My needs were met. Fran is exceptionally kind and helpful!

Very close to the airport! Fran was kind enough to order me a taxi to the airport and was very good with helping me to figure out how to get to her place from the city center. Perfect if you have an early flight and need somewhere close to the airport!
great stay at Dave's, Dave is very friendly
Great location and great host! Love Alfie as well,  beautiful and energetic dog :)

Clean room great amenities and good location. Enjoyed the company of Dave, Kieran and Alfie (lovely friendly dog!). Great conversations and recommendations around Dublin too!

Will definitely come back to stay with Dave if there are upcoming trips to Dublin.

Highly recommend! Everything was perfect about my stay: Dave is a wonderful host, great to chat to, and gave great tips about where to go and what to do in Dublin. The apartment is very cool, with great views of the canal, the bed is super comfortable, shower is great, there is a hammock above the bed where you can read and look out at the water.  Some of the best coffee I've had in Dublin is just around the corner. Book this place for a very authentic and enjoyable Dublin experience.

Beautiful house close to the beach in a lovely little coastal town. Phillipa and her family were very kind and helpful. We were allowed to use the Kitchen and even the food. We would definitely come back.

Without a doubt my best AirBnB experience! 

My friend and I were made to feel extremely welcome in Philippas house, every member of the family was genuine, friendly and made the effort to make us feel at home and provide recommendations on things to do/places to see. Philippa was flexible with our check-in and check-out times which was really appreciated as we arrived late at Dublin airport - nothing was too much trouble. 

The house was incredible, clean and very well presented, the room itself too was a good size for two and we were invited to use the kitchen (including cooking) and conservatory space as desired. 

Im unsure how many bathrooms the house has in total, but it almost felt like we had exclusive use to the adjacent bathroom because it was rarely used by the family - again, amazing standards and very clean, modern and stylish. 

As we had hired a car the location was ideal, with good road access to Dublin (30mins) and Belfast (2 hours). We didnt have an opportunity to use the local transport links but from what the family told us, and from reading previous guest experiences its easy enough to get around without a hire car. 

Some great added touches like glass of water and chocolate for our arrival. 

I would absolutely stay again, and recommend to anyone visiting the area. Thank you Philippa and family for having us!
Greaylt host great property
Lovely room and house, clean and stylish, Philippa is a very warm kind person and makes you feel right at home. Would return if in the area.

Wonderful and friendly hospitality, Philippa is charming! Clean and pretty home, comfortable beds, beautiful tranquil sunny veranda to relax in, super location close to airport, great tips for local restaurants... I can highly recommend a stay!!

Philippa is a warm, personable hostess who offers wonderfully natural conversation and loads of tips for visiting and dining in her area. The room accommodation was very private, quiet and cozy. Great shower with lots of hot water. Lovely breakfast overlooking her garden and numerous bird feeders. And the proximity to Dublin airport is ideal for travelers coming in or leaving. Nearby beach and waterfront ideal for walks.
Philippa and her family were great hosts. They were very helpful and gave great tips. I would definitely stay here again!

Very clean and comfortable room with facilities next door in a bustling and friendly household. Very friendly welcome and stay in Rush and at the end of town to be   closer to the train station for links into Dublin

If I could write a glowing 10 star review for our stay with Phillipa I would.  If you are looking for a quiet place to stay by the sea outside of Dublin then Phillipa's home in Rush  is the place for you. 

Phillipa is the most warm and welcoming host you could ask for.   She is knowledgeable about Dublin, transportation and offers many helpful tips that made our visit in the city easier and more fun.  She recommended the Epic Museum which was the highlight of the places we visited.

We cooked dinner one night and were made to feel right at home in the kitchen.  

I will echo the comments of an earlier reviewer and say that it was by far the best Airbnb experience I have ever had.  By far!

One note is that you really do need a car or be ready to walk.  The train station is a good 15 minute walk and the walk into the village is about 20-25 minutes.   

We loved staying here!!  Thank you Phillipa!

Diane and Zack

Philippa and family were very friendly and helpful with local tips. We felt very at home. The location was quiet but also convenient for local sightseeing. The house was beautiful and the room was very comfortable and stylish. Thankyou Philippa!

It was a very pleasant stay. Room is clean and comfortable beddings. Philippa is very prompt at answering inquiries even late at night. Location is quite a walk from public transport (20 mins to bus stop then another 20 to train station if you miss your bus).
Warm room in a comfortable home! I would have stayed longer if possible!

Thank you so much for this wonderful stay. It has been a wonderful weekend. 
We sleep very well in the bedding. The breakfast is delightful. Maeve and her husband can not do enough. The place is beautiful. There are very nice walks to do. 
Thank you again for your superb hospitality !!!
If you want visit Dublin, you have to come here. Trust me !
The room was okay but not as nice as expected. The host Maeve was very friendly and helpful.

Such quick responses from the host, who was kind enough to arrange a taxi for us when we needed it. Great recommendations for local travel and transit. The Bay restaurant is close by and absolutely lovely.

Maeves hospitality was incredible! Not only is her home lovely, but she responded quickly, gave us a lot of suggestions for transportation and places to go and made us feel at home. I will absolutely be staying at Maeves when I return to Dublin and highly recommend her home.
Nice location, right near the water and easy bus ride into the city.
Maeves place is a lovely location and perfect accomadation
Maeve and her husband are terrific hosts. The beds were comfortable and everything was clean. The breakfasts were delicious, hot, and tasty. We highly recommend their accommodations.
The host canceled this reservation 9 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
You can expect fantastic host, easy easy travel to and from Ferrie. Tips on bus line (3 euros) one way. Great tips on places to see. And a great comfortable bed that will give you a super rest.
Thoroughly enjoyed our stay here.  Maeve and her husband were kind and helpful.  The place is just as described in the listing.

This is a classic, sparkling clean, and comfortable B&B.  As other reviewers have noted Maeve's hospitality is exceptional. I was traveling with my wife and two kids (4 years old and 1 year old) and we had a wonderful time. Highly recommended.

We stayed with Maeve for 3 days and had a lovely time. She was so kind and welcoming and had lots of great tips for local things to do. Breakfast was great. The room did not have it's own bathroom but that didn't really inconvenience us. City Centre was about a 15 minute bus ride, which stops less then 10 minutes from the house. All in all, definitely worth the stay.
Great place, nice host and cousy rooms. All you need.
Nice B&B, very friendly hosts and lots of local tips. Public transport to Dublin is very close and very easy.
Maeve e suo marito sono due persone splendide. La casa si trova in un quartiere tranquillo a 10 minuti di bus da Dublino.
Maeve and Shea were very welcoming and accommodating. Pretty close to LEAP bus line. A little tough to find but it worked out ok afterwards. Breakfasts were good
Maeve was a friendly and cheerful host who was very hospitable. The location of the B & B is close to the waterfront and the city can easily be reached via the bus line 130.
Great folks, great location, lovely house - great room and amenities - lovely garden in the (almost) centre of the city. Will stay again. Thank you - Mike & Carina.
Lovely house and garden,centrally located,private parking,exceptionally welcoming hosts.Highly recommended.

This place is in a wonderful location. Close to absolutely everything. The apartment gets so much natural sunlight that its always warm and cozy. The amenities are great. The only downside are the four flights of stairs but it was great exercise.

The apartment was fantastic. You wont find a better location, just in the city center within a walking distance from every touristic attractions. 
The apartment was clean and quiet and the check in/check out was extremely easy and fast. 
Just be aware that this is a 4th floor without.
Fantastic location for a visit to Dublin city centre. We were quite nervous about the only/emergency exits in the event of a fire etc.
Great appartment, great location!
