This was a very clean and updated home in a nice and quiet neighborhood. The room was on the second level and this level was unused by the hosts if you are looking for privacy. The host were wonderful and helpful people who we had great conversations with over tea and they even gave us some bus passes with credit on them to use. The bus stop was a short walk from the house and about a 25 min ride to the city center. We would recommend to future travelers!
Warm welcome and great place to stay
Great stay with great hosts!! Very friendly and nice private room
You can expect John and Caroline to be the most gracious hosts possible!!! 2 better people could not be found!
Amazing hosts. Really enjoyed my stay, can't fault in any way
Perfect Airbnb, very comfortable and clean. John the host was very kind & chatty. Would recommend to anybody.

Very happy here. Caroline and her husband made us feel welcome. Appreciated being able to make a cup of tea, and even a chat to go with it. Use of washing machine for a charge, was welcome.
Spotlessly clean and comfortable.
Grate place to stay in Dublin easy to catch bus into City. Lovely home inviroment very clean and good amenities great hosts

Caroline and John are such a fantastic hosts, they helped us in all that we needed and make us feel like home. Im sure that if we come to Ireland again, well stay at their place. Thanks for your hospitality!

It was a very fine place to stay, and the hospitality was magnificent.
In dutch we call it     TOPPIE

Lovely stay in an incredibly hospitable home. Youre made to feel welcome as soon as you walk in the door. Lovely room, comfortable bed, hot strong shower and great company. Couldnt recommend highly enough. I look forward to returning

Beautiful and confortable room. The house is fast connected with the city center by bus (20 min. beetween there and the city) Caroline and John are fantastic and very gentle with the guests. We appreciated so much the holydays

Highly recommend. The host welcomes you into their home as if youre part of the family. We used the bus and taxi throughout our stay to get to and from the city center. Great public transportation near home.
Perfect host, perfect room, localisation is great since it is a bit out of the city but still close with the bus! The neighberhood was quiet and lovely! I recommand it all the way!
wonderful home, friendly dog, and restaurants within walking distance. Nice to be out of the hustle and bustle of central Dublin.
We love staying here. Very comfortable, like a home away from home. Great location, very clean, great value and super friendly. We would highly recommend Caroline and John's Airbnb.
Ive stayed with Caroline & John before - really great hosts, great accommodation - a really lovely homely feel. Looking forward to staying again soon.
Wonderful people. You and John were absolutely wonderful and kind.Hope yo see you again.
John an Caroline are some of the best people you could ever hope to meet!!!!

Beautiful home in a great location.
Peaceful and quiet.
Spotless clean place big house and very friendly family 100% recommended
Best airbnb I've ever stayed in, also nicest host I have ever met. If we return to dublin will 100% stay here above anywhere else

This was probably the cleanest and most comfortable Airbnb I have ever stayed in. The bed was so comfortable and the bathroom was spotless. John and Caroline were both very welcoming and offered some great tips of what to see and do in the city. They definitely made my time in Ireland that much more enjoyable.

Beautiful home and fantastic hosts. The bathroom was sparkling clean and stayed that way all throughout our stay. The location was quiet, the dog was friendly, the kitchen was beautiful, and our hosts gave us a number of great tips. 

We had been traveling quite a bit before we got to this home, and it was our best experience on Airbnb yet.

Caroline and John are really good hosts. They understand airbnb not only as a way to earn money but as a possibility to meet people all around the world. The welcomed us very friendly, are openhearted and most of the time openminded  (john really likes to discuss with his guests). The house is super clean and the guest rooms are very cosy! The guest rooms are om a seperate floor. The bathroom is shared with the guests of the two other rooms. Supermarket is near (10 minutes walk) and the bus to the city center (30 minutes ride) too. We really would recommend this place! And we would like to come again

Christina's townhome is a spacious home with all the amenities one needs. We (two adults and 3 kids) stayed for 3 months and loved it! The kitchen is fully equipped and has everything you need. There is a washer and a dishwasher too which is really nice if you prepare meals at home. We also ordered food from local restaurants close by - they either delivered or we picked up. There are small convenience stores close by and a few pharmacies. Grocery stores are also 15-20 minutes walk or a few bus stops away. 
There are three bathrooms and we really loved this - especially having 2 showers. Christina even arranged for the cleaning company and the linen company to come and pick up linens and towels regularly even though we were staying fairly long term. That helped us a lot since we did not have to worry about washing and drying the towels and sheets. Everything was in great working order and if we needed anything Christina and John were on it right away and fixed a few small issues that came up. The location was great for us because there are at least 6 bus lines one minute away from the place, and all the buses take you straight to the center of the city. We were also glad to be near the workout park and LUAS. We are so happy to have found this place and Christina and John who were amazing hosts! We highly recommend staying at their place.

Christina was a great host.  She communicated with us beforehand and was there ready to let us in and show us around. The house was clean, and she added special touches for us.  Overall, the house is a great value.  It fit our family well and was a quick cab/bus ride to the city center.  I would highly recommend this place to future travelers.

The place is new and clean. There are no curtains in the master bedroom where it gets light very early in the summer time. The bed in the master bedroom is a full size mattress and not very comfortable. The loft upstairs was nice and is perfect for a teen. The bathrooms were adequate. Bring some towels.
The place is off the beaten path but it doesnt take too long to get places downtown.

Christina was a fantastic host! It was so nice to be greeted by her when we first arrived and to be shown how everything worked. It was close to MANY bus stops which was super handy. Parking was great and the space was large enough for 5 of us plus a toddler. A wonderful place to stay when in Dublin!!
We loved the place, very spacious and easy to commute to the city. Chirstina was both helpful and friendly and I Would recommend the place. Thanks Christina for a lovely stay!

Christina is AMAZING! She was the most accommodating AirBnB hostess we have ever had. Her place is lovely, and close to everything we wanted to do while we were in Dublin. If I could give her 10 stars, I would!

Christina's place : 4.5 stars.
... no body is perfect !

Christina is an amazing host and we felt right at home. The property is great for a family or a group. We loved the easy bus access to all parts of Dublin and the ease of access to grocery stores and dining. We would definitely stay here again!

The house is a three-bed roomed house with two bathrooms and another downstairs toilet. which is extremely hard to find and helpful when adults are sharing.
The location is a bus or taxi ride from the centre, but both options are easy as the property is near a main road and a hospital. Also if you need to travel in Ireland it is close to the M50 and other motorway routes out of Dublin.
The house is well decorated with comfortable beds. The kitchen was the only area which we felt needed improvement due to a lack of cutlery which is why we are only giving 4 stars. Despite this there is a washing machine/tumble drier, dishwasher and microwave oven as well as an electric oven and hob which we used during our stay.
Our host was friendly and helpful with any requests we had and we enjoyed our stay in this property.
Great stay with John and Caroline! They went out of their way to make our stay perfect. Would highly recommend!
Super hospitality! Excellent
Caroline and John are absolutely lovely, and their place is wonderful! Their hospitality went above and beyond and we had a wonderful time

A very cozy space about a 20 minute cab ride from Dublin city center! John and Caroline are lovely people, and their home is so cozy. Lovely twin rooms and very clean bathroom. And if you love dogs, their sweet pup JD is an absolute angel :)
Caroline and John were great hosts. It is a peaceful and quiet home and neighborhood.  Enjoyed our stay and would definitely recommend highly.
Caroline and John are a very good host. We have been very happy in their beautiful and comfortable house. Thank you Caroline and John for welcome !

Myself and my husband cannot recommend this place enough! Everything was perfect down to the last detail. The rooms were spotless and very comfortable. Caroline and John were amazing hosts: always willing to help us whenever we had questions about the area and what sights were worth seeing. We will definitely be planning another trip to Dublin and would love to stay with Caroline and John again!
You will enjoy your stay at Carolines its a Great location, clean and helpful hosts!

It was amazing stay. Caroline and John are very nice, open minded and hospitable people. Their house is beautiful and very clean. Its located a little from center but is not a problem. I highly recommend!
Lovely home and nice, friendly visit. Like visiting family.

Caroline and Johns home is a very welcoming environment. They are more than happy to help out in any way they can and offer advice about your stay in Dublin and in Ireland. Their home is very clean and the location is great and near a bus stop. They are quick in their responses in the Airbnb app. Would definitely recommend staying here when visiting Dublin! Just a lovely home and couple.

Very confortable bedrooms. 
They are very nice and helpful. Everything was perfect :)

Our stay with John and Caroline was absolutely amazing. The space was sparkling clean, updated, and had plenty of amenities. John made our stay unforgettable and taught us so much about Ireland. I hope to stay again and would highly recommend this location as it is only a few minutes to the bus stop. This is a great option for those looking to experience Dublin without staying downtown and to experience genuine Irish hospitality. Thank you for having us!
Very nice people, great bathroom, very clean and friendly rooms.

John and Caroline's place is very beautiful, located in a quite little neighborhood outside of Dublin. Getting into town is very easy, just a thirty minute bus ride from a stop very close to the house. The room was very nice, and we enjoyed our stay there very much.

Fantastic accommodation & hosts. A short taxi journey into/out of the centre of Dublin (around ‚Ç¨15), or easily accessible on bus routes (About ‚Ç¨3 each-way for a ticket).
House is clean and 2-bed room was just as described. Good bathroom facilities. We didnt manage to meet Caroline, but getting to know John was a highlight of our stay - caring hospitality and refreshingly honest conversations! Plus lots of useful tips and advice!
Beautiful and clean house, comfortable beds, and great hosts. We had very good conversations with John in the mornings, and the hosts were very helpful and accommodating.
Very fiendly and helpfully

Really cool couple. We really enjoyed our stay and the area. It was really easy to get there on the bus and we felt comfortable walking in the neighborhood any time of day. The couple are really sweet and were really helpful even giving us a ride one morning so we could make our reservation. The bathroom was always really clean and we always had clean towels. Also loved JD the dog

Best hosts ever, good location for Longitude as taxi is ‚Ç¨10 from and to Marlay Park. Got to experience all of the city.  John is some man for a chat. Told me more about Ireland than you could ever find in the JC/LC History Books. Absolute gem of a place. Wholeheartedly recommend to go there. I'm sure the other 500 people before me did too.

Our stay at Caroline & Johns Made our trip to Dublin so much more fun. The location is just out of the centre of Dublin with a good busconnection. John told us a lot about the history of Ireland and gave great recommendations. We would definetely recommend this airbnb to everyone!!
Awesome couple, great chats, very helpful and got a restful sleep.
The place is very clean and nice, and the hosts are extraordinary helpful and nice people.
This Room is absolutely great. Most of all, the Hosts are very kind and communicative. I had a great time in Dublin by the hosts favor. I definitely recommend to others.
A nice and quiet place - John is a host of great hospitality and full of stories about Dublin, Ireland and the rest!

Caroline was very accommodating.  We arrived late and hungry at about 8pm and she offered to have John, her husband drive us to a nearby restaurant and pick us up afterword!  We enjoyed a healthy political debate with John who also had lots of interesting stories of growing up in Ireland.  Everything was very clean despite having a shared bathroom with 3 other tenants.  An added plus was getting to meet their sweet dog JD.

Top Airbnb experience!¬†The house is very cozy and clean, the beds extra comfortable and the shower is also great. The location is also a good advantatge since it gives you the possibility of getting to the center in a short time but having the relax of a quite¬†neighborhood¬†at the same time.¬†

Caroline and John are execellent hosts.¬†John provided us with anything we needed it and spent¬†with us a wonderful time telling us about the irish essence and giving us very valuable tips for visiting the city and the towns arround. I'd really recommend this place to anyone.

Caroline and John were excellent hosts. They were so generous and kind. The space was sparkling clean and private, and John and Caroline were great to make conversation and gives us lots of tips for travelling around Dublin. I truly felt at home staying with John and Caroline.

A very quiet, spacious, tidy and comfortable house. The guest room was much larger than expected. Caroline and John are really fantastic  hosts: friendly, caring and super nice. I stayed for three nights together with a friend, and they supported us with plenty good advices for our plannings in Dublin and the outskirts. Absolutely recommendable. Any time again!
The house was very very clean. The people in the house are very polite. Very cozy room. Very calm Neighborhood! I hope to back soon!
Loved staying here. Great hosts - so welcoming to their home. Really lovely space - exceptionally clean. Would definitely return
Nice stay

Staying with John and Caroline was a wonderful experience overall. They went above and beyond to ensure that our stay in Dublin was the best that it could be. Caroline was so kind in welcoming us into her home, and John was extremely helpful in ensuring that our stay in Dublin was comfortable and safe, and had great tips for touring the city. We would highly recommend these hosts and their home stay for its cleanliness, comfortable and home-like feel!
Caroline has a beautiful home and my room was very comfortable and quiet. The bus to Dublin is just a 5 minute walk and there are restaurants walking distance from her house.

I had absolutely the best Airbnb experience at Caroline and Johns place. Its truly a home away from home. John is the most kind and thoughtful host, and I really enjoyed talking with him. Look forward to coming back soon.

This airbnb is a lovely place to spend a few days. John was a great host, very friendly and always ready to help and offer great places to see around Dublin.
The room was very comfortable and the neighborhood is nice and quiet. Busstops to get to the city center are within walking distance.
The dog is absolutely precious - a very playful little guy

Fantastic host's and make you feel at home instantly. Always willing to sit and have a chat. House is immaculate and John & Caroline couldn't be more friendly and helpful. Couldn't recommend highly enough. .

Caroline and John are very openminded and friendly. They gave us a lot of tipps about Dublin. They have a lovely home and everything was very clean. We really enjoyed it and we would come again if we visit Dublin again. Thanks for everything!

If you need a nice place to explore Dublin, this is a perfect place
The place can be reached easily by car and bus, room is nice and clean. 
The bathroom is shared with other guests, but for us this was no problem. 
Caroline and john are very friendly.
Lots of fun and interesting talk with both John and Caroline. Felt at home. clean and comfortable with good value

Caroline and John have a beautiful house in a nice suburb of Dublin, they are very friendly.
Bed is so comfy (without bed springs...) , spotless bathroom and a huge kitchen!
My son enjoyed their lovely dog and had a fantastic Halloween night in the area!
Liz and Connor were very warm and welcoming. The space was beautiful and the location was excellent. I couldnt recommend this Airbnb enough.
Such a great host and the apartment was great, very clean and very stylish. Would 100% recommend

Unfortunately this airbnb was absolutely not to standard, particularly for 5 guests. 
Isa  was totally fine as a host but the property was in a very poor state.
Very comfortable and simple apartment to stay in. The area was quiet, not far from the center, and easy to find.
Only a 5 minute walk from the Fatima tram station (Luas red line). Isa has amazing communication, and responded immediately to all my questions.
Very clean and well sized apartment for a short stay in Dublin

Nice little apartment, very clean and tidy. Bed wasnt the most comfortable but fine for one night. Provided a travel cot for our baby which was great to have set up ready for us. Nice and quiet despite being on a main road/in an apartment building. Would stay again.
Good flat. Communication easy with Isa.
This was a great place to stay!

Isa was so very helpful.  The space was really clean.  The space is perfect for 4 people.  Nicely updated bathroom.  Overall a wonderful place to stay.  I would recommend it and would stay there again.

Isa's place is a confy small private apartment in a nice small fancy building. the spaces, forniture and the kitchen are very essential but I found everything I needed for my stay. All perfectly tidy and clean.  Extremely quiet during the night.
Convenient, affordable place to stay in Dublin. Easy to get to by bus from the airport, city center. Clean and comfortable. Great communication with Isa. Would stay here again.
Venue great just around the corner from luas and convenience store and take aways. Very clean great as a Base.
Very clean apartment, has everything you will need. Off street parking was welcome and the bus stop outside was convenient for the bus to the city centre which takes about 15 mins.

Isas place is not huge, but very clean and offers travellers everything they need. Our group of 6 stayeda night in Dublin, so we chose something not too expensive. For more than one night, the apartment would be too small though. Close to the apartment there is a tram which takes you into the city (~15 min). Free parking on premise + easy check-in.

The location was difficult to find for the local cab drivers. Fortunately, we were able to give the hospital as a landmark, but the first time from the airport, had to take two cab drivers to get to the destination. Overall, the place had all the amenities we needed and was very clean. It was loud at night from other neighbors which was a little frustrating since we chose the place away from Downtown Dublin. Check-in was a little stressful since we were traveling internationally and didn't get WiFi always and was not made aware of the check-in instructions until the day of.
Great communication with the host made checking in easy. Access to on site parking was a great bonus. Great location. Apartment was clean and up to date. Would highly recommend!
Very clean, fairly convenient location.

Isas place was great! We stayed here for our first night in Dublin and check in was a breeze. We walked to the Guinness Store House and it was no more than 15mins. Very clean location and Isa is always ready to respond. Thanks for the awesome stay Isa!
First stay in Dublin for us. The appartement of Isa was a perfect place for our family : quiet and well situated. Next Time we wont hesitate to come back
Very clean apartment, and also the building itself! Everything was very nice and Isa answered timely on any questions we may have had.
We enjoy staying at this Place
Isas place was exactly as described. A great place to stay while in Dublin.
Nice flat
Very clean, good parking facility, close to bars and clubs 9 Euro taxi. Very happy thank you
Nice stay in Dublin, especially if you need free parking space. You can take the bus to the centre from the bus stop in front of the house, which was very handy.
Lieux propre mais lointains des transports et du centre villes

This was a great little spot for me, my mom, and grandmother. The apartment is small, but its Europe, and it has everything that you need. It would be a bit tight for seven people, but still doable, plus the whole reason for traveling is to explore, not sit in an apartment. It was clean and comfortable. The building was secure and there are little shops, pubs, and restaurants nearby. The bus stop is right out front and you can get anywhere in the city easily. Do yourself a favor and get some fish and chips from Gino's Takeaway, just down the street. I would stay here again if visiting Dublin.
Was a good place, not to noisy, handy information

Little appartment not far from Guinness House (15minutes by foot).
Beds are confortables. It was not possible to lock the bathroom door, the appartment is not really soundproof and some cooking tools are missing in the kitchen . The direction information were correct and clear and answers for our questions were quickly answered. For a place to sleep in Dublin its ok.

Good place. Close to the tram, but in a bit of a rough area- although we had no issues with it, we did not leave anything in our car overnight just in case. Would stay here again, because the price is good. But the price is good for a reason.
Good, clean accommodation and perfect host - Thanks
The place is very nice and has a great host! The location is a 30 min walk from the city center and can be tough during the cold rainy season. We used public transportation most of the time.

Great location! Walking distance to Guinness factory and Jameson on bow street. Lots of restaurants in walking distance as well. There was free off street parking available which was a plus. The apartment was clean and suited our needs which was only to sleep close to airport and local attractions.
A lovely cosy place thats very central to the city. The beds are comfortable. Overall a really great stay. Would recommend this home.
cozy apartment, everything was fine

The apartment was very clean. However, the bathroom door did not close/lock. The beds were mattresses/box springs on the floor and were beyond uncomfortable. The springs in the mattress were broken, therefore, the bed wrapped around you like a cocoon. The neighbor cooked something nasty 24/7 and the smell leaked into the apartment. The fold out beds in the front room have stained mattresses. The washer appears to be only hooked up to hot water so our clothes shrunk. There was 3 of us staying at the Airbnb for 3 nights and only 3 towels were available. I actually contemplated finding a hotel but due to the marathon and festivals, they were booked and expensive.
Great weekend in Dublin, staying at Isa's place. It is very convenient and super clean! Perfect for a weekend in town.

The house is amazing, in a great spot and a walkable distance from the city centre with great local amenities.  We didn't get to use the garden much as the weather was a bit wet and windy but it was nice to come back to a warm house after being out in the cold. St. Patrick's Day was fantastic and we all had a memorable visit to Dublin made all the better because of the accommodation.
Great local vibe in a great area!

This is an incredible home that you will be so happy that you rented. We walked to the city center, relaxed in the house and enjoyed every thing Dublin has to offer. 
Conor has thought of everything and anything you could need and he is available to answer your questions or concerns.
The house is beautiful and in a  gorgeous posh neighborhood about a block from the American embassy. 
Schedule your visit and enjoy!
Conor was very easy to communicate with and made every effort to provide the Make-A-Wish Family with everything they needed for a comfortable stay.  Thank you!
Great spot. Perfect location and easy communication. Nice sun room. It worked well for our family get away!

Conors house is a great place situated in a lovely area of Dublin. With a bakery & one of the best Indian restaurants around the corner, plus lots of other shops, bars & restaurants in the immediate vicinity. 
The house is a warm & inviting space with one of the largest & most comfortable beds Ive ever slept on! It was a lovely space for the 8 members of our family to stay. Although unfortunately we didnt get to meet Conor,  he was always really friendly, polite & quick to reply when messaging. 
I would have no hesitation in recommending Conor & his house.

Conor's house in Balldbridge is a stylish & luxurious home, whose spacious bedrooms and living areas allow guests to feel as though they have their own space - even when staying with a group. 

The outside terrace is a sun trap. We got a sunny day on our trip and were able to spend lots of time outside. 

The kitchen/dining area is the perfect space for relaxing and socialising with your group. The bedrooms are large and spacious, with lots of space for storing suitcases/hanging clothes. The beds were clean and comfortable to sleep in. 

Unlike other airbnbs I have stayed in, this house feels as though you are staying in someone's home. 

The location has everything you want - a shop across the road, and in an area with endless amounts of popular bars and restaurants.

25 Ballsbridge is a quintessential Irish home away from home. The amenities and proximity to sights is great. Despite being near the financial district, stadium, and active roadways - it was very quiet in the house AND  the private courtyard. Conor is an attentive host but not overbearing, quick to respond and informative. He helped to make our trip to Dublin a success. I highly recommend this location for anyone traveling to Dublin..
25 Ballbridge Terrace is a great family location - close to Dublin proper, easily accessed by bus and tram.  Conor's hospitality and flexibility was superb.

This is the perfect spot to experience Irish warmth. The rooms are ample and traditional yet all of the modern amenities are available. Our host was thoughtful, informative and left some unexpected welcome gifts! The home could not be more beautiful, it will suit every taste. staying at the home wouldve been a holiday in itself if we had never even stepped outside!!
Amazing place to stay would stay there again
Very helpful and responsive. Great property.
Fantastic location. Conor was very helpful and welcoming.

Conors place was such a great space. It was a convenient distance to the town centre and had all the amentities you need within walking distance. The house was lovely, spacious and clean and Conor made us all feel very welcome and at home. I would highly recommend Connors place if you are looking to stay in Dublin!
The apartment is amazing, the neighborhood very quiet and the host is perfect.
Excelente la atencion ubicacion y hermoso departamento.llegamos y nos dejo comida para cenar y pan manteca y leche para merendar
Great location, address wasnt spot on but it was a wonderful experience and I would recommend to my friends

Great location! Super easy to get to from the airport. 2min walk to st Stephens green and the trams to the downtown area. Lovely space for a family. Super cute coffee shop just around the corner as well. Highly recommend:)
Location, location,location. It is so central and yet tucked away from the hustle and bustle. Anne you have a gem of a place.
Great location and very spacious apartment. Walking distance to shopping area and major attractions. Large bedrooms and quiet. We enjoyed our stay here very much!

This air bnb is in a perfect spot to explore Dublin city center. Getting to the actual apartment was super easy as well as an airport shuttle stops about 1 minute from the apartment. 

Anne was fantastic! She responded promptly to any message we had sent. Check in and check out was easy and she helped to make our travel stress free by allowing us to drop off/leave our luggage before/after check in and check out. We had a small issue when we arrived which she resolved quickly.

We would stay again.
Best located appartement and great communication with Anne.
The location of the Airbnb was superb! Very close to everything. The apartment was very clean and cozy. We had an excellent stay and would gladly stay again.

Anne's place is wonderful! Very roomy and clean. We had no problems and she was there to greet us when we arrived. We did struggle with keeping hot water in the shower but I know other reviews will warn you of the same thing. It is a great location and we loved walking through the St. Stephen's Green everyday.
Amazing location near St. Stephens Green
The location is great but the apartment is not so good. Expect ants and a strong smell of humidity.
This apartment in Dublin is in the best location ever. It is a city that is more than worth visiting and if you wish to be central, Annes apartment is perfect. It was quiet, clean and good value.
Good location but not luxury: it is in need of attention to bring it up to a reasonable standard.
Great location!

Anne's apartment is amazingly located for exploring Dunlin, with almost everything in waking distance. As a young family, we felt safe and secure both at the apartment and in the surrounding area. It was also larger than I expected, with some staples provided that was very helpful for new arrivals. An excellent choice for your Dublin adventure. Thank you Anne!
Roomy and modern apartment. Superb location, really close to St Stephens Green but very quiet. Great for a short or long stay close to Dublin hotspots.

We had a great stay at the appartment. Especially the location was perfect! Close to St Stephen's Green Park with a playground. Thanks to Anne a good supermarket was quickly found. The only disadvantage for us was the lack of a reasonable amount of daylight and fresh air.

Reviews said this place was sparkling clean, but the apartment could really use a deep clean. The radiator in the main bathroom leaked onto most of the bathroom floor, and it was annoying to keep emptying the bowl every few hours to stop it from happening again. Also, there is no heavy curtain on the main window, and as the apartment is on the ground floor, that was an issue when a garbage truck came by, nearly right up to window, around 10:30pm and 11:30pm one night. The location by St. Stephens Green was great and the host was very responsive when explaining the hot water heater switch by Airbnb app (in small closet by main room- takes 30 minutes to heat up), but I would not stay here again for the price and three-day minimum.
Beautiful house, located in a very good position, very good for visiting Dublin.

This apartment is in a perfect location for what we needed, walking around downtown Dublin. It was close to bus stops, lots of pubs and restaurants.  Grafton Street and Temple Bar are all within an easy walking distance. We felt safe in the neighbourhood. However I would not describe it as luxury. There are some cleaning and maintenance issues that need to be addressed. It would be nice if there was a coffee pot, of any sort. Instant coffee is gross.
Great place in a lovely location. Host was very friendly and greeted us on arrival with milk/bread which was very thoughtful. Perfect location to get into the centre while also nice and quiet.

Location, location, location! Right off St. Stephen's Green so a great jumpoff place for all the best of Dublin. The place was fine with a well-appointed kitchen and some goodies on hand, lots of room. good beds, good shower but you need to turn the hot water heater on before you use it. We had a bulb blow in one of the bathrooms where it was the only light and despite communication with the host about it, it was never replaced. Also, the listing indicated washer and dryer but no so. Would not have known if we had not seen other reviews. But host did leave addresses of two local laundries. Despite those glitches, definitely recommended.
Great location, large flat, wonderful host and great price.

Anne's flat is in a great location, around the corner from St Stephen's Green.  It is a clean, secure, warm flat in a great location.  Anne was very kind and left us a welcome pack which was great.  The flat is a little tired but with decoration and an additional comfy chair the place would be great.

Excellent location very central to everything but very quiet at night so perfect. Could do with a bit of a make over, very tired looking. The beds werent great you could feel the springs and pillows very old and worn. Only managed for two out of a party of five to shower and then the water went cold. Emailed Anne and she explained if we were to put a switch down on the boiler and wait 15 mins we could get more hot water? Why we werent told this I dont know and having to wait 15 mins at a time for individual showers was ridiculous when there is 5 people waiting! This really put a dampener on our sons 21st birthday weekend away! When we arrived also all the radiators had been turned off apart from the lounge and the bathroom so it was freezing in there. Luckily we managed to turn them on after the second day. The fridge was unclean and had half empty bits of food and half a bottle of drank Pepsi in it! A bit of a make over, new beds, new pillows and duvets, a new boiler and a major clean of this apartment and I might consider staying again but until then its a no from me!!

With a cosy coal fire on a cold April evening this was just heaven for me. 
Everything in this boat hits the correct mark. Highly recommend this to anyone with even the slightest since of adventure -brilliant
What a cool experience! Great amenities and a cozy way to be in the heart of the action in Dublin but also very private and quiet.
We really enjoyed our stay! The boat was delightful and conveniently located. Check in was easy and the video Trish provided clearly explains everything. Thanks for a great stay!

This place was amazing! It was clean and quiet and a great place to come home to each evening after a long day of walking around Dublin. 

Trish was a fantastic host. She was quick to respond and her video tutorials for using the barge were excellent.

I highly recommend this unique experience.
Trish's barge is located in a great area, lots to do and everything you need in walking distance.  Living on a boat is a fantastic experience.

Fabulous location, coffee shop, supermarket, restaurants and bars a stroll away. 
Trish was extremely responsive to any questions we had. A pleasure to communicate with.
The boat itself was such a fun place to stay. Had everything we needed and, oh my, the water view for morning coffee!
Great experience. Live on the canal. What a unique and great stay. Ill be back for sure. And Trish is a great Host. No issues at all. Enjoy!

The barge was such an amazing and unique way to visit Dublin! The space was very comfortable and good sized. It was very cozy during one day with torrential downpour and cool temperatures. The bed was great and the seating out of the bedroom over the canal was incredible. Its hard to find a private place to stay in a city, this was exactly that. 

To top it all off Trish was absolutely the best, extrodinarily responsive and helpful. Five stars for sure!
Great place and very Safe !!

This stay was the highlight of all my trips around the world, it's unique, adorable and so much fun. The barge was so delightful, Trish had the fire lit for when we arrived which was really lovely. I cannot recommend this stay highly enough.

The barge is in an amazing location for adventuring in Dublin and you couldn't ask for a cozier, cleaner, more interesting living experience. The pre check in video provided all of the information necessary and Trish was available whenever necessary. Highly recommend!

We had a few beautiful days in dublin and the appartement was realy nice.
when wo go again to dublin we would go to daves apartemnt
Great apartment with a lot of great books to read :)

The apartment is clean, spacious, very comfortable and with very good location in the Grand canal dock area, few steps away from coffee shops, restaurants and supermarket.  Dave and his friend Kieran are super friendly and attentive.  Hope to stay again next time!
Super hospitable, friendly, clean and comfortable. Would recommend.
Perfect location, great hosts, very accommodating. Great room, large, comfy, very clean and it really does feel like a home away from home.
Great location! Richard and Kevin are wonderful hosts and truly made us feel welcome. Would definitely recommend to others!
Richard was a great host. His place is clean and conveniently located, and his fridge was well stocked with food to make us feel at home.

Richard and Kevin managed to make me feel welcome even before entering their flat! Communication was spot-on and loads of tips provided, i.e. super detailed direction to the flat  even before I had a chance to ask  Welcome was friendly, we had a nice chat, flat is very nicely decorated, really bright, amazing terrace, fully equipped kitchen, spacious bathroom and HUGE bedroom, with very comfy bed and lovely smelling bedsheets! Attention to detail (make-up towel!!), breakfast adapted to my diet, good tips on restaurants, pubs and activities, 5 mins walk away from Trinity College but yet quiet enough to have a restful sleep! Would recommend this flat to everyone and will definately book it again for my next trip to Dublin!

Richards home was warm and welcoming, with such incredible personal touches, and his fantastic communication from start to end made it effortless to find. He gave great suggestions for things to see and do and had resources galore at the ready. Great private room, very comfy bed, wonderful home with lots of natural light nestled a short walk to so many key spots in the city. I had a fantastic stay - only wish it had been for longer.

Richard and Kevin out did themselves with brilliant pre arrival info and tips on transport link. Treated us with kindness and the facilities were excellent, including perfectly cooked poached eggs for breakfast.   Greatly appreciated being able to drop off our cases in the morning and free to wonder round Dublin, and on departure day, again kindly kept our cases for the day until we had to return to the airport. Thank you very much for being incredible hosts.

A beautiful flat which is comfortable and quiet. Location is fantastic. Richard wasnt there when we stayed but hopefully next time we are in Dublin their flat will be available and we will get to meet Richard. Highly recommend!!

We highly recommend Richard's place. It was amazing with an amazing view. Kevin was extremely helpful in tips of great places to go, especially local places that might not be in some websites. The location is fantastic and you'll have a great time in Dublin.

Richard's place is wonderful. Perfect location for exploring Dublin at the tail end of our trip. Location is super convenient to many of Dublin's attractions. Richard and Kevin were great hosts too and served a delicious breakfast! Highly recommend staying there and hope to return sometime.

Nice apartment at great location. Everything is clean and the bedroom is stylish with a lot of decorations. Richard is a great host with very warm smiles, making me feel at home though its my first time to Dublin.
Richard's place was fantastic! The apartment is in a great location. Richard was so easy to communicate with. I hope I can stay here again in the future!
Nice flat and comfortable bed ! I enjoyed staying at Richard's place. Breakfast was super good !
Richard was such a wonderful host! We only had a quick 24 hours in Dublin and his place was a perfect location to explore from. We would stay here again!

Excellent location to stay in Dublin with good communication from the hosts.  Nice breakfast and they were flexible in allowing us to leave our luggage and collect it after we had checked out.  Wi-fi a bit patchy, but a place we can recommend you stay in Dublin for its very central location.
Dear Richard, thank you for the extraordinary hospitality, it was my pleasure to be your guest.

If you stay with Richard expect a very clean room and bathroom to yourself/ves. The shared living space and kitchen are also clean and open although if you are like us you will be out and about enjoying the best of Dublin right at Richard's doorsteps. The breakfast was great and fresh. We were offered great tips, clear communication, and historical insight into the recent gentrification of Dublin's inner-city.

Richard is a special person and host. The space lives up to its name about being homelike. He went the extra mile in being helpful. The place is very central, close to Trinity, train stations  and Temple Bar

You really forgot you're not at home. Perfect host, quick check in and check out, a lot of useful information about what to see and what to do in Dublin, excellent position, absolutely clean, all the privacy you need.
Cant beat the location or the friendliness of Richard and Kevin.

Checking in was easy and we got a nice perspective of a living in Dublin. There was a great offer of food at gorgeous breakfasts on a lovely terrace. I definitely recommend it to other people who want to have a great start in the day. Richard and Kevins hospitality made us feel right at home. They were exceptionally kind and gracious. Having our own bathroom with a beautiful big bathtub was another plus. We had a great stay all the way around.
Richard and Kevin are fabulous hosts. They are warm, kind and responsive. I enjoyed my post work evening conversations with them. I am looking forward to staying with them on my next trip to Dublin.

There is a reason Kevin and Richard have five-star reviews, across the board. Super nice people, clean, convenient, and interesting apartment. Wonderful breakfast, a great way to start the day. We have stayed at many Airbnb places, this was among the best.

This private room/bathroom in a 2-bedroom apartment is centrally located, walking distance to everything, comfortable and stylish. There is a lovely outdoor balcony where the hosts set up breakfast - including oatmeal, Irish brown bread, yogurt and fruit and just about anything else you could ask for - which made for excellent people-watching. The bedroom is comfortable with space for working with the bathroom right across the hall. The space is light and Kevin offered numerous suggestions on where to eat and walk. All in all, a great choice for your trip to Dublin!
Richard and Kevin are super nice hosts. The apartment is very comfortable, there's everything you need and you can really feel there like at home. I highly recommend  it! :)

Richard and Kevin were the kindest hosts! We woke up to an amazing breakfast spread and they gave us some good tips on things to do. Great location for exploring Dublin on foot. These two kicked of our Ireland trip in the best way!

Richard and Kevin were very friendly and communicated well. They provided local tips for bars in the area that had live music that wouldn't be too touristy. They set up a wonderful breakfast spread in the morning as well. We would highly recommend staying with them if you are visiting Dublin.

Stayed at Richard and Kevins for two days before I started on a 12 day adventure tour around Ireland. As a tourist, I appreciated the location as it was a convenient walk to most of the attractions in Dublin. They set out a lovely breakfast in the morning which you get to enjoy on the balcony. I am glad that I chose this place and would recommend it for others.
Wonderful stay! Richard was so hospitable and a pleasure to stay with. Highly recommend!

Richard and Kevin are absolutely wonderful hosts. Good fun,  very caring, quiet  and made me feel so at home.  Loved my room, the lighting relaxed me straight away.  The plants were so gorgeous, very homely. That picture, I so wanted to take it home too. Fab visit during a busy work trip. I'll be back boys!
Excellent location, friendly hosts, lovely breakfast.

No words to describe how amazing this place is and how good I've felt with they're outstanding hospitality. Richard and Kevin made me feel really comfortable since the first moment. The room + bathroom have everything you need,  both spotlessly clean and the comfy bed is absolutely the best part. I was really surprised on how quiet the room is and how easy it is to relax in there. Kudos for the makeup towel, such a smart touch, something that all places should have and think about!
Thank you for this amazing stay, would definitely recommend it to all guests and hope to come back one day!
Great apartment in a beautiful location. Place was really clean and hosts really friendly
Located in the center, Richard's home really gives you the feeling to be welcome in a cosy environment. He is very caring and the house is comfortable and clean. Lovely!
Great space in the city center to get yourself acquainted with Dublin! Richard is a great host, can't beat it!

This is a great base to explore Dublin as the location is very central yet it's located outside of the busy streets, so it's very quiet. The flat is modern and the breakfast was a great way to start the day.

Richard and Kevin were amazing hosts and made our stay in Dublin a great experience. They went above and beyond our expectations after we decided to stay with them because of the reviews. I will be forever grateful of every breakfast they cooked for us and every local trip they gave us.
Great place!  Very homey & excellent location! Clean with all the amenities you could think of. Comfy beds & actually has warm shower water lol!
Great location, spacious house, friendly host! What else would you wish for? +++
Cathys place is wonderful. It had everything we needed and was a nice warm place to come home to for our stay in Dublin. Thank you so much for letting us stay with you Cathy.

Cathy was very responsive and the home is in a great location. The issue was cleanliness. The fridge had spoiled milk and food, the dishwasher had dishes in it and the rubbish bag under sink was full. Bathrooms had rubbish and the sink cups were dirty with some mold, soap dispenser in one bathroom was broken. I mentioned the cleanliness to the owner as I wasnt sure if it was left from a previous guest or not, the response was that she lived there. It was a gated area which was good and cute courtyard.

Cathys place is in an excellent, secure location in Dublin, within walking distance great pubs, parks and local attractions. My son and I stayed there a few days and found the space to be everything we needed. Cathy communicated well and was a pleasure to deal with.

If you arent already aware, this house is the owners full time home so as such her personal items are in the house. Whilst at first this did feel slightly like I was an intruder in her home, the house and garden really is beautiful and once I got past my initial feeling I absolutely loved it. Beds are super comfy, and the house is furnished beautifully. 
Check in and out was really easy, even though we werent arriving until very late at night. Cathy was really helpful and answered all messages immediately. 
So if you are looking for something a little different to your standard hotel or sparse Airbnb, I would thoroughly recommend Cathys place. 
Note: Oil Can Harrys just round the corner has live music at weekends and is a great bar.

This is a beautiful house in a very quiet area. It is well located, short 15 minute walks to most of the popular tourist destinations we visited. My son and I loved going for a 5 mile run along the grand canal just a couple blocks away. Giustina's sister was very helpful meeting us on arrival and helping us get situated in the house. We received lots of helpful tips for stores close by and restaurants to eat at. We had everything we had hoped for and much more during our stay. Thank you for hosting us!

This place is amazing if you want to get away from hotels and live in a beautiful well cared for home. We felt like we were at home with comfortable beds and great living spaces. I would book again without question!
I booked Veronas house for a friend and she went above and beyond what was needed . What an incredible lady . ‚ù§Ô∏è

Verona is a nice lady, really nice, she always says are you good? Nice queen's bed, good evironment, neat, Verona is caring, and always wants to make you comfortable and happy. Almost forgot, she gave me her books signed by herself..
Eine nette kleine Unterkunft mit einem guten Fruehstueck. Das Bett ist etwas kurz (ca. 175 cm) aber wir haben gut geschlafen.
Verona's place is very cosy. Verona is very kind and will help you with places who you wanted to visit. Her place is close by the bus station and the local supermarket.
Very nice host
very hospitable and clean!
Sabrina was a great host. Very responsive to messages and made us feel welcome. The apartment location is excellent and it is very well presented. Would highly recommend.

Sabrina was great and really quick to respond to messages. 
The apartment is located centrally to local shops and pubs so a great spot! Would definitely come back and say again!
The apartment was really sweet and in an amazing location. I would definitely go back. Sabrina is super helpful and really nice.

The location is really amazing close to everything very central. The sofa is a bed sofa and it is very confortable as well as the bed. We had great communication with Sabrina and we enjoyed the place. Would definitely recommend it
Great location. Sabrina was a lovely host. Would definitely stay again
Great location and nice place.  It was quiet and we had a great sleep!  We will definitely stay again.
The best location for the price. Cant beat it

Excellent location and great apartment .
Sabrina makes it all very easy and was utterly helpful during my stay.
Appartamento carino, posizione molto buona.

Sabrina is a wonderful host. She is very responsive and clear in her communications. She was very hospitable and we really enjoyed staying in the apartment. It was extremely convenient and in the center of the city. We loved staying there and would highly recommend it to others!
Great location, easy check in and communication. Comfortable and as in the pictures
Sabrina's place is a very short walk away from Temple Bar and is located in a quiet neighborhood. Cozy, comfortable space with one bedroom and a pull out bed in the living room.
PERFECT location!!! A five minute walk to temple bar area and all major  attractions. The place is very big and we felt right at home. Sabrina was extremely helpful and responsive.
Deffinitley stay again! Perfect location and great place to stay!

The place of Sabrina is very nice and located in the city center. The space is totaly enough for 4 adults and also 1 infant (there  is also a travel cot for the baby). The apartment is clean. Sabrina is very nice. We totally recommend this place.
Cute place! Great location. A little loud at night but thats the price you pay to be so central to downtown. Sabrina was very communicative and friendly. I recommend this place!
Perfect location, excellent apartment, and great host!

Amazing hospitality and location! This apartment was central to almost everything! Sabrina went above and beyond to help my friends and I when we required extra assistance due to a travel error on our part! Incredible experience :)

We loved Sabrina's place in Dublin! She was extremely helpful and kind during check-in and throughout our communication. The place is lovely, clean, and stylish. The location was perfect! Sabrina had left breakfast food for us in the fridge, which was so nice and thoughtful! We also recommend the LemonJelly Cafe which was right around the corner. Very close walk to Jervis shopping center and Temple Bar. We were sad to leave!
Awesome place! Close to everywhere we wanted to go.
Great stay.  Super central and convenient.  Sabrina is a great host, very responsive.
Sabrinas place was perfect for our short stay. Easy to get in and out and  so clean! Nice and clean bathroom and beds. So close to everything! Great restaurant recommendations.
Excellent location just north of the Liffey.
Great place near all the attractions in Dublin.

Sabrinas place definitely exceeded expectations! I wasnt sure what to expect really, but the location was fantastic! Very close to many major attractions but not right in the middle of all the noise. The only downside was that sometimes the seagulls can get a bit noisy outside the window, so if you plan to sleep in and are a light sleeper you may want to bring some earplugs. Great apartment!

We loved Sabrina's apartment . It was the perfect location for our trip to Dublin . So close to everything and just a quick walk from airport bus to the apartment . The apartment had everything we needed for our stay . 
Tania
Nice, well kept apartment in a great location, great value for money compared to similarly located places
Superb location and Superhost !!

Great place to stay for the weekend. Fabulous location that is close to Jervis shopping centre. Checking in was a breeze and Sabrina was very helpful in making sure we got to the apartment without confusion.
Great location and Sabrina made check in easy

Sabrinas apartment was a perfect location from which to explore Dublin city center. It was absolutely sparkling clean, very comfortable, and well-equipped. Sabrina was very responsive throughout. All the main attractions I wanted to see were within 15 minutes walk, and many were within just 5 minutes or so. There are loads of coffee shops and restaurants just nearby. The one drawback is that the immediate neighborhood is not particularly attractive, but as a woman traveling alone, I did feel safe nonetheless. For the convenient location, value, and cleanliness, this is a great option in central Dublin.
Really enjoyed our stay at Sabrinas place, the location is perfect and easy to access everything in the city centre. The place was very clean and spacious. Would recommend.

Great location, very clean and secure and the host gave us clear and accurate information.

Sabrina made check-in very easy. Everything you want when using this service. 

A decent kitchen with a cook top and oven. And a small fridge for essentials (but why cook - too many good places to eat very close by). 

Everything you need for a comfortable stay is provided. The weather was warm and a bit humid, but the fan provided kept the flat cool.

The lift was out of order our last day, but the stairs are easily accessed and not difficult to manage. 

Overall a very pleasant experience.
Super location: close to lots of restaurants and shopping and nightlife, but not so close that the bar crowds are an inconvenience. Clean, comfortable, functional city apartment.

The apartment is exactly as shown on the pictures. Excellent location, few minutes walking away from the Temple Bar and all the main attractions. Lots of restaurants and markets near by. The building has a elevator, which is very good for those with lot of luggages or people with difficulty with stairs, like our case. The apartment is cozy and very comfortable, including the sofa-bed on the living room. Sabrina was always available. I would definitely stay here again on a next visit to Dublin and recommend Sabrina¬¥s apartment.
Good location

Very comfortable and clean apartment. Very well equiped, in a quiet street in the center of Dublin. Everything can be reached by foot in less than 10 minutes. Sabrina, the host, is very kind and answer on phone immediately. I  fully recommend !
We had a lovely stay here! Location is fantastic and host went above and beyond communicating with us regarding our stay!

The apartment not clean 
The apartment not enough for 3 person 
Bad smell in the apartment
Great location for going all over the city. Everything is in walking distance. Place was super clean and perfect for our few nights we were there!

Great location; on the map I was worried about street noise but the apartment is in the center of the building away from the street.  We slept great!  So close to so many parts of downtown Dublin.  Very happy with our choice to stay at Sabrina's place!
Lovely stay in an excellent location
Excellent location is by far the best part of the apartment

This place is convenient, within walking distance to major attractions and public transport to/from airport and ferry. While in a back alley, it has the benefit of being relatively quiet. The host provides a decent list of supplies., especially food related. Overall, we are happy with our stay.

Sabrinas apartment was great, as shown in pictures, and in a perfect location. It was clean and check-in instructions were clear and simple. However, equipment was basic, and the double bed was not very big, enough for two medium sized people. 
Would definately recommend it for a short stay in Dublin.
Alloggio vicinissimo al centro.. posizione stupenda
Great Apartment in excelente Location! Recommended
Brilliant location great shower. A little hard to find but really good!
Great central place to stay!

Sabrina's apartment was sparkling clean and in the best location of Dublin. Temple Bar is at a walking distance and all other major attractions. Dublin stay was the best and the kitchen and bedroom were adequately stocked. Our baby boy also thoroughly enjoyed the place. Very child friendly.  Definitely recommend this place
Great apartment. Excellent communication!
This place is great. Would stay here again. In the heart of everything.

Sabrina's place was in a wonderful location right down the street from temple bar and the heart of Dublin. If you are lucky enough to book this home you will have a great time! We did have an issue getting the hot water heater started up, but Sabrina responded so quick and resolved our issue. 10/10 place and a 10/10 experience.

Apartment location is amazing! Its close to many tourist places. Sabrina provides thorough instructions on how to reach her place either via public transportation or car. Theres a parking garage right across the street from the apartment. Her apartment is also very stylish, I could imagine just living there. The sofa bed is a little worn but if youre staying for only 1-2 nights its not a problem at all.
Awesome location near many bars and sights.
Excellent location, apartment was clean and had all we needed.
Everything was as described and Sabrina was very communicative and easy to deal with.
Great spot located right downtown. Easy walking to all the sights, shopping, and restaurants!
This is a great place to stay if you want to be in the heart of the city.  There isnt a view but if getting into the city is what you're looking for this will do it.

Perfect little apartment in the absolute best location possible when staying in Dublin. A quick 3 min walk to the city center let us make the most of our short stay. Sabrina was more than accommodating and her apartment was so clean and comfortable!
Slept really well. Comfy bed and super quiet.
Great location, close to a lot of pubs/ food places. Easy check in and perfect for what I needed

Sabrinas place was incredibly close to all the attractions and night life.
The space was clean and cozy.
Wish were able to stay longer but if we are in Dublin again we will definitely be sending Sabrina a message!

Thanks for the stay!

~Channate & Taylor
Perfect location close to Temple Bar, quick responses and lots of information provided for finding the apartment and checking in, will definitely stay here again

Unfortunately Sabrinas place did not work well for us.  We didnt have hot water 2 out of the 4 days we were their.  We would leave early and come back late and their must be some type of timer that turns off the water heater.  Despite following the instructions it never worked for us.  In addition the place needs a good thorough clean, it was very dusty.  Many of the amenities were rusted or had holes in them, kitchen items were dirty.  The walls are very thin, so if the neighbors are loud it can be disruptive.  The location is definitely the best thing about the apartment.  Checkin was also very easy.  If you want the best location and the other stuff doesnt bother you then it might work for you, for us it didnt.

I've stayed for 3 months at Yvonne's place and I can tell you that you will be perfectly received ! The room is pretty small but you have access to the rest of the house at any time and can use all the facilities. Yvonne is super friendly, she will often invite you to some trips (and even offer you some of her food or pastries) and Oscair is a super cute and well behaved doggo. I felt completely free and at home at Yvonne's, don't hesitate !

Yvonne is really kind and caring person. Rio (my dog) and I had a lovely time staying with  Yvonne and Oscar (Yvonne's dog). It felt as if I am living at my own home, she has helped me with with transportation, grocery shopping,local tip and looking after my dog. I will highly recommend her place and Yovnne as a host.

I can't rate Yvonne highly enough. I had a wonderful time staying with her, and she was the perfect host, instantly making me feel at home, and going out of her way to help me settle in. The area is safe and quiet and well-connected to town, and Yvonne was really helpful in explaining the various bus stops and routes. A really perfect introduction to Dublin, and I hope we stay in touch!
Yvonne is a nice person, she is ready to help if you need that.

Our stay with Tony & Cathy was absolutely wonderful. They are such wonderful people and we enjoyed visiting with them so much. Tonys humor always had us laughing and they were both full of great, local tips and places to visit. Some of our favorite parts of the trip were from their suggestions!
Their home is lovely and a perfect location with a quick 10 minute walk to the train and local transport or easy parking if you have a car also. Breakfast was a quick perfect start for the day and appreciated a lot! The space was very comfortable, cozy and clean, and gave the true Ireland feel. Id recommend it to anyone and cant wait to return! Cheers!

Tony and Cathy were warm and welcomingîreally pleasant to talk to. Both were happy to answer my questions and offer great tips on activities to do. The breakfast Tony serves is top notch. The location is a nice mix of easy access to Dublin (via the Dart) and easy beach accessîroom was also clean and comfortable.

My stay at Anthony's place was quite short but very lovely. He kindly offered me a lift from the train station when I arrived and provided some great tips on local restaurants and sights. The location is so nice - only a 10-15 minute walk to the beautiful Killiney Beach and rail station and my room was very clean and well stocked with any necessities I could want. He even provided a USB port/phone charger, which was helpful as mine had broken the night before my arrival. My stay was far too short this time but I definitely recommend this sweet little spot and hope to come back someday!

Tony was a fabulous host. Great fun and very witty! We enjoyed all the jokes. He and Cathy were so welcoming and made us feel very comfortable. Really appreciated the added tasty bites over Easter too! Tony is a mine of information for points of interest locally and further afield. Barney the dog was also great and a wonderful singer! We would have absolutely no hesitation in recommending this place to stay.

Absolutely fantastic hosts and a great location to explore Dublin from. Plenty of street space to park -if youre driving, and walking distance to the Dart -if using train. Their house is a hidden gem in Dublin; a small cottage feel, with all the modern amenities you want. Dont hesitate to get advice on where to go, as they know the city in-and-out. 

This Airbnb offers the amenities, safety and space of much more expensive options, at an affordable price. Also, if you love dogs, their dog, Barney, is calm and super friendly!

Really beautiful house in a really beautiful location. 
Anthony is a generous host with great hospitality. He prepares breakfast with his self-baked bread - Awesome! He has alotta good tips and advices and we had really deep talkings, as well. His wife was rare cause of her work shifts, his daughter had great advises, as well. 
Trainstation is nearby, also other shops and take-aways. Really quiet place and really good location to start to Wicklow National Park. You are not in the Center of Dublin but in a good place to start over to all the good places in and around the city. Car to city center: 25-30min, train (DART) 35min+footwalk (10-15). Really highly recommended accomodation!!

This delightful gem south of Dublin's city center is a hidden gem. The highlight of our trip was our host, Tony, who availed us with fun stories and quick wit, delicious breakfast (including his homemade peanut butter), and recommendations for local attractions (including Joyce's tower and Killiney Hill Park). We also loved spending time with Barney, Tony's sweet cocker spaniel.

We stayed at Anthonys and Cathys place on our short stay in Ireland. Anthonys communication was great in the lead up to booking the room and he even came to collect us from the coach drop off in Killiney as we arrived late evening. The room was ideal for our purposes and he even made up a camp bed for my teenage daughter who I was travelling with. The shared bathroom (with the other room occupants) was lovely and clean and had everything needed. Anthony and Cathys breakfast was a nice touch, yogurts, coffee , juices and homemade bread was gorgeous in the mornings. 

We were in Ireland for a concert in Malahide (1 hour away by train) but Killiney was an ideal base, just outside Dublin on the coast in a beautiful neighbourhood with good transport links  to everywhere. Killiney itself is definitely worth a walk around, especially up to the top of the hill passing a few local celebrity homes along the way. Also Dalkey the next Village over is also worth a visit. 

Myself and teenage daughter had a lovely stay at this AirBNB and would recommend Anthony and his wife Cathys hospitality to anyone.

The hosts really make you feel at home! Tony and his family will help you with everything you need, for example tips for daytrips or very good restaurants. Moreover we enjoyed the selfmade bread every morning and the nice converations. We will definitely come again!
Anthony is a very pleasant host, friendly and interesting. The accommodation is absolutely lovely and the house has real character. Wifi and communication with host both excellent!

My friend and I stayed here for a weekend vacation to Dublin, and it was an absolutely amazing experience! Anthony was very accommodating and gave great instructions on how to get to Killiney. The scenery in the area is incredible and there's so much within walking distance! The train ride to Dublin city center is only about 30-45 minutes, and a Leap card can get you unlimited rides on the train and buses. Anthony also gave fantastic tips about what to do in the area and in the city, and we loved chatting with him over breakfast! Overall, we loved our experience and would love to go back again!
Five stars plus, lovely place and excelent Hosts, everything it¬¥s perfect!! Thanks!!

Great hosts with plenty of entertaining chat and local information.

A perfect base for us.

Anthony and Cathy are lovely hosts. Room had lovely touches and considerations (e.g., Q-tips, make-up remover pads, lint remover and adaptable charger/USB plug). Very clean, great mattress, and even greater breakfast. Cathy and Anthony always offered a lift to the train to shorten my travel time into Dublin. I will miss cute and cuddly Barney the family dog.
Tonys house felt like our temporary home. We felt welcomed and taken care of. Tonys delicious breakfast rekindled my love of sofa bread. We are already looking forward to our return trip. Thank you!
A clean and welcoming environment. Anton goes over and above what is required. He was helpful and kind the entire time. Accomodating and professional

Anton was a really great host, who went out of his way to make sure everything was comfortable. He was so considerate about our really late check in (midnight). He kept the fridge stocked and the place was exceptionally clean. He is also friendly and helpful with advice about what to see and how to get there. The place is really good value and I would stay here again when back in Dublin. Thanks Anton!
Extremely tidy place, Anton is a very thoughtful and a great host

Anton and Kristof were such awesome hosts. They helped us with local tips, offered complementary food and were great companions when we came home from a day of exploring Dublin. We will recommend Anton's air b and b to anyone traveling to Dublin Ireland! Thanks again Anton and co

Brother and I stayed over June 2019. Anton and his housemate Christof were both very friendly and full of tips and information about the locale. Very laid back and relaxed. Nice flat in central neighborhood in the north of the city. 15min walk to O'Connell st.
It's been a great stay at Anton & Christoph's. They have been very helpful and forthcoming in all terms.

The best option is to call Anton just before you would enter in the lodgement for the first time. The entrance is a common entrance, several private lodgements had the same entrance and could be a little bit confusing for the very first time, that is all.
Very cozy and spacious house with very easy access to the city center. We had a great stay and would recommend a stay at Laura's to anyone, especially cat lovers! Best regards, Ken

Linda makes you feel completely at home, she is very nice.
Her home is very comfortable and cosy. Highly recommended! =)
Linda is a lovely woman. Very welcoming and friendly during my stay. The bedroom was warm, comfortable and lovely and clean. Would recommend this to anybody and will definitely stay again.
Linda was very welcoming and the bed was very very comfortable! Walking distance to the train and the shops.

Linda & her daughter were great hosts with a beautiful place. They have a beautiful kitten too. I would say allow enough time for check in as there are a few things to learn (I had to rush off to a family dinner & this wasn't ideal though Linda was very accomodating). I'd definitely stay again.

Linda was a great host. I enjoyed my conversations with her, and she made me feel very welcome in her beautiful home. Lindas residence  is conveniently located within walking distance to the train station that takes you into Dublin (5-10 min walk). The train itself is about a 25 minute ride into Dublin city center. I recommend her place if youre a solo traveler interested in exploring the sights and sounds of Dublin, and even Ireland (through tour buses), but would like to put your head down at night a little further away from the hussle and bustle of city life.
Great and reasonable priced!
Linda was very friendly, and did her best to make sure my stay didn't encounter any problems.
Linda  was very welcoming A lovely home in a safe neighbourhood Only 10 minutes walk to Luas.
Linda was welcoming and informative on how to avoid any problems during my stay.
The place is on the back side of the second building if anyone gets a little lost. A warm home with a furry friend. The patio is a place to be in the morning. Wonderful space!

There aren't enough stars on the rating system!
The only thing better than the fantastic home is the wonderful host Linda and her daughter Megan.
Please do not book as I want to return
A nice host and a clean house!
Lindas place is very good and shes so friendly and does everything to help. Its a quiet and clean house and I loved the cat too :)

Linda is a very lovely and friendly host. I arrived very late but she waited for me. Thanks again for that. :) 
She told me how get easy to city center and always answered my questions. With tram you reach city in 35 min. They neighbourhod is very silent and very nice with some shops. The room was clean and comfortable. Had a good stay here.
Linda is a wonderful welcoming host. Super helpful and friendly. Nice and comfortable stay,
Everything was perfect
The host canceled this reservation 43 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 44 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Unique little section of Dublin with a friendly neighborhood feel.  Super clean accommodations. They have an automatic taxi  call in the breakfast area which summoned our taxi within minutes.
Wonderful location, walked into town, and had a lovely visit.
The host canceled this reservation 53 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
This is in a great location, just a short walk to Camden Street.  The B&B was very comfortable and great hosts.  The breakfast was good too
Great room, comfortable bed, lovely hot shower and tasty breakfast. Certainly good value.
Very good value in a great location. Very good communication and ea easy check in . Would recommend/stay again
Would highly recommend for a weekend break to Dublin. Great location, accessible by bus direct from the airport and near the lovely canal. We really enjoyed our time!
Nice place to stay! Unfortunately left too early in the morning to enjoy breakfast. Close to bus stop and airlink stop. Clean and friendly!

We were very happy with our stay. The B&B is in walking distance from the city center (around 20 minutes) and the bus 16 goes directly from the airport to the accommodation (takes 45 minutes till 1h). Because of a flight delay we had to check in really late and it wasn't a problem at all, also the host is answering any questions or requests within a day. The breakfast is great too :-)
Wonder hosts and wonderful accommodations!
We had a wonderful time in Dublin. The location is close to the center and the hosts are very very friendly.

We spent some wonderful days in this airbnb. Conj has been a perfect host. The breakfast, accompanied by some warm good-morning-words, gave us the power and the good mood for our daily Dublin adventure. Located in a quiet quarter of Dublin but within reach of the busier parts of the city it was a perfect basis to experience Dublin walking or by bus. Highly recommended!

We loved our stay here in Dublin.  We were greeted the first day and shown to our room.  Conj reviewed the room with us, gave us our keys, and saw us on our way to site seeing.  Our accommodations were perfect!  We had a room to accommodate 3 of us with our own bathroom, very comfortable beds.  It was clean, the perfect location, and we really enjoyed our breakfast each morning.  Very healthy meal of breakfast cereals, fruit, ham, jam, cheese, toast and bread.  We had lovely conversations with our host who recommended sites of interest.  We would love to return and would definitely stay here again.  Thank  you for a lovely place to stay!!!
Great space for the price and location.  Highly recommend.

Good clean place in a nice quiet area that is close to things.  We were also able to park a car which was important.  Nice continental breakfast with Cathrine as a wonderful host! We got a small room but had everything we needed.
Great value for money. Very kind.
The host canceled this reservation 10 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Very good stay. The place is clean and the breakfast has all what you need.
The location is perfect, 20 mn walking from the city center.

We had a room in the main building (next to the building with breakfast). The room was beautiful! Very spacious for 3 people with lots of natural light. The bathroom was also larger than other places we stayed in Ireland, had a skylight, and the toilet flushed well. Decent water pressure with enough hot water for 3 back to back showers. The room had plenty of towels, a hair dryer, adapter, and a tea kettle with coffee and tea packets (plus milk and sugars). There were also maps of Dublin, the bus schedule, and other information packets available downstairs. They were great at accommodating late check ins and let us drop our bags off early. The hosts were very nice! Breakfast included toast, cheddar, deli ham, mini babybel cheese, and soda bread. There was also tea/coffee and an assortment of cereals and jams. We were very happy with our stay!
Comfortable place that is very close to the city. Great place for exploring the city. Overall it was a great little place

This was the perfect place to stay! Located right off bus 16 from the airport (it takes about an hour to bus-in due to all the stops), this was an easy location to find. The neighborhood felt safe. 

The room is just the right size for what we needed. Breakfast was delicious (babybel cheese!) and Conj was a pleasure to chat with. 

We were about 15 min walk from City Centre. We enjoyed Grafton Street and found delicious food in Dublin.

Overall a really good stay. Good value room in a really good location, you can take the 16 bus from airport to door and Temple bar area is 30 minute walk or 10-15 by bus.  The area also feels very safe. Breakfast kept us going and the lady serving was very friendly. Only drawbacks are you can't use appliances like straighteners or tongs but they do provide a good hairdryer. Ensuite is good but no soundproofing, wasn't much of a problem unless of you want to use the toilet in the middle of the night while others sleep :)  very easy check in and check out process and quick comms (one  note is the listing looks like it switched times so check out is 11am not 12pm and vice versa for check in which does make more sense and is till generous compred to other places)

Was a lovely stay. The host took care of us very well and was very friendly the whole time. Offered us an earlier breakfast than usual when she found out our departure was earlier than the normal breakfast time. I would definitely stay here again!

Conj was very helpful and check in was simple. The place was clean and bathroom amenities like shampoo and body wash were provided. Along with breakfast down the hall there was also coffee and tea provided inside our room. I would stay there if I visit again!
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
