I had an excellent stay here over two nights. As a weary traveler being on the road for three months this was the ideal situation to rest in a peaceful environment. Everything was as pictured, clean, cozy and private, with extra nice touches of breakfast foods (including nice homemade scones). The bed was very comfortable and the room very quiet. Good shower with hot water. I had the best two nights sleep Ive had in months. The home is in a very quiet and safe neighborhood with birdsong and beautiful views of trees from both the bedroom and sitting rooms. I enjoyed a leisurely 15 minute walk along the coastal path to Malahide village where I had a nice healthy lunch at D/F cafe and was able to visit a post office and SuperValu market. A few minutes walking past the village is Malahide castle with an Avoca Shop where you can have a lovely meal and do some shopping. A 3 minute walk away from the house is the bus stop with a 3 Euro direct line to Dublin Airport. Albert was communicative, gracious and friendly. I would have loved to stay longer and would definitely return.

We could not have asked for a nicer stay in Malahide! Its such a lovely coastal village with lots of shops and restaurants, and Alberts place is the perfect home baseù for coming and going. Private and quiet, overlooking a pretty park and steps to the beach, easy train ride into Dublin... we felt so comfortable there and had an absolutely delightful stay. Albert was so hospitable and helpful with recommendations, and we especially appreciated the lovely breakfast he set every morning in the little sitting lounge next to our room. We enjoyed our time in Malahide and at Alberts place so much... we highly recommend both and hope to return someday!
Great spot and a great host
Beautiful accommodation that is sparkling clean with a lovely, kind, and helpful host. Would not hesitate to come and stay again!

Incredible place, mainly because of the location and host. Malahide is beautiful and this is only about 100 yards from the Ireland coast. Albert count be friendlier. Even let me borrow a power adapter and answered my question on how to make a phone call in Ireland. Highly recommend
Great location near the water in a lovely town. Albert was very inviting and helpful. We wish we could have stayed here longer
Albert's place was fantastic, we would highly recommend. Comfy bed, lots of space and very clean. We wish we could have stayed longer!
Homely very clean and great facilities.Easy walking distance to Malahide.

Alberts place is extremely comfortable, pristine and so convenient to the beach and Malahide Village. Albert is a gracious and efficient host. This is accommodation and host we would highly recommend- Airbnb at its best!
A private space near the beach with great amenities. Recommended
Lovely place to stay! Very close to the coast with about a 30 minute walk to the castle and just over 20 minute walk to Malahide which has cute pubs/restaurants and shops.

Albert's place was perfect for our last night in Ireland.  It is clean, comfortable, private, and located in a lovely beach town close to the airport.   Albert is a great host. offering excellent communication and a warm welcome.

Albert has been a great host: very kind and helpful in giving us suggestion on what to do in Malahide and nearby. The room is very nice and clean. We had a great experience. Definitely recommend it to anyone!
A nice stay a short walk from town. Albert was a great host and accommodating with check in and check out times.
Buen alojamiento a 15 minutos a pie de malahide

Alberts place was exactly as described and we could not ask for a more friendly welcome. It was clean and comfortable. His local knowledge and advice on things to do was spot on. Would not hesitate to book again or recommended to anyone.

Perfect accommodation, friendly hosters! It is one of the best accommodations we had on our trip! Really quiet and comfortable room. 
Respect to Albert and his wife! We recommend staying here.

We had a really nice time at Alberts house. He was extraordinary friendly and we had everything we needed. He stayed awake for a late check in and was there to answer all of our questions. The room is warm, cosy and on the upper floor so there is a lot of privacy for the visitors. We hope to come back and stay with Albert again next time we fly to Ireland

A lovely private sector of the house. well located. private parking and a nice 10 minute walk to the village along the lake. Albert greeted us  and gave helpful tips for dinner.  And what was most important to us was the fact that Malahide is 20 minutes from the airport.
Great!
We truly enjoyed staying here. Albert is a great and helpful host! The location is great (close to the beach) and only a 10-15 min walk to malahide center. We definetly recommend it!
Fantastic host, nice place, lovely location, all perfect. Really adviced!!

We stayed in Albert's place the night before we flew out of Dublin's airport.  We drove our hire car to the airport in the early morning very quickly, so his place was very convenient for our needs.  We didn't get to see much of Malahide but what we did see looked very nice. Albert's accommodation was great with bedroom , sitting/breakfast room and bathroom all on your own private floor.  Albert himself was very friendly and helpful
 You could walk to the beach very easily from his house. We would recommend Albert's place for sure

We had a wonderful stay at Alberts house and can highly recommend his property. It was such a great location for getting to the airport and such a pretty place to spend our last night in Ireland. Malahide and nearby Howth are beautiful places to visit and Alberts house is so close to walking paths to the beach and Malahide village.
Best place to stay in all of Dublin! Do not hesitate to book. Just phenomenal place to stay!

A clean room with seperate bathroom and small breakfast room where a light breakfast and hot drink facility all in a self contained floor. Ideal for working guests and those who want an uninterrupted stay.
Albert was so kind, an amazing host. His home is beautiful. I would highly recommend staying here. Hope to visit Malahide again soon.
Albert's place was quaint and welcoming. There were freshly made scones and tea awaiting us in the tea room. It is right near the water where we took some great pictures. He is accommodating
Very good service

Albert is so gentlemanly! He's such a great host, he has so much local insights to share (we followed his suggestions closely and never regretted!) His house is lovely, he also has breakfast and drinks all nice and set up everyday. We enjoyed ourselves so much :)
Albert has a nice clean room in a quiet neighborhood. You can walk into town or the beach. It is close the airport and easy to get into Dublin via DART or bus.

Alberts place was a great spot to stay if you want to tour around Malahide. It is only a 10 minute walk from the town center. He was a lovely host, and took great care in making sure our stay was a memorable one. He was very willing to share his knowledge of the town and his recommendations on what to check out were very informative. Definitely a great place to stay!

We thought Albert's place was amazing! 
*top floor to yourself *everything is very clean  
*yummy food for us 
*offered to drive us to town when rainy and very windy
*very quick responses
Absolutely recommend Albert's place, it's fantastic!
Nice place (really quiet, close to the sea) with a warm welcome and service from Albert
Excellent location and easily located. Very clean and private.

Luxurious. Superb. A true gem. Albert is a gracious, sincere, helpful, generous host. The whole second floor to myself. Tea, scones, cereal, fruit, milk, juice -- all provided. Short walk along the coast, above the beach area, to the village and castle. Outstanding.

Wonderful accommodation on the outskirts of Dublin, close to the lovely town and airport.  Everything in the accommodation was lovely, well presented, extremely clean and with lots of space and privacy.  Highly recommended.
Great location, thoughtful touches and very helpful. Highly recommend!
We stayed with Albert and we were very pleased. He made us, feel very welcome and home from home. Very clean and breakfast was really good.Thank you Albert.

Tony was a very thoughtful host. He met us when we arrived to the house and bought us breakfast food and a few groceries. My family has spent many nights in Airbnb's around Dublin and Tony's house was exceptionally large, comfortable and hospitable. I would highly recommend.
I had a lovely stay here, everything was thought about the milk in the fridge was a very nice touch. Location is very convenient to city, area is quiet and offers a good sleep. Tony is super
Everything was great. Tony was so helpful.
Very welcoming  and friendly place. Very convenient to go down town. Good value. Feel at home !
Easy check in with great instructions. Tony was very attentive and answered our questions promptly! Quiet location with easy access to the DART.

Very Nice house,  Great and Nice street
Near shop and station
Everything we nead Tony help us
Great location and clean space. Communication could improve. Had to call to confirm booking and how to check-in. Otherwise, good experience.

Great location and perfect to get around the sights and on top of the Temple Bar area.  We were a party of four and the space was more than adequate. 

Enjoyable stay and Dumitras was kind enough to let us park our car in the free parking space after we had checked out.
great location but took forever to get a hold of host day of check in.
Great location. Good size of apartment and clean. Good fast communication with host. Made things very easy. Happy with stay, thank you.

The apartment is in a very good location. Near to Temple Bar and Trinity College yet in a quiet side street which feels quite safe. Just a short stroll to many restaurants. Having a secure parking lot within the building is big plus for those who are driving.  The apartment itself is clean and functional. The beds in the room are very comfortable but the sofa bed had a bit of nicotine smell. Everything in the kitchen works so we were able to do our laundry and make our own breakfast. 
We had a bit of issue at check-in when we couldn't open the lock box holding the apartment keys but Dumitras was great and came down immediately to help us retrieve the keys. The hot water worked fine throughout our 2-day stay until the morning of our check-out when for some reason, there was no hot water for the shower. As we were checking out that morning, we did not want to bother Dumitras again but I am sure he would have fixed it speedily if we had requested. Overall, a good value and comfortable stay in the city centre.
This apartment is in a great location for staying in Dublin. A few minutes walk to Temple Bar, and just over the bridge to the shopping area.

Very nice home with all the amenities you could need.  Sean and Jason put together a great guidebook for their home and the local community. There are great tips on places to eat, grocery stores,  and transportation.  They made our stay so easy!

Lovely space, exactly as described. The underfloor heating makes it very cosy and comfortable and Sean and Jason were very helpful and timely in their correspondence with us. Would definitely recommend.

Sean's place is great. Loved the heated floors throughout, kitchen was really well equipped, bed comfy and everything was spotless. Sean gave great instructions for the bus which was super easy and quick to get everywhere. There are a few excellent restaurants within walking distance. We would definitely recommend The Pigeon House. Overall it was a fab trip and we'd love to do it all over again!
Clean well supplied place. Close walking distance to bus stop to go downtown.
Very nice place for a family, too. You got a whole house in a quit location.

Relaxing stylish space with all the comforts of home. Location is great base for trips to the City Center or to points North of the City -  Onsite parking  near light rail (10-15m - DART Killester Station) and near bus lines direct to the City Center.

We very much enjoyed our stay in Dublin. We came here for business, came as a family of four with a baby. All went extremely well. The accommodation was wonderful! It was exactly where we needed to be. The place was stylish, clean and very comfortable! Pauline was very nice indeed. We will be coming back for sure!!!!
I truly enjoyed my stay here. Pauline went above and beyond to make my stay as painless and comfortable as possible. Thank you for sharing your home with me, Pauline!

Our short stay at Pauline's was too short!  So comfortable and home-y, clean and attractive!!
We particularly enjoyed living in this residential area with normal daily life going on all around us and would definitely stay here again, as it is also very handy to downtown Dublin.  Thanks, Pauline, for this lovely home!

Pauline was a great host. She answered any queries I had regarding location or public transport right away. Very detailed and helpful check in details provided. Check in was also flexible which suited my needs. Great amenities provided, we didnt need anything extra...there was even a wee pint of milk in the fridge. The house was very clean and cosy. Public transport is only a few minutes walk away and the location is perfect for exploring Dublin City and the surrounding area.

This place was wonderful landing spot for this jet-lagged traveler and her elderly mom. Pauline couldnt have been nicer or more accommodating. We loved the bus access and the experience of being in a real neighborhood - not a tourist area. Thanks so much for all, Pauline!

Great place to stay - so quiet at night, private parking on site, and very handy for access into town (by bus). The house is bright, spotless, exceptionally well set up for self-catering, and there's a really generous attention to detail in the home comforts available to the visitor.

Pauline's house was comfortable and quiet. It is in a good location very close to a bus stop, and not too far from a DART stop either.

Pauline was a great host with quick responses to any questions. She was also very generous in letting us check in early as she didn't have anyone staying the night before. 

The check in process was very easy.

Thanks!
This was our second visit to stay in Paulines place and again we had a great time, also we were able to enjoy the garden this time around.

We (family of three) stayed seven nights at Paulines place and really enjoyed it.  At first I thought you would really need a car (which we did not have) but we managed fine.  There is a small market a few blocks away and a Tesco Superstore less than a mile away.  The bus for the city center is on the other side of the park so about a three minute walk.  The train to Howth and to Malahide (both we went to for afternoon visits and highly recommend) is about a twenty minute walk.  The house is comfortable with plenty of natural light, the kitchen is well stocked with pots and pans and the beds were comfortable.  If we return to Dublin we would stay there again.
This is a handy apartment location.  Getting into town is simple on the bus, and costs 3¬£ apiece to downtown or the Temple Bar area (8 minute bus ride).  Very kind host.
Paulines place was exactly what we needed after our tour around Ireland before we flew home. Thanks for the hospitality!
Perfect!
Very comfortable accommodation 12 minutes away from the city centre

There were 7 of us for a short stay in Dublin. We appreciated our accommodation, everything was fine. The apartment is well located and is approximately 10-15 mn journey by bus from the downtown (Bus 11, approx 5mn walk).
Ronan is very reactive and can answer to your questions fast.
The neighberhood is quite.

Excellent place to stay.  Lovely and spacious, and there were 5 of us (two of which are a couple) so each of us having our own bathroom was a definite plus. Its a really lovely quiet spot, close to UCD and the 11 bus which takes you straight into town. Highly recommend.
Nice large space with four bedrooms and four baths.  Good for a large family.

Ronan's house has everything in order to have a nice and pleasant stay in Dublin. Fully equipped with modern furniture, in a super safe neighborhood 20 minutes to the city centre by bus and with a host that takes care about your stay and quickly offers his help for everything you need. I fully recommend it!

Beautiful place in a lovely location, not too far from the city, a short 10 minute drive depending on traffic. Perfect place at a reasonable price for a large party. Ronan was quick to respond to any questions and happy to help with any problems, an all around great place.
We had a nice week in Dublin staying at Ronan' house. The house is spacious and has a good bus connection to the city centre. Also, the communication with Ronan was very good. Thanks!
Ronan was great, the place was beautiful and I would highly recommend it

Seven of us used this as our base of operations for a week exploring Dublin and the surrounding area (for four of us, this followed a week of cycling the west coast), and I really couldnt be more pleased with decision to stay here. With plenty of space, in a quiet neighborhood, within minutes of public transportation (20-30 minutes by bus to city center, depending on the time of day), and a short walk from a small market and a few pubs/restaurants (Id recommend Ashtons - or a quick bus/cab ride into Ranelagh, which has quite a bit more to offer), I found the location to be terrific. More than that, it has that feeling of home that lets you relax after a day touring the city, or like we did, Howth, Dalkey, and Bray. While Ronan was unable to meet us in person, he was a very good, responsive host, who provided us with what truly felt like a home-away-from-home. My eight-year-old son would recommend this for the Super Nintendo alone, and while I too am a fan of Mario Kart, Id add that this is a very comfortable and welcoming space to call home while you explore the best that Dublin has to offer.

This is a great accommodation for large groups. We had a very nice stay. Be aware that the house isn't in the city center, though it is very easy to get there by bus.
It's great that every bedroom has it's own bathroom.
Unfortunately there aren't many big pans in the kitchen, but we still managed to cook for all of us.
It took us a while to figure out how the heating and the wifi works.
In the end everything worked out fine though. If you're traveling with a bunch of people and you're looking for a place where evryone has their own space and nice common areas this is the place to go.
Excellent service from Ronan the host and a lovely place to stay.  We are very pleased.
Enjoyed our stay. The house was very spacious and pleasant. I would definitely recommend it to others.

We searched high and low for a location that would accommodate 8 and this 4 bd/4 bath spot really hit the mark.  It is a quiet place yet easily within range of the city center to be ideal for us.  We could not be happier with our choice to stay here.

We stayed at Ronan's house while we visited our daughter at UCD (studying abroad this semester). The location is fantastic for visiting the school. The house is very spacious and visually interesting.  I enjoyed cooking dinner for a dozen of my daughter's friends in the kitchen. The neighborhood is quiet and peaceful. We did not rent a car, but the house is within walking distance to a bus and the train. Cab's are easily requested by an app to get to the grocery store.

A great stay! This townhome provided very spacious very clean accommodations for our entire family while we visited our daughter at UCD as well as visiting Dublin and taking tours across Ireland. The number 11 bus takes you straight from city center to the end of Wynnsward Park. I highly recommend  this townhome and Ronan as a host! He was very attentive and responsive.

This place was perfect for a group of people.  Each bedroom had its own ensuite and the beds were very very comfortable.  The kitchen was well stocked and laundry was available.  The sitting room was spacious and was great for congregating.  We cooked meals and ate at the local pubs (Farmer Brown's pub around the corner had the best fish and chips in Dublin...and we tried quite a few!).  The bus stop for the 11 bus into the city was right at the end of the street.  Everything was wonderful and Ronan was quick to respond and easy to deal with.  If in Ireland again, we would definitely stay here!
Great location!
Fabulous apartment and host. Apartment was in a perfect location close to everything. Sally was lovely from the start. I would definitely recommend this place to friends and family.

This place is amazing. Location is perfect! Close to everything and anything you need. Sally was a great host! She made sure we have everything! I would stay here any chance I get coming back to Dublin!
Perfect location. Nice space!!

Location could not be any better! Sally was an excellent host and the apartment was stunning. 
Thank you, Sally!

What a fab place much bigger 
than it looks
Fab location in the middle of town with everything within walking distance
Tina & Friends

Could not possibly be a better location, central to everything.  You walk out onto Grafton Street where it meets Trinity College and you are immediately swept into the excitement of Dublin.  The living room is huge, with high ceilings and large windows overlooking Grafton Street.  Our host Sally treated us like family and helped us whenever we asked... including finding transportation to Cork that accommodated our special needs.
If you enjoy the hustle and bustle of city living, then this is the place for you.  Be warned that with that comes noises from Grafton street at all hours of the day and night.  The main bedroom is in the back of the building where you cannot hear the street noise, but you will from the living room.  Another caveat is you have to make it up approximately 15 stairs to access the unit.  No problem at all unless you have mobility issues.   As noted in other reviews, the 2nd bedroom is small.
We could not have been happier and would recommend this place to anyone who loves to be right in the middle of a vibrant city.  Thank you Sally.
Wonderful location. Great size. Sally is a very responsive and caring host.
Great location. Fantastic duplex apartment, plenty of space. Well definitely stay here again.
large apartment in a great location! Very clean and easy check in and out!
We cant give any higher rating for Sally and her home in central Dublin. Our family of four were delighted in all respects!
Excellent location, central to a lot of activities in Dublin. Well-equipped, large spacious living space, modern layout, great host.

Sally was an excellent host! Place was in a perfect location, could not ask for a better place to stay. We really enjoyed our time in this beautiful and fun city! Thank you Sally again for everything!!!!!
Wonderful owner and a very convenient location. I can recommend Sally without reservation. :-)

Very centrally located and easily accommodated family of 4. Unfortunately the apartment is part of an older building (not surprising given location) and had no sound insulation to the apartment above which had active residents until the early hours of the morning.

The apartment is beautiful and centrally located. We throughly enjoyed our stay and would be happy to stay again. Sally was very attentive and quickly responded to any questions. If you are a light sleeper then the noise at night might be noticeable but the location far outweighed any concerns. The back bedrooms are quieter. We truly loved our stay!
Great, spacious place in heart of Dublin. Extremely comfortable. Sally was very responsive and helpful. Only complaint about the apartment is the noise from neighbors upstairs.
Location, location, location! This apartment is absolutely amazingly positioned between Trinity College, Grafton shopping, and Temple Bar. We walked everywhere!

We all had a great time. We were a group of 4 friends, we had loads of space. Would definitely recommend. The apartment is perfect for adults. It's really clean, showers are lovely, and  the location was just perfect. Sally was very friendly to deal with and replied quickly to any querie.
Sally is a perfect host, she gives all necessary informations and is very quick to answer and helpful. The apartment location is perfect and the living room is big.

Cannot beat the location. Across from Trinity College and next to an amazing chocolate shop and the Irish Whiskey Museum, there is no need to go far to get what you need. Highly recommend to everyone and the host Sally is lovely and is quick to respond.
Great location! Well appointed house. Great communication from the host. Our family of 4 was very comfortable here!

Sally was an amazing host. Great communication. Super nice. Great tips. The place is well situated in the middle of everything. Super clean with great amenities. We would definitely stay again when we return to Dublin.
Apartment is in a great central location. Sally, thanks for all the great restaurant recommendations!
Sally was a amazing host! I recommend her without a doubt!Thanks fo all!It was a great place to stay.
Absolutely the perfect place to visit Dublin for couples or a family.  Very well kept with all the amenities youd ever want and Sally was most helpful in preparing our visit!

Would highly recommend this flat for anyone who wants to be in the centre of Dublin. Sally was a wonderful host - our ferry from Wales to Dublin was cancelled and Sally was able to make alternate arrangements so we could still gain access to the flat at 1am when we had to take a later ferry!  She is a rock star.  Fabulous restaurant and grocery recommendations - thanks for making our first stay in Dublin so memorable.
Beautiful apartment right in the middle of the action of all that Dublin has to offer. The entire apartment is large and spacious with everything you need! Highly recommend!

Terrific apartment on Grafton Street across from the entrance to Trinity College. Very well located, in the middle of everything. And yet the bedrooms were very quiet. The apartment is just as described. Sally is kind and thoughtful, and responded almost immediately to all inquiries.  Plus she gave us an above-the-call-of-duty explanation of the Dublin theater scene. (She is a theater person herself.)  Highly recommended in all respects.

The location on Grafton St. was ideal for walking everywhere in the city. The apartment was very spacious , clean, modern and well equipped.  The layout provided privacy to couples sharing
accommodations but also had an extremely large common area Perfectly met our needs and I would highly recommend this property.
Great place in a great location.

Great location across from Trinity College on Grafton Street. Large spacious sitting room with high ceiling, tons of light from windows and plenty of comfortable seating. Bedrooms and bathrooms were clean and adequate. The kitchen was a little out of the way but we didn't cook. Communication was quick and helpful. Check-in was easy.
Great location! Walkable to everything. Sally was super easy to get in contact with, and check-in was easy!
Excellent location, was everything mentioned in the description and so much more. Sally was quick to offer help, and very responsive to all of our needs.
Such a convenient location with lots of bars/shops/restaurants/public transport around the area. Also very clean and the host was great with communication. I would 10/10 stay here again
You can't get a better place... luxurious living spaces, amazing location, a five star host.
Wir hatte einen super Aufenthalt! Top Lage, super nette Gastgeberin, alles wie inseriert.
Great place to stay! Excellent location walking distance from bus stations and major attraction.
Nice place ! Great location !

Very cosy room in a lovely house. 
The location is ideal : at the very center of Dublin, and very suite at the same time. 

We very much enjoyed our stay !
Loved Catherines place. Very homey and in a great location
Catherines place is in a great location, and she made some excellent recommendations for places to enjoy in the city.
Friendly, easy going host and convenient location.
Very nice room in great location, superclean, great communication prior to the stay.

Catherine's place is just as described.  I found it comfortable, cozy and so convenient to walk downtown, while being just far away enough to maintain a little quiet at night.  Catherine is a great host and I would recommend her space to anyone!

Catherines place was a cosy little gem super close to everything. Easy access and walking distance to the city with a clean and comfortable room. Cathrine is very friendly and welcoming! We would definitely stay again :)

Cathrine's place is very cute, cosy and super close to everything by foot. Cathrine is very welcoming and has plenty of information and tips about Dublin. Would definitely recommend her place to anyone stopping in Dublin.

The accommodation was just as I expected.
The area was quiet and nice.
It was close to everything .
Great location.  Could walk pretty much anywhere of interest to us in max 20 mins, but typically less.  Catherine gave us some great recommendations, and was very responsive.   Lovely host!

Catherine's place is in a good location, close to Dublin's main attractions. Catherine is a nice host and she was very responsive to our questions. The bathroom is quite small and the room is rather small to accommodate two people. No key for the room, neither for the bathroom is available. Cleaning could be better. Quite expensive comapred to other rooms in the same area of Dublin.
Catherine was great! The place was very comfy, excellent bed!

Catherine's space was great. Location was just far enough to be away from the loud hustle and bustle, but only 3 blocks or so from St Patrick's Cathedral. She was very accommodating about letting me drop off my bag before check in.  She also had a great list of both local places to eat/drink and places to try in the more touristy center. I felt safe in the neighborhood and the house as a solo traveler. I would definitely stay here again if back in Dublin.

Friendly and helpful hostess. Good location. Room was smaller than expected. Had to hand fill the tank of the toilet since it was broken, which was gross and time consuming. She said that she is trying to fix this issue and had a plumber out earlier on the day we checked in, but he was unable to resolve the issue. Hopefully it will be fixed soon.

We enjoyed staying at Catherine's home. The area is charming and the room is really quiet, so you can get a good night's sleep although you are in the centre of a city. Catherine is an easy-going host whom we loved talking to and who gave us useful tips. She is extremely helpful if you need something. We also appreciated using her kitchen for a quick lunch and for our breakfasts. Everything we wanted was there!
Catherine is a really warm, generous host. I recommend her whole-heartedly!
Catherine is a gem! Her place is perfectly located in walking distance to all things Dublin. She was so warm and welcoming, I felt like we were kindred spirits. Had a wonderful visiting.
The host canceled this reservation 85 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Catherines place was great- good location that was walking distance to everything but on a quiet street 
Cozy room and Catherine was a very communicative great host

Despite we didnt get the chance to know each other ( basically because we were outside all day ), we had a wonderful experience at Catherines place. Everything was tidy and clean.
Great location in a lovely neighborhood.
100% recommended !!!
Fantastic location and great hospitality. Catherine always answered promptly and offered many useful suggestions and tips. We very much enjoyed our stay at Catherines place!
Catherine is very friendly and relaxed, room and bed very comfortable. Nice quiet street, easy to walk everywhere.

Catherine is absolutely wonderful and so quick to be helpful in anything you need. The location is perfect. Its walking distance to just about anywhere, but if you happen to need the Leap Card, Catherine has one you can borrow. The house is on a cute and quaint street so you wont be bothered by any noise. Overall, an amazing time spent here!

We stayed at Catherine's appartment for 3 nights, which was enough to explore the most important places in Dublin. The appartment was very clean and tidy, as well as located close to Dublin's sights. It was perfectly easy to reach everything by walking. Catherine as a host was very accommodating. When we cleaned our dishes ourselves, she told us that there is no need for that since we are on holiday and that she will do it later. All in all, our stay at Catherine's was very nice.
Great experience, Catherine was very responsive and flexible to our request to check in a bit early. She gave us a list of good restaurants in the area and thats basically all we ate.

Catherine's place is a nice little house in Dublin city centre, close to everything (walking distance).
Catherine is a very good and extremely considerate host, having in mind that I had a late flight and I came in after midnight. All the instructions were clear and understandable.
It was all impeccable during my stay.
Thanks Catherine
would highly reccomend , great hosts and good location.

Nice and clean house in a quiet neighbourhood
Very friendly couple willing to have a chat and share tips
Simple but nice breakfast with tea/coffee, toast and fruit 
 Easy transport to Dublin center by bus at the bus stop within a few minutes by foot, you will need 3 euro's in coins per person for a one way ticket
A comfortable place to stay with good bus links into the centre of Dublin.
Very hospitable! We were grateful for a pleasant experience.

The place was nice. The location is not very near to the center and all the sights, but I guess that is explained in the description. I think it is a bit pricey for that location. 
There was a shampoo, but noo shower gel provided. 
Breakfast was included, but very simplified- bread, butter, jam and cereal.  The room was warm but not the kitchen. 
On the good side - hosts are very friendly, house was very clean. Bus stops were very close. The neighborhood was nice.

We enjoyed our stay at Federico's place. Federico was very friendly and easygoing. He welcomed us with some nice tea. The room and the facilities were just as the photos show, and we appreciated the daily breakfast. I recommend you to stay with Federico in Dublin. :)

Federicos place was comfortable and he was very friendly. The breakfast he serves is good, and helps you save money on your trip. The location is a little far from the city center, but the transportation isnt too expensive. Highly recommend this private room.
Lovely house and couple.
Federico and her wife are very welcomed and our room is pretty clean and comfortable. It is a wonderful living .5 star to recommend!
Sparklingly clean, comfortable and quiet place, conveniently located for the bus into town. Ben Dunne gym round the corner. Breakfast a great touch. Would highly recommend
Federico's place is nice and he is very friendly.

Federicos house is nice and located in quiet neighborhood on the outskirts of Dublin. If youre looking for a cosy room out of the way then this is the perfect spot for you. However, its a bit inconvenient (and expensive) to get to the city center without a car. Overall we had a lovely stay with Federico!
Stayed at Frederico's place for one night. I arrived pretty late during the night but was there to welcome me. His place is clean and comfortable. Breakfast was a great touch. Definitely recommend!
Trƒós sympa. Bien placƒó pour une vite cool de Dublin 25 mn de bus ligne 150

Great host and convenient location. The place was spotless! 
Thanks Federico!
Check in time and communication was very good. The bus station is just few meters from the home. Hospitable.

Federico is a very good host. The place is very clean and quiet. At the South of Dublin, many bus stops are located close to the apartment so it is easy to go in town.
Federico and Jody are respectful and kind persons. Many thanks, especially for the lovely breakfast, prepared each morning.
Do not hesitate with them it is a safe and good address.

Convenient located in a quiet neighbourhood just outside downtown,easily accessible by bus 150 or 9 from the city. Tidy and neatly decorated room. Tesco, SPAR as well as a bar located just around the corner and the hosts, Federico and his wife Jodie, is a lovely and helpful couple!
Very nice room in a quiet area with many buses to the city centre!
Everthing ok
Clean and tidy house, and free breakfast is a great!! Convenient supermarkets near by and (erratic) bus links into town
Federico's cozy apartment is great to discover all wonderful things that Dublin has to offer.

Federicos house is located in a quiet neighborhood of Dublin, about 30 min by bus from city center. The room was very comfortable and Federico was very kind and responsive to any messages. If Im back in Dublin, I would try to stay here again.
Very happy to recommend.
Had a lovely stay at Annas place! Super friendly and accommodating and the apartment was so cute!
Had a great stay! The apartment was very clean and within a 5 minute walk to the Laus stop which made it convenient to get into the city centre. Overall, a very good experience.

The apartment is stylish, comfy and clean and there is pretty much everything we were in need of, the position is also perfect as it allows for traveling through the city centre by foot alone. Anna has been really welcoming, giving us info about the must-to-visit places and giving us freedom to use the apartment as we saw fit. Heartily recommended!
Great stay!
Everything was as advertised! A great stay in Dublin

Anna offered a warm welcome into her home. Tea and coffee was included which we gratefully used every morning! I would say the biggest drawback is that the place is about a brisk 20 minute walk from where it's all happening in Dublin. This was okay for me, but for my mom who isn't used to walking as much was a little bit of a problem.

We stayed at Annas place for 3 nights. The location is great - we walked all over Dublin without problems. We had access to the kitchen and fridge, so we bought groceries at a close by grocery store and cooked breakfast every morning. We also had access to the washing machine, and did 2 loads of laundry. Detergent was not provided so we purchased it at the grocery store, and there was no dryer, but Anna provided us with a large drying rack and a dehumidifier. Anna and her partner were pleasant hosts and offered us lots of great tips for eating and drinking in Dublin. One of the bars they suggested ended up being our favourite in all of Dublin. They have a cat, which was nice, but was very energetic at times.    We kept our bedroom door closed so the cat stayed in the main area. Overall, we loved Dublin and had a good experience.

Anna was an amazing host. She waited for us for the check in, cause our flight was delayed. She took her time to show us the house and tell us about the city. 
The apartment is welcoming, everything is in a walking distance. 
Thank you for hosting us! Definitely would recommend to anyone who plans to visit Dublin.
Tutto ottimo posizione pulizia host comunicazione e sicuramente prezzo. Una sola nota quella di lasciare un po di spazio nei cassetti in modo da sistemare i vestiti.
Cosy appartment with great kitchen and bathroom. Anna was very kind when she welcomed us and was very reactive to my messages before our arrival. I totally recommend !

It's a nice and cosy appartment. Everything is clean and you can use all facilities. We didn't meet the owner, but she answers very quickly by email. We had a very nice stay. It was close to all high lights we wanted to see. Nice area. The only thing we didn't know is that she had a cat. It was a sweet cat but my friend was allergic so she needed to be careful. Other than that I would recommend this place.
Nice place to stay in Dublin, around 15 minutes walk to city centre. Anna was a friendly and helpful host, there were cooking and laundry facilities in the flat.
Perfect location, perfect apartment, perfect treatment. Nothing more to say.
Comfort and lovely place, 20 minutes walking to the centre. We could find everything we needed there and everything was also very clean. We definetly recommend the stay.
Lovely flat in a great location!
We had a lovely stay in Anna's flat which was walking distance to Heuston station as well as to all the tourist attractions downtown. Everything was as we expected:-)

Very friendly host. Apartment is in very good location for exploring Dublin. 
No bad surprises, everything like expected.

Leos place is awesome and pretty much as central as you can get in Dublin!
The room is cosy and has a full ensuite which is mega convenient.
Due to me arriving late in the evening I only met Leo briefly but he seems like a genuinely nice guy and will look forward to staying at his place again next time Im in Dublin.
Awesome communication prior to stay too with extremely detailed description of how to access to property which was mega helpful. Thanks Leo!

The apartment and room were great. Leo was very friendly and helpful with the self check in, giving detailed instructions. The bed was so comfy it felt like we were sleeping on a cloud! The room is well located with the private bathroom. I would definitely recommend staying here!

Leos place is tops! The location is unbeatable. Youre just so close to everything. We walked everywhere because it was all so accessible (and safe!). Leo gave perfect directions for not only getting to his place but getting into it. The room was immaculate. He has two adaptors in the room so if youve forgotten yours, dont worry! The en-suite bathroom is the perfect touch too. The space is so private and feels like your own apartment. I would 1000% recommend to anyone coming to Dublin who wants to be close to it all and have a perfectly private and easily accessible place to stay!

We are so happy we chose to stay with Leo! The location is easy to get to from the airport and bus stops, plus is downtown which made all of the sites we wanted to see easy to get to by foot. There is a variety of take out restaurats near by, in addition to several grocery stores on the block so we were able to buy groceries to cook in the kitchen. The room is very private and when we happened to be at the apartment at the same time as Leo (he is a busy artist and was out most of the time) he was friendly and respectful.

Leo is a friendly and nice guy with awesome tips for Dublin! The room was clean and in the centre of the city. From there you can get easily to temple bar and to the city for shopping. Even the Bus for the airport is just 5 minutes away!
Thank you for the great time :)

Perfect location near the bus and trainstation to go to the airport or Howth. 10 min to walk to the city center.  
Check-in and communication was easy and the room clean. 
Thank you Leo for hosting us :)
Leos place is perfect if you want to explore Dublin as its really close to the city centre. Check in worked perfectly fine and we genuinely enjoyed our stay. We would definitely come back!
Beautiful room and private bathroom. Great location. Really lovely.
Location is great and handy to have grocery store and coffee shop just around the corner

Leo is a great host, we felt welcomed at his place. The apartment is comfortable and walking distance to the city. Communication was good and detailed instructions for checking in were clear. The late check out time was also convenient as we had an afternoon flight.

Leo is a great host, very communicative and knowledgeable of the Dublin area. We had plenty of space in our room, and the common areas he shared were a bonus for us. His place is very convenient to Connolly rail station, bus services and LUAS. Much of city center is within 15 - 20 minutes walk if you prefer not to take a bus.
We would definitely stay there again when we visit Dublin.

Leo's place couldn't be more conveniently located. It's well priced, clean, and quiet. Leo communicated promptly and clearly. The normal check-in time is unusually late, so guests will want to make sure it suits their schedule (as it did mine) before booking.
Well located, perfectly furnished, very clean, friendly guest with lots of good tips, will recommend this place without any hesitation!
Location is great. Leo has everything every traveler needs. Great host!
Basic, simple but quiet and clean accommodation
It was  a pleasure for us to have been your guests. Excellent hospitality. Thank you very much. Cheers! Michela!

Leo has very clear with directions, fast with responses and kindly accommodating to a surprise flight time change. This was a convenient location in a quiet apartment I wound up having to myself.  Comfortable bed and couches.

Brilliant central location and very welcoming personable host. We walked everywhere and loved the authenticity of the area. Comfortable flat with good shower and nice bed. We would definitely come back as this ticks all the boxes!

Superb, central location with immaculate, clean room. No qualms here.
As long as you are not fazed by the unorthodox entry to the building via an enclosed car park, this really fits the bill.
quiet place near city center, I enjoyed staying there!
Uitstekende online gastheer (elkaar niet gezien), vlot en prettig. Locatie ligt ideaal en tips voor bijvoorbeeld reizen, eten en pub zijn uitstekend. Kortom zeker aanbevelenswaardig.
Lovely room in a super central area!
Sauber und City nah. Nur zu empfehlen.
Tip top
No

Leos appartement is een prettige locatie op een prima plek. Vanaf hier is vrijwel alles te lopen. Let wel je hebt een eigen kamer en badkamer in het appartement van de eigenaar. Bij ons was de eigenaar niet thuis dus was prettig en gaf meer privacy. Verder heel gastvrij.

Leo is a friendly host, ready for a chat if you are or happy to leave you to your own devices. 

The apartment is well located (my partner and I walked everywhere) though a little fiddly to enter (Leo provides clear instructions).

The bed is on the small side for two large adults but it's nice to have your own ensuite.
Perfect location. Great place to stay for a short stay.

The appartment is well located, the bed is comfortable and communication with the host was very efficient. 
However, check-in time is too late and the price is high considering you are sharing the appartment with the host (although he was not there often).

It was a very pleasant stay. Leo sent exact information, so we didn¬¥t have any problems to take keys from the box. Great location for exploring the city. The apartment was nice, clean, fully equipped ( own bedroom, bathroom). We recommend to everybody!

Sparkling clean and stylish. 
Leo let us in around 10 a.m. to leave our luggage, even if the official check-in is after 7 p.m.
Great position of the apartment. Airport bus station and supermarket in 2-3 mins range of walk.
Super silent neighbourhood. We could rest up to noon. No noise to disturb us. 
Great amenities. Well-equipped kitchen. 
Leo is very responsive and he doesn't bother you, even if he is at home. 
TOTALLY RECOMMEND HIM!

The room was perfect, clean and with every comfort. The position is really good, a few steps from the Spire, so that we could visit Dublin on foot. the communication with the host was perfect,  fast and precise, the instruction were really precise.
Suggested!

I would definitely recommend anyone to stay at Leo's place, which is centrally located, clean and tidy. Leo is a very good host and gave us accurate instructions on how to easily check-in, even though we arrived very late.
Wonderful place, close to the center and Leo is friendly and nice. He has good tips to eat and drink, (pubs, restaurants).

My husband and I were very unimpressed by this rental. We arrived around 6pm and had an awful time finding our way to the room. Luckily there was a nice gal who lived in the building and she helped us find our way. If it wasnt for her, we would have never found it. Our key was left in a mailbox that was completely open and anyone could have grabbed it. I cant stress enough how UNSAFE this building is.. as a woman, I could never imagine coming here alone. Also, as we were walking in there was someone going the the restroom right outside the entrance. So that made sense why it smelt like urine everywhere. The building is absolutely disgusting. Once we finally found the room, we were welcomed by an awful smell in the hallway and the entire hallway was filled with toys and equipment, they must have been a neighbors but nonetheless,  it didnt leave much room for walking. Once we got into the SHARED apartment, there was stuff everywhere. The kitchen had probably 20 alcohol bottles out on the counter and the whole place just looked a wreck. After being in the apartment for all of two minutes we knew there was no way we could stay here. We ended up booking a hotel for two nights, that was not cheap but there was no price tag we could put on it. Save yourself the time and I would never even consider this place. I have never written and bad review on Airbnb, and we dont feel like we are picky travelers but we felt it was necessary to warn anyone that is considering staying here.
Freundlicher Gastgeber, gute Lage, sehr zufrieden..
This location is very close in walking distance to the Temple Bar area and its not far from the train. Very easy to get around in this location.

We had an amazing stay! Leo was so easy to communicate with, his instructions to find the location were clear.. We had no troubles at all. 
The space was clean and comfortable.

Leo's place is very conveniently located for exploring Dublin, close to the main tourist attractions. There are many nice cafes and restaurants in the neighborhood. Leo's place is clean and convenient and he gives very clear check-in instructions, so we  had no problem during our stay. Would recommend this place!
Everything was perfect. Quiet, nice room. We had nice chats with Leo. We really enjoyed our stay.

-Location is convenient- about 15 mins walk to the other side of town for Dublin castle and everything else. 
-Bedroom is clean! And there were 2 outlet adaptors which was nice. I didnt need but could be useful for others. Heat available in room.
-Private bathroom in room was older but clean but had some hair in shower from last tenant? 
-I didnt use kitchen or living space, host had guest over. He informed me day of arrival. 
-Allowed early luggage drop off which was great
-Overall, decent stay and more affordable than other hotels in the area!

The apartement is really great for a fun stay in Dublin - clean, quite, everything you need is in the apartement and most of the sightseeing places are in walking distance. A great place to stay and I guess we will be back.

Keith's place is very nice, confortable, and well located, and Keith is a very arranging guess.
Bonud: One of my friend's forgot his passeport, Keith found it before the flight and joined us asap so that we can take our flight!
Thank you Keith

Its a very lovely little cottage. Our family of five was very comfortable there. The location is quite nice, easy walking distance to many tourist sites. We particularly enjoyed stumbling on all the antique shops around the corner on Francis Street. Our host was very kind and very communicative. We definitely enjoyed our stay.
Nice, clean and cosy cottage, 15mn walk from temple bar...

Great location! 10-15 walk to pretty much everything but its also just removed enough that it feels like youre seeing a little of the locals Dublin. Fully functional kitchen, comfortable beds - we slept 5 with no issues - and plenty of seating which can be hard in an Airbnb! Not sure if Ill be returning to Dublin but if I do I hope Im able to book this place again!

Keiths place was great! He made sure we had all the instructions we needed to fully use his space and the neighborhood around it. We enjoyed staying in the Liberties because it was further away from the noise of the busy streets in Dublin. We had 5 people staying so it was a little tight, but manageable. Keith was a great host!

Great location, near enough to explore all of the city on foot but far enough out to be away from traffic and people noise. Parking immediately outside the house is metered and restricted so could be quite expensive if you have a hire car for your stay, but we found  a couple of nearby streets that were completely free. The house is well equipped with bedding, towels, clothes space and kitchen necessities. All in all a very pleasant stay

Our stay was great! The cottage was wonderful and very clean. A short walk to everything we needed. Everything was as described and checking in with the lockbox was very convenient. We loved this place and would definitely return.

House is located around 15 mins walk from some great shopping, pubs, restaurants etc. Be aware that the immediate area around the house isnt the most desirable, and you will need to take taxis at night. House was spotlessly clean, plenty of space upstairs but a little bit cramped for our group of 6 downstairs.
Had a great stay at this house with my friends. Lovely place, very clean & really good location. Highly recommend!
Nice place in old Dublin near the Guinness storehouse, the brazen head pub and many nice stops and food items. Gets one out of tourist central with a more local experience.
Great stay in a great location.
Fabulous location! Everything we needed for a great stay. We appreciated the extra linens, few more pillows, throws on the beds. We were grateful that we could drop luggage early.

The layout of the apartment having to go through the kitchen to access the toilet was less than ideal.  The area is very residential with limited eating options for dinner without a decent walk. For the price its ok
Very quiet residential area and yet not far to many sights and Temple Bar.

Decent place for the price. Living room is fairly spacious, but other rooms are small.  Electric shower was loud and small, with limited amount of hot water. No soap or shampoo provided, so make sure you bring your own. Location was walkable to St Patricks, Temple Bar, etc. More hostel than hotel, so set your expectations and it's fine. Checking in and out was easy, no problems there.

Its hard to beat the location of Keiths place!  Its super easy to walk to stores, public attractions, pubs, etc.  The people in the Liberties neighborhood are really incredible and friendly.  The bathroom set up worked particularly well for us.  The toilet and sink are separated from another sink and the shower so you can easily stay here with a group without feeling the pain of 1 bathroomù.   The flat was clean, well appointed and Keith responded super fast if needed.

Keiths place was perfect for our group of 5 to spend a few days in Dublin. Overall the place has everything you would need packed into a small townhome. Also, the location was good, anywhere near the city center could be reached by a quick bus ride.

Excellent location if you dont have a car. Just a 6 minute walk to Teeling Distillery and an 8 minute wall to Guinness. Apartment is clean and quiet and there are plenty of restaurants and pubs to walk to.
Clean and good logation
Nice, quiet space that is an easy walk to wherever you want to go. Place was clean and fit the four of us easily. Very much enjoyed our stay.

It was very easy to check in, since the was in a combination lock with the key on the door. 
I had some troubles with my booking and Keith contacted the Airbnb support immediately and sorted it out. The cottage was really nice, supermarkets were really near by and also some great local stores, bakery etc. 
Our neighbour in the cottage was also really nice, he waited for us to come out in the morning to give us informations about the city and a map where he marked his suggestions. Over all we had a really pleasant stay there with our family!
Great stay in Dublin! We had more then enough space and it was a great location to walk to all the main attractions.
We had a great stay at Keiths home.  Clean and great location!
Nice place to stay. Not very spacious but a good house to stay a few days
This place is great, easily accessible to amenities and attractions in the area.

Nice house near the center. everything important with bus and on foot fast attainable.
the apartment is very good equiped.
Nice contact. Nice Apartment. Thank you!
It's an amazing cottage, the kitchen is spacious and has all the utensils you need, the only complaint is that if there are 6 people it may take a while with only one bathroom but otherwise great!
Lovely little stylish and cosy place to stay. Not too far from all the sites. Would recommend!
Cute place, good location to wander and get lost in the citys charm, accommodating host, could have been a bit tidier. Overall good experience.
Great place for a stay in Dublin
Excellent host! Provided detailed notes on area/home. Location within 20 mins walk of every major attraction. Definitely would stay again!!

We had a great stay here. Everything was clean and plenty of towels were provided. We were able to drop our bags early which was a huge help. We were given local recommendations for food/live music and the location was prime walking distance to everything we wanted to see.
This house is perfectly located for a trip to Dublin. You can walk to the city center.  It is quite tiny , but was ok for 4 adults and a child. Thanks

We had a great time at the very central appartement! The rooms are all thought-out and there is place in the tiniest corner. There is just a five minute walk to the Guiness Storehouse and 10 min to the other direction to the Temple Bar!
My family and I stayed here for a few days and the location is fantastic, we walked everywhere! There was 6 of us so it was a bit cramped but we were hardly there so it worked out fine.
Very comfortable and quiet place,  perfect for walking into the city centre

Well located spacious property within easy reaching distance of all main attractions.

Comfortable, clean and ideal for a small family taking a break in Dublin. Would have no problem in using this house again when I visit Dublin.

Martin Smith 
West Midlands.
Great experience for my fist time using AirBNB! Would recommend to anyone.

We really enjoyed our stay in Rathmines. 
Easy to get to the Luas - which was then 10-15 mins to the city centre. 
Really handy Tesco store next door as well as a lovely butchers, pharmacy and off licence. 
Lovely welcome gifts! Thank you
A fantastic spot, located in a lovely part of Dublin. The parade of shops were perfect for picking up any amenities and some lovely local produce. Perfect for a weekend break for couples.
Great location  , fully equipped apartment with many extras.

wonderful experience.
ever5need was immediately taken care of. spotless modern apt.
will come again!!!

We had a fantastic couple of days in Rathmines. The flat was a perfect base for us to visit friends and see a bit of Dublin. We really appreciated the little touches...fresh food in the fridge. Would definitely recommend

Elaines apartment is beautiful, its clean and modern. The location is great if you want something close to the centre but quiet at night. 

There is a tram stop (Luas) just a 10min walk from the apartment.

The apartment is set in a nice, suburban area with good restaurants and shops nearby. 

Elaine was friendly and welcoming when we arrived to check in and helped us with local transport and restaurant recommendations throughout our stay. 

We would stay again if we were back in Dublin.
Everything was fine. I appreciated the extra effort to make sure my motorcycle was safe overnight.
Everything was as good as advertised. The flat was perfect for the three of us and well located for getting in and out if town. I'd definitely recommend it!
Place was beautiful and we really enjoyed it. The problem we had was the noice from the streets and the neighbors. The communication was amazing.

We were pleasantly surprised by our stay. The place was better than described with the personal touches that we received when we arrived, it was clean, modern and just like home from home. No issues what so ever and we would definitely stay again. Elaine and the other staff that we met were very friendly and welcoming...thank you again guys!!

Elaine was amazing. She had the place perfectly prepped, and heated for us upon arrival. She had a safe and free place to park for our rental car. The space is conveniently located over a pharmacy and deli/grocery so you can get everything you need. The other tenants were a little loud, the doors do slam from time to time, but nothing a little white noise machine couldnt fix. The area is very safe and its about a 20/30 minute walk into city Centre. I would highly recommend this space!

Everything was ok, easy check in and check out, the apartment was super clean. Elaine answer my questions really quick. The location of the apartment is more or least at half an hour walk from the city center, otherwise theres the bus right next to the door. We spent a great time.

Elaines place was the perfect home base for our Ireland trip. She was quick to respond with any questions and extremely helpful. We loved that she bought us some groceries for us to use during our stay! Would absolutely stay here again!
It is a very spacious and comfortable place, close to the center. A really nice two bedroom apartment to stay.

The apartement was ok, clean and beautifully furnished. We were given a parking space, which was great.  I liked  it was warm and welcoming.  It had all the necessary utilities if you wanted to cook. The only problem was with the shower water that was either very hot or very cold
Good location with all amenities close by. The provision of breakfast items and a box of chocolates was a nice touch and greatly appreciated.
It was very well situated and the apartment is great for 4 people.
Elaine's place is well located with thoughtful touches. The apartment is well equipped with a nice feel to it and check in was very accommodating. The showers were somewhat difficult to use however
Lovely place, with nice personal touches from the host. Will definitely be back and would recommend to anyone travelling to Dublin.
We enjoyed our stay, and will be ending our trip staying at this apartment again. Elaine was very helpful and quick to respond, location was perfect.

Our stay at Elaines was amazing!!  Its a great location- just a simple bus ride away from Trinity College area.  The space was so welcoming and comfortable, and she had bought a few groceries which was so lovely since we got in at a late hour.  I would definitely recommend for anyone to stay here!

Phenomenal place with a phenomenal host! This apartment was an awesome location to different activities in the city, it had great access to groceries and restaurants and was just an overall wonderful place to stay!

This is a lovely flat in a quiet, safe, and easy access location.  Public transportation is nearby and restaurants are within an easy walk.  Beds are comfortable, furnishings are nice.  Elaine and the folks at the pharmacy below truly are super-hosts as they are super helpful and kind.  Made us feel at home.  Sophie went the "extra mile" one morning in helping us call a cab and giving us directions.  We were so appreciative!  The space is clean and well apportioned.  Of note is that there is a flight of stairs to navigate and parking is a 6-7 minute walk away.  Also be sure to bring a sleep mask if you are in the back bedroom as the summer nights are long and there is a skylight.
Lovely!

This is a very nice and comfortable apartment, clean and close to the city centre - an easy 30ish mins walk. Elaine was great, very welcoming and quick in communicating. We ever got food for breakfast which was unexpected. Very happy we found this apartment. Overall we enjoyed staying there and would come back again!
It was great to stay in Elaines flat. Especially for us as a Family with 2 Kids we enjoyed it.
Nice apartment above pharmacy. Tesco supermarket 1 minute walk away. Convenient to take bus into dublin.
Elaines hospitality was such a great welcome to Dublin.  She was able to make our stay very comfortable and one to remember.  Highly recommend booking this charming place!

A comfortable stay in a great location! Close enough to public transportation into the city and in a quiet neighborhood. Having a grocery store and pharmacy right below us added an extra bonus!  The host was very kind and helpful. Would definitely recommend!

The location may not be close to the downtown area, but the local bars and restaurants in the area are great. The place was nice and homey with the right amount of space for me and my friends. 

Elaine was always quick to reply and answer any questions I had. The location is also located above a pharmacy, so it was convenient to hop downstairs to grab anything needed.

Our stay was wonderful. Fantastic location, quiet and safe. Will most certainly stay again. Elaine was so accommodating and had wonderful suggestions on things to do and places to eat! Wonderful time!

Our family of four had a wonderful stay at Elaine's apartment during a recent trip to Dublin. The location is fantastic: close to the city centre by bus and a short stroll away from the bustling town of Rathmines where there is lots of choice of excellent restaurants and shops as well as many beautiful examples of the Georgian architecture for which Dublin is famous. Check in was very straightforward. The apartment was clean and comfortable and Elaine had very thoughtfully left some food essentials for us on arrival. I would definitely stay at Elaine's apartment again and highly recommend it.
My second stay at this venue. Highly recommend.

A very nice flat with all we needed for our stay. Very clean. Lovely and warm with plenty of hot water. Nice area with local shops and a coffee shop nearby. Handy to have the use of a parking permit when our daughter came to stay. We very much appreciated the welcome pack of eggs, bread, butter, orange juice and milk. Good communication from Elaine. The only thing we feel needed attention was maybe its time to change the mattresses. Would definitely recommend staying here.

Absolutely loved our time in this apartment. It was very clean, cosy, and in a good location. Some thoughtful things like providing us some groceries, and check in was seamless. Great location in Upper Rathmines with access to some great pubs and shops. Will definitely be back!
No complaints
Beautiful country location and wonderful hospitality.
It was very lovely, we feeld us very good in your house. Thank you so much for all :-) cheers nicole and sisters
Vert quiet house
Great little place to stay out of the big smoke. The hosts were amazingly helpful and I could not of been more grateful.

Beautiful stay with very generous people and family. Our daughter was entertained with there beautiful son Michael and shared toys, played with chickens in the backyard. Very kind people and was great with our kids. Very accommodating and understanding. Breakfast was included and very good, great start to the day and made sure we ate at the best restaurants around town.  Everything was very clean and cups of tea with there beautiful family was very nice.
Clean comfortable stay close to the airport. Exactly what we needed.

This was an awesome stay with Dermot and Kim! Wonderful hosts.  Perfect location to the Dublin airport too! Quaint location away from the hustle and bustle but closer than you would think to the airport.  Wish we had longer to stay than we did.  Thank you Dermot & Kim!
Thank you for your hospitality.
Dermott was a super host and handled our last minute needs. Nice modern house and grounds in quiet rural setting but only about 10 minutes from airport

We were a family of 4 adults and 1 child and the room was perfect for our stay. Dermott was very helpful and even went to the station to direct our lift. The breakfast was great and the location is within walking distance to a station that takes you into Dublin city centre!

Dermot has a beautiful home that is sparkling clean.  He and his wife are very friendly and helpful. Their house is in a quiet area within a quick drive into Dublin. Getting to the airport from their house was quick and super easy. Highly recommend staying with them when in the area.  Sweet family.
Very nice place to stay.  Highly recommended.

We were delighted with our stay and hope to return the next time we are in Dublin.  It is the ideal location for us - the area is lovely and easy access to the LUAS made getting around the city so easy.

We had a lovely couple of days staying at Elaines place. Every thing for the stay had been thought of along with some  basic essentials like milk bread and butter. 
This place is great for a cheeky weekend to see a concert (like we did) or for a whole week as you have everything you need. Only a short walk to the bus stop which will take you in to Dublin and there are local shops nearby to pick up groceries. 
We have spoken about returning to Dublin later this year and will hope to stay at Elaines Place. Thank you all.
Probably the best Airbnb experience a person could have.....  Elaine was friendly and responsive. The apartment was beautiful. Thank you
Spacious apartment that is clean and welcoming. Great location to get into city centre. Would recommend.

Great stay at Elaines place. Accurate description and pics. Very clean. Elaine accommodated us a little earlier than checkin since our flight arrived early morning. She communicated rapidly if we had any questions. 

Cowper is a great location for anywhere you want to get in Dublin, whether on metro transit or an easy walk to the city center. 

Youll love staying at Cowper and youll have the city at your fingertips. We definitely recommend staying at Elaines place.

First airbnb experience and Elaine made it all plain sailing. Check in handled personally, and communiction quick and easy. Great apartment in a great location (quiet and leafy) with unexpected extra touches of a thoughtful host. Apartment is spacious with all the facilities you need, with parking and a lift. 10 minute walk to local shops. A real home from from home.
Elaine's listing is well located, extremely well-provisioned, comfortable, and clean. We'd stay here again and recommend this listing.

So easy to get to from city centre
Beautiful, quiet neighbourhood
Spacious, cozy apartment
I love that it comes with basic food and drink to get you started!
Very welcoming checkin staff
I personally had my best sleep there while vacationing in different places - the beds were so comfortable.
The place was great! Short 5 min walk to the tram, food and grocery. Location was perfect. Elaine is an excellent host! Could not be happier with our stay.
Super convenient flat, not far from the Luas. Communication was great and check-in/ check-out super easy. Definitely recommend, especially with kids.
Super and thumb up
Loved my stay.  Close to everything. Wish I could have stayed longer. Ill be back!

Thanks for letting us stay in this lovely apartment near the city center. 
Even though we arrived at 11 pm, the check-in wasnt complicated at all and Elain left us some food and orange juice for breakfast. 
We had a greate view over the Skyline of Dublin and the bus stop to get to the city center was 5 minutes away.
The Apartment isnt the biggest, but the mirrors do a greate job.
The location was great and the accommodations were okay. Heat in the bathroom was not working and there were other issues, which were resolved by the host.

If you want a place that isnt in the center of the city and is more laid back/quiet, this is it! Very cute neighborhood and I loved that we could walk to the Tesco to buy bottles of water and some snacks for our day trips. A liquor store and pizza place were also within walking distance so this was great after our late flight in. The apartment is a little hard to find at first and our cab drivers had trouble finding it at times. The apartment is actually quite spacious for Europe.ù Having two bathrooms was also great and a wonderful welcome package!
A terrific location in a very safe area with easy and close proximity to LUAS and busses. Highly recommend.
Great location, central to everything.  Spacious apartment with everything needed for a comfy stay.  Elaine is charming and so quick to respond.

Apartment is in a great convenient location for luas and bus into the city.  Apartment was pretty spacious and had excellent views north to city and south to Wicklow.  We love the convenience of the shops in Rathmines
This place was very clean and modern. Elaine provided us with a few essentials like eggs and bread and butter which was great. Would definitely recommend to anyone.

We reserved this place for a family of four. Two adults and two teenagers. The place was outstanding! Way larger than the photos look.

 It was extremely clean and the landlord was amazing! They allowed us to check in early and even provided us with a very thoughtful welcome basket which included eggs, milk, bread,  orange juice and Irish butter!

The place had more than enough room for all of us! And two bathrooms! They also provided us with a very helpful booklet that describes all the local areas of interest. 

It was a short distance from a supermarket and a mailbox to mail  postcards!  

Taxi service to and from the apartment was easy and it was also within walking distance of very good local restaurants. if you are up to a 40 minute walk, you can walk to the temple bar area!

This is rental is a treasure and a gem! You won't be sorry for staying here!

This apartment provided the perfect amenities for our stay in Dublin. It was within walkable distance to the RDS for our concert,  3minutes walk to neighbourhood shops, great links to the city, by road,  rail and bus.  The apartment is safe and secure, in a leafy district in Dublin.   Great for a stay in Dublin.   This was all supported by a wonderful host Elaine, who answered all our phone calls ,  seen to all our needs and very generous with her attention.  Nothing was a bother to her.   Perfect stay

I highly recommend this apartment. Elaine has arranged everything and allowed me to check in early. The house is clean and tidy, very comfortable, and she have prepared milk, bread, juice, eggs, cookies and other foods for us .The quilt and pillow are very soft. Alleviate the fatigue of the day. Everything is great, I have to definitely recommend it to my friends.
First Class stay... Apartment is one of the best available in Dublin for the money, Will definitely stay again

We just returned to Canada after  a two week vacation all over Ireland.  Myself, my two children and my husband stayed at Elaine's at the end of our trip just before flying home. This apartment is perfectly appointed for a family of four and is MUCH better than staying in a hotel.  Everything we needed was in the suite (including laundry!).  The location was amazing.  Rathmines is a very safe family friendly neighborhood and is only a quick train ride to the heart of Dublin.  There were some essentials (milk, juice, bread and eggs) left for us which made for a quick and easy breakfast before we headed out to explore Dublin.  You will not be disappointed with this accommodation!
Awesome place, clean, spacious and close to stores. Can definitely recommend it.

A lovely flat perfect for 3 or 4 people. 10 minutes walk to the local tram service into Dublin central, so very well situated. Everything you could want or need in a self catered accommodation. Some thoughtful touches as well that we were super grateful for. Thanks Elaine!

Excellent host with quick responses always.  Met us at check in time. Gave us some essentials like milk bread etc. The location is super. Its quiet and near the Luas. Elaine arranged parking permit and was available if required. Nice quiet safe residential area.

You can not really get a better place, location or host - to explore Dublin. 
Elaine was amazing, always ready to help, fix some unexpected issues, provide useful tips and recommend places and services. The place is large, well equipped, as described. Location is fantastic - safe, close to local stores and restaurants and only 15 min with LUAS green to downtown.  Well deserved 5 stars!!!
Lovely apartment in a quiet area.
Great stay. Walk to local pub and tram - very helpful host
Elaine is an amazing hostess! We loved our time and found the flat clean and just as amazing as pictured. Highly recommend it!

Elaine does a great job of being available, helpful and extremely thoughtful without being at all intrusive. We arrived a day late due to a problem with our aircraft, we were wiped out, and she left goodies outside the door while we took extended naps. 

The apartment is in a safe, quiet area with a little row of shops nearby - small Tesco supermarket, liquor store, cafe, greengrocer, etc. The bus is around the corner, and the luas tram is a few minutes further in the other direction - the two made it super easy to get to/from excursion departure points, Temple Bar, and all the major sites. It was my mother's first AirBnB experience and she was delighted.

Very nice clean space with a nice 4th floor view of the city .The location was convenient to public transport to city center, pubs and resteraunts walking distance away. Very nice area with no worry of crime.  We would definitely stay there again.

This is a great flat in an excellent location in one of South Dublin's loveliest neighbourhoods.  It was very convenient - a short walk (4 mins) from the nearest supermarket, and only about 8 mins' walk to the Luas - where you can catch the Green Line into central Dublin.  The flat is bigger than it looks in the photos - and it has amazing views over the city.  Elaine and her team could not have been more helpful with booking and any queries, and the little 'welcome pack' of food was a really lovely touch.  Elaine was even able to provide a parking permit, which was really helpful.  Highly recommended!
Great place to stay. I would stay here again during our next visit.

This apartment is in a great location, short walk to Luas.  Elaine and Sophie were very helpful even arranging  our cab to the airport for us.  The starter pack was very thoughtful.  Apt was very comfortable and had  everything we needed.

Very nice apartment in a very central location. We only used public transport whilst in Ireland and the apartment is within walking distance from the Luas stop, as well as the bus stop. This made it very easy to travel into Dublin City Centre.

Elaine is a very accommodating and assisted us with all our questions (and we had many). We received a nice welcoming pack with a few essentials such as milk, coffee, tea and bread. 

We enjoyed our stay and if you are planning on visiting Dublin, I will recommend staying at this apartment.
Great location! Great for a weekend trip!
Elaine was a very helpful host and the property is close to Luas stop which is handy.  I would definitely recommend this stay.
Nice place to stay
