Rose was very prompt with  her responses and no problems at all. The accommodation is in a great location and had everything we needed.

Rose and Brendans place was clean and safe (we travelled as 2 young women). It is very small but equipped with all the essentials - towels, French press, and the like. It isnt very difficult to navigate to the city center, in large part due to Rose and Brendans clear directions. FYI future travelers might consider a 48 or 72 hour pass for the buses. The heat does take a bit to kick on but we were quite comfortable throughout our stay. Very nice neighborhood and great suggestions for restaurants by Rose and Brendan!
great place and great people!

The apartment is in a wonderful location, steps from Croke Park with convenient walking access to restaurants, markets, buses and taxis.  It's within walking distance of the downtown tourist areas if the weather is nice and you want to stretch your legs, otherwise it's simple to catch a bus at the end of the street and set off for the day.  Amenities were perfectly suitable and made for a comfortable place to crash at the end of the day.
Excellent accommodation and we easily walked to the city centre. Also found two great restaurants within easy walking distance.

Overall good place to stay for a night! The suite is small so for two people it can feel cramped. Not a big deal if you only plan on sleeping there. We only stayed for a night before our flight the next morning, but if you plan to stay longer and prefer space I would rethink this Airbnb. 

That said it had one of the nicer showers of all the Airbnbs we stayed in during our trip (even of larger spaces). 

Communication was A+.

Excellent value for money! 
Great location and comfortable bed. Great place if you only need a place to sleep and we would definitely come again. Thanks Rose and Brendan! :)

Perfect place to stay for a weekend in Dublin! The apartment is right next to Croke Park, around 15-20 minute walk away from the main centre. The apartment was clean and tidy, and there was fresh bedding and towels. Thanks very much for letting us stay!
Location is outside of city center but is close enough to walk. Room was exactly what we needed for the couple nights we stayed.
We love the studio and is near to the city center. Rose and Brendan are very kind
Very nice studio, near to Dublin City and to the Airport.
Very close to Croke Park. Only really used it as somewhere to out iur heads down and have a shower and it suited our needs perfectly.
It was a wonderful stay in a good very good area with easy access to downtown. Thank you for the hospitality.
Quick easy access to croke park and easy to walk to most places

Basic, clean room with amenities. Would caution the bathroom is quite small, room 101 is at the front of the house on a reasonably busy street so there is some traffic noise. The fridge can be intermittently quite noisy also. The room suits a short term (1-2 nights), single person stay. Hosts are friendly and communication was very good.
Good location

We had a pleasant stay. The flat is smaller and less nice than it appears in the photos and a bit far removed from town.  The bed wasnt very comfortable. Overall its decent for the value and does have everything you need. Perfect if you are planning to spend most of the time out and around Dublin and we were and you have a car!

Rose and Brendan have a lovely location just north of the city center. They were quick to respond and left helpful and wonderful recommendations for places to go and eat. Thank you again, I really enjoyed my stay!

Rosheen was a wonderful host and especially helpful with our relocation to Ireland. Her home is clean and the breakfast wonderful. Her home is located in an exclusive resort right at the beach, also located close to the train station, bus stops and airport. We enjoyed our stay with her.

We had a most hospitable stay with Rosheen and her family. We were greeted at the agreed upon time, showed our accommodations and treated to a lovely breakfast before our morning departure. Rosheen also recommended local restaurants and arranged a morning taxi for us. Thanks for everything!
Lovely room but it's a little too small (will be crowded if 3 persons were to stay in it).

The stay at Rosheen was great. The place was tidy and Rosheen is a great host. She was very helpful and offered fantastic recommendations regarding the surroundings. We felt welcomed all the time and would choose her again, if we'll end up in Dublin again.
Perfect location that is walking distance from the waterfront, restaurants, and shopping.
Great location and a lovely host give this Malahide airbnb top ratings!

Clean, cozy and relaxing. Rosheen is a terrific host. Great location î close to the airport, close to the train station (half-hour to Dublin). Malahide is a beautiful village with nice pubs and a castle.
My friends and I enjoyed our stay here, and would highly recommend. Rosheen is very accommodating, and kind!
Q

Rosheen's place is neat and private, despite being in her family's home. We had all that we needed and Rosheen and her husband were available for local info and anything else that we could want. Perfect location within Malahide!
Great location, friendly family, excellent value.
Very warm welcome by Rosheen, her husband and the kids.

Rosheen's  place is quiet, yet just is a short walk to the charming town center of Malahide, with post office, food store, and many restaurants and pubs.  The castle is  just a short drive away, or a 20 minute walk, and the airport is conveniently near.  Rosheen is a charming host,  super clean, and so helpful with advice.  Would definitely stay there again.
Rosheen was a great host. Had everything I needed and was a very enjoyable stay!
Rosheen was very pleasant from the get go. Fast responses and very accommodating.

Rosheen is an amazing host! The house has a very nice atmosphere. The colours on the walls and the posters create a positive and calm feeling.  Rosheen gave us private access to the bathroom, which is a plus! The breakfast included nice fruits! We liked the area even more than Dublin and we went on great excursions with Rosheen's tips. Make sure you buy the LEAP card instead of the Dublin bus card to be able to use the trains.
Very welcoming host and very well located
In the heart of Malahide, great location.

Rosheen's place offers excellent value for Dublin which has become very expensive. Malahide is a great little place and a convenient 20 minute trip on the dart into central Dublin. The room is small, but comfortable and comes with a spotless private bathroom where she provides soap, shampoo,  and shower gel.  Rosheen is a lovely host; friendly, helpful and she also provides breakfast in the morning.  I would definitely recommend staying with her.

Rosheen and Michael were great hosts, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay with them in Malahide. Michael picked us up from the Dublin Airport at a late hour (our plane arrived ~10:30 pm), which we greatly appreciated, and the room we stayed in was as described and suited us well. The bus stop and train station were within easy walking distance of the place, and Rosheen gave us great tips on potential places to visit. We highly recommend Rosheen's place!

Rosheens place is great for a stay when you visit Dublin. We stayed for three nights, three persons. She and her family are very nice and friendly people, taking care of their guests. Sleeping room and bath room both very very clean and comfortable. Breakfast was also great, she even prepared breakfast for us for our quite early leave, thank you again for that. Based on this experience we can recommend Rosheens place and would stay there again!
Public transportation is also very good:
You can reach the airport with a direct bus (102) in about 40 minutes, very convenient.
Dublin city center can be reached by direct train in about 40 minutes. Bus 42 is also going into that direction, takes maybe a little longer, did not use, but good to know.
Both bus and train station are about 5 minutes walk from Rosheens place, and during that walk you pass several (super)markets and restaurants, so very good place to stay.
As written before, we would highly recommend Rosheens place!
Very good place. Rosheen is very nice person.

We really enjoyed our stay at Rosheen's place. Her husband Michael picked us up from the airport, even though it was quite late. Everything was super clean. Rosheen offered a nice breakfast in the morning and left us the living room to take it. She is a really nice and hospitable person and I can highly recommend staying at her place.
Unbelievable location. Rosheen is just lovely and the room was spotless. Very comfy bed

We were hosted by Rosheen just 2 days, however, during those days I found Rosheen as a very nice and helpful person as she adviced us places to visit in Dublin and in Malahide (including good pubs). She also printed me out a boarding pass and also she helped us with baking our meal because we could not use the kitchen. I can really recommend staying with Rosheen.
Very clean and tidy place, quiet and cosy. Rosheen is a very attentive host. We had a wonderful time there.

I cant say enough wonderful things about Rosheens.  So extremely helpful with service to airport and buses.  I will stay here everytime I come to Dublin if it is available.   Malahide was a greatplace and she is right next to train and buses.  Thanks so much Rosheen Michaelfor such a lovely time.

Shes really sweet and answered all our questions on how to get to places and recommendations and responded to messages really fast. Provided a good breakfast with fruit, bagel, yogurt, tea, coffee etc. which was really nice.
Kind folks very near to all that Malahide has to offer!

Rosheen's home was lovely, inviting and very clean.  The room was as pictured, with one twin and one double bed  - both very comfortable.  The light breakfast, tea and coffee was just right to get our day off to a perfect start.  We had our own private room and bath, but had to be a bit careful out of the bath, as it was on the second floor and the stairs were used by the family to get up to their living space on the floor above and the 4 children used the play room off the bathroom in the evening hours.
Near to public transport. Its tidy and clean! Breakfast was lovely. Rosheen is friendly and helpful too. Satisfied.
The location was close to Malahide village shops and restaurants. Rosheen was very helpful and provided us with a great breakfast.

The location of Rosheen's townhouse was so convenient that we were able to reach the DART station as well as a couple of good restaurants in a few minutes on foot. Although the bedroom was small as the photo shows, we were  given an exclusive access to a full bath as well as a kind of a living room on the same floor as our bedroom. Since the townhouse was one of more than 100 units in the neighborhood, we had expected some noises at night. However, we were very much impressed by the quietness during the night and we got good sleep over those three nights.
Great location close to the train station (~5 minute walk) and a ~30 minute train ride into Dublin.  Parking provided with a permit.
What a wonderful overall experience, from being picked up at the airport to clean comfortable accommodations with a great breakfast in the morning. I would definitely stay here again.
Perfect place, perfect location, with perfectly thoughtful, hospitable and informative hosts. Quiet, cozy and spacious interior. My favorite place to stay in Malahide!
Great place to stay. Rosheen and her family are a fantastic host. I definitely recommend her for any future guests.
Perfect place,  Rosheen hospitality is excellent. My stay was pleasant. I always recommend.
The host canceled this reservation 33 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location in Malahide. Easy 5 min walk into the town. Can take the train into Dublin from the station in Malahide. It is only a 5-10 min walk from the house. Stayed one night as we were flying out the next day. Only a 15 min drive to the airport. Room was very clean and comfortable. Bathroom is right beside the bedroom. Breakfast was served in the sitting room on the same floor.

She came to pick us up at the airport even though it was midnight.
It was all perfect. Rosheen has been helpful and kind with us.
I absolutely reccomend Rosheen as a host.

I had a wonderful stay in Malahide at Rosheens home. She went above & beyond as an amazing hostess to be helpful & accommodating to my needs. She was always thoughtful & kind. Her home is within walking distance from the bus for the airport & train to Dublin. You can also walk to Malahide castle & the great local pubs, shopping & marina. Its a beautiful place. Rosheen has very detailed information & ideas for things to do & see in Ireland. It was extremely helpful in guiding me in my adventures. Im thankful to her & her lovely family for making my trip even better than I could have imagined!

Rosheen's husband picked us up from Dublin airport, only 15-20min from their home. Rosheen was very welcoming and gave us a tour of the space upon arrival. They provided a great breakfast and so many blankets! 
The train is only a 10min walk from the home and there are several bars and restaurants within a 5min walk. We had a great time.

What a lovely home in a fantastic location.  Ideal for families or adults who want to enjoy a tranquil urban stay. Rercy is a terrific Airbnb host. So many thoughtful touches for weary travelers...tea, coffee, wine and chocolates to name a few. She provided us with a detailed guide of the neighborhood that was so useful throughout our trip.  Such a great experience!
Great house with a lot of charm. Specious dining room. We enjoyed it a lot.
Nice, clean, spacious place, definitely worth it.
Great hospitality and well looked  after throughout!
We had a wonderful 2 nights with our family here. Great location close to train to city. Large bedroom with en-suite was terrific. Catherine was so pleasant and helpful.

Beautiful and spacious. Exactly as advertised. Gary answered all our questions very quickly and was always kind! We had some small issues with the cleaning but Gary explained and apologised. Overall a great experience. Many thanks

My family and I had a peaceful and enjoyable extended weekend at Garys place. The living space and two bedrooms were perfect for four adults, having an en-suite and large bathroom was ideal. The underfloor heating kept the apartment nice and warm. This is a quiet area about 2-3 miles from the city centre. We got taxis into the city as there were four of us, cost to the city ranged from ‚Ç¨13-‚Ç¨16. I would advise using the local taxi app. Parking right outside the door is a real bonus in Dublin.  Would definitely book again.
Gary is very responsive and communicates really well. His place is very stylish at the end of a quiet ally yet its very convenient to shops and restaurants and its an easy walk everywhere.
This is a very classy place, and you get the feeling that you'd enjoy a conversation with whoever has been living here.  We never met Gary, but he responded to our questions very quickly.

Garys home is very cosy and comfortable in a great village 10 mins from the centre.  It is close to nearby restaurants, bars and Herbert Park.  I stayed with my family between our house move and Gary was very helpful with checkin and accommodating our dog.  His garden is quiet serene and a beautiful calm space especially for a yoga teacher.  I would gladly recommend this place for any traveller.
Absolutely lovely apartment. Beautifully decorated, everything has been thought of, beautiful finishing touches. Great bathrooms. Lovely leafy green patio with a bbq. I could happily live here!

Great communication 
Stylish and lovely size apartment 
Garden was great albeit didnt have sunny weather
Good walk into town 
Good coffee shops, pubs and restaurants nearby
An extremely beautiful and very confortable appartment in an absolutely amazing area. Gary was very welcoming and we had a lovely time in Dublin.
Excellent place in an excellent location. Thanks for the warm welcoming place . The bus routes to the centre of Dublin are on the main roads, easily accessible.
Lovely flat, great location. Those who like to cook will appreciate the good stove and oven, and the lovely outdoors area to relax and share food and wine with friends.
Really spacious and clean accommodation in an excellent location! Gary was a great host! Would 100% recommend
Excellent place in a nice location. Host made it all so easy, including providing extra fluffy towels and anything else you might need. A real oasis in Dublin.

Nice house! With everything you can need, at home, in the kitchen, even juice and milk for breakfast! I recommend it. Only a couple of thing to improve: the flow of water in the shower is very few and the cleaning at the bathroom could be better. But anyway highly recommended.
Joli appartement spacieux et lumineux, tout confort.
Lovely apartment and great location.  Fantastic host.

My family and I had a fantastic stay at Garys. The apartment is beautiful and in a lovely part of the city. Gary had the place well stocked and the fresh flowers were a nice touch. I would really recommend this apartment and will definitely return to it again.

A fabulous stylish  apartment in Donnybrook.  Spotlessly clean with an extremely welcoming and informative host.  A very easy home-from-home with every amenity throughout including books, a completely fabulous garden, a well equipped kitchen, comfy beds two bathrooms and more.  Truly a pleasurable stay and our host Gary is a great ambassador for Air BnB - this was our very first booking and the bar has now been set very high ;)
Great host, great location, walkable to shops and restaurants,  comfy apartment with a lovely garden
Unique private real home with warm atmosphere and hospitality

Great apartment with convenient location and transport. Pristine stylish and very comfortable! Lovely quiet and beautifully landscaped bak garden
Terry
Great Apartment, super helpful host!
Gary is an excellent host. Everything was as advertised and even better. Provided the best quality towels and a fridge and cupboard full of goodies. We had a fantastic stay. Thanks Gary

Garys place was exceptionally clean, in a great location that was not on the main road, but close enough to walk to activities.  And only a 15 min taxi ride into the heart of the city.   The apartment was beautiful and well kept. And Gary was very easy to reach, and very communicative with access and tips for venturing out!

An absolute pleasure to stay here, and we look forward to coming back!  Highly recommended!

Gary is a very responsive host and takes care of all the details. Traveling for work we needed a space with two beds and two bathrooms. This place fit the bill and was also a cozy place, with a nice garden, full kitchen amenities, and a stylish space.  Fresh flowers and some basics in the fridge never go amiss. There are a number of cozy pubs, excellent eateries of different cuisines, and access to bus, air coach, and the tram system. Would definitely return.

Garys apartment is OUTSTANDING! It is spacious, wonderfully decorated and convenient to the downtown Dublin area. The rooms, especially the master, are spacious and comfortable. Gary was a communicative, thoughtful and kind host, which we were greatly appreciative of. The living space is open and the kitchen had everything we needed for our stay. The back patio space was also lovely and peaceful. Theres a dedicated parking space in front of the unit. We will stay here again on our next visit to Dublin!
Wonderful place to stay! Gary was a great host and his place was just perfect for our stay.

Gary's flat is a really lovely place in a quiet neighborhood on the outskirts of downtown Dublin. It made for a very comfortable introduction to the city for my in-laws who had not been out of the US in roughly 20 years and were not quite sure what to expect. Floors are heated, everything was clean and modern, decor was stylish yet comfortable with a great outdoor patio space. Each couple had their own bedroom and bathroom. Check-in instructions were very clear and Gary was super responsive when we had questions prior to arriving. The flat is a 10 to 15 minute cab ride in to various parts of downtown Dublin. For the price, it was a great value for lodging in an otherwise very expensive city.

Gary's Place was amazing. Gary is a real awesome guy. He went out of his way to accommodate us. The apartment is brilliant, very stylishly decorated and super clean. Anyone that chooses this Airbnb will be greeted with great hospitality and will enjoy every minute in this awesome accommodation and company. The location is great, close to great pubs and restaurants in the village. Thank you for your home Gary.

We enjoy our visit in Dublin, the flat is really very well located in a secured and safe residence.
The neighbourhood is very quite. The apartments equipment was perfect.
Communication with the owner Duncan was very easy and reactive.
We can just advised people to rent this flat! Thanks again and see you soon !!!
Great space with everything you need. Close to all the major spots.  Communication is great. I appreciated the food provided in the fridge.
Excellent location with lots of cafes, pubs and restaurants nearby. Super easy communication with host. Highly recommended.

The apartment is just as pictured - we were a family of 5 and we were there for 10 days visiting our daughter who is studying at Trinity. The space was very nice, with thoughtful, interesting touches throughout! The outside patio added a great extra place to sit and chat. The beds were comfortable and the kitchen amenities were really a nice treat.  I injured my foot while traveling , and so the location required me to use MYTAXI more than I had planned, but the city is walkable and there are a few very nice bars less than a block away!  Great hosts had a very helpful instruction book awaiting our arrival ( and they were so terrific about our check-in time- as our flight landed at 5:30 am!) All in all - a terrific stay!
The Penthouse was a perfect quiet oasis away from downtown but close enough to walk. We loved our stay and highly recommend the Penthouse for future guests!

I have stayed in dozens of AirBnbs across 10+ countries and Stephen and Adam's place is the BEST AirBnb I have ever stayed in: magical on the inside, great location, incredible hospitality. It is one of the only times I've been in a city and decided to go back to my apartment rather than explore because I wanted to spend more time in the AirBnb. 

Truly amazing - I recommend going to Ireland just to stay in this apartment.
Super zentrale Lage
It was a lovely stay. Thanks!
We had a wonderful stay! The apartment was very cozy and comfortable.

Terrific location. Easy access to DART, LUAS, and central Dublin. Clean space with comfortable and stylish furniture. Ideal for two couples. There was a slight miscommunication regarding check-in, but this remedied quickly. Highly recommend.

We really enjoyed our stay! Check in and check out was seamless, and the place was full of character and very clean. The host was thoughtful in making up the pull out couch to accommodate the number of guests and any providing snacks. Would highly recommend!

Beautiful Apartment that was more than we expected.  Close, but not too close to the city center.  Walking distance to main attractions yet far enough off the beaten path to enjoy the non tourist side of Dublin.  balcony was a huge plus!  Thanks for helping make our trip that much more memorable!

Fantastic!

The apartment was great, and very well located. Also thank the treatment of the renters as they were attentive to us at all times.
Great apartment in a great location.

Stephen & Adam's space was perfect for what we needed for a quick family stop over in Dublin.  Beds were comfortable and the space had everything we needed.  The hosts were quick to connect with me as soon as the reservation was made and leading up to our arrival and provided all of the information that we needed. 

Upon arrival, we were met by one of those hosts who helped us get settled and answered any questions that we may have had. The hosts were nice enough to provide coffee, tea and a few basic food items to get us started, along with a book that noted the apartment and surrounding area details,  very hospitable!

The location is about a 20 minute ride to the airport, 20 minute walk from Temple Bar area, and 30 minute walk from some of the "major" tourist attractions, but the immediate surrounding area has plenty of options for quick dining, pubs and grocery needs.  It's also conveniently located about a 3 minute walk to the Connolly stop for the Luas, if that's how you choose to get around the city.  

Would definitely recommend or stay at this location again. Thank you!

Fantastic. Highly recommend. It's close enough to everything to be convenient but far enough away so you get peace and quiet at night. Duncan and Marina were super hospitable and went above and beyond to accommodate us.
What a fantastic home! My family of five (ages 13-50) loved how clean, neat, well cared for this home was. Very comfortable too.
Amazing, attentive hosts, great location. We were spoiled by such an amazing property. Marianna was in regular touch to ensure we were ok... great experience

Absolutely wonderful! Thank you so much for your hospitality, we felt very taken care of. The view was positively phenomenal, even better than we were expecting! Would absolutely recommend to anyone and everyone.

This place was great, it was located near everything we wanted.  If you want none stop parties try the Temple Bar, if you want a place that is near pubs, restaurants, the train and bus station, etc.  Will come back again if we can return to Ireland.
Great communications. Super accommodating to jet-lagged travelers!  Fantastic location close to sights/restaurants/bars.

We had a beautiful stay in the apartment, it was absolutely perfect for our needs and was within (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) mins walk of everything. To be honest I can't find any fault about the place, there were supplies of Bread, butter, milk, ham , coffee, tea etc all there for us when we arrived too. We will definitely be staying here again (if we can get an available date). Duncan, Adam and Marina were so easy to deal with and responded via (Hidden by Airbnb) within minutes of texting. A really great place to stay

Cute, stylish apartment north of the Liffey. Had all the amenities we needed, and the extra space was greatly appreciated. Check in was flexible and a breeze, and our hosts were very attentive. When the apartment got a bit hot and stuffy, they even offered to bring us a fan. All the small touches like coffee, starter kit of groceries, laundry supplies etc were very much appreciated. Definitely worth staying and worthy of the super host designation! Thanks Alex and Duncan!
Good location and space. Cleanliness and amenities were disappointing. Poor value for money.
Great and beautiful space, incredible location and amazing hospitality. Adam and Marina are amazing hosts

Adam's place is very stylishly and interestingly decorated and designed.  The location --just north of the river by the EPIC Emigration Museum and public transportation -- is excellent.  It is also a quick walk to the south side of the river, Trinity College, St. Stephen's Green, and the Temple Bar area.  The view is great and the beds are comfortable.  There are several stores within a short walk so it is easy to get what you need.
Excellent communication and great location. Youll definitely get fresh air from this penthouse spot!

The place is excellently located in the heart of Dublin, but not too close to loud streets. The building itself is very interesting surrounded by canal. We enjoyed the luminous and large place with great taste. The host was very helpful to the every question we made - Duncan helped us a lot and even followed up whether it had gone well :) The stay will promise your stay very special and feel local in Dublin at the same time.
Apartment was accurate to listing - a great place in a great location.  Host was quick with responses to questions and provided some nice recommendations.  Would highly recommend.

The apartment is really phenomenal. The location was fantastic and easily within walking distance of all the prime sites of Dublin. There was absolutely no need to entertain public transport or Ubers or anything like that. It was a very stylish apartment with a lot of thoughtful nuances and creature comforts.  All of our questions were answered very quickly over the app and the check in process was super easy.  I Would absolutely stay at this apartment again when I visit Dublin in the future. Fantastic place!
Great location, with easy access to both red and green line trams.   Very responsive host. Great space to relax after a full day of sightseeing. Very safe.
Great place in a safe neighbourhood. The apartment is a short walk to pretty much anything.

What a great experience.  The location in the center of town could not be beat.  We were able to walk every place we wanted to see, including the popular attractions of Christ Church, St. Patricks Cathedral and Guiness.  Check in and check out were easy, and it was great to be greeted on arrival.  Hosts were very attentive well before and during our stay.
We would definately stay here again.
Well styled listing. Comfortable beds and fantastic location.

The place was as pictured.  The host was always accessible.  We locked ourselves out and the host was very helpful in getting us access.  Central location for business which was the purpose of our stay.  I will return!

This place was great. You can walk pretty much anywhere, and for places you can't, it's very easy to get a taxi (the meeting spot it right outside the gate). The host was great at communicating and being available no matter what time we wanted to check-in. If I visited Dublin again, I wouldn't hesitate to stay here.
The hosts were brilliant in every way very helpful!
Great place, would stay again.
Great stay, terrific location for Dublin.
We enjoyed a great weekend in Dublin at Adam & Stephen's

Great pad to hang out in newù Dublin... everything you could need for a city break. 
The guys were great hosts and communication was good. 
Thank you
A lovely house with plenty of space. A short bus journey or taxi ride into city centre.

The house is reasonably spacious. With 3 bedrooms, it worked out great for our family of 4. Wifi worked as expected. The place and the neighborhood seems safe. Our host suggested that we could park our rental car on the road, and that worked out ok for us as well. But public transportation is close by. DART is just 5-6 min walk. All in all, seems like a good place to stay for a visit to Dublin.

This is one of the best homes we have stayed in. Extremely neat and clean and you have everything you need in a home away from home. The location was just perfect and only 15min from Dublin City by taxi. Shops and restaurants are also close by. Best of all is the quiet area it is located in. Denise is a wonderful host and was extremely accommodating with the check-in and check-out times. Thanks for everything Denise and see you soon ;-)
Denise's place was awesome.  Nice touch with breakfast supplies for our first morning as we arrived late in the evening.  Quick communication and everything provided as stated in listing.

This was by far one of the best experiences with an airbnb our family has had! Denise was quick to communicate through out the whole experience. She was accomodating when it came to our check in and even had a wonderful selection of snacks and breakfast items which was greatly appreciated. The location was perfect as it was easy to get to the train and bus stop. We purchased a bus pass from the Spar shop less than 10 minutes away and used each day for our trips into Dublin. So many great places locally in town that were so easy to walk to as well!! Denise is definitely a super host!!

Denise was great! Was in constant communication and very accommodating. Really nice 3 bedroom spot with one room having a private bathroom! Very awesome place and like a 4 minute walk to the bus stop to go into town.

This is a perfect place to stay, the proximity to downtown Dublin can't be beat. Clontarf is a peaceful place to relax after a busy day in Dublin. The DART is about 12 minutes walk from the house but even better is the Bus #130 that picks up and drops off right on the main road about 2 minutes walk from the house. The local restaurants along the bay front were great. Fish and chips/burgers at the La Casa takeaway and pasta next door were a hit. Denise was great and very helpful, we hope to return soon.
Lovely house,  was well equipped.  Denise was lovely and helpful.  Overall had a great stay.

Denise has been an excellent host. The place was great and the location was geographically perfectly balanced. It was just at one stop away from the city center by DART, but in a safe and calm neighborhood. If you are travelling with kids it is also quite close from the Fairview Park and playground. If we ever return to Dublin we will contact the host again for sure.

My weekend in Dublin was perfect! Bb is one of the kindest people I've ever met. The check in process was easy and I felt safe and comfortable in the apartment. Barbara is also very easy to talk to and has great tips on traveling to the surrounding areas! Will definitely be making a trip back to visit!

Barbaras apartment is in a good location, with central Dublin within reasonable walking distance, otherwise reachable by bus. Theres a Starbucks just two minutes down the street, good option for breakfast. The room can feel a little cramped, but youll be fine for a few days. The bathroom doesnt have much space to place your toiletries. Bathroom/kitchen is shared, but I never had to wait for anyone, so that was no issue at all. Barbara was super flexible regarding check-in time, very friendly and smiling, and offered plenty of tips for things to see and do around Dublin.
All as described. Barbara is very sweet and nice host.
Barbara has a lovely place. With great (Hidden by Airbnb) that like to have an interesting conversations. Felt like home.
Barbara is an excellent host. She is very kind and willing to help. Her place is very well located and the decoration is awesome. I would not hesitate to stay again at her place.
Great host, really convenient location. Would definitely stay again
Ideal location! Also Barbara is really kind and always willing to help. Thumbs Up!!
Great location, house and very friendly owners. We felt welcome and enjoyed the city a lot! Thanks!

Ester and Ed are lovely people to communicate with. Their accommodation is cosy, clean and had everything I needed for my few days their. The location is only a few minutes walk from the centre of Rathmines and parking is safe. Would definitely hope to stay again if in the area.

Esther's apartment is very nice. It's perfect for 2 people. The room is a cozy place to stay. It's super easy to get into the city by bus. If I come back to Dublin I'll definitely stay at Esther's house again. Esther was a very nice guest host and made sure we felt at home! Thank you for a lovely week

This space was amazing! Esther's husband gave us tips of where to go and even offered to sit down with a map for other areas of our trip. The space is perfect and only a mile from city center. You have to try out this place!
It is located in a great spot.  You can ride the bus or we just walked up to the downtown to see everything.  Very clean.

A great little studio for a long weekend in Dublin. Esther is a fantastic host, and communication before and during our stay was quick and easy. The location is about 20 minutes walk from Dublin City centre, but we really enjoyed this walk in and out. The surrounding area has plenty of shops and restaurants, and it is very quiet at night! The studio itself was bright and clean with an extremely comfy bed! We throughly enjoyed our stay here and would definitely recommend to others looking for a weekend in Dublin.
Great, clean bedroom with lovely garden.

The apartment is very close to the Center. Some amenities were missing but Esther brought us everything very quickly. 
Perfect place for 2.
Esthers place is so nice. Clean and cozy in a very tranquil area. Very comfortable for one person or a couple. I had a great time and I will come back if I return Dublin.

Esthers apartment is in a good location for exploring the city, a short walk into Rathmines which has some good restaurants and cafes and a short 30 minute walk/10 min bus into the centre of Dublin. Comfortable stay for a reasonable price! Thank you

Loved the location of this cute apartment. Although small, it provided everything that my Husband and I needed for our stay. I would recommend this studio to anyone looking for a comfortable and cozy place in Rathmines!
Esther its exactly as the photos. Its a plus the backyard. Its a one bus from the city center. We definitely recommend this place.

We really enjoyed our stay. Esthers place was very beautiful even if there was no kitchen we didn't miss anything. As a guest you can also use the garden with was really nice to have breakfast or a calm night. She was really welcoming and we also had a nice chat with her son. It's not directly situated in the city but with puplic transport you get there easily. It's a good choice to stay there. We would definitely come back.
Wonderful location!  Clean and comfortable. Check in was great and the communication from the host was amazing. Would stay again in a heartbeat.
This place was fantastic! Great location and comfy room with style. Although we were 2 days late due to flight delays, we were welcomed warmly and provided with extra care. Highly recommend!
Esthers B&B was very clean and neat.  The bus to downtown was easily accessible.  and there are a few pubs and restaurants and grocers at the end of the block. (10 minutes away)
Excellent facilities, brilliant host very responsive with answering questions.

Esthers place is wonderfully located in Rathmines, with an easy walk to the restaurants, pubs and shops on Rathmines road, and equally easy access to public transportation. I walked everywhere from here, to the EatYard, Grafton Street, St. Stephens Green, Temple Bar etc., some of those places are a bit of a trek, but walking was my choice.  The hosts are lovely, and I enjoyed the tranquility of the garden.
Esterùs place Is wonderful! Small, perfect for 2. It is super easy to get to the bus from her apt! I would highly recommend it! When I go back to Ireland I hope to stay with her again.

Rathmine is quiet area but lots of facilites, you can find supermarket, restaurant, bus stop. Esther place really easy to access to the town and Studio1A is amazing. We are connect to the playground so we can breath the air everyday. Room is huge also bed. I would love to recommend this place.
Great host with a great space in a fantastic location.
Great stay!! Esthers place is very cute and clean. The location is great because its walking distance from restaurants and pubs.
Beautiful room, close to everything, wonderful hosts.
We had a wonderful stay! The apartment is clean, comfortable, and close to the cities best attractions. Esther was very helpful when a hurricane added an extra day to our trip. Thanks again!

Excellent little studio apartment. Quirky clean and quiet.
Parking available in a bustling rathmines

It was a very nice place. Clean and cosy. Nice local area with just 20 minutes walk to city centre. Esther has been the nicest host, and was very patient with us when we locked our self out of the guesthouse.
Spacious, clean and handily located. Id definitely stay again.
Lovely little flat, perfect for a long weekend away.

Esther and and Ed are quite the wonderful couple. They are both quit communicative and offer quite sensible and needed advice for the unlearned traveler as we were. Even their son Rory was helpful as a welcome kid conversationalist. Kids keep you young, too! You cant ask more than a clean functioning room. Walking to the shopping and sights of downtown is so doable and can be a fascinating event to boot. Great food downtown (Brannigans Pub had a delicious salmon dinner). All in all a memorable first visit to Dublin!

Great value for money in the city centre of Dublin you arent going to find anything cheaper thats anywhere near as nice. Nice space, the little kitchen space was a nice touch. Only small flaw was it was difficult to get nice hot water through the taps. Other than that really good space for the price your paying.

We really enjoyed our stay in Esther's guest suite. The place is very clean, and she provided amenities which made our stay even more comfortable. Though she was away on holiday, Esther kept in constant communication with us, making sure things were going smoothly. The house itself is situated in a convenient location, just a few minutes walk away from a shopping center, bus stop, Tesco, and several places to eat. Would absolutely recommend as a base from which to explore Dublin (and Rathmines!).
Smaller than it looks in the photos, but a great rate in a great part of Dublin.
We had a great stay at Esthers place. The apartment is ideal for a short trip to Dublin. We received a very warm welcome. Thanks again!
Lovely and bright place. Just over half an hours walk from the centre but plenty of pubs and cafes to stop at on the way.
Esther and Ed were very welcoming, left us to get on with our weekend and made sure we had all the information we needed. Very happy and would recommend
Esthers place is really well located and a very good base to explore Dublin.
Great location within easy reach of the city centre and a lovely high street - perfect for a work or leisure trip.
Perfect space for my husband and I when we visited my sister that lives a few doors down. Modern and lovely space!

We had a lovely stay - we were made to feel very welcome and Ed was particularly helpful in making sure we had everything we needed to make our stay enjoyable.  In terms of location we couldnt have picked a better spot.  Local pubs and amenities are a stones throw away - there are cafes - pubs - restautants everyhthing you could wish for walking distance.  Getting into dublin city centre was also a breeze - about 20-25 mins walk or there is a regular bus service too.  The house and room were both very impressive a large georgian town house perfect for a city break stay.  Couldnt fault anything really - if we were to be really picky maybe a bin area outside so residents can easily dispose of rubbish or recycling other than that a perfect place to stay.  Would highly recommend it to anyone looking for comfy elegant roomy accommodation with an absolute perfect location.  Thankyou, jag and collette
Nice apartment in a really nice area. We dont met Esther in person, but communication to get into the apartment was well described. We enjoyed our stay.
Loved!
Great neighborhood with lots of fun restaurants and bars close by. Walkable to center of town about a 25 minute walk. Clean space with why we needed for our stay in Dublin.
Excellent location and a nice bright studio, with a very comfy bed. The shower was slow to drain so we had to be careful not to flood the bathroom - it was a shame this wasn't fixed during our stay.
Comfortable, cozy, kind host, fast responsive on texts.

Esther and her family were very hospitable. We stayed in her studio, which was small, but just what we needed. Esther is a great host and  besides the normal amenities, even equipped the studio with a refrigerator, water kettle, and tea! The apartment is in a quiet neighborhood surrounded by a bunch of great restaurants and a short bus ride or nice 30 min walk up to the city center. Thanks for a great place to stay in Dublin! I would definitely recommend staying with Esther and her family :)
Very quiet and clean place. We didn't see the host for 5 days

This is the perfect location for exploring Dublin, especially if you can handle a 30 minute walk. Its a stylish area and there are greats bars and restaurants just down the road. A no frills accommodation, which is exactly right for the price.
Thank you for the wonderful stay at your place. It was so charming and we loved staying in the studio apartment. We had everything we needed and more. We would love to come back here one day.

Lovely little place in the heart of Rathmines. Super close to local shops, restaurants & within walking/bus distance of the city centre.
I enoyed my stay & would definitely recommend to other guests.

This studio fit us very well for our three nights in Dublin. The check in process was extremely easy, and after a long day of travel this meant a lot. The bed was comfortable and room was perfect size for my boyfriend and I. But my favorite part of this studio was the location. Had I not stayed here I likely wouldn't have ventured into Rathmines, which has gorgeous streets lined with brick houses and delicious food only a block away. It's also about a 20 minute walk into central Dublin. I would reccomend booking this studio!
A great space that is a convenient distance from the airport and Dublin centre. Highly recommend renting a car and driving out into Wicklow mountains/national park for beautiful scenery.

The accommodation is good, the room is big enough for 2 persons and is really private. The renters also reply quickly and are very hospitable. The location is good if you want to relax, but if you want to go to the city center it is pretty far away. Walking 35 minutes, the bus 20 minutes.  In general, it is a good room and nice hosts :)

My stay at Lee's place was excellent!!!  Check in was easy and Lee went above and beyond my expectations to make my stay comfortable.  Lee's place is centrally located and allows easy access to buses and local sights.  I would highly recommend it for female solo travelers.

The location of Lees place is in the heart of Dublin, walking distance to everything including Temple Bar. Room was private and clean, comfy bed and Lee was always available. Highly recommend for your Dublin stay.

Due to arrival and departure timing, I didn't meet Lee, but her flatmate Monica was grand! Clear explanations on the layout and how to work different lights and electric shower. The bed/bedding was comfy, a little balcony off the bedroom is great to sit and relax while hearing the Christ Church Cathedral bells, space in a wardrobe to hang and store items. There are several maps and reference materials, and Monica pointed out some areas I might be interested in exploring (I was and I did!) And she would ask when I was planning on walking between areas and let me know when a taxi was advisable (whether due to distance or safety). I would definitely stay here again. The location can't be topped, and the hosts and space are so welcoming!

Matching the description. 
Only inconvenient element : you have to turn the water boiler on 20 minutes before you plan to have a shower. Beside that all good, I recommend to stay and well located in the city
Great location in Rathmines!
Great place to stay, not too far from centre
If you want to spend a few days in Dublin this is the perfect room, there is a garden behind if it's sunny. Perfectly located with everything yo need near by. I highly recommend
Great place. Great price

This was the perfect place for my sister and I to stay while visiting Dublin. There is a bus stop directly across the street that takes you into central Dublin, so getting around was extremely easy. Bernard was very responsive and check in and out was simple and smooth. Id highly recommend!
Nice accommodation near city centre (20 mins walk). Clean rooms, kitchen with everything you need for a few days. Silent area at night. Supermarket next door. Perfect!
Tranquilidad y libertad
Very nice place! Well located in Dublin. You can have access to a beautiful garden at the back of the house. Bernard is welcoming and very helpful, we enjoyed our stay in his studio.
Bernards place is well located in one of the best regions in town. You have so much to do in walking distance. The place itself, although not too big, is cozy enough for a welcoming stay in Dublin
Very good location. Everything was good.
We had a good stay in this clean apartment. About 20 to 30 minutes walk to the city center, and plenty of public transport options (busses and bikes)

Nice trip! 
I recommend!

Great location to enjoy the lovely city of Dublin

Well located, clean, quiet, and about 20-30min walk from Temple Bar area. Bernard is a very attentive and responsive host. Great value, comfortable stay. Took me a bit to get used to the water heater but it wasnt a problem. Nothing fancy but its a nice little studio apartment for a solo traveler.
A cosy, little flat in a great location next to public transport and local shops, cafes, and pubs. Bernards communication was excellent and fast.
Very clean and convenient room. The neighborhood is very nice and you can easily access public transports or other commodities

Basic clean studio flat. 
A good base for seeing Dublin
Comfortable, very clean, extremely handy for city centre (and in the heart of a very buzzy / lively part of town) and host very friendly and helpful.
Great value! Very easy access to public transportation. Very comfortable!
10/10 would stay again.  Strategic location and perfect for a lone traveler.
Bernard's place was just what I was after and the communication the whole time was great and I had a great time in Dublin because of that..
Very nice little place, nothing fancy if you're willing to take the bus into the city centre. Great cost for the little studio
Great studio space in an excellent location. Easy to commute around Dublin from and great places to dine and drink around the area.

Sparkling clean and comfortable studio with all the amenities a person will need to have 	an enjoyable stay in Dublin.

Nikola
Very nice place, very cozy!  Bernard was a very nice host,  and i loved the location :) would recommend!
Super tolle Lage; kleine Wohnung, in der alles vorhanden ist, was man braucht.

This spot is perfect for a solo traveler who isnt expecting a luxurious hotel room. It is quaint and cozy. I found the location to be marvelous. Not too close not too far from the Temple Bar area. Its exactly a thirty minute walk to get to that area. But theres so many shops and pubs on the way that it feels like less. While there, I only used a taxi once (after a long day tour I was too tired to walk). 

There are about three groceries stores within walking distance, for those travelers who like to prepare their own food. Restaurants and pubs are plentiful around this air bnb. 

You can hear your neighbors, but thats expected. This airbnb also offers a garden (with a grill!)  to wind down and relax. All amenities worked as described - heater, water heater, and WiFi. 

All in all, Im very satisfied with my stay at Bernards AIRBNB.

Great choice for solo travelers, it quite roomy for a one room place. You get a bed, small table and small kitchen. The location is great, just a short bus ride (or 30 min walk) into the center. About 4 different grocery stores a few minutes away. Bernard has over 10 apartments in the building that he rents out. Everyone shares the backyard and the laundry room. Everyone's key opens the front door and their own door. 
This place is up one flights of steps and faces the backyard.
There is some noise from other guests, but not from the street.
The place was pretty clean except for some mold around the ridge of the shower.
Communication was ok, when I arrived at 2 I did have to wait in the garden for 10 minutes while  Bernard finished cleaning room...
In sum it is a good choice for a solo traveler, you get exactly what is described.

This studio is great!  It's in a central location in Rathmines which is a thriving neighbourhood that is easily walkable to the city centre. There are plenty of good restaurants, cafes and amenities in this area. The studio is in a quiet building and is equipped with a comfy bed, small fridge, kitchen to cook if you'd like and a clean bathroom with towels, shampoo and body wash. It was a very comfortable stay as I slept well and would stay here again if I could!

The studio is basic but has everything needed for a short visit.  The studio faces the garden which was nice. The location is great, with bars and shops nearby, and within walking distance to Dublin city centre.
The host canceled this reservation 7 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
The host canceled this reservation 6 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

This place was in a good location just outside the city center.  It was about a 25 minute walk to temple bar but the street its located on had a bunch of great places to grab food as well.  Bernard supplies everyone with a little list of good shops, places to grab food and everything else you could desire.
Super friendly host, quick response and very nice! Recommend!!
Thank you
Bernard was an excellent host. The room was perfect for a single traveler. I will be returning on my next trip.

Bernards place is right at the hub of a lot of necessities including diners, transport, shops, grocers, etc. Love the privacy of the place and the amenities for a solo traveler. All I needed were just a stone throw away!
Host was great to work with. The room came with tea and coffee, hairdryer, cutlery and crockery. Location is great.
Very good place. Highly recommended
Great value for money, had all I needed, generally clean, would recommend!
Good value for a great location. Shower pressure and temperature can be awful, but overall it's a great place for a solo traveler.

The room is very cozy with everything you need, ideal for a solo traveler. The location is good with various bus routes, easily accessible to other parts of the city and can also have a stroll to the centre. Bernard is a wonderful host, friendly, quick response yet respect guests privacy. I arrived around 9:00 am in the morning, Bernard arranged early check-in for me. Its my first Airbnb experience, which is far more better than I expected.

Bernard was a great host who was very helpful with getting me to and from the accommodation. Very polite and had no issue with me being slightly late due to public transport being slow/delayed. The room was great and very clean, although I did not use very many of the amenities I am certain they are up to a similar standard as the parts that I did use. The information sheet provided about the area is very helpful even if slightly dated. It is great that the information sheet doesnt just cover the big tourist attractions that everyone already knows about but instead local shops and pubs in the area. All-in-all, amazing experience at this location. Would definitely return if I were to come back to Dublin!

Bernards place is exactly as described! There are bus stops right outside so it is incredibly easy to use public transport. It is a little outside the city center, maybe a mile, but it is a pleasant walk or super simple to catch the bus. Bernards tips were very helpful for both the area and how to successfully get around Dublin.

I had a pleasant stay. The room was clean, quiet and comfortable. The description of the room on Airbnb website perfectly matches with what I found. Bernard is a friendly and supportive host. The location is great as well, with many bars, restaurants and supermarkets and quite close to Temple Bar district (30 minutes walking). On the way to Temple bar there are nice bars and pubs as well. Highly recommended place.
Thanks Bernard

This is exactly what I was looking for during my recent trip to explore Dublin. The space had everything I needed and allowed me to make several small meals on my own so I didnt have to incur the expense of every meal out. Accommodations were comfortable and well appointed. Bernard was very helpful with my check in and helped with local tips. About a 10 minute walk from city center which was perfect. Would recommend.
I would totally recommend Bernard's place to stay,  a good value for money and amazing locality. Everything is just so close by and alot of things to do around Rathmines. Highly recommended
A great place for a solo traveler.  Located on multiple bus routes so easy to get in and out of the city center.  Would definitely recommend.
Loved staying at that place. Bernard is a great host and the house is in a great location with walking distance to the centre.
Great place

Basic accomodation, location decent as Rathmines close to the city centre and on a major bus route. But the shower water pressure was not good and just a dribble. You could get around it by keeping the sink hot water tap on which seemed to improve the water flow, and you could also pour a 'shower' from the sink.
The host canceled this reservation 3 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Bernards place was absolutely perfect. My friend and I stayed for a weekend, and it had all we needed. Rathmines is a really cool area, with some nice restaurants and a couple of nice pubs. Its so easy to get a bus or an Uber from the city but super quiet to sleep in the apartment. Very good value for Dublin!

The place is small, BUT it has everything you need for a great stay in Dublin. The location was perfect with 3 grocery store options within feet from the flat, a bus stop across the street and a really unique pub down the street, Blackbird, that I would recommend. I was able to walk to pubs, restaurants, the city center and tourist attractions from the flat- I did not have to take public transportation once aside from travel to and from the airport. Bernard provided a comfortable place to stay with coffee/ tea, extra towels, and the basics you would need. The communication prior to my stay was excellent, as he was really accommodating with my early flight and let me check in early (thank you!). Overall I would recommend!
Really cozy place in a nice area. Would recommend.
Good
Nice place and in a good location
The apartment is very clean and has everything you need. We even cooked simple meals. Although in a lively and lovely neighborhood its very quiet in the apartment. The garden is a bonus! Beautiful!

Bernard was very helpful and friendly. He assisted us with all of our needs. Great location with many eatery's near by along with easy access to many of the bus lines.
Thank you!
Stramer and Bianca
Great stay at Bernard's place! Loved the neighbourhood, not far from downtown, everything within walking distance. The appartment was basic but nice for a weekend!
Great location, perfect for what it is

Located a 20 minute walk from Grafton street, St. Patrick's and Guinness, Bernard's place is lovely. I especially enjoyed being several doors down from the Bowery. There are some steps but a lovely backyard area and an attentive host.
Lovely place in a great location, located in Rathmines where there is plenty of entertainment and amenities, and a short bus trip, or walk to Dublin city.

Bernards space was perfect for my needs. It was super clean and comfortable, and he was very quick to respond and flexible with leaving bags prior to check in and after check out if I needed to. Some people may be concerned about its distance from city center and all the attractions, but it is really just a stones throw away via public transportation and much more peaceful at night while still offering all the amenities like restaurants, pubs, and groceries... I would certainly stay here again!

Location cant be beatîgreat area with lots of shops and cafes within walking distance of City Center. Apartment itself was a little sadder than the photos make it look. Very cramped. Thin mattress, thin walls and very moldy shower.

Our stay here was great. It was very clean and a perfect fit for two people. The location was good. There was a bus stop right across the street and also a lot of amenities in the neighborhood itself if you didnt want to go into downtown Dublin.

Everithing was like in the description.
Perfect location, very near to the bus stops, supermarkets, pubs and so on.

Very nice place with tons of pillows and towels. Local tips as well. Right next to a bus stop!

Small but ideal for a weekend mini break. Garden is amazing and I loved sitting there both mornings. Rathmines is great and very close to town. Transport links and airport bus all handy. Would recommend.
Very convenient, quiet, clean studio. Bernard is great host!
Excellent host

The place was clean and described accurately. There was even a backyard that had a few picnic tables. The buses to Temple Bar were frequent and quick, but walking to and from was just as easy and pleasant (30min~). We had a very late arrival and Bernard still checked in with us. It was a good stay.
Very friendly and helpful host. Good location in Rathmines area of Dublin
Bernard was very professional and accommodating.  It's not fancy, but it is clean, quiet, and in a good location.  Good value.
Great location and all mod cons catered for

This studio is great!  It's in a central location in Rathmines which is a thriving neighbourhood that is easily walkable to the city centre. There are plenty of good restaurants, cafes and amenities in this area. It was a very comfortable stay as I slept well and would stay here again if I could!

Agnes's place is great! The apartment is in a wonderful location, a very short walk to most places downtown. The apartment is lovely and there was plenty of room for the four of us. The only thing to note is that the water pressure in the shower isn't super strong, but other than that the place was perfect for our stay. Agnes was an excellent host and gave us tons of helpful recommendations for the area. She also met us early in the morning when we arrived so we could drop off our bags before the check-in time, which was very thoughtful of her.
We very much enjoyed our stay at Agnes listing. Perfect location to all the best spots in Dublin while still being in a quiet location. We would absolutely stay again! Highly recommend!

Agnes's place highly exceeded expectations. The apartment is in walking distance to everywhere we wanted to explore in Dublin. She also was extremely helpful in communicating and giving us recommendations for things to do in the city. Check in and check out were easy. Highly recommend booking this place!

Agnes' apartment is the perfect spot to start an adventure in Dublin! Agnes had lots of helpful information about what to do. A good friend of her took care about all our requests. It was a pleasure to stay here. Fully recommended!
Great location... easy to walk everywhere we wanted to go. Fast responses. Highly recommend!

Agnes appartment is very well located, in the center of Dublin. The flat was clean and cosy and we had a very enjoyable stay there. We came with our two children and it was perfect for them too. I highly recommend this place!
A very decorated, but clean appartment with 2 bedrooms. Agnes lets you use her Netflix account. Nice detailed stay.

The house is in a great position, very nice appartament.  Clean and cosy.  Agnes  is a good host, kind and full of tips!

Agnes is a wonderful host and gave us so many good tips what we should visit and where we find the best pubs. The apartment is near the city center - you can reach everything by foot.

Agnes' place was a lovely space and a great location for the few days that I was pottering around Dublin, with lots of nice coffee spots all within walking distance. Although Agnes was called away for work at the last minute, so wasn't there for my stay, she made sure a friend was there to give me the keys and was accommodating to my late arrival time. Thanks Agnes!

My stay at Agness place was amazing. The apartment was beautiful and Agnes was so generous and hospitable. It was clear that she truly wanted me to feel at home. She also sent me a list of things to do in Dublin that proved extremely helpful since it was my first visit

The location is perfect, you can find yourself in the heart of the city. It is a perfect place to see how the days start in Dublin. The apartment is clean, modern and it has a great view of the city.  The beds are good and clean. It has two bathrooms with all toiletries. The kitchen is fully fitted. The check in and out was really easy. I can recommend it for a sort or a long stay.

Its a cozy apartment. We had an enjoyable and unforgettable stay there. The most impressive thing was that, when we had a problem with the heating system, the owner or agent Matt came over to fix it around midnight.
Staying at Amandas place was a good choice for our stay in Dublin. She gave us good advices and the communication was very good. Thank you!

My husband and I had a wonderful stay at Amandas. We walked to most of the major sights and its about a 15 minute walk to the Temple Bar area and 20 minute walk to Trinity College. Amanda was easy to communicate with and she gave us a few great recommendations when we arrived. We also loved George, he is the sweetest! We would definitely stay here again.

Staying at Amanda's place was wonderful. Check in was easy, with a choice of times to meet at the flat. Amanda was super welcoming and her pup, George, is a sweet, friendly little chap. The ensuite room was bright, sparkling clean and spacious enough for both myself and my (6 ft 2 rugby playing) boyf to not feel crowded. Amanda had great local knowledge (Legit Coffee across the road was a great shout) and the location of the flat was perfect for getting to/from town. We were also able to leave our bags at the flat for the day after check out, which we didn't expect and were very grateful for. In short, 10/10, 5 stars, would recommend 110%.
Had a great stay in Amandas place. The location is good and the room has everything youll need. Amanda is such an lovely person and her dog George is aswell. :)
Amanda is the perfect host. The location is very good, only a 15min walk to the city centre.

We are very happy that we chose Amanda's place! We stayed for 2 nights. The apartment is in a perfect location about 10 minutes from the city center. It was well equipped and spotlessly clean! We would definitely stay again next time in Dublin! And George is great too!!

Fully recommend staying at Amanda's place. Me and my girlfriend went to Dublin for a weekend and Amanda (and George as well) was a super nice host. Her place is clean, in a great location and Amanda was quick in communication and gave us nice local tips. We would definitely stay here again.

Amanda offers a clean and very comfy place in Dublin. Her apartment is just a few minutes walk to all the things to do/see; no car needed. There are a couple options for breakfast, lunch and dinner nearby, but it's not too far from the Temple Bar area and other locations if you fancy other restaurants than the ones nearby. Amanda helped us a lot with finding a place to park and giving us tips to get around the city. Check-in and out was very simple due to great communication. We would definitely go there again!
Amanda was a great host. The room had everything we needed for our short stay in Dublin. Amanda was very accommodating and easy to communicate with.
Amanda is super nice! Very good location. Clean and cosy room. Thank you Amanda!

Stayed at Amandas place overnight after a redeye flight. It was a very nice room with a very comfortable bed and a nice sized washroom. Amanda goes out of her way to meet the guests and her doggie George was adorable. Overall we really loved her hospitality. The location is a bit further from the attractions and not ideal to walk at night. There were not many close food establishments. A great place to stay if you dont mind a walk into the main area of attractions. Bus transportation  to and from the airport was very easy to navigate.

Amanda is a very kind and helpful host, making you feel welcome from the first helloù. She offered suggestions of what to do and gave directions to the many sights in Dublin. The bedroom is a bit of a tight space since she added a darling bookshelf (not seen in the pictures). It is a bit noisier at night than we expected but the location is just excellent. Its a short walk from many of the spectacular sights in Dublin and safe! I would recommend Violets home to anyone looking for location and absolutely adequate sleeping situation.
Great place for a short stay in Dublin!
Amanda and George were really great hosts. We loved the little accessoires in the room (Oropax, desinfectant, etc).

Perfect!!! Amanda greeted us and made us feel at home. The room was very clean, the bed was comfortable. The apartment is located just minutes from the center. We will come back to you when we return to Dublin. Thanks a lot :)
We had an excellent time at Amanda's place. It was a perfect location and so clean and comfortable! Would definitely stay again and loved having George great us!

We had a great time at Amandas! She was an outstanding host, very friendly and welcoming. She was flexible with check-in since our flight arrival was within 1-6 PM and I really appreciated that. Cute little George was well behaved and so cute! Thanks Amanda, definitely recommend!

Amanda is a really friendly host who answers quickly to messages. She also gives great tipps for sightseeing, restaurants and bars. The room is tidy, the bed comfortable and you can quickly get to the centre of Dublin either by foot or bus. Don't worry about the dog George, we never heard him once - but he would appreciate your snuggles.
Tl;dr: Great place, great host, even better dog.

Amandas place is great! It has a great location in the city. Georgie, her dog is about as welcoming as you get, just loves a good pet! The bathroom was clean and well stocked as was the coffee and tea. I would recommend to my friends.

L'appartamento si trova in una zona comoda per raggiungere a piedi il centro di Dublino.
La camera piccola ma molto carina e pulita.Amanda cordiale.
Amanda is a wonderful host! She bent over backwards to make our trip as convenient and comfortable as possible. Definitely recommend.
Apartment near to the city center in a little bit noise street but at night it was silence.

This is a space with a great location close to lots of attractions in Dublin. We like to walk so it worked well for us, but it is also not far from public transit. The price is right for the amount of space, the amenities, and location in this city.  The affordability and location are the best features of this place.
Just slightly off the beaten path but only 4 blocks from James St., this room was clean and quiet. Amanda was accommodating and there was nothing lacking. A great experience.
Nice little place close to the city center.
Great location, Nice and clean room!
Amanda and George are both great!
Great cozy space, conveniently located.
Great location in Dublin. Easy to walk everywhere.
Great location, everything was less than a 20 minute walk. Clean, friendly and easy to get to.

Amandas place is clean, comfortable, and secure; Amanda and her dog are super friendly. The location is in a real neighborhood, with good places to eat breakfast and reasonable distances to walk to Dublins main tourist attractions. We found both on-street and garage parking troublesome and would recommend not having a car with you in Dublin.

Our stay at Amandas was very great! The location is good and within 10 minutes your right in the centre. Legit Coffee for breakfast is just opposite the apartment and very delicious! Amanda and George are very kind and give you great tips!
We can definitely recommend it :)

Outstanding place to stay in every aspect! Great location that is 15 minutes walking to every attraction in Dublin. Walking distance to OConnel street and Temple Bar. The bedroom was lovely. The bed is super comfortable and had a bathroom that is attached to the room. Everything was super clean. Amanda was really welcoming and had everything we needed and more. Thanks again Amanda! Hopefully we can come back again at one point.

We enjoyed our stay at Amandas apartment! She was kind and always helpful, very communicative and sweet. The apartment is located quite central, everything can be reached by foot. Little George was adorable.

Amandas apartment was perfect for two travelers. Private bedroom and bathroom, secure building, very clean and organized apartment. She provided an outlet converter (for US plugs), toiletries, towels, an armoire to hang clothes, coffee/tea. Plus she was very friendly and her dog was so cute! It was within walking distance of the main attractions, Temple Bar area, etc. A couple good coffee and breakfast places right on the same street as the apartment. We had a great stay, would highly recommend!
Tutto come descritto

In all fairness, it could not have been better. Amanda is such a nice and sweet host, she made us more than welcome from the first second. Bed was big and comfy and location was great. A big plus definitely is George, the dog though  Can highly recommend to stay here!
Fantastic place to stay, great location, great company and the friendliest puppy. You will have a comfortable and relaxing time at this beautiful place.

Amandas place was perfect for our short trip to Dublin.  10 minutes walk from both the main Temple Bar area and the Guinness Storehouse, we thought it was great value for both location and services.   Id not booked an air bnb where you dont get the whole apartment to yourself but if they are all like Amandas Id do it again in a flash.  We spent most of our time out and about but we felt very comfortable to come and go as we pleased, and when we were there we felt extremely welcome, the en suite bathroom gave us an extra bit of privacy, and Amanda was a perfect host- complete with great recommendations and a few thoughtful finishing touches in the room.  Thank you Amanda (and George- the cutest fluffiest host ever!) for having us!
Amanda is a wonderful host, she was kind and helpful. The room was really nice, especially the bed!
Lovely host!
It was fantastic!
Amanda's place is small, but clean and comfortable with a nice bathroom. Best of all, Amanda is a helpful hostess, and the location is an easy walk to central Dublin. A very nice AirBnb!

Lovely place located a very quick walk into the main city centre and close to so many attractions - all within walking distance. Place was clean and check in/communication was great. There are plenty of cafes, bars and restaurants close and even more a short walk away. Communication was great and Amanda (and George the dog) are very lovely. Safe area, some noise was heard from the pub below, but not too disruptive and sleep was still easy to come by! Great place! Thanks again Amanda :)
Great location. Amanda was really lovely and welcoming. Thank you for making out stay more enjoyable
Amanda and George were 5 stars, the room was super comfy and clean, well decorated and in a great location close to most of the main landmarks. I'm are very happy and we highly recommend it.
Nice place, not so expensive.
Perfect really good place and close to the center and the attraction of Dublin! Amanda and George are lovely! She gives good advices !

My friend and I stayed at Amanda's over the weekend. She is a very lovely person and she will help you with anything you need. George is a nice dog who's quiet and you won't even notice that he's around.
The room is lovely and it's convenient to have your own bathroom. Amanda prepared a little basket with a bunch of things guests may need which was very helpful since we forgot to take a converter with us. Amanda endeavours to please all the needs her guests may have - there's also a water boiler and tea in the room. We enjoyed our stay, the apartent is not in the Dublin center but just a 15 min walk away from all the pubs and touristy places.
The only thing which bothered us was that the bathroom could be a bit cleaner - there was a sponge hanging in the shower with black hair on it.
All in all we enjoyed our stay in Dublin with having Amanda + Goerge as our hosts.

Amada gave clear and easy directions to follow. The apartment is a bit older so its small and nothing extravagant but Amanda is really thought with setting out tiles and we had tea in the room! Even offered us slippers!! Her dog, George, is really well behaved.

Amanda and her dog George are wonderful, friendly hosts! The location of her apartment is a just a short walk away from all the hustle and bustle of downtown Dublin, which was perfect for us. Close enough to be convenient, and far enough away to not be massively loud. We would definitely recommend staying here!
Amanda was great and very friendly! And the room was clean and there was everything we needed! I highly recommend staying there.
The experience with Amanda was impeccable! The room was very clean and she was very willing and friendly. The position of the apartment is close enough to the city center. We absolutely recommend it!

Monicas place was great to stay whilst my partner and I were exploring Dublin. Not too far out from town and definitely very nice, comfortable accomodation. Monica was friendly and we really appreciated her still accomodating us and staying up to check us in after our flight was delayed. Nice little touches such as ear plugs as the room was on the street but to be honest was not bothered by any noise even without the earplugs. Very nice place, would recommend.
Great experience in Dublin, with the location of this place and the hospitality making it that much better.

Monica is an amazing host with a very beautiful home in the Liberties.
The area is amazing and very close to everything you could possibly want to see in Dublin.
Would highly recommend staying here had an amazing time.

Monica is a great host who makes you feel more than welcomed in her home. She is very thoughtful and caring about the guests in her home. It was truly pleasant to stay with someone as kind as her, she offered many great places to eat as well as where to find local services . I highly recommend staying with Monica .
Monica is nice, her hospitality and personal charmer made us feel well, the room is good and she tried to help us. We felt like home

My wife and I had an amazing stay at Monica's. Lovely warm welcome, very easy going and a great location for exploring the city. Couldn't ask for better hosts and being able to chat to the calmest dog I've ever met was a bonus! I'll miss you Frodo. Thanks again Monica and Michelle.

The house is charming with beautiful modern interiors. It is well equipped with all the facilities. The host, Monica, is the most charming, warm and helpful woman who made our stay in Dublin a very memorable experience. Also, the house has a cute little dog to keep you happy all day long.

Monicas home is very well situated within Dublin, a short walk from St Patricks Cathedral, and near Temple Bar area. The bathroom is gorgeous and updated, with great hot water (which was much appreciated at the end of the cold Dublin days)! Thanks for a great stay, Monica!

Your place was great! Frodo melted our hearts!  The bed was very comfortable and the bathroom was super clean. WiFi and access to the room were easy and efficient. The earplugs were a great touch, but we did not use them.
