Theres an amazing breakfast place (2 pups) down the road and its very close to the oldest pub, St. Pats and about a 15/20 min walk from Temple bar. We stay at a bunch of air bnbs and we were happy to have found your listing.  Slight issue with noise, but not enough to cower away from booking. Just know if you are a light sleeper, utilize the plugs. Thank for the wonderful stay.
Monica is a really great host. She is very friendly, helpful and has good recommendations for us. The place districts very close to the City Center. We will come back definetely.

A great location for exploring Dublin on foot. Amazing true local pub two blocks away at Fallons. A classic. Very good hosts and two lovely dogs that are super friendly. A fun place to stay, but a little noisy as it is right on the street. All in all, a very good place to stay.
Monica and Michelle were great hosts!  Our stay was comfortable and enjoyable!
Monica was such a lovely host. The place was as described. Everything is super clean and neat! Everything was splendid. Would definitely come here again. Thanks Monica :) (and Frodo )

We enjoyed staying at Monicas place. As other reviewers mention, theres a bit of street noise but this didnt bother either of us. There were even earplugs provided which we didnt make use of. The location is greatîno more than a 20min walk from anywhere we went in Dublin. Airport bus picks up about 10mins away. The private bathroom down the hall is stylish and recently renovated. Our only real complaint is we didnt get to meet the dogs!

We would 100% recommend Monica's place! Not only is she an excellent host, her place is located in  a great location to everything! Monica was easy to communicate with, she was super helpful, and great to visit with!

This place was awesome! The location  was perfect and central. Monica gave us parking vouchers for our rental car and we walked everywhere in Dublin. She was super helpful with restaurants and things to do.
Monica was great host

A really great place. Good location and ideal walking distance to Temple Bar, city centre and airport express bus. Clean, tidy, stylish space and we were made to feel very welcome. Would definitely recommend staying with Monica if youre going to Dublin. Thank you very much : )

I had a great time staying at Monica's place! She was incredibly friendly and gave great tips about what to see and where to eat. The place was in a good location and it was easy to walk to attractions and main bus stops.
The room is at a great location and most of Dublin is accessible on foot. Monica is a lovely, gracious host and the doggies are pure magic.

Monica is an amazing host - so friendly and welcoming! The bedroom and bathroom were perfect for our needs. And we loved being able to share the two dogs, Frodo and Jeffrey. We would highly recommend Monicas place!!

The location is perfect. You can easily get around by foot, go to cafes / pubs / restaurants and see the sights.
The room is tidy. The bed is very comfy. The window goes out to the street but if you are a light sleeper, there are earplugs in the room available.
The bathroom is wonderful. A big shower and a skylight. What do you need more. 
Monica is a lovely host who will provide you with tips and welcome you into her home.
Jeffrey and Frodo are the big plus! Such nice and cuddly dogs. 
We recommend this room immensely!

We cannot recommend Monicas Airbnb enough. Our trip to Dublin was made extra special by staying with her. Her home is in a central location, therefore many of Dublins highlights are just a short work away.

We really appreciated Monicas hospitality, her beautiful home and her gorgeous doggos. Both are extremely friendly and we loved getting to fuss over them during our stay. 

We cant wait to visit the city again, hopefully stay with Monica and her lovely family

We had a great weekend in Dublin, Monica was a great host and made us feel really welcome. Her place has everything you need and made even better with two beautiful dogs, we would definitely come back!
Nice place near the centre of Dublin. Good bed, beautiful bathroom. 2 lovely dogs as well. Would recommend this place!
Had a great stay with Monica. She is the perfect host. She helped me with little extras like parking (not easy in Dublin), breakfast, washing and lots local tips. I also enjoyed the two dogs. Fun!

Monica is so lovely, very helpful, very accomodating and offer good advices.  Her apartment is ideally located in the center of Dublin.  Her dogs are friendly too!  Thank you very much for your welcome.

Monica was a great host! She provided great recommendations for restaurants and pubs and made you feel welcome and comfortable in the shared spaces! The bathroom was very nice and the bedroom is located on the ground level in the front of the house but it is located in a residential area so we felt very safe and during the week it wasnt too loud at night!

Beautiful place, refurbished and very well located (nearby St. Patricks cathedral). Monicas was so kind welcoming us and let us share with her family their place. Clean and tidy. Highly recommendable!!

Monica was a great host and I felt very comfortable staying in her home. The room is well furnished, and having your own private bathroom is the cherry on top. You're an easy walk from any site you want to see, and but far enough away from downtown to be on a quiet street. I would recommend 100%.
Monica's place is fab. Great mattress, spotless bathroom and couldn't be better located. 10/10
Excellent location. ...close to pubs and transportation.

Monica and Michele welcomed us with a lot of warm. They gived us a lot of advices to visit Dublin and were really lovely. Frodo and Jeffrey were both really cute too ! The apartment is clean quite and ideally located in the center of Dublin.

Monica is a wonderful host. She was incredibly welcoming and we knew we could approach her with any questions we had about the city. She left us a file of recommendations which we used and found some great bars and pubs to visit. The room was clean and tidy, as well as in a great location with a short walking distance to everywhere we wanted to visit. To top it all off, Monica's pet dogs are very friendly and well-behaved and it was lovely to stay with them too. We couldn't recommend Monica's place more!

Unlike impersonal or automated entry AirBnB's, Monica is a gracious host who is there to greet you. Her AirBnB space is clean and utilitarian with a comfy bed and good bathroom. Her dogs are well behaved and friendly too. Great location for exploring Dublin.
Great location on the south side of Dublin.  Within walking distance of the major attractions.
Monicas place was great and was in walking g distance to everything we wanted in Dublin. Great host!

Everything was perfect at Monica's place. The location is excellent and the room was clean and warm. We liked the vintage style of the kitchen and the shower is great. Frodo and Jeffrey are friendly and respectful and Monica is a thoughtful host. She provided us everything we needed and a folder with info about great pubs and restaurants. We highly recommend this place!

Very well located, convenient and clean with lovely dogs to boot! We had some great recommendations for places to go for food and drink from Monica and she was very helpful and communicative for our entire stay. We had a wonderful time and would definitely recommend to anyone!

Had a wonderful stay with Monica! She is very friendly and helpful and was very understanding when I had to check out late. Her dogs are adorable! I would definitely recommend her place and would be happy to book with her again next time I'm I'm Dublin

Fantastic stay, we were greeted at the door even when we arrived late. We felt so welcomed like we were staying with family. Everything was really clean and Monica gave us so many great suggestions for eating places. The pooches were the BEST PART. So much love and it was so good to stay with them. Being from Australia, we were so cold over there but the apartment is constantly warm, and was so nice to come home to after a day of adventures. The place is so close to everything, we walked everywhere. Would highly highly recommend this place. Also great water pressure and great temperature in the shower, this is always a big thing for me and it was great. Anyway If you want to feel like you are staying with family and love some puppy love this is the place to stay. Thanks so much for having us.

Monica was a super sweet host, always ready to answer any question. Her place was really clean, simple, and cozy. Had everything you would need and two amazing dogs! Very accessible via bus/luas/taxi. Would definitely stay again.

We had a lovely stay at Monica's. Lovely room in a stylish house in a great location just a 10mins walk to St Stephen's green. Monica was very welcoming and had loads of great tips for things to do and good places for dinner and drinks. Thank you :)
Monicas place is superb, perfect area, very clean, very comfortable and everything we needed! X

Super position, really close to Temple Bar area (15 min), Guinness storehouse (10 min) and St. Patrick's Cathedral (5 min), as well as the Airlink bus stop to the airport.  Nice room, newly furnished bathroom in the corridor. Monica was very helpful, waiting for us for a late check-in and also letting us store our luggages after the check-out. Heartly recommended!
Brilliant location. Cozy space with 2 lovely dogs.

Our stay at Bens place was amazing! A lovely walk to the town centre, bed was so comfortable and the shower was amazing! Really what we needed after a long day. Bus stop right outside the house meaning you can go anywhere around Dublin for about 3‚Ç¨.
The whole home and our flat was very cute and cozy! We didnt meet Ben but we met his mother and she was very nice and welcoming! Close to city center as well. I would absolutely recommend :)

This space is exactly as described. Youll have the entire fourth floor to yourself. Really cute neighborhood in the wealthier section of town. 15-20 minutes to Temple Bar area. Perfect if you want to stay near downtown but not near all the noise. We walked to and from everyday. I was also sick during my stay and Ben and his mother checked up on me a few times which was extra nice. Would definitely stay again.
Beautiful room in a great location perfect for exploring Dublin. Super easy checkin and check out and exactly as described. Would definitely recommend- thanks Ben!
The host canceled this reservation 127 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Great location, a 15¬¥ walk to the city centre. Nice and cosy room on your own floor with private bathroom. Ben was easy to communicate with and made our late arrival very easy. Perfect place to stay for a weekend in Dublin.
Excellent location, great room and bathroom. Bed was really comfy, really felt like you had your privacy as you have the whole floor to yourself. Room very clean and stylish.
Great Place to stay in Dublin, amazing location, quiet but still central. The house is beautiful and the bed super confy.
Large bedroom. Close to southern side of city centre.

The room is absolutely gorgeous. We loved our stay with Ben - clean, private, spacious and beautiful room, even a little mini fridge and a selection of books! WiFi was great, check in was super easy, communication was prompt, bus links were very convenient, and only a ~20 min walk into town. Good assortment of toiletries, a kettle with tea and coffee, very comfy bed, good lighting ... could go on. Really happy with everything!
Nice, spacious place within walking distance to central Dublin. Host is easy to get hold of. Good value overall

This flat is in a great location, an easy walk to the Grand Canal, St. Stevens, and the entertainment quarter of south Dublin. 
Getting in and out is easy, and you have privacy on your own floor.
Ben's place was exactly as advertised - easy walking distance to everything. Close to bars & restaurants, St Stephen's Green and the city centre. Comfortable bed, spacious room and decent shower.

Ben's place was a great spot with easy access to St. Stephen's green and stop for the Airlink from Dublin Airport.
Place was very private and a nice end for our busy Dublin days!

We enjoyed our stay. The rooms are clean and the house is really nice. Location is close to city center. Taxi from Fleet Street (Temple Bar) was around 10-12 Euro. Bus stops in front of the house. If we come to Dublin again, Bens apartment would be my first choice again.

We really enjoyed our stay and would stay there again . Great location. 
Ben was a brilliant host who communicated with me prior to travelling & once we got to Dublin . The Aircoach drops you very near to the property & it was easy to find the coach stop at the airport terminal. Access to the building was easy as there was a key safe at the front door . The bedroom was large with a very comfortable bed & the bathroom was clean & functional. There was only little things which could have made stay even better. A lock for the bedroom door . We locked are passports in the lockable bathroom when we went out  as we didnt like to just leave them in the room . Proper cups instead of paper cups would have been nice . 
Otherwise a perfect stay . Thank you Ben
Great facilities in a beautiful neighbourhood.
Very nice room, everything very clean, and handy for the city centre.

Bens room is perfect for a great stay in Dublin. The area is quiet but still in walking distance to the city center. The air coach stops nearby and its just a very short walk to Bens house. Thanks for letting us store our luggage in the hall on our last day!
Great stay in Dublin! Ben responded to questions quickly, check in was easy peasey and in great location to buses and our favourite local pub OBriens!

Bens home was wonderful. The room was very spacious and comfortable, and a great location for walking into Dublin City for exploring. Very handy to airport bus and other buses. Would definitely stay again!
It was a beautiful, reasonably priced room within walking distance of the Temple Bar section of Dublin. I hope to return
We had a great stay at Bens place. Everything was exactly as described. It is very centrally located with a 10 minute walk to St. Stephens. Perfect location if you need parking.
Our stay at Bens was incredible. His home was beautiful with very nice amenities. It was quite and very relaxing. He left us great instructions for the area. Would highly recommend!

A beautiful room in a quiet home. Very short walk to most sites in Dublin. We slept well and felt well looked after with tea and coffee, milk, cheese and treats left for us when we arrived. Highly recommended.

The apartment is very conveniently located, you can easily get there from the airport and several bus routes take you within minutes to the city centre. You can also walk though and will be there in about 20 minutes. Communication was very quick with Ben and the check in went super smoothly. The bed was a little too soft for me but the room itself is very nice!
Ben's place was great
Excellent location, within walking distance to the centre. The space is large, attractive and comfortable. Hosts we're always quick to respond.

Ben and Zachs Airbnb space is great- a self-contained area within their house, that is a healthy walk the other side of St Stephens Park to the main touristy areas.  Although on a well-used road, the space was quiet without traffic noise. Their communication was very responsive and I would definitely stay there again.
Beautiful house in a great location. Room is spacious and clean. Bed is incredibly comfortable. Check in is easy and any queries are responded to quickly. Would fully recommend.

We had a comfortable stay at Bens house. A simple room with basic amenities - comfy bed and a hot shower, with a kettle for tea and coffee. Not too far from the centre of Dublin and some nice spots to eat nearby.

Ben's place was a great spot to stay for our short time in Dublin. The room was clean and had everything we needed. We appreciated the coffee and cookies that were left for us. We felt extremely safe in the area, and the location was super easy to find (we took the bus from the airport and the space was right across the street from the bus stop). The private bathroom was also a bonus. The street was extremely quiet and we slept very well. Would stay here again!

Thank you for a lovely stay in Dublin! It was great to be able to drop our bags off early and when we arrived the room was actually ready for us an hour early which was perfect! The bedroom and bathroom were clean and comfortable and we had a really enjoyable stay. The house is right on the bus route into town and we even walked it a few times- 30 minutes flat walk into temple bar area. Ben's instructions on good places to eat and how to get around really helped
Great Space! Highly recommend!
We were amazed by the hospitality of our host! The place was comfortable and neatly equipped just in the right location. We strongly recommend!

Located quite centrally (20 min walk from Trinity college). 
Nice restaurants less than 5 min and a Spar opened until quite late. 
Nice and safe neighborhood, only a bit noisy from the room. 
Room perfectly fine and private bathroom in front of the room. 
Briefly saw Bens mom Sally, no particular contact with her.

A lovely place to stay with a welcoming host, a clean and tidy room and perfectly located if you want to stay just outside the hustle and bustle of the city but close enough to walk in.  Offers great value for money and I would definitely stay again.
Fantastic house! Very central, easy check in and lovely hosts. I'd recommend this place to anyone looking to stay in Dublin.
We stayed at Bens for my first trip to Dublin. Its ideally situated an easy walk to several areas in the city and is easy to get to from the Airport.
Great location! Exactly what I needed for my stay! I felt safe in the area. Was able to walk everywhere I wanted. I would stay here again!

Fantastic location and welcoming reception. Fairly secure apartment and very clean. Recently renovated  with wooden flooring throughout. Can be a little noisy due to close proximity to the entrance gate and the main road but that is expectable in such a central location. Would stay again in future.

Good value and located in Dublin city centre. Short walk to shops and restaurants. Can be a little noisy outside at times due to close proximity to the main road. Spar convenience store literally across the road. Would return again in the future.
This apartment was very clean and comfortable. Its walking distance from many popular sites and I would certainly stay here again.

Charming one bedroom apartment just a few blocks off of OConnell St. Very convenient location. Good value when compared to hotel prices in that part of City Centre. Area can be a bit noisy, so come prepared with noise canceling headphones.

A nice, large apartment (much larger than any hotel room) with a super comfortable bed and fresh linens, lots of hot water, immaculately clean, great TV and channels - we caught up on Game of Thrones! I do think this was not a really good fit for us, an older couple with lots of luggage. We had to find a Dublin Visitor Center and check our bags while waiting for the room to be ready, which is later than most hotels would be, and hotels just accept and hold your bags. Making arrangements to do this and then check in took until mid-afternoon of a precious touring day. Younger people with only a rollaboard, and plenty of energy to walk around will probably like it just fine. There are some welcome touches, like plug adaptors and plenty of nice toiletries in the bathroom. The heat works well, which was crucial in Dublin's very chilly "spring." Fast wi-fi! The apartment and building are quite safe, but the neighborhood is a bit sketchy for a single woman, I'd think. It's only a few blocks from O'Connell street, the center of Dublin. David is a thoughtful host.
Great location. Very clean. A lot of street noise as it is located on first floor and faces street. More noise on weekend night.
Pretty accurate about Location but you are definitely getting what you pay for
Well located, very clean and good check in service

It was very clean and the perfect size! It was a really cute space and it was great walking distance from everything! There were all types of amenities that one may need and the building itself was extremely secure.

A great house for a couple, the house has the perfect size for 2 people, small and cozy, with all the facilities that we needed for a couple of days. The location is really good, closer to supermarkets, pubs and all the principal turistic places at Dublin. The host Carla was  a really nice preson and always replied me quickly to all my questions!

Great apartment! The co-host was exceptional. The apartment location is not centrally located, but is easy to walk to local attractions. This apartment is on the ground floor on the street and you can hear people walking by, which I imagine may be a bit noisier on the weekends.

Davids place is in a great location close to the city centre and night life! It was clean and communication was great! Only thing is it is very noisy but this is expected due to the busy street and location! I would definitely stay here again and would recommend it to anyone
Great location and wonderful apartment for your Dublin adventure. Be aware that it's on a busy street and noise might be a factor.  Near wonderful Chinese restaurants.
While this apartment was clean and well maintained, it was much further from city centre than we were expecting.
Nice place, friendly people.
Nice place, close to main street.
Very accommodating and great location!
Location is great, walking distance from most places downtown. Flat has everything a guest may need, and Carla (the Caretaker) is great!
It is very central to public transportation and lots of pubs and restaurant. I work from my laptop and the wifi was great and stable. We would definitely stay again.
Nice appartment, very close to the center and pub.. very nice!!!
Perfect place to stay!
Nice place. Great location.

This is a great sized and simple place that is very comfortable and safe. The location is a bit of a walk into the main area of the city, but it is still a great location. Also, it can be a little noisy as the apartment is on the street level, but we overall did not have a problem. The hosts are amazing and made everything very comfortable and easy!

Apt does not look like newly renovated at all, there is a big painting spot on the wall, the kitchen door has no handle and other small detail like that.
Host is great, responsive quick and helpfull.
Price Is quite high for what it offer (electricity is not included in the price)
Lovely, clean house in a great location for walking to all of Dublin's attractions, shopping and night life. Thoroughly recommend.

This house was in the perfect location, just outside of the major bustle, but close enough that we could walk anywhere. The only downside was figuring out parking,  but knowing ahead of time made it easier to plan! I would definitely stay here again.
Great stay, walking distance to everything we wanted to see!

This townhome suited our needs just fine. It was comfortable and quiet, the washer and dryer worked well (actually dried the clothes!), the rooms (both upstairs) were fine, and the bathroom and kitchen (both downstairs) were nice. The stairs were a bit cumbersome in the middle of the night to get to the bathroom, being squeaky and with the bottom two steps being so small, but it was fine. I thought that the location was perfect!! I loved being in the Liberties, away from all tourists, but near plenty of bars and restaurants with locals. We walked everywhere easily. Id definitely stay here again - I felt like a local.

A lovely home just outside of the city centre and a walk away from Temple Bar. The house was clean and well furnished with comfortable beds and pillows. Netflix on the TV was great!
Communication with Keith was quick and helpful. The check-in/out process was really easy.
Thanks for a lovely stay!

Keith has a lovely place, check in & out was easy and hassle free. We had an issue with the tv/internet which was quickly corrected.
The Liberties is great quaint area with great little shops, great location and within easy walking distance to Guinness Brewery and Temple bar.

Lovely cottage, perfect for a few days in Dublin. Well located near the city center, in a cute neighborhood. The house was also very clean and we appreciated the basic supplies at our disposition¬†! Would recommand¬†!
We had such a nice few days in Dublin. Very nice place to stay, great location and exeptional communication. Id highly recommend staying here.

Great little house. Very clean, great bedding. There were 6 of us and we all managed to shower in the morning with hot water .. just don't let the water run all the time. About 15min walk to Trinity College. 5 min to Guiness and Teeling distillery.  Convenient little shop around the corner. Calm street.

We can recommend the house of Keith. Its a lovely little house 15 min away (by foot) from the temple bar. Everything is clean and you have all the stuff you need in the house. Check in and check out is easy with the key box. We had a great time and enjoyed Dublin.

This cozy apartment was in a great location and well appointed.  Clean and stylish with comfortable beds. The stairs are steep which was challenging for those with me that had mobility issues but that was the only minor issue we had. Keith as very patient with our changing schedule and was very quick to respond. I would highly recommend staying here.
Keith was easy to deal with and responded quickly. Awesome location. A stones throw from the Storehouse and 16 minutes walk in to central Dublin
Perfect for a weekend in Dublin, central location, spotless and kitchen had everything you would ever need.
This home was in a great central location very close to all the main attractions as well as providing a nice quiet place to relax at the end of the day.  It was perfect for us.

Loved the location 
House was super clean
And was able to accommodate 6 comfortably

Our family of three was very comfortable here.  The washer/dryer was a terrific convenience.  We dont mind walking so ditched our car back at the airport after getting our stuff in and were able to get around everywhere by foot.  The Lidl supermarket nearby has a great selection of affordable foods!

We had a great time staying in your quaint cottage in The Liberties.  The location was perfect for seeing the sights, an easy walk to many of the local favorites.  The sofa bed was comfortable, the linens are stored inside the long section.  We would love to return for a future visit.
Great location and beautiful apartment!

Keiths home is in a great spot for your time in Dublin - very close to Guiness Storehouse and an easy 15 -20 Min walk to Temple Bar area.  
Best suited for a group of 4 adults - as we were 6 adults and found it to be tight quarters  but certainly do-able.   Keiths home is lovely and he is a good, efficient and prompt communicator.
We loved the location and Keith was a very responsive host. The space is a little small and 1 small bathroom but we made it work for 5.

We had a nice stay at Keiths place. It was clean and nicely decorated. However, while this pace technically sleeps 6, we felt cramped with a family of 5. Perhaps it would be better for littler kids but we have teenagers and it was a bit small for us.  Check in process was easy and had no issues while staying there.

The house's location is great.
It is a small and cosy house, perfect for a short trip (I stayed for 5 days). It was perfect for four people despite the size of bathroom.

Apartamento en una ubicacion excepcional. Barrio muy bien situado para conocer a pie la ciudad y con supermercados y pubs muy recomendables en la zona ( por si quieres vivir otra experiencia de Dublin que no sea la de Temple Bar )
Keith was easy to communicate with and his place was great. His place is super close to everything we basically walked to get to all the attractions. Highly recommend staying with Keith!
Great accommodation in an excellent location at a reasonable price.
Nice communal space and about a 20 minute walk to main areas for food, drink etc. Well equipped kitchen for eating in.

The location and ease of this Airbnb was perfect!! The space was great and provided a landing pad with perfect location and needed level of comfort for our short stay.
The space was a bit tight for 4 grown men, we anticipated tight but was a little tighter squeeze than anticipated. Id recommend for 3 men (or less) over adding the 4th on the couch for just a bit of added comfort during your stay.
The handle on bathroom door gave us a bit of trouble but the rest of the group who had small troubles simply didnt read the signage and directives easily left for those who stay.
Overall we enjoyed our stay in this Airbnb and would recommend (for groups smaller than our own). :)

The house was smaller than I expected, but was quite cosy. Actually brought me and my friends a little more together. The beds were comfy and I really liked the thick pillows. The kitchen had everything that was needed, an oven, fridge and all spices and sauces.

Keith's place was great.  We arrived a bit earlier then expected, and he happily accommodate us.  We had some questions on how things operated, his response was quick and thorough.  The location was centrally located, we walked everywhere we wanted.  *As previously noted the stairs are steep,  narrow and a bit slick.

We had a good stay. Can walk into town in 15 mins. The local area is a bit run down so you would want to always head into Dublin City. 
Compact house but offered what we needed as spent most of the day out and about
Really lovely house. The sofa bed in the living room works very well as an additional bedroom as it's separated from the bathroom and kitchen by a door. Great location and fantastic host.
Amazing
Good ubication, 10 minutes by bus 79/79A/40 to the center of The city, the stop bus is in front of the house. The flat is perfect for three persons and Patrick respond quickly any dubt.
A nice apartment in a central location.    Patrick is responsive and flexible.  I would definitely stay there again.

This place is a convenient bus ride to city center where there is lots to do and explore. Patrick is always available for questions and is easy to communicate with. The train tracks are extremely close to the building and are quite loud but stop running between 12am and 6am. Other than that this is a nice place to stay for 1-2 people.
Patrick's place was very nice, great environment to be in. Very communicative when needed and accommodation.
Patricks house was a good place to stay. Easy bus connection to the city.

Lovely apartment situated about a 20 minute bus ride outside of the city centre. Patrick was lovely, patient and helpful and friendly, replied quickly to all messages and questions. The apartment was lovely and spacious with a balcony, and WiFi in a quiet location except for the odd train going past but that wasn't really too much of a bother!
Great location, parking was useful for us! Very very helpful and accommodating. Would stay again!
Patrick was very accommodating but cleanliness could be better and train noise was an issue.

I have stayed here with two other people over the weekend and it was still comfortable. Great connection to the city center by public transport. Patrick is a great host, helpful and very quick to respond.
Good host, nice place, close to city.
Its not too bad, next time a little bit more cleaned. Patrick was very nice.
Dolores and her family were wonderful! They accommodated our last minute request, and provided a warm welcome to the house. The neighborhood is adorable, and the people so friendly!

Delores and her family were fantastic hosts and this home is uniquely wonderful.  The neighborhood is very charming and very safe while close to transit options to explore Dublin and beyond.  My family had a truly unforgettable month staying in this home and we hope to do it again some day.
The host canceled this reservation 24 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

The apartment's location is within walking distance to everything. The building has elevator so you don't  need to carry luggage ups and down. The apartment is decorated nicely, and the washer/dryer is a huge help. Communication with Cathal was always fast and easy. She is also very flexible with early check-in or late check-out. We would definitely recommend her place to anyone traveling to Dublin.

Good area to stay - good communication from the host. Had a lovely time. 

Only thing Id say is there was some wear & tear, however this is expected.
Great location. Great space. Four adults fit comfortably.

Great 2 bedroom apartment close to public transport. We used the hop on hop off bus which picked us up across the road. Close walk to temple bar tourist district (5-10min) and other attractions. Had everything you needed in the kitchen for cooking. Beds were ok, but a bit old and sunken. Coffee shops downstairs and a express grocery store across road. Building is safe. Enjoyed my stay.
Great location and good communication from Cathal. The Cathedral Cafe and Two Pups Cafe were both delicious. Bed was comfy. Would recommend.

Cathal's apartment is perfectly situated in the heart of Dublin, near St. Patrick's Cathedral and Francis Street. Her instructions/communication were quick, clear, and helpful and we really appreciated being able to check in early so we could drop our luggage and go explore! The space is well furnished, clean, and very spacious. Make sure to check out her welcome binder for tips about great places to eat, drink, and enjoy. We would definitely return in the future!
Lovely place, spotlessly clean and really close to Vicar street which was perfect for us

Perfect location to feel a little like a local! The Cathedral Cafe on the other side of the road serves a fabulous full Irish Breakfast. A must. 
Walking distance to several bus stops as well as St. Stephen's Green, Teeling Distillery and the Guinness Storehouse. Also near city centre and about 20 minutes away from Trinity College.
Your lovely host has tea, coffee, sugar and a French press available. There is a supermarket in the same block. Very convenient!
Earplugs are -unfortunately- necessary, but also provided. Check-in /out is super easy - and very "Dublin". Love it!
Great location, clean, perfect for 2 couples.

Cathal's apartment was perfect for us. We were going to a show in the Olympia and it was very close walking distance for us. Beds were comfy and the apartment was very clean and perfect for 2 couples. Very close to main city center and plenty of amenities near by.

Great location to do things. However there is a big construction project going on across the street that is very noisy. Plus the nightlife is very loud there. Still worked around everything and it was just a short visit it worked for us

This AirBnb is in a perfect location. It is 1/4 block from a mini market, 1/2 block to St Patricks Cathedral and a Hop on Hop off bus stop. In addition just around the corner there is a city bus stop (across the street from St. Patricks). We caught the bus here twice to go up the street to Christ Church Cathedral ( which is within walking distance as well). Both times the City Bus drivers when we asked do you go to Christ Church and asked how much was the fare just waived us on without payment. It was only 2 stops away. It is also an easy walk from Christ Church to Dublin Castle and an easy walk from Dublin Castle to St. Patricks. All 3 of which are must sees. We didnt go to the Ginness Storehouse but it is also within walking distance. 
The unit is very nice and we really enjoyed our stay. It gets a little noisy around 7:30 am because of all the early morning traffic but was very quite at night. The elevator was real handy. We would stay here again if we are ever in Dublin.
Great place, Cathal is very quick to respond to questions and very helpful.

Had a wonderful stay! It was our first night in Dublin after flying from the US, so we spent most of our time sleeping. Bed was very comfy! Great location and within walking distance of many attractions. Would definitely stay again!!
Great place to stay in Dublin.  On the fringes of the busiest places.  Felt we were more locals than tourists.  Would recommend this without hesitation.
Great location. Clean and convenient.

Cathals apartment is the perfect place to stay when visiting Dublin! It was a great location within walking distance of everywhere we wanted to go. Two cozy bedrooms with comfortable beds, a bathroom, living space, kitchen, and small balcony. Cathal left great tips for our stay and checked in on us to ensure we had everything we needed. I highly recommend!
This lovely apartment is in a great location. The elevator made hauling luggage so much easier.

This was our first stop on our Ireland road trip and it was beyond perfect! Perfect location to walk to all major areas but not too close that we had to worry about extra noise. Cathal was a gracious host and answered my call when we had parking questions. The biggest thing Cathal helped us with was acting urgently to mail us something we left behind! We cannot thank her enough as a host and for her great space!

Our stay was great! The apartment is located near everything we wanted to see in the city and was well maintained. Cathal was quick to send a message making sure everything was going ok (a message I missed due to the app not sending me notifications while I was over there). The only minor hiccup we had is that the checkout instructions stated to leave the keys in the mailroom - accessible by a key provided. Unfortunately, unaware to Cathal, a keypad lock had been added to the mailroom preventing us access. I contacted Cathal via the app, and she responded instantly with further instructions. We could not have been happier with our stay.  The only other thing I would like to add is that for some reason the taxi drivers had a hard time finding the apartment with their GPS. This was quickly remedied by just telling them to take us to Fallon's Pub by St. Patrick's Cathedral.

Cathal's apartment location was great and right across the street from St Patrick's cathedral. The apartment was very nice and comfortable for the four of us. The walk was 15 minutes to the Temple Bar area of Dublin. Picked up the keys at a cute pub across the street from the apartment.

The location is GREAT , the apartment is clean , organized  and a good value.
We would recommend this place in Dublin‚òòÔ∏è
Perfect location to hit all the Dublin highlights. Simple, convenient check in.
Convenient location, clean and welcoming and very pleasant host

Cathals place was amazing! It was clean and the location was fantastic, right near St. Patricks and a quick walk to Temple Bar area. Her apartment was also beautiful, I wish I got to stay a couple more nights there. Would highly recommend staying at Cathals place if you are in Dublin.
excellent location. great apartment. excellent communication. highly recommend
Great location with a comfortable space.

My husband, myself and another couple stayed for one night and it was wonderful. The place is in a good location, walking distance to bars and restaurants. It is very well kept, super clean and cute decor.

Cathal has a lovely space in a great place in Dublin. Walking  distance to Saint Patricks Cathedral and Christ Church. Several restaurants in walking distance and grocery stores, etc. The house is spacious and the WIFI worked really well. All kinds of little touches like coffee, paper towels, spices, etc. for cooking. We were especially grateful for the washer and dryer at the end of our trip. I highly recommend this space. I cant imagine you finding one much better. Great value, spotlessly clean and easy checkin. Just book it!
Great location!  Would stay again!
Great place. Very good location, walking distance to city centre. Very quiet due to double glazed windows. Clean and comfortable

Cathal was fantastic at communication and well above and beyond to help us out when we had a 13 hour delay with our flight. The location of her apartment is excellent and you can walk to every where. The apartment is exactly as described and worked great for start of our Ireland vacation. Would stay here again for sure.  Can't thank you enough for all your help. Mike, Carrie & Ross
An amazing place with lots of adventures close by.  You will have no issues finding dining options and it's in a very convenient location.

Location is everything at this place. We were only here for 1 night and it worked well for this. We were right across from St.Patrick's Cathedral. Pretty much a 10-15 minute walk from most places. Cathal helped with any questions we had.

This apartment worked out perfectly for our family of four.  There was plenty of room.  The neighborhood was great.   We could walk to pretty much everything we wanted to do.  

Fallon's across the street was the perfect place to end each evening with a pint or two of Guinness.  We loved everything about Dublin and this apartment.

Cathal was great at communicating! We had an issue with the hot water when we first arrived but he arranged for it to be sorted out the same day. Good location and plenty of room! Thank you for having us Cathal!

This was a great location, it had a lift (we had a lot of luggage and my dad is elderly, so that was nice!), and Cathal provided us the opportunity to check-in early and that was greatly appreciated, and her communication before was very helpful, detailed, and accurate. Just wish it had been a little cleaner. The refrigerator smelled and had food bits still in drawers, we pulled dirty glasses out of the cupboard, and bath towels were left out to air dry to be eco-friendly but that wasnt a very welcoming sight and the open window let TONS of flies in. This was easy for just a one-night stay, close to lots of Dublin attractions, and spacious enough for our group of four adults.

Cathal was a great host. Very quick and helpful communication. Very easy check-in and out. Great location, with plenty of cafes nearby and walking distance to plenty of Dublin sites. Plenty of room for my family of four. Definitely recommend this place. 
Did get a bit loud at night with the pub across the street, but it added to the charm for us.

Clean, modern apartment with easy check in / check out arrangements. Lots of local tips and communication from Cathal. About 20 minutes walk to Temple bar area, 40 minutes to RDS arena (as we were staying for a concert there)  ideally situated for us
Nice and clean apartment; conveniently located. Cathal was quick to respond and very clear in her instructions. Check-in and check-out were exceedingly easy. Would definitely recommend.

Great location for walking to most all attractions within Dublin. 
The layout of the place works well for more than 3 people. 
Very noisy at night though. Need to keep the windows closed and hope they block it!
Grocery right across the street and a good coffee place right by the building too. 
Cathal is very responsive to questions and feedback.
Convenient to everything.

We highly recommend Cathal's place! Check-in was very easy, the apartment was clean, and the location was great for walking to nearby restaurants and historic sites. The bed was also very comfortable and allowed us to get a good night of sleep before flying home.

Cathal's place was in a great location within walking distance to all of Dublin's attractions. Cathal was a very responsive host and the apartment was a large space. If you have a car like us we found street parking in Francis St that is free from 7.00pm to 7.00am. Check-in was simple and make sure you have a guiness across the road at Fallon's. We had a great time.
Very comfortable place in a great location.
We had a great time and we would book this apartment again.
Great place! Cathal was very responsive and gave great information
Great place to stay in the city center of Dublin, walking distance to all of major sites. Cathal is a fantastic host with great tips. Thanks so much!
The location was perfect to walk and know the city. The street is a little bit noisy but nothing crazy. The apartment was very clean and the bed very constable.

This is a nice, clean two bedroom flat.  Plenty of room and amenities.  The host, Cathal is extremely responsive and helpful.   It is on the third floor of an apartment building but the lift worked very well. Would recommend it if you are looking for a two bedroom flat.
Apartment as described. Decent location.
Very clean, easy to find and has all the amenities we needed! Plenty easy to walk everywhere we needed to go!

Cathals place is perfect for a small family or two couples. It is perfectly located with everything you want to see in easy walking distance from the apartment. Considering the location it can be a little loud outside later in the evening (we stayed on a Thursday night so it was probably a busier evening) but it was no trouble getting to sleep. I highly recommend  staying here!
good location  excellent apartment
Great stay at this apartment.  Fantastic central location and place was spacious,clean and comfortable. Highly recommended
Good location, good house, nice host.
Perfect for what we were after.  Clean and tidy.  Nice amount of space and handy enough location.
Good location, cool house with parking. Quick response and nice recommendations.
Sinead is a responsive and dedicated host. We had a good time in Dublin
Nice distance walk to temple bar area. Much bigger and better than it looks on the photos. Had everything we needed, thanks!

We spent a night in Sinead's house during our holidays. We were perfectly received and the house is in a very nice and practical neighbourhood. The house is not very big but well equipped. Thanks a lot!
Great place in walking distance to the Luas and to Guinness Brewhouse! Neighbor was great and easy to check in! Great communication!!!
Very comfortable, good location. Nice welcome.
Very comfortable quiet 2 bedroom apartment.

We had an amazing time during our weekend in Dublin, made extra special by how lovely Sineads property was where we stayed throughout our visit.

Its a lovely house on a quaint little estate on the outskirts of Dublin, there were good public transport links nearby but we enjoyed making our way on foot the short distance into the city, around a 25 minute leisurely walk.  There was a lovely pub (Arthurs) on the way to break up the stroll if needed.  

The house was much better than we had expected for the very reasonable price.  It was spacey, yet cosy with a lovely feeling and lots of stylish touches and trinkets which made it feel very homely.  It was fully equipped with all the amenities and utensils that you would expect and the kitchen had everything we needed.  There were two double bedrooms and a very large family bathroom with a full sized bath and a lovely powerful shower.  The heating could be put on when needed and was very effective.

There was a lovely little courtyard style, private back garden with wrought iron table and chairs.  

Check-in was simply a case of knocking on the next door neighbours door to collect the keys from Mary, who also manages the cleaning of the property and she was lovely.  Communication from the host Sinead was first class, both leading up to and during our visit.  We were even allowed to check-in earlier than advertised which was a massive help due to how early our flight arrived.  

We thoroughly enjoyed the freedom having our own property allowed during our trip, especially as it worked out cheaper than most hotels and even some hostels in Dublin.  We cant wait to return to this beautiful city and beautiful property.
The place was small but adequate for 4 people.  Check in and check out was easy!  Sineads place was clean and her neighbor Mary was awesome!

Sinead hosted us in her own apartment. Located in a typical neighborhood of bricks houses, 20 minutes by bus of the city center. The inside is not recent but cosy with a "soul" and clean. Perfect stay for a trip in Dublin.
Locality great,  A Clean House in  & Safe Residential Area, Easy check in & out, home from home Style Accommodation with Parking,
Good host, grand place

Outstanding location, safe, clean and comfortable home. The bedrooms are upstairs so our sleep was very quiet. The driveway was perfect instead of the street. Sinead's description was spot on so we knew exactly what to expect. We enjoyed a glass of wine in the adorable back yard. I loved the french press for coffee in the morning. 

We very much appreciate the location and were able to walk to Guinness as well as restaurants and shopping.  The building is incredibly beautiful, built in 1917. We loved imagining the history.

The drive to the airport was close and easy in the morning. It took us 25 minutes. Thanks for Sinead's advice, we were prepared for a bit of traffic even at 6am. 

Thank you!
Great host! Very precise and fast communications. The house was gorgeous and in a nice centric neigbourhood ^^
Nice Clean home and an Excellent Location
Great host, answer very quickly !

We had an amazing time exploring Dublin while staying at Andrew's place. The space is exactly as advertised- spacious, amazing views, clean. It is close to a lot of great local pubs/food and a short (5-10min) walk from the centre of town/temple bar area. We went to a lot of places they had suggested and loved it. Andrew and Leo are so friendly and welcoming. I would not hesitate to book their place again!

Welcoming hosts! Everything was perfect! Identical as per the pictures, and clean. The private bathroom, and private balcony... make you think you are in a hotel room. All the infos, brochures and maps are on the desk when you arrive. You think it cannot get better, then you meet Andrew! He is attentionnate, helpfull, and very welcoming.
If youre lucky as us, he might make you a coffee! We will be back for sure! Location wise, couldnt be better for us... we walk everywhere. 15- 20 minTaxi to the airport!
Thank you for everything! :)

Absolutely the BEST place to stay !!! 

First: Communication is prompt and clear.

Second: The location is directly across from the Jameson Distillery in Smithfield Square (two blocks from the tram line). It's was a very easy walk to Guinness and Temple Bar.

Third: The space is clean and exactly as described and pictured. 

Fourth (and most important): Andrew and Leo are amazing hosts. They are extremely considerate, fun loving people who went above and beyond to ensure that our stay was perfect. I can't thank them enough, and will definitely be staying here again if I'm ever back in Dublin.
Nice and quit location with good connection to the city

The room is everything you will need for a great night sleep.  The bed is comfy and bathroom is clean with great linens.  The location is perfect for Hop on off bus, great restaurants and night life.  But the real treasures in this booking are the hosts Andrew and Leo.   We had not stayed in many shared spaces.  Our time in Dublin was so much richer having them to give recommendations, relax at the end of the night, and to give us a bit of Irish hospitality.  We wouldn't stay anywhere else if we return to Dublin.
A perfect home base for a weekend exploring Dublin - thanks Andrew and Leo!

Andrew is such a great host and his place was amazing. The space is very modern with lots of natural light. The location and views were top notch. Andrew offered great suggestions and insight on the area. We found our experience delightful and inclusive. It was easy to navigate Dublin from this location and bonus, there was parking on site. Highly recommend!

Andrew was great with directions & communications and gave us an overview of the city with great suggestions for places to eat and various attractions. Our room was very clean, bright, comfortable and in a great location.  We enjoyed our stay.
A CONVIENENT LOCATION

Andrew and Leos place is so nice! Penthouse suite is so bright and stylishly decorated. The room was set up to higher end hotel quality and was super comfortable. Theres even a balcony overlooking the courtyard and a rooftop garden. Leo and Andrew both gave us some handy local tips and are very friendly. We were so lucky to also catch a big festival for dogs in the square below the apartment on a sunday afternoon. Lively spot! Would love to stay again if were in town.

Dramatic top floor en-suite room in a 3-bed apartment with views over Dublin and access to kitchen and living room, with other rooms in use by the host Andrew who lives there.  About 10-15mins walk to Temple Bar, O'Connell St down the riverside or up to Phoenix Park / station.  In fact you could probably walk to pretty much all the key touristy sights in Dublin with a little more time (or take the bus) from here.  Interesting restaurants and pubs nearby.  Andrew very welcoming and informative about Dublin and what to see.  Recommendations - take the hop-on/hop-off bus  if you want to go to get a quick (2hrs) summary of Dublin sites, and if you want to go to Kilmainham Gaol book tickets before you get to Dublin! (and if you are English, be prepared to be made to feel very guilty for everything bad that has ever happened in Ireland!).
Lovely room at a central location in Dublin. Helpfull hosts, and a Good experience!

Andrew was such an incredible host and provided a wonderful stay in Dublin. He is a very kind, caring, hospitable, and knowledgeable host who gave my mother and I tips and tricks for our adventures. 

The house itself is in a great location and even has its own roof attached that you can go experience a 360 panorama of the city. 

Highly recommend this for anyone and would come back in a heartbeat ‚ù§Ô∏è
Excellent hosts, apartment and location.

Andrew made me feel really welcome.  The room was exactly as described and the communication was excellent.

Cant recommend this place enough.
Everything we needed and more. Lots of amenities, restaurants, cafes, pubs and cinema, just out the door or short train ride away to right downtown. Would stay with Andrew again!
Great host, very friendly and helpful! Lovely room, central and clean. Would definitely stay again. Thank you!
Andrews place was great super clean stunning location great view . Leonardo was very friendly and welcoming.

Lovely room in Andrews flat, in a perfect location to explore Dublin.  Andrew was extremely welcoming and helpful, and gave us a few tips on the best bars and restaurants to visit.  Fully recommend this place for your next visit to Dublin.
Great place and great location
Great accommodation in an amazing city!

Andrew is definitely a super host. His place is conveniently located. The space and bed were very comfortable. Andrew provided us great recommendations of places to go experience. I would highly recommend a stay at Andrews place.
Nice person, clean place
Lovely room and nice host, very close to dart line so handy for the city!
Nice house in a residential area very close to city center, 15 minutes away by frequent trains
Catherine was so so lovely and her place was perfect! Really comfortable cosy room! :)

We knew the appartement was well located, it even happens to be closer to some places than we thought (Dublin Castle, Christchurch, Dublinia, Queen of Tarts, bus stop to go to Howth, Phoenix Park) It was very clean and tidy, tea and coffee available, kitchen well equipped for cooking as we had many meals at home. Our flight was planned late by night and we arrived even later, by 1 AM, and still Micheal and his wife were available for us. Some little details also make the difference and help you travel lighter (umbrellas, bathroom stuff). If we ever come back to Dublin, we would definitely stay at the same place!

Clean, comfortable space, well thought out for guests.  Lots of good information available for things to do from Micheal and also brochures/travel books  available in the apartment.   Also, a great location--close enough to walk to so many things, but also convenient to bus stops. 
We would definitely stay here again!  Highly recommend!

We had a wonderful stay. Really enjoyed that the bedsheets, pillows, and blankets were clean, soft, and comfortable. The whole place was clean, living room and bathroom. We had a quiet cozy apartment to ourselves. We did not use the kitchen but the water kettle was definitely useful for tea and drinking water.

The apartment exceeded our expectations. The location is deceivingly quiet based on its proximity to the busy Temple Bar area. The directions from the airport are simple and thorough, and we had very little difficulty finding the apartment. Micheal and his wife were very responsive and easy to communicate with, and it made us feel confident in navigating Dublin. Extra bathroom amenities were a plus!

Everything about this place is perfect- location, accessibility, Micheals hospitality and thoughtfulness-we are 110% satisfied. He had lots of local tips and maps around to help us. Dont even hesitate- this listing is too great to pass up! It even looks out over a courtyard with a statue and history of Handel- SO cool!!

Absolutely amazing space and location. Convenient to everything...We walked everywhere in every direction. Michaels space is so centrally located and he is super responsive and he is very knowledgeable about the history of the area and things to do! If you are lucky enough to stay at his place, you are lucky enough!!!
What a great accommodation! Perfect cozy stay for a couple who wants to be walking distance to all the hot spots! Great location, clean and comfortable. Highly recommend!
Location location location. A great central apartment to explore Dublin. Just a few minutes walk down the street to the Temple Bar area.  Building felt safe and secure.  Hosts very responsive.
Fantastic location and host!

Amazing location - you can walk everywhere - and we did!! There are 2 great restaurants right around the corner in Cow's Lane - Piglet and Queen of Tarts.  We enjoyed live music at Darkey Kelly's just around the other corner.
Amazing spot! We only took a bus once! Awesome for going out and quite even though it's temple bar!
Great location in the heart of Dublin! No car needed.

Staying at Micheals apartment was fantastic, and exactly as advertised, and more. The location couldnt have been better. transportation, bars, restaurants and attractions footsteps away. We felt very secure in the apartment, with doubly locked main entrance, and location is worry free. We would definitely stay here again on any future visits.
Perfectly located, clean, and a great host!
Great place to stay,excellent location,clean and lots of extra touches.Would highly recommend !

Great apartment in Dublin! The place was as advertised.  Everything we wanted to experience was within walking distance. The place itself was fantastic. We really enjoyed our stay. If youre looking for quiet, bring ear plugs. Christchurch bells go off pretty regularly, and temple bar craic can be heard. We loved the vibrancy of the area, and would stay here again in a heartbeat!

My wife and I really appreciated the fact that Michael came to find us when we got lost walking to his place. He was enthusiastic and very friendly. Showed us how everything worked. 

Space was perfect for us. Right on the edge of Temple Bar. Not noisy and it was homey.

Bed was firm but comfortable. We highly recommend this place.

This was a lovely flat in a great area of Dublin! It was easy to walk around and the Airlink bus to/from the airport was very convenient. There were so many restaurants and bars nearby. We loved the little touches like having a (Hidden by Airbnb) chrome cast so we can watch movies on Netflix! The washer/dryer was also wonderful to have to wash some of our clothes from our long travels. Thank you so much! Would definitely stay again!
You will not be disappointed. Great location and amazing value
The location is great with close distance to temple bar area, but still quiet. The apartment is perfect for a couple and was very well maintained.   A great place to stay in Dublin!
AMAZING AIRBNB! For our honeymoon, this was the perfect place in the city with great amenities and such fun tours to do close by. 120% would recommend staying here!
Very clean and convenient place.

Great central location. You can easily walk to most major tourist attractions from Castle to Trinity to Guinness factory to great shopping and restaurants. But expect to hear drunken yelling when you are trying to sleep as this place is a couple blocks from Temple Bar.. Nothing fancy but the place is well stocked.
Great apartment in the middle of the action, very clean.  Has all the amenities you desire.  Easy walking to get to attractions.   Would recommend staying here.
We really enjoyed our stay :) it was very clean and is directly connected to the city, you are just a few steps away from the nightlife, but the flat is calm :) we recommened it

Lovely Apartment very central to lots of amenities as well as the best places to visit in Dublin. Micheal was very easy to communicate with . His local knowledge was helpful. I highly recommend this apartment. Thanks for Irish hospitality Micheal

This flat checked all the boxes for me.  Micheal was an incredible host and went above and beyond to accommodate me.  Loved the clean and comfortable surroundings and the surprisingly historical significance of the area.  The flat had everything I needed for a perfect stay.  Would stay here again in a heartbeat....
Thank you so much for everything! Super friendly! Property was amazing and in the most fantastic location!

This was our fifth annual fall trip to Ireland, and found Michael to be an amazing host who provided us with many useful tips of where to go without getting sucked into the pricey Temple Bar tourist traps.   On that note, the place is very close to Temple Bar, but far enough away that it is a quiet, peaceful refuge.   

Checking in was a breeze with Michael meeting us outside place at an agreed upon time.  The condo is very well stocked, and comfortable.  The bathroom is modern with a proper flushing toilet and great shower, a rarity in many of the places we have stayed at over the years.    

The modern and spacious kitchen is nicely stocked with heavy stainless pots and pans, as well many condiments.  Some of the nice touches Michael has added are umbrellas for guest use, blue tooth speaker,  washer/dryer combo,  hair dryer.

As seasoned Airbnb travelers to Ireland, we highly recommend Michael's condo.

We found this apartment to be in a perfect location.  We were able to walk to everything we wanted to see and yet it was quietly outside the chaos of the Temple Bar area.  Everything about the place was easy and convenient. Micheal was great fun to talk to and gave us a lovely introduction to the neighborhood, Dublin, and Irish sports. We took his advice and went to Darky Kelly's... it was fantastic! We would absolutely stay here again. Thanks Micheal!
Perfecte ligging, super ontvangst, leuke tips, kortom een superverblijf !

This is an ideal location for exploring Dublin. All the major sights are within walking distance. And despite being in the middle of the action, the overall noise level was minimal. Michael is an attentive host, and he provides all necessary amenities. Plus, the bed is really comfortable! We definitely recommend staying here.
Great little apartment in excellent location. Very quiet (apart from church bells all day & night). Good amenities, nice little sunny balcony, works well for 3-4 people.

Absolute recommendation if you intend to stay very close to lively temple bar, and seek to have a fairly nice, comfortable and quiet place to sleep! The communication was excellent and the hosts made everything possible. Everything was clean, the kitchen was fully equipped and the beds were comfortable. Thanks again and all the best!

Amazing location! In the heart of everything but still pretty quiet! The house was spotlessly clean, comfortable bed, and great little touches! The host was so nice and greeted us when we arrived! I highly recommend staying here and we will definitely be back!
Would thoroughly recommend this place in every way.

Can't say enough nice things about Michael and Maylene. We mistakenly booked the apartment for a day less than we needed and they bent over backwards to accommodate us. The place is in a prime location in Temple Bar and close to seemingly thousands of restaurants and pubs as well as the bus drop off and pick up areas to other cities/the airport. Also it was perfectly clean and nice! I cannot recommend this spot enough or thank these hosts enough. Truly.

Micheals place was perfectly located to everything! It is by the night lifeù but still very very quiet.  He was extremely fast to respond and an excellent host. His place was clean and he also offers amazing history and tips for around town. I would stay here again and recommend it to anyone who is staying in Dublin.
The location of the apartment is great, right in the center and yet quiet. The apartment is equipped with everything you need and also the communication and the check-in /out was uncomplicated.
Happy to stay and hope to come again.
An excellent little apartment, ideal for a short stay in Dublin. Well located, clean, lots of local information leaflets and an all round great place to stay.

Amazing location, my boyfriend and I walked everywhere we wanted and more! Great places to eat near by and sight seeing was easy. Very clean and great amenities. Was definitely worth it!! Great and quick responses from the host and great suggestions from them as well. Check in was so easy, they worked with our schedule even though we were a little late getting out of the airport.
Great location, comfortable beds, well stocked necessary items and great Host.

I had a lovely stay at Francesca's place. Room was exactly as advertised and I had a nice peaceful night of sleep. Location is unbeatable yet quiet. All facilities are very close to the apartment (supermarket, restaurants, buses). Francesca gave me tips on what to see and do, was always available for questions, and even pampered me with a great cup of coffee in the morning. Grazie mille, Francesca! It was a pleasure to meet you and I hope to see you soon
I recommend the place because it is clean and close to the center.

It was a pleasure for us to be at Francesca's place. Her home was close to the centre but in a quiet area where you could rest really well. She had great suggestions on what to visit and helped us with anything we needed. We had a great stay. We would return to her place without any doubt.
ottimo alloggio,in un'ottima posizione. mi sono trovato benissimo,francesca inoltre mi ha aiutato molto anche con un itinerario di viaggio!

One of the best Airbnb in which I have been. Good location and great host. Francesca made made us feel like at home. The appartment was clean and was totally comfortable. Moreover, Francesca gave us the best recommendations about Dublin and she was always available for whatever we needed. If I come back one day to this city, I would definitely choose Francesca's house again.

Thank you Sandy for the amazing stay at your beautuiful and lovley home! We had really a very good time. Your tips for restaurants and places to see/go were always really helpful and worth it. Thank you! We will come back.
Though it was a short one night stay, Sandy made the experience most pleasant with an excellent upkeep of her home! Sparkling clean, cozy and comfy! Good value for money!
Very accurate description! Lovely comfortable room. Quiet residential area but with close transport links to the city and Howth.
We stayed only for one night, but it was very nice - you have everything what you need in the room - also the little kettle ans some tea and coffee :)
Great hostess who helped us with everything. Communication was great. Sandy's breakfast was great. We had no problems. I'd love to visit Sandy again. Thanks for everything.

I had such a lovely stay at Sandys place She is a very warm and welcoming host and has a beautiful house. The bed was extremely comfortable and you could see she had clearly made a huge effort to ensure you have a very pleasant stay .  I would really endorse the positive reviews she had received.
Perfect stay in Dublin! I can highly recommend Sandys home, its clean and she is so friendly and ordered us a taxi to the airport

Sandy is an excellent host! Extremely comfortable room with it's own little kettle, very near the seafront and only about 20 minutes from town on the train. Nice, quiet and excellent base to work from.
She was really considerate with our Check-in, as our flight arrived too late. She was really nice, with thoughtful details in the room and a really comfortable bed.
The room was set up really lovely and its a  nice area to stay. Sandy was a friendly and welcoming host even though we just met for a short time we enjoyed it!
Sandy was amazing. Her accommodation was perfect . I enjoyed the location by the sea, so much to see and do. Thank you Sandy
Sandy is an amazing hostess, very welcoming and helpful. The room was perfect. Everything was spotless and the bed was cosy. Would highly recommend staying here.

Sandy was a very nice Host.
Would highly recommend her.

Sandy did a great job as a host. I accidently booked my stay for 1 day too few and returning to her house at 9.30 PM, new quests were already in our room. Sandy had to pack and move out all our luggage, plus she helped us get a late cab ride to a new Airbnb rental. Kudos to Sandy. THANKS!
Very helpfull host. would definitely go back!
House and room spotless, friendly host.  No hesitation recommending this accomodation.

Sandy was wonderful! Responsive, kind, and very helpful with local tips. We enjoyed our stay here, especially the shower and comfortable bed. The home was warm and comfortable and we were able to come and go as needed. Transportation to and from the airport was quick and easy, 20 min by taxi. Thank you Sandy!

Sandy is a wonderful host and very responsive and helpful. The room is nice and cozy. The house is in a residential area and we really appreciated how quiet it was.  I strongly recommend Sandy's place.

We stayed for one short night at Sandys and flew out the next morning. Sandy is truly kind and hospitable, offering insight into getting into Dublin and gives great recommendations. The train is located minutes from her home and is a very easy ride into the heart of the city. If you dont mind the train ride, this is a great and affordable way to see Dublin on a budget!

Sandy had extra toiletries in case we forgot any, which was nice. Our room was very clean. It was nice to stay at prior to flying out of Dublin. Without traffic, her home is a 25 minute drive to/from the City Center. Thanks for a lovely stay!

The location worked well for us as we are comfortable taking a train. Why pay double the price to stay in Dublin. it's only a 20 minute train ride to the city centre for 6.25 euro. Also the town of Howth is just north of Sandy's air bnb. Howth is a fishing village with a nice trail to hike.

Hi there!
We had a wonderful time in Dublin and really enjoyed staying at Sandy's house. The room was very nice and clean. We had to share the bathroom with Sandy herself and other guests. The Check-in was done by Sandy's nice friend Suzanna. 
Highly recommendable accommodation!
Thanks for recommending to buy a so- called Leap Card (40‚Ç¨ for 7 days) to use all kinds of Public Transport in the Dublin area. 
Barbara and Frank Ecker (Neuwied/GER)

Sandys place is very clean and homely. Sandy was a great host and full of top tips for the area and how to get around. Great position for the train, bus and cycle path. Would definitely go back and stay.
Lovely house and host. Very nice experience and quiet place.
It served my needs for a place near the airport . comfortable bed for sleep and local information for place to have supper.

We had a wonderful time at Sandys place. The room was very clean & cozy and we had everything we needed. Sandy is super kind and a fantastic host. The train station is very close and it only takes 20 minutes to the city centre. 
100% recommendable. Thanks again!

Sandys place was an excellent place for us to stay when we had to get to the airport. Theres also plenty of transport to get into city center. Sandy herself is a fantastic host and just the sweetest woman. Her place was also SPOTLESS! All in all, it was a great spot for us to stay at on our last night in Ireland
Amazing stay, Thank you!
A nice place to stay. Lots of advice and guidance is provided.
Shandys place is lovely, is in a  very nice neighborhood, and accessible to various modes of transit that will get you where you want to go in Dublin.

Sandy was a perfe t host very flexible cause of transport it changed a bit but she followed our changes. The room was in aovy quiet neighbourhood ose to the sea very good air. Everything was in place very clean and cosy we recommend it highly very good comfortobel bed!! 5 star

Sandy gave us some great tips on places to go in and around Dublin. She was very friendly and her home was very cosy and clean. The room was just as described in the posting - however, bear in mind that you could be sharing a toilet/shower with up to 4 other people and there is no other access to water. This is the only downside to the accommodation. Otherwise, it was in close proximity to Malahide Castle, where we were seeing a concert, and to the city centre. Public transport was absolutely fine from here! All in all, great value for money.
Thank you very much Sandy, it was only one night but it was lovely.
Sandys place was perfect! She was lovely, the space was very comfortable and the location great.
Very well positioned- great host- good value for money would definitely recommend
Such a cozy, nice home, with cozy, nice people! In a great location, for town and airport, with a very comfortable room. Sandy's place was perfect :)
Warm and friendly host! Location exactly as described. Great host.
Friendly and clean, but lots of rules. Double check the check in time, we were surprised when Sandy had to change the time at the last minute. It's understandable, but was disappointing for us.
Perfectly located between Dublin, Howth and Airport. Super clean. And Sandy is truly a Superhost!
Sandy is a lovely host, who is willing to help give travel tips and even helped us when there was some confusion in finding the house. An outstanding host! Hope to stay again sometime :)
A nice and clean place close to the airport. Close to several  restaurants. Free parking on the street outside.
This was a great stay! Sandy was super helpful in giving tips on getting around the city and answered any questions we had. The room was spacious and clean, would definitely stay here again.
Great quiet location chose to public transportation. A bit confusing first locating the place. There are 3 different Baysides with the same address number. Make sure you go to Bayside North
Sandy is a perfect host with good information and tips about the surrounding area. The room and the bathroom were very clean and comfortable. We had an amazing stay in Dublin. Thanks a lot :)
Sandy's place was comfortable and clean.

Sandy is the perfect host..great communication, house is so inviting, bed really comfy + everything really clean and organized. Highly recommend a stay there + nearby Howth is easy to get to and lovely
What to say what have not been already said about Sandy's place. It is beautiful, it is sparkling clean, it is quite. I can only recommend it. And Sady, thanks for the insider hints!
Sandy is a nice, informed host. Not very close to water, but easy access to DART and getting to Dublin.
The house is great and so is the bed, very elegant and clean. I really needed a nice rest!
Had only one night but a good one. Perfect for parking and proximity to Dart and Howth. Spotless. Recommended highly!
A comfy place in a quiet area. Everything clean and uncomplicated

Sandy's place is lovely, very cozy, sparkling clean! She is really nice , always available for a chat and a local tip, but at the same time we felt we had our privacy and our space and we felt really comfortable.  We absolutely loved it! The neighbourhood is very pretty, well connected to downtown Dublin. We stayed only one night but could have easily stayed longer, you feel at home!

Sandy is a wonderful, warm and caring host who will provide you with informations about Dublin and its surroundings. She has a very clean and comfy house, the room we slept in is very tidy and well arranged. Bonus point for the extra soft carpet :)
The place is super clean, super comfortable and Sandy really is a super host!

Sandy was an an amazing host. When we brought up that the WiFi wasnt working she was quick to figure out what was wrong and fix it. The location is only 15 minutes from the airport which was perfect for our early flight.
good for an overnight stay.

Sandy is a Superhost. She is very friendly and communicative. She helped us with all our questions and even organised us a taxi to the airport. Her house is in a lovely suburb of Dublin which has an own train station to the city. It was very clean as well. Definitely a place to feel like home.

Absolutely wonderful room, bed is comfy and room is full of everything you might need if you forgot! 
Sandy is an amazing host, who answered all of my questions!

The room is really cozy,nice and clean,we arrived quite late and Sandy waited for us,Sutton is a nice place but unfortunately we just stayed one night for the flight,if we ever visit Sutton again,we will choose Sandys place again.
Tolle Gastfreundschaft und herzlich, sauberes Zuhause

Sandy is a super nice host, we stayed a few days in her lovely home and felt very comfortable. Bayside is a great place, it takes just a bus ride to Dublin city centre or to the beautiful village Howth. Thanks for being our host!
Wat een ontzettende fijne plek! Sandy is enorm gastvrij en de kamer was heerlijk. Ideale locatie voor zowel de stad Dublin, als naar de kust. Goed geprijsd en een absolute aanrader

An amazing place to stay! It's calm and very clean. sandy is a lovely and ambitios host. The room we had was very pretty and big.
Great connection to the city and close to the sea for a nice evening walk. 
Would totally recommend!

We had an excellent stay, which was very clean and cosy! It was perfect that we could enjoy a cup of tea in the room to start and end each day, and always a warm greeting from our host Sandy! This was a great place to stay for visiting Howth, and was also relatively easy getting to and fro from Dublin city center by DART. We had a very nice stay overall and would highly recommend staying at Sandys place!
Lovely room with very comfy bed and lovely accommodating host! Perfect location and amenities easily available.

Lovely woman was very helpful and even helped arrange a taxi for us.   

We really appreciated the care she took for us :)
Very nice accommodation and friendly welcome
Great place near airport.  Close to shops, restaurants and bars. Cozy, stylish room.
Sandy was very helpful and kind host, always giving tips and such! Would highly recommend!

My boyfriend and I had a fantastic stay at Sandys place!
