I had great trip and an amazing experience. The house was so clean with all I needed for my stay. The lady Clara that checked me in was so helpfull and great to deal with, she was also very responsive to any question that I had.
Only 5 mins walk from Dame Street and Christ Church. Very quiet bedroom for a good night's sleep. Communication have been brilliant and quick. I'll be back soon
We stayed only one night, and we didnt have any issues. Great location and an easy stay. Would definitely book again.
Great value for such a central location!

David was great communicating through my trip, we checked in with Carla and paid for the power- never had any issues. This was a quiet area tucked away but walkable to many attractions. Our favorite was Arthur's Pub on Thomas Street! Check-out was very easy.

Amazing location. Right around the corner from a yummy bakery and cafe. Close to all the famous sites like Dublinia and St Patrick's Cathedral. The house itself was great. Lots of space with full kitchen, hot water and a comfy bed. Will. E staying here again.
The apartment is located right in the heart of the city! No need for bus transport. Check in was super fast and easy! It looks just like on the pictures - very nice for a few days in Dublin.
Thank you let us stay

A lovely place in a great location. Very clean and comfortable. The girl checking me in was lovely and was very flexible with check-in time and paying for electricity top-up. Overall would really recommend staying here.
Very close to temple bar
Awesome location!
Great location to City Center, convienieant to bus route (for bus tours). Freshly cleaned unit, strong wifi, cable with movies and shows for the little ones. I would stay here again, great place.
Over all great stay   the location is the best.  Host was super nice.
Good location and communication. Have stayed with this host twice by chance and enjoyed both times.
Lovely apartment that was very close to everything. Pictures are very accurate and they were able to accommodate and early check in for me. Would stay here again and recommend to friends.

The apartment was nice and tidy, also very close to the city center.
We met Carla at check in and she was very kind and helpful.
Would recommend as a good place to explore Dublin from.
Lots of TV channels also helped us relax after a long day of walking around.

The location was super central which was fantastic and exactly what we were looking for. I only gave four stars because its not in the best neighbourhood and I wouldnt recommend it as a great place for families or people with young children because it is neighbouring to the local drug dealer and constantly has people outside trying to buy. Great for back packers and individuals constantly on the go such as ourselves.
Close to attractions, only short walk into town.
Nice apartment, well located, I recommended
Great location
Nice little place, very clean and near lots of popular Dublin sites! Parking in Dublin is a bit hard on general, so it was nice to have the option to park on the street, even it it was metered.
Very nice place to stay, equipped with everything necessary. Was on a working trip and everything with check in went super smoothly. Close to the city centre, sights and the train station.
Great location & very nice accommodation
Very clean, location is great. there is plenty to do close by!
Nice place !
Outstanding hospitality from Ismenia. She is very kind, and ensures your comfort throughout your stay. It's value is congruent with price per night.
Ismenia is a very nice host with a great flat. I can recommend it for a nice trip to dublin.
Just have a SAT NAV or give Ismenia a call once you are close to the address and she will give you a warm welcome and direct you to the apartment. Ismenia is great!

I experienced a really warm welcome by ismena
The room was as i expected. There was no key to lock the room, thats why i give four stars
Ismena answered my messages and calls immediately
Great host great location
Ismenia is a kind and precise host!
Ismenia was friendly and and responded to messages quickly. The room was ok and the location is quiet, while not being too far away from the downtown areas.
Great place . was very clean . Ismenia is very friendly and we communicate very well. the place is close to main attractions in the city center .
A lovely and cozy room. Very quiet and peaceful. Would stay again! Ismenia is a great host and very accommodating.
I would recommend this place!

Ismenia is very nice and will respond quickly. She walked me through everything and asked if I had any questions about the city. The room is decent and although you do not have access to the kitchen she provides: water, hot water kettle, tea and coffee along with a fridge to put your stuff in. In the bathroom she has pretty much everything you would need in terms of toiletries. Also location is key! Shes walking distance to almost any major site in Dublin! Would definitely stay again. Thank You!

Great location - not far from the city centre. Next to the Teeling Distillery.

Ismenia is very nice and can provide you with some tips about the area. She was able to accommodate a very last minute booking (5pm) and I'm appreciative of her flexibility.

Her place is a little old - wallpaper and some ceiling drywall peeling, but otherwise her place is very clean and I had a comfortable stay there.

Very hospitable little place for 1-2 people.   City center is very walkable from here.   Ismenia Provides plenty of brochures and things to do during your stay along with other nice little touches.   Would stay here again (in fact I did on my return trip).
A great find, close to the centre but not too expensive. Ismenia is quick to communicate and was very helpful.
Good quiet place for travelers on a budget.
My second stay at this place and highly recommend for a quick stay in Dublin. Walking distance to everything
This location is in an easy to access location in Dublin. You can walk to anywhere in the South End of Dublin within great ease.

Close to many great locations in the Temple Bar area. I walked everywhere.

Fantastic host: very personable and helpful.

Only inconvenience was the bathroom is shared among 3 bedrooms so you may have to wait on occasion.

Rooms were nice, clean, and warm.

Mini-fridges in room, which was useful. Coffee, tea and water provided.

Great breakfast places nearby.
Very cosy and clean room. Great host, super fast communication and very central location. Can highly recommend this place.
I came to Dublin for a conference and Ismenia's place provided everything I needed: a clean and comfortable bed, a hot shower, within a fair walking distance from the city center.
Great location to walk to all areas in dublin. Room met all our needs for our trip

Clean and very near the city attractions. Bathroom is wide and comfortable. A very quiet place. Good fridge, no TV (and specified in the services)
I advice you before choosing this room, to read carefully the services not provided. In my case I needed the closet to hang my whole shirts for a week stay to go to a congress, and it was not possible, it was  fully occupied with another persons clothes. Then, although there are some services not provided and specified in Airbnb website, this one was not specified, even though a closet is the minimum you expect to find in a room you rent.
Awesome place, very close to the city center. Very calm as well.
Centrally located & the hosts are very nice and responsive. If all you need is a clean bedroom and a shower - this place is perfect!
This apartment is in an excellent location for all the major tourist attractions in Dublin. The room and bed are small, but a decent place to stay if you are 1-2 people.
The hosts were great and responsive, the place was clean and within walking distance from St. Patrick's cathedral. Real, functioning shower was great plus (instead of some bathtub version).
Good location for a solo traveler stay. Within walking distance of all major attractions in the city center. Host was very responsive and helpful.
No lock in the private room. Even though, the place at all was GREAT and highly recomendable for tourists.
Great location. Its just far enough outside everything that the noise at night is quite but close enough that everything is walkable. Id stay again.
A lovely, bright room in a nice building in a great area of Dublin - just minutes from good cafes and shops and an easy walk to the city centre. Very good value.
A nice big room with a double bed and a fridge in the room. The location was pretty central. About a 20 min walk to everything.
I had a great stay and the host was extremely helpful.
Close to everything, pretty much just a room to stay... but a nice host

Ismenia was very flexible with leaving my bag a few hours before check-in and after check-out, which was very helpful. She also responds very quickly. The apartment is located in a great spot, about a 10-15 minute walk from some of the major attractions.
Good location and nice flat :-)

The host is nice, I changed my check-in time till very late, her son received me in good order.  The host called me cause she really cares if I already find and enter into the building in good order.   I can feel Ismenia is a responsible host.  The guest has to realize the bedroom without locker,  it cannot be locked, it's ok for me! The host also reminded in advance.  I still suggest the host to install a locker for bed room because it can give more better feeling to most of other guests.
Super friendly and felxible check in, great communication and uncomplicated stay. Great location and value  if all you need is a bed to sleep in and an bathroom.

I had a good stay.
Rested well and could explore this great city from there.

Great place.
Excellent location.
Great host
Great place to stay in Dublin south of river!
Excellent location, great host.
Ismenia was a lovely host! The room was spacious and bed was comfortable. Location is about a 15-20 min walk to main temple bar area/shops. Overall I was happy with the place.

I had a great stay with Ismenia. The home is in a great spot near the city center. Also very close to the Guinness tour. Check in was easy and the bed super comfy. Perfect for relaxing after a long day of exploring!
Great location for sightseers and workers!
This place is in a perfect location for staying in central Dublin. It's only 10 minutes walk to the Radisson Blu and Temple Bar was very near.
Good location and very nice host!
It was great to be Ismenia's guest. She is very helpful and friendly! The location of the apartment is great. Thank you!

The place is well located to enjoy the city at best. The bed is confortable ,the shower also.  There are no keys for the private room but Ismenia and her son are very respectful of your belongings, you will find a refilled bottle of fresch water every day without moving anything else. There is an other room with possible guests, anyway the access to the bathroom wasn't difficult at all. Ismenia is kind and helpful.
Thank you for everything.

Ismenias place was perfect for my brief stay in Dublin! Located literally around the corner from two of the best distilleries in Dublin, The Liberties Distillery and Teeling (Jameson is overrated and they dont even distill on site anymore). The apartment was clean and exactly as advertised. Ismenia had great travel and dining recommendations for me (go to Camden Market for meals!! Temple Bar is dirty, overrated, and overpriced, with the exception of Klaw which I highly recommend for fresh seafood and wonderful staff). Ismenia was so kind and hospitable, she felt like a sister. All the major sites I wanted to visit (from Guinness to Trinity College) were no more than a 15-20 min walk from her place. I was amazed at how easy it is to get around Dublin, and after one walk I knew exactly where I was and Ismenias place was very easy to find thereafter (if you can see St. Patricks Cathedral, youll know exactly how to get back home). Great stay and I can not recommend enough for a solo traveler or even a couple!

The room and bathroom were super clean. I met Ismenia and her son briefly and they were both very kind and lovely. This place is about a 15-minute walk from Temple bar, so very close to the centre. If you're only looking for a place to sleep, this is a good option for you.
Lovely sized, tastefully decorated double room. Location is good for all Dublin attractions. Host is super helpful.
A really great place to stay. The room is a bit bigger than what you would assume out of the picture. Its in a super great spot of Dublin.
Ismenia is very kind, I suggest this place!
Very comfortable bed. Excellent location. Good, safe neighbourhood with no noise from traffic or neighbours.
The appartment was very close to the center of Dublin. We were able to do many things, such as shopping/ temple bar area by walking! That was amazing.
The location was great and they communicated well with us. I would recommend staying here if you are in need of a place in Dublin.
A comfortable room in a convenient area of Dublin. Responses were swift and helpful.

Great location, 20 minutes walking distance to everything. Ismenia and Joysse both reply really fast. Would have been nice to know I was staying with other travellers too as I was a bit confused at first but overall felt safe and slept well!

The room is exactly as advertised. Good bed, a towel, and a bottle of water. Other than that, you really get nothing else. It was perfectly lovely for me as I left at 6 every morning and didnt return till midnight. Communication is very good and everything touristy is about a (Phone number hidden by Airbnb) minute easy walk away. Wish the towel was a bit nicer and that there was someplace to put clothes (even a tiny shelf) but it turned out great and I would return here. Thanks for a lovely stay!

Note that the place can be hard to find in (Hidden by Airbnb) /apple maps. Its much easier to navigate to the Teeling Distillery which is next door.
A central location in a clean house. Basic facilities but ideal for simply crashing out after a long day.

Communication was prompt with Ismenia. The apartment is a leisurely 20min walk to  the center. St Patricks Cathedral is a 6min. The apartment is clean and the bed is super comfortable. Joysse is very respectful of your privacy. Despite the language barrier, you just immediately feel welcome into their space. Highly recommend.
A proper host!!
Ich bin sehr nett empfangen worden.
Check in really easy, if you need a room and a bathroom near the city center, this room is perfect! Ismenia also let me leave the luggages for some extra hours, really appreciated!

Ismenia is a very hospitable and considerate host; you could tell she really cared that you were comfortable and had everything you needed! The room is cozy and clean... you don't have access to the kitchen, so don't plan on making meals or bringing home leftovers, but the space is a good value for what it is!
Great place to stay and an absolutely lovely hostess!
Great place to stay. In the heart of town. Bed was very comfortable and they let me check in early because the room want booked the night before!

I had a great time at Ismenias place! She is a great host, very responsive and everything with check-in/out was perfect. The location is great and I had a lot of privacy. I highly recommend Ismenias place for a short stay in Dublin!
Ich hatte einen super angenehmen Aufenthalt in guter Lage um Dublin zu erkunden. Vielen Dank und sehr gerne wieder.
Very nice person, and a great location.

Ismenia is so kind! As an anxious traveller, staying at her place was like a warm hug. She helped me feel grounded when I arrived and helped me with everything from figuring out my transformer to calling me a taxi. Really excellent host! The location is nice, quiet, and within 15 minutes walking distance from everywhere youd want to go. Right around the corner is the Fumbally Cafe & Tenters, both places I would also recommend. Thanks again for the great stay, Ismenia!
The room was clean and the apartment is in a strategic location , just 10 min walk to the city centre. It was what I needed! I will definitely book again if I am back to Dublin.
Good location

This was a very nice, complete house in an excellent location.  Close to the city center, yet far away to be nicely nestled in a tranquil setting.  For a family with kids this is a perfect place!  The hosts were wonderful at all times, and prompt when we ran into a minor problem.
Great child friendly house in a quiet neighbourhood
Anne provided a welcome hamper which was lovely and so helpful after travelling so we didn't need to worry about essentials. A quiet location at the end of a cul de sac.
Wonderful apartment !! Beautiful little details and not to far away from the city!! You will enjoy the view for sure !!
Really enjoyed my stay here! The place is so stylish and spacious. John was quick to respond and help with any questions we had. Definitely recommend :)

We really enjoyed our stay here! It was as described and really cool to stay in an old distillery. The old brick walls were awesome. I really appreciated Johns communication and we were able to extend our stay an extra day at the last minute as well.
Great space.  Nice location.
We had a great time in Johns place. Super friendly & responsive, great location. Central but quiet.

Very Nice appartment. Easy to get to the centre. During the stay John always answered our questions within the hour. 
Thanks!!!!

Fantastic apartment within walking distance from all local areas and bus stops! Gorgeous interior, furniture comfier than most hotels! Fantastic host and have zero complaints! Would happily stay again and again!
Loft molto carino e particolare .ubicazione perfetta e servito bene dai mezzi pubblici
Awesome stylish place. Lovely and clean. Quite and super comfy bed!
It was a great and relaxing spot to stay! John was great and answered any questions we had quickly! Very close to buses and transportation.

John was an amazing host - and the space was absolutely stunning. Very convenient and comfortable, clean and the tips that we were given for the city and the local area really helped us uncover some hidden gems in Dublin, we had such a great time! Thank you! X
Great stay!  Highly recommend... especially to anyone who is attending an event at Croke Park.

A lovely loft apartment just on the outskirts of Dublin. Great for a weekend away with good public transport links. A little out of the way if you're wanting to go out in the evenings to the middle of the city.

John's place is a stylist apartment in a lovely building with a big comfy bed.
The apartment is a good 30 mins away from the centre so be prepared for a bit of a walk but John's recommendation for transport as well as bars, restaurants and traditional Irish pubs was brilliant and so helpful.
Great location with connections into city centre. Great host with speedy communication responses. Clean, warm and homely. Would definitely recommend.

Johns place was incredible.  Lovely apartment in the perfect spot to explore Dublin. Great communication and lots of extras that made the stay comfortable and cozy. Would recommend this listing to everyone!

Great place, had a really unique atmosphere to it! The Loft Apartment was cosy, clean and comfortable. Within walking distance of the city centre and a short taxi drive away too. John was also very helpful and check in was very easy! Altogether everything was great! Would definitely recommend!
Great apartment, very smart and clean. 20-30 min walk from centre. John was easy to get in touch with and quick to respond to any queries.
A bit of a walk to the city center, but around 15 minutes as described. Overall, great place to stay!

The apartment was a delight to stay at as it had a stylish/modern interior with immaculate levels of cleanliness. The hosts were also amazing with quick and effective communication. Would definitely recommend. Thanks again!

Very spacious apartment and convenient to walk downtown or to local grocery stores. Felt very safe in the area. Apartment had everything we needed to be comfortable. Wouldnt hesitate to recommend this apartment. John was a wonderful host who responded quickly with any questions.

John's place was amazing! The apartment was immaculately clean and had all the amenities you can think of for a pleasant stay. The bed was very comfortable and I woke up well rested each day. Thank you for a great stay!

We had a lovely stay at this apt. We prefer to stay in a quiet area outside of the city and this was perfect for us. We took taxis & the #13 bus into & back from the city easily. The apt is very clean and comfortable and the building is very quiet. The lift is ideal if you have a lot of luggage (like us). John was attentive and quick to respond to all of our questions. I would definitely stay here again!

John is a great host! Check in was flawless! His apt is amazing with amazing views, charming character. The building is equally charming with such cool character! While there, he was quick in his responses. He's kind, gracious and very accommodating. There were added touches that made us feel like we were home. The walking distance to/from downtown Dublin was a bit longer than described. We ended up using the taxi service more than planned so it got to be more expensive than planned. If we stay in Dublin in the future, we'll be sure to look to see if his apt is available! Thank you, John! :-)
Great apartment to stay in Dublin
We had a great stay at Johns place
Awesome apartment

We really enjoyed our stay in John's loft! Everything worked perfectly and we were received with very thoughtful details such as fresh milk in the fridge and very good suggestions for restaurants, etc! We walked to Dublin's city centre every dsy and felt very safe. We would gladly return to this very beautiful, spacioud and stylish apartment!

Really lovely apartment with everything you could need. 
Great location and really good communication and local info from John.
Awesome and spacious appartment. The communication went well and everything was well prepared for our arrival.
Great apartment, nice walk into city centre (20-30 min depending where you were heading to). Lots of information on the city provided by host; great stay overall.

Great location and even better host. John was communicative at every step and his place was clean and even roomier than we expected. The location was ideal for us as we wanted to spend the day walking around the city.
sehr angenehmes Loft, ruhige Wohngegend, superschnelle Antworten auf Fragen, sehr sauber. Sehr zu empfehlen

Lovely loft in North Dublin. Centre of town easily accessible by buses and the spaciousness and style of the apartment makes up for the slight distance. John was quick and very helpful with any issues and there were nice touches around the place, like some food, toilletries and a board with the key info.
Great place for a weekend trip in Dublin!
The loft is such a great place to stay when in Dublin. We just loved the space and how convenient it was to everything we wanted to see.

This place was amazing!  We loved the thoughtful touches like fresh flowers and the building was really cool being an old distillery! This was the most comfortable bed of our entire trip and the shower had the best water pressure and the thickest towels! John was very responsive to our questions and even permitted a late check out since our flight wasn't until afternoon. Would definitely stay again!

We loved John's place in Dublin. It's very stylish and appears exactly as in the pictures. It's a short walk to the city centre and parking was easy and convenient. John was easy to work with and responded quickly to all of our questions and messages. Recommended!
Good location, beautiful loft, great hosts. Thanks so much. I would recommend this spot to anyone headed to Dublin.
Weldon¬¥s place is a cosy B and B,  the rooms just fit everything necessary, even tea and coffee and Weldon himself is very friendly, helpful and hospitable.
Easy to locate on bus route and clean.
Wonderful B&B. Thanks for everything!

Weldon is a true Irish host. His suggestions were on target for us. B & B ten minutes from Dublin airport. We had to leave early for flight and appreciated the hot coffee, croissants, cereals, yogurt, and toast.
Weldon was an amazing host! We will definitely return!!

Weldons place is the perfect place to stay in Dublin. His hospitality is unmatched, it is also one of the cleanest places Ive ever stayed and I am a frequent air bnb user when abroad. At Lucyswell youll be treated with such kindness. Bus stop is right outside that takes you right into city centre.. do not hesitate to stay here!

The place is very nice, clean and you get a lot of space. 
It is outside town and is very quiet - the train station was out of order during our stay so we spend allot of time in the busses. If the train station is running normally I'm sure you will feel like you are quite close to town. If not and you have to use busses it will take about 1 hour to get to the center of Dublin which we were a bit sad about since we were only there for 2 days.
I will recommend the place if you're aware that you are not living in the central of Dublin.

Jennifer's apartment is lovely, like shown on the pictures. It is very well kept, has lots of natural light and the area is very quiet. It is perfect for two people. All the services are included. It is close to the airport, Howth and Dublin city. Communication with Jennifer was great. Arrival and departure were so easy. There is a welcome paper in the living room with the house rules and recommendations on what to do around the area. 
We very much enjoyed it and we highly recommend it.

Bright and cheerful apt. Well appointed and nice decor. Fantastic location for catching the DART into Dublin. Easy walk to Portmarnock village. Check out Panorama cafe! Easy 20min walk to the beach. No hesitation in recommending this place
Great place close to the Dart, clean and easily accessible.
Jennifers place is very clean and stylish. Great location as its only a few minutes walk to a train station to take you to Dublin city Centre. She was a great host, definitely recommend:-)
Jennifer has been a very good host, very reactive to the messages. Her apartment's location is perfect if you want to discover the Irish coast (Howth, Malahide, etc.).

The apartment is very lovely and clean and Jennifer is a great host! The trainstation is just 6 min walking so the center of Dublin is not far away. You can walk to the Lidl and the pizzeria, that is very handy.  It is very nice to be in this quiet place after a day in the center of Dublin.

Decs house was so great, exactly as advertisedî beautiful architecture and furnishings, wonderful kitchen and perfect neighborhood.  We couldnt have asked for a better host or home, Dec is helpful, super friendly and prompt.  If we ever go back to Dublin we would definitely stay there again.
Gorgeous, warm and inviting home with plenty of space for my husband and I and our three daughters. Dec is a gracious host. Would love to come back!

Decs home is impeccably clean, has everything you need and is absolutely gorgeous. It even has the added bonus of a beautiful back garden. Its in a fantastic neighborhood, in the middle of  many fabulous restaurants, coffee shops, pubs and the Grand Canal. Its also an easy walk to many other wonderful attractions. All of that and its on a quiet block.
Fabulous, historical, quaint home. A pleasure to stay there! Great location surrounded by good restaurants!
Very nice place to stay. Will return soon. Homey, comfortable, functional, well located.

This was a great place to stay.  The two living areas, kitchen and three bedrooms were all good sized rooms. Easy walk to all the sites.  Dec was a great host. We will definitely stay here again and will recommend to anyone.

Dec was wonderful to deal with and extremely accommodating - even when we realized we had given him the incorrect dates! My colleagues (who were the guests) all loved the accommodation. Highly recommended!

Dec place was a real gem. It is a beautifully preserved Georgian house with sensitive, stylish touches and all mod cons. There are beautiful spacious living spaces and bedrooms. I would highly recommend the place for anyone visiting Dublin. 
The location was in a beautiful, safe, and central part of Dublin. 
The host was very accommodating - providing parking permits and accomodating our less-than convenient arrival and departure times. 
We're very grateful!
Great location, great flat with thoughtful touches making our short stay very comfortable.  Had some issues with the hot water, not sustaining all five of us, but otherwise it was an amazing stay!

Carmel and John are just the best, a perfect apartment as described and very helpful, let us check in early and check out when we wanted, couldn't have asked for any thing else. The place was lovely and for the 5 of us staying it was great in size.
Everything you need was there we didn't need to take anything.. Thank you. xx

Carmels place is absolutely beautiful! Upscale with top of the line appliances. The bathrooms are gorgeous with heated floors, HOT water with great pressure (much appreciated after traveling around Ireland). The espresso machine was also a plus! We stayed in other Airbnbs which were nice but lacked a coffee machine. Carmel is a wonderful host who genuinely wants your experience in Dublin to be memorable. Carmel has put together a thoroughly detailed welcome packet with maps, restaurant/pub/shopping/tourist recommendations which was very helpful! We have family in Ireland so go back often. We hope Carmels lovely place is available to us in the future! its located in a great location. Thanks again Carmel for everything (especially for stocking the fridge with water, wine, bread/butter, juice, coffee etc and for the lovely box of Butlers chocolates! Hope to see you again soon!
Ann Paul and family

Beautiful condo in a great location. Walking distance to anything we needed. Carmel has spent the time to put together a guide book that you could use for a lifetime of adventures in Dublin. Excellent experience!
John and Carmel are flexible and welcoming to all travelers.  This stay was clean, comfortable, and convenient.  They are gracious and hospitable hosts.  Highly recommended!!

Great place and a great location.  Carmel was very welcoming and handled everything we needed.  We would not stay anywhere else in Dublin.  Only suggestion to future travelers - do not use your car in Dublin.  We made that mistake once.  Carmel's place is close to everything - just walk or take a taxi.  Thank you Carmel!!!!

Highly recommend this property. Great space with high-end amenities. The location exceeded our expectations - some great restaurants, pubs, distilleries and the Guinness brewery within a short walk. Most of all, Carmel went above and beyond to help with some local advice.

We really loved Carmel and Johns place. It was very comfortable with plenty of room for our family. We loved their decor, nicely modern with  cool lighting, especially in the bathroom. They even had plug adapters, maps and brochures, and a very thorough book about the local area and travel suggestions. We would visit again for sure!

Communicating with Carmel & John was perfect from the beginning. Their home is very modern, clean and loaded with numerous amenities and lots of extras. After a 10 hour flight, it was nice to be able to drive directly to their home and not have to worry about purchasing necessities beforehand. If you need a place in Dublin - this is the place to reserve!They are definitely SUPERHOSTS :)

The apartment was perfect for our first trip to Dublin.  It is a short walk from supermarkets and pharmacy, and 15m walk from restaurants and bars in the Temple Bar area. The hosts provided everything we needed and were available at all times to answer our questions very quickly. Its definitely been one of our favourite holidays so far, and would definitely recommend it to others!

What an amazing place!  Great place for my group of guys in Dublin.  Easy access to neighborhood pubs and restaurants.  Amenities were very nice as well.  Definitely would recommend for any future trips to Dublin!

Carmel & John are superior hosts! Their home, phenomenal, touches- amazing. We couldnt have asked for a better experience. 
They have thought of everything a traveler will need. They make you feel extremely at home like their home is yours. Comfortable, cozy, everything you need is there. If we ever traveling to Dublin again, we would definitely like to stay at this beautiful home once again. Thank you so much Carmel & John!

Great spot with plenty of room for the family to gather or retreat to their rooms.  Location was exactly what we were looking for and Carmel did an excellent job proving to notch local recommendations.  The onsite parking was also very convenient.
See previous review.  We liked the place so much we began and ended our Ireland stay there.  Highly recommend.

Carmel and John are exceptional hosts.  They went out of their way to ensure our comfort.  The apartment is spacious, stylish and well-appointed with several outdoor terraces and wonderful views.  They provided a guidebook of suggestions for sights, pubs, and restaurants that was very helpful.  The Trocadero was so good we went twice and enjoyed fabulous meals.  The location of the penthouse is highly walkable to many sights, shopping and, of course, pubs.  We are looking forward to a return visit.

This place is in a quiet residential area of Dublin, near a tram station that takes you directly into downtown in about 10 minutes. The space is very clean and includes thoughtful touches including orange juice, bread butter and some other basics for breakfast that we definitely appreciated. The cottage is just as it is pictured, except that it is actually bigger than you might guess from looking at the place from the street or from pictures. There is some traffic noise from the neighboring streets, so light sleepers may want some earplugs but it is no big deal. This was a perfect spot for our family of four with kids 12 and 7, who enjoyed playing soccer and using the playground equipment while meeting new friends each day at the park and playground just down the street. They loved the board games and legos in the place too. We definitely would recommend this cottage to anyone looking for something that puts Dublin nightlife and excitement nearby while still offering families and anyone looking for a little quieter area a great option. Barbara was very easy to work with and check in is super easy.

The cottage was very spacious and it had everything we needed, including toys for our children which was brilliant.  Barbara was really great and easy to communicate with.  She left us some breakfast bits which was very much appreciated.  We all had a great time and the location was brilliant, only about 10 min walk into the city centre.  Would thoroughly recommend this beautiful cottage in the middle of Dublin.

My girlfriends and I stayed at Barbaras for a week and her place was perfect! There were 4 of us and we all had plenty of room. Her place was very clean and had everything we needed. Location was close to things also so we ended up walking everywhere even though the bus stop was just a couple blocks away. If I get a chance to visit Dublin again, Ill definitely rent from her again!
Fantastic cottage close to the city centre. All expected amenities, and more, are there. Book it with no hesitation.

Great, quiet location just a short walk out of the main touristic area. It was also very convenient to Finn McCool's day tour bus pickup at Parnell Square. Spacious and clean with many amenities, would definitely stay again.

An amazing 3 night stay! Everything was fantastic, the cottage is beautiful, the location was amazing we walked to everything we needed! Having 3 bathrooms was a major plus too! Barbara is a great host, very helpful and messaged us to check details beforehand. Cannot recommend highly enough! We will definitely be returning!
Nice house.  Easy lock box check in.  Walking distance to brewery, distillery, and temple bar area.

If would ideally like to give Barbara more than 5 star, I would have also like to have taken the Cottage back with me!  It's a great Cottage, clean, lovely furniture and all bedrooms have en-suite. Very close to the city centre with local shops close by. Barbara was very welcoming and on hand for any queries. Don't look else where.  This is the place for you!!

This cottageù met all of our needs and expectations.  It is well laid out, has a great, bright living room to gather in, comfortably sized bedrooms, and a nicely equipped kitchen.  Barbara is a gracious and responsive hostess.  The plus for us was we were in Dublin for Bloom's Day and we were a 7 minute walk to the Joyce Center!

Barbara could not be a better host! Arranged a birthday cake  which was amazing. The little touches of cereals, bread, butter & eggs. As well as milk, juice tea & coffee meant we were in luxury! Very clean and beautifully decorated with everything you need... and only 10/15 min walk to city centre. 5 stars ‚≠êÔ∏è ‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è‚≠êÔ∏è is not enough.

Barbara goes above and beyond to make your stay special. We had all we needed for breakfast left for us for our three day stay. Great to have the use of a washing machine and dryer. The property is about a fifteen minute walk to the Temple Bar area and very close to shops for a few groceries. The house was very clean and comfortable. We would stay again.
A beautifully appointed, private, and convenient cottage with fantastic hosts!
Terrific house, great amenities and close to the centre of Dublin.
Great place- good layout for kids, good kitchen, and very thoughtful touches.  Highly recommended!
Ist weiterzuempfehlen
This was terrific. My family totally enjoyed Dublin. The location was a little off the beaten path it made it feel more homey and still very easy to get to everything we wanted!  Great  experience!!

Lovely cottage in a great location.  Walking distance to bus stop, shopping and many restaurants.  Extra special touches like coffee, Tea, milk, eggs, bread, jam, cereal, granola and more... was a pleasant surprise to make our first morning breakfast relaxing before heading out to explore the local sites.  We especially appreciated having 3 separate bedrooms and 3 separate bathrooms.  The washer and dryer were also very convenient.
Overall we were very pleased with our stay.  Would stay again and highly recommend!!
Recommended for all. Beautiful apartment and great location.
My family and I really enjoyed our stay here! Owners were quick to respond and very thoughtful of our needs î especially travel (checking in and out).  Would definitely recommend :)

Family friendly, close to the hustle and bustle of the city without being in the thick of it. 
Quiet, allowing us to spend quality family time without being intrusive. 
Definitely returning to Dublin and definitely returning to Barbaras.

Die Wohnung ist komplett eingerichtet (sogar mit Trockner und Waschmaschine). Drei Badezimmer erleichtern den Aufenthalt mit mehreren Personen. In das Zentrum sind es ein paar Gehminuten aber es gibt immer etwas zu gucken.
Great private accommodation in Dublin. Highly recommended!!

We had a wonderful experience! The location is great, quiet but close to lots of great spots. Very clean, and the breakfast items provided were wonderful for weary travellers who got in to Dublin very late.

Adorable cottage just north of the river. 15minute walk to Temple Bar area makes it great to be in the hustle and bustle while going home to a quiet cottage. Really felt the cottage vibe as we loved the living room with thoughtful touches like board games and cozy blankets! Barbara was a great host- quick replies and super easy check in & out. As three young female travelers we felt extremely safe and at home in this adorable cottage. Would definitely recommend. Milk, bagels and other groceries provided  was also extremely kind and made our early departure time much easier! Fabulous experience!
Barbara was very responsive to any queries I had and her home was lovely.
Marcus's place was beautiful and comfortable. It is also located close to several places to get food or drinks, as well as close to stores. Would definitely recommend to anyone.

Excellent accommodations! We had everything we needed and checking was quick and easy. 

Marcus was prompt with any questions we had about eating locally or other activities close by.

The house was perfect for us!
A stunning, spacious, period property with a modern twist - it won't disappoint.  A superb location and very thoughtful hosts!
Great stylish space. Lovely & open plan living space. Clean, tidy & very comfortable. Highly recommend this wonderful home & hosts.

Super stylish, wonderfully furnished, perfectly presented. It's a 20 minute walk to the Liffey and the conference facilities we were visiting on the other side. Location was perfect. And the rooms are MUCH bigger than they look on the site.
Great house to relax in after a day in Dublin. Handy for Dart and airport bus. Easy to walk in to the city centre. Comfy beds!

This is an excellent location in Dublin just south of the CBD. Marcus was very responsive and flexible with everything about our trip. We certainly felt like it was a home away from home. Excellent for families, larger groups.
Spacious house with great facilities. All buss stops are within a 10 minute walking distance. The Spar is at 5 minutes and open 24 hours. We had a great time!

This house is perfect for a family visiting Dublin.  The house is cozy and clean.  It is located in walking distance to Kilmainham Goal where, after visiting the jail,  you can get on the hop on hop off bus to see the rest of Dublin.  There is a French cafe just around the corner that has delicious breakfast and coffee.  If you need anything from the store there is a corner store in walking distance.

Erica was amazing!!!! It was very easy to communicate with her and if you have a question she is very fast to respond.  She left us a booklet of instructions and tips on what we can do in Dublin and suggestions on where to eat.

I highly recommend Erica and this house if you are planning on visiting Dublin.

The Angellotti Family
Everything was perfect !!
The host canceled this reservation 53 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Fiona always reply to our messages and give us a call right before the date of arrival just to ensure that everything was Ok. The house is spacious, luminous and with good amenities, like a dishwasher. A friendly, quite and safe neighbourhood with good public transport to the city center (20 minutes) and close to supermarkets. A perfect stay in Dublin for our group of five. We  definitly recommend.
Beautiful house with a ton of skylights. Very cozy.
Fionas place was beautifully furnished and offered ample sunlight through multiple skylights.

WyjƒÖtkowe miejsce. Mieszkali≈õmy (rodzice z dzieƒámi 8 i 16 lat) 3 noce. Dobre miejsce dla zwiedzania Dublina, dajƒÖce mo≈ºliwo≈õƒá komfortowego wypoczynku po ca≈Çodniowym zwiedzaniu. ≈öwietna komunikacja z w≈Ça≈õcicielami, precyzyjne wytyczne do korzystania z domu.
Perfect location with a short walk to the tram station to get into Dublin (took about 20 min) Comfortable mattresses, lots of natural light and well-stocked kitchen.
Great host and great kitchen for cooking by yourself.
Ciara was an ideal host. Room is clean and cosey. Conveniently located near to the bus lines taking you directly in the city (30 mins approx.). Would highly recommend for short or long term stays.

Wonderful experience! I am staying here for more than a month.
Location: Very convenient: with many stores nearby, including Tesco and SuperValu; many restaurants, and a lot of buses available. Quiet, very safe residential area.
Host: Ciara and her family are very thoughtful, friendly and accommodating.
A great place for short-term or long-term stay!

The apartment is great! Close to a lot of the city but still far enough out you could sleep comfortably. Temple bar was about 10-15 minute walk. Apartment was presented much like it was described on the website. Would definitely stay again!
Great place, great location. Hallways of the building have a bit of a smell but the room did not. John was a great host would recommend this place highly.
Warm, welcoming apartment. Suitable for our short visit to Dublin.
The location is excellent! The appartment was clean.
Great place in a great location.
Buen alojamiento y muy centrico

Great location, very walkable to
Anything you could want or need! Space is adequate for 4 adults, although a little small. Clean and feels secure.

This apartment is modest, but served its purpose well for our 4 travelers. Its location is superb and the space was clean and well kept. There is an overwhelming cigarette smell in the entry and hallway, but once you enter the apartment the cigarette smell is gone. I was hesitant because it is a ground level apartment, but there are 2 metal fences and a large gap separating the windows from the sidewalk, so we were able to comfortably sleep with the windows open. Quick responses from the host. Thanks for a great stay!
Good. Especially kitchen

Place was solid for a short stay. I wouldnt classify it as a modern space, as it is basic and comfortable. The building itself leaves much to be desired: older, 3 doors to open before you get to the apartment, and many wafting smells from surrounding apartments (I know this isnt controllable). The key pick up location is a bit inconvenient, as well. All told, though, it is a good central location for exploring Dublin.
John's place was so clean and stylish! Was perfect for our weekend in Dublin. Was within walking distance to a parking lot and to amenities in Dublin. John was also so responsive and a get host!
Johns place was clean, stylish and close to the centre. Made the stay very nice and had everything we needed. It is a short walk to the main Dublin attractions.

This place is great! If your staying for a few days its perfect due to its location. The place itself was clean and ready when we arrived. Checking out was easy and hassle free. The only thing really to take note of is that the building the Airbnb is located in smelled horrible but the room itself did not. Overall this place has all the essentials for a perfect stay in Dublin.
Nice space, great location. Would stay again.

Accommodation in Dublin are expensive, but this one doesn't worth the money.
It was clean, very well located and the host was very reactive to answer all the questions.
Though for the money would have expected a higher standard. The common part were a bit dodgy and very smelly, kinda exotic food. The apartment is in the ground floor along quite a busy and noisy road.
Again the accommodation is decent and the host quite welcoming and supportive. But that is not enough for a 4 star hotel price

Central location, many hostels on the same street with airport bus stop. Accurate photos of tasteful Ikea interior however beds are uncomfortable and the road noise made it very hard to sleep even with the windows closed. Its is good value for Dublin so you get what you pay for.
Awesome place, 10~15min walk for temple bar. Good Location
Clean and perfectly located apartment
The unit is located almost in the heart of the city and a walking distance to most of the city attractions.
This place is close to the Connely Station. very convenient.

This is a perfect location close to everything. You can walk into the Temple Bar area and access the hop-on, hop-off bus within minutes. The airport shuttle will drop you off directly in front of building. Excellent place for our four-days in Dublin. The only criticism would be the smell in the front lobby and hallway area, it is quite strong and would  be intolerable for sensitive noses.

The place was very near to the center which is amazing and the check in process was also easy with the self check in instructions. However the apartment wasn't exactly as shown in pictures. Heating only worked at the livingroom but not in the room neither the hallway. Also, the power/plugs in the room didn't work either to charge the phones.  Hot water is good for a couple of showers but not for 4 people in the house.
It was a good stay at this apartment
Nice stay, very clean and good location. No hot water for the shower is the only complaint
A bit like a hotel vibe... photos were a little misleading ç‚ôÇÔ∏è
Nice flat in a perfect location
This house is in an amazing location and perfect for the three of us. I would just note that to get the key you need to go to a different location about a 20 minute walk away.

Absolutely gorgeous little apartment! Everything you need is available in the kitchen. The beds can be used as singles or shift together for a double bed. 
The apartment is located just a few walking minutes from the events of the city, we basically walked everywhere! Tesco is just around the corner and the bus station is right in front of the building.
I especially appreciated the communication with John, he answered every question within a couple of hours and any issues where fixed immediately. 
The only downside was, that we spotted some hairs on the floor and the tub, but theres also a vacuum cleaner available in the apartment so we fixed that.
This place was great. Great location, perfect for 2 people. John and Martina were quick to respond and offered so much help on transportation options and things to do around the city!
Great location, and awesome host!
Great stay, conveniently located.

Johns place was absolutely perfect...perfect set up, perfect location, perfect amenities, and perfect hospitality. John responded immediately with any questions or needed tips that I had. Its a quick 5 minute walk to Temple Bar. John even provided his own website for all of the must dos while in Dublin. Would definitely recommend his place to anyone. You will not be disappointed!

John made everything so easy to be a guest with directions from the airport, being met when we got off the bus and shown to his flat. He also shared tons of great recommendations for places to eat, where to shop, transit, etc. The flat is a great home base for exploring Dublin. The flat itself was quiet, clean, had soaps, shampoo, coffee and teas (which really helped as we were traveling very light). John was very responsive and friendly in his messages. Martina was very kind in showing us to the place. If you have back problems the mattress might not work for you.  Everything else was great and we would stay again! Thanks John!
Best host ever!
Great little apartment in a wonderful location. Kept up great, and a really calm place.

Amazing location - 5min walk from all the traditional Irish action! We stayed here for a concert at Croke Park. It was only a 20min easy walk. 
Johns place is handy, clean and extremely great value for money! Bed was comfy, shower nice and hot, and even had access to coffee machine!

I loved Johns place! The place is right at the Center of the city and at a walking distance from most of the places. John is a wonderful person. He is probably one of the best host I have stayed with. From welcoming with a fantastic wine bottle to giving tips about everything he made sure we make the most of our trip! Thank you John for being a wonderful host.
Great location! Exceptional host. Best local tips and guidance ever.

John was THE most amazing host we've had.  His place was just as expected and very cozy.  Everything from hot water and security was very accurate.  Never had any issues.  The building itself was very quiet and we slept like babies for the nights we were there.  John was not able to personally check us in, but had a trusted friend pick us up from the bus stop and walk us over - a very welcoming feeling as guests.  He was the very thoughtful of our vacation and even gave us a special gift for us upon arrival.  His guide was very helpful as well in finding local restaurants.  I'd highly recommend John's place and thanks for being such a great host and now friend.  Keep in touch!

If you want to be within walking distance of all that Dublin has to offer, stay here! John is an extremely attentive host who was always quick to respond with any questions or issues we had. The hot water is a little tricky and is the only thing we had any trouble with while we were there, but once we figured it out all was well! The apartment is small, so make sure you're okay with being a bit cozy!
Brian is so very thoughtful and the loft is so quaint and warm! We absolutely loved the stay!!
Brian is a great host, and his place is excellent. Definitely the place to stay around Dublin.

Irish hospitality at its best, Brian went out of his way to accommodate. Lovely, comfortable, and stylish apartment with great views, walking distance to everything in Howth. Very handy to have used his Tesla Model - 3 airport service too, a great trip!

Fantastic stay on Howth. The space could not have had a better location , adjacent the harbour and only steps away from fantastic restaurants and a great pub. 
Brian was an amazing host, recommended two of howths best restaurants and they fully lived up to his reviews. Must try everything at Octuppussys and Aqua was a great finish to the weekend.
A wonderful place to wander around the town and the cliff walk was a definite highlight.
Cannot say enough in terms of thanks to Brian for making this little rendezvous very special and one that will always be remembered.
Wonderful place! Highly recommend
The apartment is beautiful and perfectly located.  And Brian is a wonderful host.  Highly recommend!

Brians place is outstanding. Perfect location in Howth & felt incredibly safe for us two solo female travelers! Brians place had so many little touches that made it feel much more comfortable than any hotel could ever offer. Brian was so responsive and helpful but we still felt independent. It was so nice knowing he was a quick message away with any questions. He also suggested we take a cab to the airport rather than train into the city + bus/taxi to airport. This saved us so much time and money. Fast WiFi, Netflix & amazing coffee/tea options. Every little touch made it feel like home.. we didnt want to leave! Thank you Brian.

Brian was very responsive and went out of his way to make an early check-in possible for us.  I would definitely recommend working with Brian! The location can be a bit noisy on the main road, but you cant beat the close proximity to the best of Howth!

This place was an absolute star find. The level of thought and detail put into the place by Brian is the best I have seen in an AirBnB. From the fluffy, scented towels to the stocked kitchen and diverse book collection. The suite was so comfortable and cosy. Brian was a very responsive and accommodating host and the location couldn't have been better. Would highly recommend and hope to stay there again.

We found Brians place very relaxing and enjoyable. Most of all Brian was welcoming and hospitable and his space was famously designed for leisure and relaxation. You can lay on the bed and enjoy watching and hearing the sounds of life go by below you (I read on the cushion in the windowsill, a well) along with nice candles and aromatherapy oils ready to go by the bed. The kitchen was stocked with all the basics to get a handy yummy breakfast and I indulged in the face mask in the bathroom "forgotten amenities" drawer. Brian gave us a great tour around the island, bringing us back to a previously fog-covered spot to make sure we got the view in, walked us to Martello Tower, and walked us to the "trailhead" on a short hike we selected to get us started in the right direction. It was an easy 20 minutes drive to the airport, and he knew how to time it right with traffic and our departure time. Very relaxing stay, Brian made everything easy and very communicative by text about all our plans. And he has the best dogs ever if you want to meet them. Thank you!

Brians place is just as great as he is. His place being our first stay on our trip really set the bar high. I just hope the other places we are going to can compare. 

Thanks again Brian!

A home away from home. This is our third stay at Brians studio apartment and we look forward to returning. The accommodation is extremely comfortable and Brians attention to detail makes you feel at home. The location is excellent overlooking Howth Harbour. Public transport is right outside the door. I would recommend this place to anyone. Thanks Brian.
Brian was an excellent host! We had a lovely stay in Howth!

Brians apartment is awesome! A really unique, thoughtful, creative, homely and spacious place to relax.  Brians communication and hospitality really went beyond expectation - friendly, helpful, responsive - his dogs were really friendly too! Highly recommend, you really wont be disappointed.
Highly highly recommended.

What a beautiful apartment, in the perfect spot.  Brian has created a great space, spotlessly clean and very cosy with lots of extra thoughtful touches, to make our stay so easy and comfortable.  A wonderful place to watch the world go by, but close to everything we needed.  A 3 minute walk to the Dart and 25 minutes into the center of Dublin.  Just 25 easy minutes from the ferry port.  Plenty of great bars and restaurants within minutes of the apartment.  Definitely the place to stay when visiting Dublin, without the city hustle and bustle! Thanks Brian.

Brian's place was great! Awesome location within walking distance to everything we needed. Extremely friendly host and gave us plenty of good suggestions. Would definitely stay if we're ever back in the area!

This apartment is in a fantastic location and the host is very helpful and friendly. Brian has thought of everything needed for a comfortable stay and gave  some great tips on which restaurants to eat . You will not be disappointed. Cant wait to go back .

Brians place was wonderful and even better than the photos. Giant windows that open to the harbor , everything seems to be in the perfect spot.  Seafood , open markets , coffee shops and quiet little bars full of locals are steps away.  The towns people will know you soon and you will feel just like a resident.

The best part of the whole trip was Brians local tips and his limo service. For a better price than a taxi , he is a certified chauffeur and He will drive you where you need to go long or short, in a beautiful luxury black Tesla. We felt like royalty as Brian drove us to the front door of attractions and events, Jumped out and let us out of the back seat like celebrities. I think I  even saw a paparazzi snap our photo at  Giants Causewayù thinking we were someone famous. As mentioned the price for this service is fair and well worth it . Dont rent a car! Rent Brian. He will handle it all. 

We can not wait to return. 
Thanks ,
Cayce and Sarah

Brian is the perfect host and his apartment is beautiful. Tastefully decorated with generous facilities. Its the perfect location for a quiet weekend by the sea or a trip to Dublin, with the train only a 5 minute walk from the house and a 15 minute journey into the city.
Lovely apartment in a very central part of Howth, near to the DART, hill walks and restaurants. Brian is a lovely host with a lot of attention to detail and is a good communicator.

The apartment is lovely. So homey and comfortable. Great big bed and in a great spot so close to everything. 

We didnt get to meet Brian, but he was in contact with us during our stay in the apartment. 

Would definitely recommend anyone to stay here.
Brian has a beautiful place that is very open and has lovely views. He is very helpful and makes your stay very pleasant.  Great communicator.

What a cool spot right along the harbor in Howth! We stayed here to be close enough to Dublin to get there with ease (thanks to the DART station < 10 minutes walk away) but to be a little quieter and easier to park our rental car. Howth itself has lots of cute seafood restaurants and cliff walks nearby that are worth a visit in their own right.

Brian was a fantastic host - supplied us with extra essentials for our baby, had fresh juice and milk/yogurt and coffee pods ready to go for us.  He is fast at communicating and accessible, yet you have your privacy with a separate entrance to the unit.

You do pay a little bit for the great location to getting some road noise from the main street below, if you are a light sleeper. But that proximity is really awesome otherwise!

In a word - Exceptional!  Brian's place is exactly as pictured.  However, we had no idea the gracious hospitality that was to come.  Special amenities and thoughtful touches abound - yogurt and fruit for a quick snack; milk for coffee or tea; and cookies!  Brian's place is stylish and clean.  The bed and linens - extremely comfortable.  Perfect place for an overnight - or longer stay - Howth is a city full of wonderful surprises!  The value for this bnb is outstanding.  Also, Brian is excellent at keeping in touch and answering questions in a timely manner.  I cannot say enough good about this Airbnb! Thank you so much, Brian, for a wonderful stay - we're already planning a return!  
P.S. - We also loved your doggies so much!  
Chris & Jim

Wow. This place was amazing. Sad we only had one day here. Howth is definitely worth checking out and when you do, you should stay here. Cute apartment, beautifully decorated. Great bed and sheets, slept really well. Wonderful extra touches like Irish yogurt and some milk, oj, tea, coffee, hot chocolate....the list goes on. Brian also gave us great recommendations of where to eat and grab a drink. For an extra fee, hell pick you up and drop you off in his Tesla (based on availability; hes a licensed chauffeur) and that was so worth it. He gave us a nice little tour around town before getting to the apt. Hospitality at its best. Was such a perfect way to end our trip and rejuvenate before the long trip home.

Absolutely lovely apartment and fabulous location, if you're looking for a little quiet after the crowds in Dublin.   Brian's place is top notch with a very comfortable bed, stylishly decorated and smartly designed.  Delightful.
We loved Howth and Brians apartment was a great place to relax. He met us when we arrived and gave us a lot of tips about the area, things to do and places to see.
Fantastic host, great communication at all times and a wonderful apartment with everything you could possibly need included during your stay. Very thoughtful and friendly.
Lovely flat, spotlessly clean, comfortable, breakfast left for us. Would definitely recommend. Brian very helpful.

Comfy bed, lots of natural light (dark shades as well to get good sleep), and Brian was very accommodating for our needs. The apartment is very close to restaurants on the west pier as well as the DART station to get into Dublin or anywhere else.

Brian is a wonderful host, very friendly and helpful. He has a great knowledge of the local area which he is more than willing to share. 

The location is perfect and Howth is a stunning place.

Would definitely recommend this place to anybody.

Top marks.

First of all Brian is a top shelf host who greeted us in person and showed us his lovely (and perfectly located) loft in Howth. The attention to details set the bar very high and I wish all Airbnb hosts were as amazing as he was!! We loved the loft and it had everything and more that we needed. Great recommendations for things to do and where to eat. I felt like I was on a seaside vacation - so relaxing and the Tesla trip to the airport was soooo much better than any other alternative. This is a must stay if you are any where near Dublin. Thank you Brian

No wonder Brian is a superhost! Well deserved. His loft is perfect for two, open and comfortable, with an amazing location in a great seafood restaurant town. But what stands out is Brians love of hospitality, combined with his chauffeur (in a Tesla!) and concierge services. We highly recommend booking Brians professional, personable chauffeur services, wherever your travel plans take you. They will elevate your holiday stay ì both coming and leaving ì and make you want to start all over again!
Brian is a lovely, thoughtful host and the apartment is a real treat - I would definitely recommend!

We were thrilled when Brian showed us in the flat for check in. The place was everything we could have hoped and I only wish we had booked the space to spend more days there. Great location, all the amenities. It felt like a really special spot to vacation. Brian was an exceptionally great host. Very friendly and personable. We felt at home right away.
Brian's place is amazing. I would highly recommend it. Superb location and views and an overall beautiful loft too.
The accommodation is cosy and nice with good scenery too. Thanks for the warm hospitality from Brian and we enjoyed our stay in Howth. Well be back again.
Brian was very friendly and accommodating. It's a nice space for a couple. Great location!
Place was fantastic, I only had 1 night in Howth... I will absolutely return. Brian was very helpful, everything was great!
Had a great week at Brians! Wonderfull loft with everything you need!
Excellent location, fab space - stylish and comfortable. Super clean and Brian is a super host. You will not be disappointed
Very nice place in Howth and very, very nice and flexible host. Thanks Brian for letting us stay at your place!
Excellent location and hospitality. Stylish and comfortable home.

This apartment was perfect.  Right in the heart of Howth and withl all the amenities needed.   We were delighted with the treats and food left for us. Nothing was forgotten.  Many thanks and we hope to return again soon.

Brian's place is just simply amazing.  Things we loved: the huge selection of books; the large windows looking out on the port and greenway with window seats and pillows; the super comfortable large bed; the fact that he made a bed on the couch for our daughter; Brian meeting us in person at 2:00 am to check us in (sorry, Brian!); all the yummy foods he had in the place for us like yogurts, fruit, granola, cereal, juice and milk; the coffee and tea selection; the cool artwork; the huge shower; how amazingly clean and organized everything was; all the little touches like the "wine wipes", marshmallows for the hot chocolate, hygiene supplies of all kinds; the fact that he booked our taxi for us since we didn't have cell service; the fast internet; the location right on the main street of the harbor. I could go on.  This is just one of those BnB's that you can really tell the owner put a lot of love into.  The space just felt good!  Howth was also a lovely town.  Lots of great shorter walks in town and an amazing longer walk out onto the head.  We had wonderful meals in Howth as well.  If you are going to Howth, stay here!  Thank you, Brian.
Excellent location in Howth, very clean and comfortable with thoughtful added touches. Superb host.
Fab, stylish space, perfect location. Brian is very helpful and quick at responding.

If you're considering only one night in Howth, I'd add another day or two! You'll quickly fall in love with Brian's place and this adorable sea town. (If anything stay for the seafood!!) We actually used Howth as our home base and conveniently took the train into Dublin for the day. You could easily do multiple day trips from this location. Brian's place is so comfortable with a cool and stylish touch and walking distance to the cliff walk, restaurants and shops. He met us when we first arrived and gave us great recommendations for Dublin as well as Howth. Brian even offered to chauffeur us to the airport in his Tesla for honestly what we would pay for a taxi - such a nice convenience! We can't speak more to the hospitality, delicious food and overall charm of Howth. Book it.
The only thing I would point out is that it can be a little noisey, but gets quiet and doesn't effect sleep

Thought this suburban chic Airbnb was perfect for our needs. Right in the heart of Howth, surrounded by a plethora of restaurants and pubs/bars, its an ideal place to escape the hustle and bustle of the city centre. Brian was an excellent host and made us feel very welcome....we hope to return.
Brians is a great place and he is a top bloke brilliant communication and nice touches in the apartment

This place was amazing. As a solo traveler it was the perfect space for me to reenergize. While clean and organized, it was the little touches that made it rather magical: yogurt and fresh fruit in the refrigerator, binoculars in one of the window seats, a jar of mini marshmallows to accompany the selection of hot chocolates. 

My trip got off to a rocky start due to a delayed flight that caused me to miss my connecting flight to Dublin. Brian was gracious and accommodating when I had to check in a day late and met me at the door when I finally arrived. I instantly felt at home and was able to relax after the stressful extra traveling. 

I miss it already.

I highly recommend staying at Brian's Airbnb. My husband and I stayed here for our last night in Ireland. Brian was a kind and welcoming host. He was thoughtful with the amenities that he provided. Our only regret was not allowing more time to stay and explore Howth for more than one night.
Good communication. Nice space.

Brian really embodies the spirit of Airbnb. From picking us up at the airport at 6 am in his Tesla to making sure we knew where we were going for the next part of our trip, Brian was a wonderful host and helped make our trip very memorable.

We had a wonderful stay at Brians beautiful apartment. The photos do not do the space and all the beautiful touches justice. Brian is a really thoughtful host who went out of his way to make our stay special. The flat has absolutely everything you could need including a bathroom that is stocked with so many helpful items. 

We found it a very romantic place to stay and loved every minute. Better than any hotel. Do not hesitate to choose this Airbnb if visiting Dublin or Howth.
Great little flat, stylish and well furnished.  All the comforts of home and nice views of the waterfront. Access to plenty of restaurants, close by, is a bonus.
Brian was fantastic to work with and made our stay simple and welcoming. Howth is a beautiful place to visit.

Fantastic apartment!  Loved the location and very easy to park on the street right in front of the building. Brian was so responsive and helpful with some great restaurant suggestions in the area.  Id definitely recommend a stay here!

Brian was an amazing host! We stayed in Howth for 1 night and would definitely stay here again! The apartment was clean and brian was extremely helpful and gave us great recommendations. You should check out the cliff walk ( which he recommended)! 

Thanks brian :)
Fantastic apartment with stunning views

Really wonderful place, very stylish and centrally located, easy parking and great pubs and restaurants within very short walking distance.  Lots of special touches and great coffee!  

Thanks, Brian!

Brian is a superhost for a reason! His place really made us feel like we were staying in a home away from home! All of his personal touches and amenities were everything we could have asked for. The location is perfect for anyone that wants to be near Dublin but not stay in the city. We wouldnt hesitate to stay here again!!!
Wonderful location and wonderful place with lots of thoughtful touches!
Brians place is a perfect place to stay.

Fabulous flat overlooking Howth Harbour. Brian is a kind and welcoming host and went out of his way to make us feel at home in his home. Would highly recommend the short journey from Dublin city center. Truly a special place to stay.
Brians place was truly a treasure. Hes incredibly kind & thoughtful and his space was very clean and comfortable. Cant get a better location in Howth. Dont hesitate to book! You wont regret it.

Brian was a wonderful host. He was extremely prompt and welcoming. He greets you at the door and shows you around the apartment, answering any questions you may have about the home or area (he has great restaurant tips too!). Street parking was extremely easy right outside the front door, and the location was perfect for getting to the airport. Brian provided all the amenities you could need, and has put so many thoughtful touches into the space it truly feels like a home. Would definitely stay here again! Thank you, Brian!

Brian is certainly worthy of being classified as a super host. Brian himself is a gentleman and communicates before and throughout the stay. His apartment is a hidden gem and the touches he has make it home from
Home. Thank you so much Brian for letting us stay in your perfect apartment and for all the recommendations. We will be back and will definitely be recommending to others.
Lovely apartment to stay in

Of all the Airbnbs I've stayed in, this little flat in Howth is definitely one of my favorites! Cozy, eclectic, and comfortable with many thoughtful (and much appreciated) amenities. Brian is an exceptionally warm and welcoming host. Highest recommendations!
Excellent apartment with very he,Paul and attentive host, Brian. Strongly recommend.
Lovely spot. Wonderful place. I would definitely go back.
We loved our stay at Dorothys place! Located close to the city but quiet and in a great neighborhood close to parks and cute restaurants. She responded very quickly as well!

It's just like the pictures, a cozy loft with a great view. It has all the necessary. The location is perfect, just 15 mins walking from the city centre in a nice and calm neighbourhood. Dorothy was nice and helpful when we asked her infos. I would definitely stay again at her place if I ever go back to Dublin!

Perfect for a short break. Location not the nicest on the outside street although lovely little park with a lake on the doorstep.  Easy enough walk into town and plenty of street parking. You need a pass but Dorothy arranges same for us without a fuss. 

Couple of great little eateries on the doorstop. La Pausa for breakfast and Wood Fire Cafe offering awesome pizzas and pasta.  Both at the other end of Blessington Street. 

Dorothy was amazingly quick to respond to any request and even went out of her way to do an 8 hour round trip to get the studio ready for us as her cleaner did a no show!!  Didnt cause us a problem as was able to leave cases etc but shows her commitment to looking after her guests. Added to that she kept in touch throughout our stay to ensure we were okay.  

Value for money was excellent in such an expensive city.  

Thanks Dorothy.

Loved the location and the studio. The view from the apartment was an adorable park where locals came to catch up with friends and feed ducks. Its a 10 minute walk to downtown and in a quiet area which was super great. We had our car with us, so Dorothy was kind enough to provide us free parking. She was an attentive host and we enjoyed our stay! Highly recommend

Host is very accommodating and helpful. Location is close to the heart of the city without the hustle and bustle/loud noises that come along with staying right downtown. Proximity to a park and on a residential street made me feel comfortable and at home. I felt safe during my stay.
Place is walking distance to a lot of great historic sites as well as great food and bars. Host was very responsive

Deirdre's place was a great spot for us! We had access to all the busy parts of Dublin, but when we got back to her place it was quiet. We were within walking distance of everything we did in Dublin (Literally never got on a bus). The view out the window was our favorite part and my favorite afternoon reading spot with a glass of wine. Book it!
The apartment is really stylish and the building is beautiful. The street is quiet and is a short walking distance to city center. Deirdre was very responsive. We enjoyed our stay.
Lovely studio apartment for a weekend break in Dublin. 10 minute walking distance to centre, easy transport link from the airport. Bonus of Blessington Basin on the door step.
Apartment is conveniently locally to some points of interest in Dublin.
Cute apartment next to sweet park. Check in was easy.
Great location. Very responsive host. Lots of information on places to see etc
It wasnt as clean as the reviews has told me.D is a great host and accept the advices.

Deirdre's place is very well located next to a lovely gated garden.  The walk to city center is 15 minutes & there are several good places to eat closeby.  Street parking is difficult & needs to be arranged beforehand. We found a good safe lot called "Euro Car- Eccles Street" under the local hospital just a 10 minute walk away.
We had a great stay in Deidres studio. Quiet area not far from the centre.
Very quiet location though in unfashionable part of town. Easy to walk to centre, or lots of buses. The flat was clean,  comfortable and well equipped
This is a nice apartment. Very close to city. There is a lovely small park right next door. Very quiet area. Easy on street parking. Comfy bed and very clean bathroomand kitchen. Wifi was excellent.
Great place !
This was a great place! Deirdre was super helpful, we got to see some great local spots and we loved how close we were to the park!
Cut little appt.  Has everything you need.  Deirdre is an Excellent communicator¶ I would stay there again
Small cute studio right next to Blessington basin park. Short walk to a lot of Dublins main attractions. Short cab ride to other attractions like the Guinness Storehouse

Ds place is wonderful and she is an excellent host! Shes extremely responsive, offered traveling and local tips, places to eat and see, etc.

She was flexible with her check in time and did her best to accommodate in any way she could.

The location of the cozy residence is about a 10 min walk from Temple Bar area and very easy to navigate. It sits by the entrance of a nice, quiet park.

Highly recommend this place!

Overall the place was very nice. It was smaller than the pictures lead on. It was perfect for two people because we were out all day and just needed a place to sleep. She was quick to respond to my messages if we needed anything. It is a bit of a walk to the attractions of Dublin so bring your walking shoes.

We loved our stay at Deirdres, the location is wonderful with the beautiful basin just next door. Everything we could have wanted. We walked everywhere we needed to go and enjoyed the local Georgian architecture.

Great communication with D all throughout!
The space is on the small side but perfect for a stay in Dublin with your other half. It was really easy to move around the city.
Nice comfortable room.
Everything as described in the listing, no complaints whatsoever.

We stayed there for 3 nights and D. always responded very quickly at any questions we had! Super convenient when you want to have your own little kitchen.
Easy to reach near a little Park!
Thank you again!!!
I do not recommend this apartment

This place is smaller than it looks in the pictures. The neighborhood was very loud throughout the night, each night, and seemed very transitional (people passed out on the street). It is within walking distance of many points of interest.
