Rachel was communicative leading up to our trip - and check in was easy. There is a cute park right out front that easily makes you forget you are in a city. Thanks for the stay Rachel!
Very nicely equipped and great location. Owners go out of their way to make your stay awesome!!.
Beautiful home in a perfect location.
Great location!

Rachel and her husband Alan are extremely friendly, accommodating, and hospitable. We enjoyed their large multi-level home that felt very warm and welcoming. Our group of 5 adults were very comfortable. The main bathroom and kitchen have been updated and the bedrooms and living area are well appointed in traditional style furniture. The home was everything we could have asked for for the Dublin leg of our Ireland trip. Keep in mind that the home has many stairs and none of the bedrooms are located on the ground level, therefore you will be carrying your luggage up or down multiple sets of stairs. A few people in our party left our luggage in the living room and carried up the items we needed. Overall, this was one of our favorite places we stayed. One of the people in our group even stated that they preferred this home over our stay on castle grounds later in the week. We would highly recommend this home for your Dublin stay!
Thank you so much - really grateful for everything.

Rachel and Alan were terrific hosts!! We could not have had a better time!! Their place is very well located with restaurants, convenience stores and hotels only a short walk away. Great place to stay in Dublin!!
A wonderful place to stay! Beautiful house on a really picturesque square. Would highly recommend!

Perfect location right next to Grand Canal. Was able to walk to office in less than 5 minutes! Good area for restaurants, grocery, and fitness. 

Pros: luxury space, great kitchen area. Owners were very friendly and communicative. 

Cons: To get to master bedroom, you have to climb about 4-flights of stairs. And bathrooms are not on the same floor as the bedrooms. Bottom bathroom also has low head clearance so if youre a tall person, may be hard to stand up. Dryer didnt dry clothes very well. Needed to do a couple of cycles so might be better to just air dry. 

Suggestions: ask owner how to lock the door if youre not familiar with that system. Took a while to figure out.

Incredible house, location and hosts! We could walk from the house to almost every place we visited! Its a super cute and charming house with a lovely outdoor area! We would absolutely come back and stay!
The hosts were very responsive and helpful!
This is a wonderful and spacious house. Highly recommend it for large groups. Rachel and Alan were very accommodating and great hosts.

Jerrys apartment is so perfectly located for gigs in The Grand Canal Theatre or the 3Arena. We had a super stay and everything we needed for a comfortable overnight was at our disposal. Great to have secure parking in Dublin included with the stay.  Thanks Jerry

Nice apartment, comfortable and clean with everything you need, bring tea/coffee/milk sugar though. Its a pretty perfect location for the 3arena, nice cafes close by, really quiet at night. Great Airbnb spot!

Jerry's stay was a perfect location for anyone visiting Dublin, especially if you have a car.  The car park was super easy and helpful to have in the busy city and the location of the apartment makes it easy to walk everywhere in the city.
Jerry's apartment was perfect for our trip to Dublin. It is easily walkable to the sites but in a quieter area. The apartment was larger than I expected for the city as well. We enjoyed our stay!
Wonderful stay. We had everything we needed and the location was superb. Jerry was a great host.
Jerrys apartment was a great place to stay in Dublin. It was a great location along the river and the apartment was very comfortable. I would recommend Jerrys place to anyone staying in Dublin!
Was a below average stay compared to my other stays. Would be ok for a crash pad but not great for family. Smelled like chemicals in bathroom. Decent location but a bit of a walk to center.
Great little flat in a great location.

Great location with plenty access mins away to fantastic Dublin city centre hotspots...
Private parking was fab and very safe area... would reserve this again anytime without hesitation.
Location is good. Disappointed about a couple of bits like the dishwasher but really handy for a night in Dublin.

We were disappointed by our stay at Jerrys place unfortunately. The apartment was conveniently located and check in was smooth enough. However we found the apartment was grubby and damp smelling and had no river view as suggested by the photos. The towels provided were damp. The beds were fairly comfortable. It was fine for a 1 night stay but I would not like to stay longer and would not stay again as I believe there are better options available.

Great location, convenient parking space, host very available and responsive by phone or text. Kitchen/dining/living space is suitable for heart of Dublin, where youll be out and about most of the time.

The condo is in a quiet location, right off the river.  We got in late on a Sunday night but were able to find good food in the Olys restaurant which is directly across the river in the Hilton Garden Inn.  Nice coffee shop right on the river, and just up the street.
Jerry s place war in a great location and you can walk to many pubs and restaurants! Jerry was easy to communicate with! We enjoyed our stay at Jerseys place!
Great location, clean and comfortable place and Jerry was very responsive. Basic amenities, nothing flash but everything we needed for an overnight stay.
Great location and loved that it had the gated parking for our rental car. Safe and clean. Very helpful and easy to communicate with. Thank you!

Small, 2 bed flat, great location to 3 arena and surrounding area, comfy beds
Disappointed that there was no tv. Parking included! Cheaper than a hotel at maximum capacity!
A very nice place, perfectly located for 3 Arena and Dublin city center. Great value
Great location, walking distance to most attractions along the waterfront

Jerry was a perfect host and very prompt in replying to whatever query we had. This flat is perfectly located for getting round the city. 
Would definitely stay again. Great value too!
This was a terrific place to stay. Jerry was and an excellent host.

Lovely location within the city limits. Close to the beautiful Beckett Bridge. Great for 2 couples, but anymore that that may be too much for sleeping accommodations unless its with children. Enjoyed our stay very much!

Jerrys place was in a great location! Tucked away on a peaceful street right next to the water with shops for everything nearby. The two bedrooms were super clean, beautiful and filled with sunlight.

Jerry was so kind and communicative helping us into our parking spot, carrying my mothers suitcase and checking us into the apartment. We so enjoyed our stay!!
Awesome place to stay!! Great location . Highly recommend!!
2 bedroom apartment, close proximity to river and sights.
Great location within walking distance to anything you would want to see or do in Dublin!
Great location for a concert but not luxury at the price !
Great spot in town. Really only for 4 people. Confirm washer/dryer if youre planning on using.
Great location, near city centre and 3 arena. Plenty of room for four of us. Good communication and prompt responses from Jerry.

We are a family of four that recently rented Jerry's place.  Jerry's home is comfortable to come back to. It is a small space if you have little ones (we don't) that need a little extra space to spread out.  The home was clean and in a great location that felt safe and close to things to do, within walking distance.  Taxis are very easy to get in Dublin if you don't choose to walk, as it can be a 10-15 min walk along the river to get to the main areas.  This was enjoyable for us, so the initial distance was absolutely fine, but if you aren't wanting to walk, keep the taxis in mind.  As far as the space itself, it has all the basics you need in order to be comfortable during your stay.  Couple of things to keep in mind if you are choosing this location, a family of four can be comfortable, more than that may be challenging.  From a female perspective, it was a bit challenging to get ready in the morning, as there are limited to no outlets near the available mirrors.  This shouldn't deter you from renting this space at all, just come prepared with your make-up mirrors.  Also, the bathtub/shower is a pretty big step down, so if you have any motor challenges be prepared for that.  I was just imagining my older parents having a harder time with that feature if they had rented this space.  Jerry is quick to respond if you have any questions in order to make your stay enjoyable.  Thank you again Jerry for a great stay!
Great location, spacious and we had a great time

The apartment is in a side street not on the riverside as stated in the description. The bathroom was shabby, and there was mould on the bedroom wall in the bigger bedroom. The second bedroom had a double bed in it ,however it was meant for a single. As a result it had to be.
 Climbed across to get in and out. The living/kitchen are lacked any kind of comfort.
All in all disappointed and certainly not worth the. Cost of almost  ‚Ç¨200 for 1 night.

Jerry's place was really lovely for my recent stay. The location is a lot closer to things than I realised. Excellent location for the 3arena, would also be good for anyone visiting for the Aviva Stadium. Communicating with Jerry was a breeze, fast replies and excellent instructions for arrival (including which bus and stop to get off at). The apartment was well equipped, with washing machine, dishwasher and plenty of spare pillows and bedding. Would absolutely recommend staying here on your next visit. Thanks for having us!
Central location for RDS, Aviva stadium,  shopping and site seeing . Private secured parking
This space was perfect for our family of four. Close enough to the important sites and we had no trouble with Amy of the amenities.
Thanks!
Alles so wie beschrieben
We enjoyed our visit to Dublin and stay in the apartment.  The apartment was perfectly located.  Although it was on the first floor, it felt very secure and safe.

This place is in an excellent location.  We stayed for 2 days; parked our vehicle and walked wherever we wanted to go.  There is a beautiful, private courtyard (part of the reason we stayed there).  However, there is no seating in it.  We took the kitchen chairs outside.  
We found that the place was not very clean.  There was insufficient comfortable seating for 4 people in the Living Room.  The addition of 2 armchairs is recommended. The kitchen is not well stocked in terms of dishes.  However, there were basics including laundry  and dishwasher soap.  There were plenty of towels.  The beds and the bed linens were reasonably comfortable. 
We would have benefited from more information for check in e.g. exact location of the unit and where we would meet the host/representative.  I didn't ask those questions assuming that it would be straightforward when we got there. (It wasn't.)
Overall, based on the pictures and the description, we were disappointed with the unit but not with the location.
Very convenient location -- almost everything you want to see is within walking distance.
Jerrys house is brilliant, plenty of space, clean, tidy and the whole stay was very enjoyable and hassle free. Jerry is a great host!
Great central location. Perfect to 3 arena and city centre
Great location for 3 arena and getting about Dublin.

This is just an OK place. I was hoping for a four-star apartment but landed a three-star based on overall condition of the place, amenities, and decor. You will get nothing but the very basics at this AirBnB. BUT...if you're looking for a place close to everything in central Dublin, look no further.
Just as described and location is fantastic!

This is a nice, basic AirBnB. It is conveniently located and within walking distance to many of the tourist spots that we visited. We liked that there was a parking space for our rental car and a grocery store right down the street. Being so close to the river I was awakened by loud squawking birds early in the morning but the rest of my family was not bothered by them. Jerry's place worked well for our visit to Dublin.
Jerrys place was a great location. Very near the Temple Bar District but far enough away to still be quiet at night. Jerry was friendly did everything in his power to make sure we had a good stay.
Responsive host and great location.

Great location right on the river.  Very comfortable apartment with a lovely outdoor garden area perfect for a lazy afternoon drink after a big day exploring. Wifi is fast and parking excellent. Perfect for 2 couples or a family of four.
Great location and secure parking. Which was important for our motorbikes.

We used the Appartement mainly because of the central situation. We came back from our roundtrip in Ireland to go the day after to ferry to GB. For arrival in the late afternoon and a last visit in the Centre of Dublin the place was optimal. Thank you Jerry for the good hospitality. From first contact until the end the respondtime was everytime very good. It was easy to find the Appartement. Jerry has organized that someone was there when we arrived to let us in. We are a Family with 2 teenagers and it was enough space for all of us. The Appartement was clean, the kitchen is good equipped. Great stay, the Appartement will also be good for several days in Dublin. Thank you very much, Jerry.
Jerrys place was very comfortable and in a great location. Great communication and he was very helpful!
Great place to stay in the heart of Dublin!
Great Location with on-site parking.

Nice location in Dublin. Parking for car ok.
Bathroom should need to be refreshed, and windows in kitchen may need to be opened sometimes...

The apartment is very basic but functional.  Having a parking spot was a big plus.  All the rooms were smaller than we thought.  It was great to have a market so nearby.    There was a lot of street noise and very loud gatherings in the street right across from the apartment until 1:30 am.

Checkin was easy. Communication with Jerry was good. We were three persons. We needed to a second pair of keys. He gave us it one day later after we asked for. 
I stayed many houses with Airbnb. This apartment was not memorable one. Second bedroom was very tiny. Kitchen and bathroom were very old fashioned. We actually dont get somethings why he buy a coffee machine or a new shower curtain. 
Location of the apartment  was okay. It tis only fives minutes walk to get The Congress Center. It takes ten minutes walk to Temple Bar. 
Your expectations would not be too high for the apartment. Otherwise communication with Jerry and location are okay.

Great Location 
Easy access to Dublin highlights 
Most places walkable from Jerrys place 
A bit small for anymore than 4 people 
Underground parking included

Lovely stay. Great location and lovely bedrooms. Only negative was lack of mirrors and ventilation, there were big windows in the living room but were locked shut so when cooking felt a bit steamy and non vented well. But apart from that it was a lovely stay and perfect for us . Jerry was very quick in his responses and very helpful.

A stylish apartment next to the river. Temple bar is a 10 minute walk away and you can jump into the hop on hop off bus right on the other side of the river.
Jerry was a good host and shared some useful insider knowledge.

Comfortable apartment in a central location, we were met on arrival and shown our secure car park in the attached parking building, and taken to our apartment. Plenty of street parking locally for after check out when we were there. Met all our requirements for a comfortable safe visit to Dublin.
Amazing location, especially if you're attending gigs in 3Arena
This was a great location and the host was very responsive.
Nice spot; quiet and close to the centre of city.  Great host.  Would stay again
The location is great , secure parking , walking distance to everything, some upgrades are needed , sleeps 4 comfortably.
Jerry's place is clean and in a convenient area of Dublin. Jerry went above and beyond to accommodate us.
Great location!

We stayed here as a family of four for a four day, three night stay.   The flat is in a great location;  easy walking distance to most things in the city and in a safe area.   Candidly, we didn't do much in the flat besides shower and sleep.  (That's probably a good thing, because there isn't a ton of room there for much else; 2 BR, a small bath, and a small kitchen/sitting room)  Jerry was very accommodating and quick on the communication.   Don't come here expecting four-star accommodations or amazing bed linens.  However, if you want an affordable stay that is close and in a safe neighborhood with a supermarket steps away, this is a good base for a Dublin vacation.
Good place to stay for a weekend in Dublin. Tiziana is a great host and very hospitable.
I loved my night in Tizianas home. I was exactly what I expected, I recommend it! And she is very welcoming.
Great , clean place ! Tiziana is a lovely person and very helpful. I can recommend her place :)
Excellent location, lovely and friendly host - felt very much like I was staying with a friend than a complete stranger! Couldn't recommend Tiziana enough!
We had a pleasant stay and Tiziana was kind and helpful. Thanks for having us.

Tiziana's flat is situated in an amazing location, in the heart of Dublin but just outside the busy touristy area. Lots of bars and restaurant around and very well connected. The flat is beautifully decorated. The room very nice and full of light! Tiziana was an amazing host, she gave us plently of local tips and made sure that we felt at home. Highly recommended!
Great place
Absolutely great experience! Tiziana is an amazing person, very friendly and happy to chat! Lovely flat in great location, so close to City Centre. Highly recommending to stay with Tiziana!
Tiziana is a great host ! So welcoming and friendly, you feel like home at her place, I recommand !
Tiziana is a great host and made us feel at home. Her appartment is perfectly located in the centre of Dublin and everything is at walking distance. We recommend!
Tiziana couldn't have been a  better host. Check in was easy, and the accommodation was easy to find. Location is perfect for the city centre.
Tiziana was such a lovely and attentive host and her place is in the perfect location to explore Dublin.

Tiziana's room was comfortable, clean, and had lovley natural light from the ceiling windows! Tiziana was flexible with us for check-in time, easy to communicate with  beforehand and a delight to chat with and learn tips and tricks for all our Ireland travels. Plenty of great bars and restaurants in the area, with easy transport from the airport too. Would recommend to everyone!

Tiziana was so welcoming and accommodating! She gave us lots of tips and information about Dublin and gave us recommendations for places to visit and transportation options. We had everything we needed and the space was very clean and comfortable. The location is on a street with a good amount of nightlife so I would recommend bringing earplugs if you're sensitive to noise.
Well located apartment. Clean room and bathroom. Tiziana is easy to get in touch with and very responsive. She is very sociable, energetic, organized, and keen to help the guests with anything.

A wonderful place to stay for a short trip in Dublin. The apartment is very well located and is very clean and tidy. Lots of thoughtful touches like towels and space in the bathroom. Ideal for a couple looking for a relaxing time away close to the heart of Dublin.
Tiziana is very kind and the apartment is very well located, clean and cosy. It's perfect to stay on Dublin city center. I recommend!
nice and comfy place in dublin - with a wonderful host !

Great host ! 
Tiziana is a very nice person and shes very helpful. We had a great stay. The apartment is perfectly located (10-15 minutes by walk for the city center).
Thank you for everything !
Lovely apartment with everything you could need. Very clean. Tiziana is very welcoming, friendly and easy to contact. Very good location.
Tiziana was a fantastic host, extremely helpful and friendly. The apartment itself is clean and spacious and in a perfect location. I would definitely go back again.

It was great to stay at Tizianas Flat!  It is a super cozy and super clean place. Tiziana was so friendly, nice and helpfull. And the flat is in the middle of the center. We really enjoyed and would love to come back!
We stayed for one night and everything was more than perfect. Place was easy to reach and in a great position for visiting. Tiziana is a very friendly and helpful host.
Great apartment and lovely location. Great host.

Tiziana is a super host! The apartment is located at the city center. Lots of nice cafes, restaurants, and night life around. Tiziana is very friendly, we felt super comfortable with her. Great communication!

Clean small room, shared WC, access to kettle in common area.  Room had poor ventilation - top floor with skylight so was very warm on sunny day. Walk up several small flights of stairs.  Host was very enthusiastic
Great location and Tiziana is very friendly and welcoming

Hey, we didn't see Tiziana a lot because our aircraft was late. But she helped us along with information, everything was ready and she explained to us where to got and how. Everything clean, good bed and clean bathroom. It is a bite noisy because the windows go out towards the street but still ok for one night (and I come from a quiet tiny village so maybe not so good to compare :) ). Very good to reach by bus!
Very central apartment. Nice big room, very clean and confortable. Tiziana was very friendly and give us tips where to go out, where to eat and other details. Thanks Tiziana.
Tiziana is a sweetheart and is very friendly. Her place is right in the middle of town. Just be aware that the room is small with a slanted ceiling. It's appropriately priced for what it is!

We can highly recommend- landlady is extremly nice and friendly and take care. She has many good advices, maps for tourists, is very open and helpful. Our stay was a pleasure.Room is clean and warm. And this is good location to sightseeing.  everything perfect
An excellent location near the center of Dublin run by a friendly, helpful hostess.

If youre ever looking to stay somewhere in Dublin, I 100% recommend Tizianas place! 

Perfect location to all the main attractions, just a short walk away, and only an hour away from the airport. 

Tiziana was super helpful for tips and getting around, provided us with free coffee/tea/water, and was very flexible about check-in & check-out! Shes also very quick to answering any questions or concerns you might have.

Very great place close to shops, bars, food, etc.
The place is very clean and Tiziana is a super great host. She provided us very useful local tips and informations about the visits, the bus, how to go to the airport, etc.
I recommend this place it was a wonderful trip :)

Tiziana is a really good host, she gave us a lot of information about what we could do in Dublin etc...
The  room is nice and comfi, the apartment is clean and close to the city centre.
We definitely recommend you to stay at Tizianas!

Tiziana made us feel at home. She was very welcoming and made sure that we could find everything that we wanted to visit. She told us what buses to take, which way to go etc. In addition she's a very solar person, and always makes sure you're comfortable! Her appartment is very nice and cosy. And her place is close to the city center. There are buses at the foot of her building and a lot of shops and places to get food in her street! I definitely recommend ‚ò∫ and I definitely will come back!

Ann's home is beautifully kept and Ann went out of her way to be friendly and offer lots of local insights. Although I was only paying for the bedroom Ann let me have the run of the house and I felt that i could come and go as I pleased.
I will recommend Ann's home to friends who want to stay in this area.

Nice house , clean ,  in a good area . 
Ann such an amazing women  .
Fantastic area for Dublin and near concert venue. Brilliant host and comfy lodging

Ann place is perfectly located if attending RDS as we did. Short 5 minute walk into Sandymount village and approx 15mins to RDS /Ballsbridge area. Ann communicated well before and throughout our stay. Room would be on smaller side but more than adequate. Would stay again if attending an event in area.
A great place to stay if going to concert in RDS as its within walking distance. Ann is lovely and the room was so clean

Ann s place is in a lovely quiet estate with safe parking. Very close to bus and dart stations and a few mins walk to sandymount village. Ann is a very hospitable host who provides breakfast. I am coeliac and Ann had gluten free cereal and gf bread. Would def recommend Ann s house to visitors to Dublin.
This lovely home is a short walk to transportation and within walking distance of the sea and the village that has wonderful cafes with friendly people.
Anns place is very convenient for RDS. A small but very comfortable bedroom, lovely breakfast.
Brandschone, fijne plek om een paar dagen te verblijven. Heerlijk ontbijt elke dag verzorgd en fijn bed. Klein huisje en Ann laat je zeer welkom voelen, alles wat je nodig hebt is er.
It was a lovely stay and thanks for hospitality.
Great quiet location and perfect for those attending events at the RDS or in the Ballsbridge area

We had a lovely stay - the cottage was very clean and the hospitality was amazing. Located right off the sea side and under a 30 minute drive to the city center, it was the perfect place to relax and take in the beauty of Ireland's east coast. Katy recommended many lovely restaurants nearby (that we took advantage of walking to) and also suggested a beautiful hike in Wicklow Mountains National Park (the hike, called Spink Loop, started at the Glendalough car park and took us on one of the most beautiful hikes we had ever been on - would HIGHLY recommend).

We had a great stay at Katy's seaside cottage. It had everything you could need. Katy left lots of food for us to have as breakfast as well as tea and coffee. Extra blankets and towels, slippers and hot water bottles were all provided. The cottage is in an excellent location. It is across the road from a lovely beach and several other beaches are accessible by foot from the cottage. Rush is only a short walk to a number of pubs and restaurants. The cottage was very clean and comfortable. Its exactly as the pictures show. Katy is an amazing host who gave us a great welcome and introduction to rush and the surrounding area. I highly recommend Katy's cottage.

Katy's seahorse is a perfect getaway with many options to hike and to enjoy the sea only footsteps away. But also to do daytrips to Dublin - also on St. Patricks Day - bus and train connection worked well - about one hour to city centre.
Katy is a wonderful host and was very easy to communicate with.
Thank you very much for 4 wonderful days!
A wonderful quiet, private little cabin just a few steps away from the beach. Made for a very relaxing little escape.
Absolutely amazing location and great scenery. Katy is an excellent host and I will definitely be coming back.

Katy's place was very charming and we felt like home from the first moment we entered the cottage. When we arrived, we were nicely welcomed by Rosa. We just saw Katy one time during the week we were in Rush, but she was very kind and helpful - in every aspect: restaurants, shops, hotspots,... In the cottage you can find enough informations about places nearby and far-off that Katy had prepared. All in all, we had a lovable stay at Katy's place!

Katy was a wonderful host and had everything ready for us when we arrived. The location is picturesque and the breakfast food is a wonderful touch, we used just about all of it during our three night stay. Katy was very friendly and provided us with some really helpful tips. Would definitely stay there again!

If I could give this location and Katy more than 5 stars I would. The cottage is wonderful.....about 20 steps from the Irish Ocean, which was just beautiful.
The cottage is just as pictured..the bed so "comfy" after  a long day of talking a "walk about". Knowing that I would be tired and much need of coffee coming from the states...everything I needed for that hot cup of coffee...was just waiting for me. "Thank You" so much Katy.
Every question I asked were answered in a timely manner and with additional helpful information. In short Katy was just great and very helpful.
The town of Rush is great.....everyone very friendly and really everything you would need. A wonderful town butcher (was able to get fresh British breakfast sausage).
The sunsets and sun rises are breathtaking. Just what would be needed to get away and clear ones mind.
I am already planning my next trip to Rush and the wonderful beach cottage.
Katys cottage is a perfect place for a romantic getaway. It looked exactly like on the pictures, it was full of character, cozy and comfortable. The attention to detail was greatly appreciated.

The pictures show what the cottage looked like some time ago. We liked the cottage nevertheless, although the worktop in the kitchen doesnt look very nice anymore (mould?) and it needs some refurbishment as well as the bathroom facilities. The flush doesnt work properly and the sink is always under water. It is more like Camping and it was a little bit cold. Taking a shower was an adventure (no curtain) and quite freezing after turning of the water. But the bed was very comfortable. And the host offers free food like milk, eggs, water... thats great. The surrounding/premises look quite nice but need some maintenace/care. Everything is little bit old and messy. 
But I Recommend the Apartment. The host is very nice and helpful but you have to know that a stay there is more like camping (very rustic) than a hotel or b&b.

Katys place was exactly as described! We loved the cosy place and warm welcome as much as the local area of Rush. Katy was very helpful and communication was perfect. I will defenitely recommend this place to my friends!

Katys place was the perfect space to land. Clean, cozy and warm and a 30 second walk to the beach across the road which was quite beautiful for a nice brisk walk on the shore. Katy was lovely and quick to respond to our needs. She had great suggestions of what to do around the area too! We got visits from her sweet elder dog, Rosa, which we loved!! but if youre not a dog person, dont worry.. shes very smart and would get the hint ;) and she wouldve never come into the cottage, even when we invited her. We enjoyed loving her up every day so she came back for more. 
All in all we loved our stay here and plan on returning in the future!
Enjoyed our stay a lot. We had a rental car which is needed i think. Otherwise great stay definitly recommended!
Highly recommended.. great communication, awesome location, cute cottage!

This is our second time to visit this beautiful cottage just beside the beach.what can we say....a totally relaxing getaway for my best friend and I. The tranquility is pure heaven.Katy,the host ensures you are most welcome, with every attention to detail attended to. We never want to leave when we visit.we would not stay anywhere else. Denise and Suzanne.

This little gem is just wonderful! I would highly recommend it! The added touches of sausages, eggs, milk and bread was fab and we were pleasantly surprised to find toothpaste, Linx and hairspray in the bathroom as we had forgotten them! We had lovely walks along the beach sipping gin and came back to the candles lit outside! It was just truly magical ‚ù§Ô∏è

My boyfriend and I stayed at Katys place for 4 nights. We loved staying here! The place was cozy, and the bed/down comforter was truly heavenly after a long day exploring Ireland. Katys place was stocked with the essentials and she generously provided food for breakfast which we took advantage of on a few occassions. There was an issue with the toilet needing fixing where we had to leave for the day for this to be done, but Katy communicated perfectly and compensated for the trouble. We loved the area of Skerries and Katy made a lot of great suggestions of the area! One small issue that we had was a lot of spiders, which for some would not be bothersome but we arent super naturey people, so it was slightly unsettling. Overall, we thought the place was lovely and the perfect little oasis for our time in Ireland.
Beautiful guest house in a beautiful location!

Staying in Katys cottage was a wonderful experience. It was clean, within walking distance of restaurants, and Katy was super responsive to our questions. 

One note on the town- if youre not familiar with the area, restaurant kitchens tend to close at 9, which can make finding a late supper tough. Plan ahead and youll be fine!
Very nice house next to the beach. We would be glad to come again!

Katys place was the first place we stayed in Ireland- We were greeted warmly and with complete respect. The cabin was beautiful- so many unique touches. We had breakfast supplies, wine and cute doggy visits! The area was quiet and authentic- so glad we had this cabin to come back to after a day in Dublin. I highly recommend this cabin to singles, and couples especially. The bed was super comfortable and we had everything we needed. We wish we could have stayed longer! What a great start to our trip!
Katy's place was very clean, great location, peaceful.

This home is perfect if you are looking for a getaway and she provides you with some foods to male a good breakfast (eggs sausage, bread, butter, a ton of tea, and coffee)... As soon as you leave the property you are looking at a beautiful beach which is great to take a stroll on. We we're greeted by Rosa her dog who was the sweetest thing she just walked up and stood next to me wanting some attention but wasn't jumping or barking or anything. There is the main road walking distance away where there are pubs and restaurants. And if you go right when you get to the beach and up the stairs next to a play ground there is a restaurant with great seafood chowder.

Katy's place was really comfy and cute.
We were there 2 nights, and it was really good. The place is really cozy and the location is brilliant.
Katy was a really good host, easy to communicate with, and really kind.

Katys little Seahorse Cottage is the absolute perfect escape into the amazing coastline of Ireland. The cottage is a decorated blend of vintage meets seaside meets Anthropologie, down to every last detail including the gorgeous flowers throughout. It was a very quiet and very safe area. Note that some cab drivers will find it tricky to find so in addition to the aercode use Killbush Ln to get you in the general direction just in case. Public transport was fabulous and got me everywhere I needed to go. Highly recommend a trip to Howth, Skerries and Malahide, though Rush is a beautiful village all on its own. Would highly recommend this spot.
The pictures are true to the beautifully styled romantic cabin by the sea. Katy was a superb hostess, everything was perfect. Will definitely come back next time we visit Ireland

Katy and the magical paradise of Seahorse are One of a Kind and a true Diamond!! Ocean Front dreams will certainly come true for you who stay at Seahorse and Katy, her darling doggie Rosa and her amazing son and daughter are All Sparkling Gems!! I LOVED my precious moments at Seahorse and take them forward in my heart on my Life Journey! A million thanks and love to see you soon:) Aishling :) ***
The location is ideal, Katy is a great host however the cottage itself is a little tired/indeed of a little tlc ..

We had an amazing time at Katy's beautiful beach cabin. It was a cosy room with nice touches, breakfast food was left for us which was lovely. The property is right on the beach, which meant lovely morning walks in the sun. Rosa the dog met us on arrival and came to visit us a few times a day for some attention - she even showed us to the beach! This was just the break we needed and more. We will treasure it forever. xxx

Lovely cottage. Katys place is a few steps from the beach, comfort walks, and good commuting distance from Dublin without the nighttime madness. We had everything we needed and more.  Will definitely recommend her place.

A very charming and attractive place to stay with lots of thoughtful touches.  Possible to see the sea when showering and a few paces and you can walk on the beach.  Near to local amenities and yet very peaceful and private.  A great base to explore north Co. Dublin.  Would love to go back.

We loved Katys place! She was very quick to respond and offered lots of tips for local restaurants. Her place is cute and comfy and we loved her dog Rosa! Katy also had a friend check on us as she was out of the country during our stay. We highly recommend her place for a relaxing stay!

This place is amazing. It is the cutest cottage. Very private, cute, and quiet. It provides an oasis to get away from everything. The beach is right there for your use. There is a great deck to relax on. The host is perfect.
Everything ok

Beautiful beach cabin. Lovely for a romantic getaway. We had amazing weather so enjoyed spending time on the beach, costal walks and a visit to the Skerries. The cabin is exactly as in the photos - quirky.

Katys place is an amazing spot. She left in the fridge all the ingredients we needed for an amazing and complete breakfast and thats something my bf and myself highly appreciate. The cottage is beautifully decorated, is so cozy and has everything you need. The beach is 3 minutes walk and there are restaurants and shops very close. We went and came back to Dublin by bus and the 33 is just perfect. We definitely will come back.

One of the best experiences Ive ever had! Katys place is filled with comfort, coziness, beach vibes, relaxation, and a sense of home away from home. The level you can relax at with the sound of the seagulls and beach in the background are beyond amazing. The interior decoration directly reflects Katys generosity and hospitality. She is a super host and more! I will be booking this again!
Katy is a great host and the Seahorse is a wonderful place.

Just beautiful! You are at the beachs front door with an amazing coast line to walk along.  The little town is just charming, and the locals were as sweet as they come! Rosa was an added bonus too‚ò∫Ô∏è
A beautiful home and perfect place to unwind and relax!
A fabulous seaside beach house. Katy is a wonderful host and there are lots of thoughtful touches.

It is off the beaten path in the taxi service does not work on the weekends so you need to have pre-arranged transportation if you want to leave the city town of Rush is a good 10 minute walk Katie provides you with breakfast for you to make for yourself which is outstanding the beach is directly across the street from you so you can literally wake up make your coffee or tea and go say good morning to the Sea the shower is excellent the space is calm inviting and beautiful miss Katy and her children are wonderful and so accommodating and go out of their way to make you feel comfortable I would stay here again

This is a place you want to stay if you want a rustic getaway, being left completely alone and in peace in a backyard cottage just across the street overlooking the beach. However, realize that this isn't a sparkling hotel room, its garden location means that some bugs and spiders will inevitably creep in. Being slight arachnophobes, Katy provided us with a vacuum to rectify the issue gladly. Otherwise, the inside is lovely, cozy, romantic and with pleasant artistic touches everywhere.. Which can't be said for the outside, the photos don't reflect the now derelict patio furniture, used just as rustic decoration pieces, and unappealing, tarp covered dirty plastic hot tub to match. In all honesty, you'll be fine with a little adventuring spirit, just don't expect luxury, it's a trade-off for a unique peace&quiet experience.
Awesome
It felt like the Seahorse was created just for me.  I loved my stay there. It has everything you need and more.  Everything was amazing, what a healing place!
Great place to be right next to the beach in Rush.

What an absolute Gem! My girlfriend and I had a great weekend getaway and are so glad we found Katy's place. Right on the ocean and a beautiful little town, we would highly recommend staying here. The cottage itself was picturesque, quaint, and very clean with its own little private deck and area.  We even enjoyed walks on the beach with Rosa the family dog which was a pleasant surprise. Katy was a great host, always available for any questions that we had and very responsive. We can not wait to come back for another stay in the spring!
Wie beschrieben wird und den Bildern entsprechend

Perfect weekend getaway to unwind at Katys cottage.I had a relaxing weekend just exploring the nearby beach and pretty lucky with the weather too! Katy is such a wonderful host and making sure youre having the best stay. Beautiful home and loved every single detail of the place. Highly recommend to anyone who wants to explore Rush and surroundings as it is not far from city centre by car.Thank you for your hospitality Katy and will be returning to your cottage again definitely!!
Great hospitality and very kind. The place was smaller than expected but everything necessary was there.
A beautiful cottage, as a fairy tinny house. Comfortable and cozy and close to the sea. Very clean and warm. I recommend you this place to stay in Ireland.

A brilliant peaceful and relaxed place to stay.

Id highly recommend this place and we loved the  welcome we got from Katys dog Rosa.

A brilliant place that we will definitely return to in the near future

There is really just one thing left to say: Thank you, Katy.
What an amazing time, what an amazing place.
Warm, cozy, and  cute beach house with an awesome host.

A very enjoyable relaxing getaway. Very close to the beach for beautiful walks. Within easy walking distance from Rush town. The chalet is very beautifully presented. Lots of little touches to make you feel welcome. Even though our trip was in November, the chalet was lovely & warm. I would highly recommend to anyone looking to getaway for some rest & relaxation.
Deirdre will ensure that you have all the support for your travel details locally!  She will tell you exactly how the house works and then give you your space to enjoy it!

I had a wonderful meeting Deirdre and her husband. They are wonderful people in a lovely house. My wife and I had a great time. The bedroom is very nice with a comfortable bed. My favorite part was returning from a long day and falling asleep in a cozy, heated home. Highly recommended!
I had a wonderful stay at Deirdres. Big cosy bed with super comfy pillows and very clean. Deirdre and her dog Ben were a delight to stay with. I cant recommend this wonderful home enough!
Perfect Place for Dublin Tours an very helpfull with all Important Information about the City. Nice an lovely House. Feeling like your own Home.
Excellent location, helpful host and the worlds comfiest bed! Thank you!
Perfect location , amazing host
Great experience, Deirdre was an amazing host. The house is in a great location.
This was the Comfiest mattress I have ever slept on and Deirdre was an excellent host

We used Deirdres accommodation for the Pink concert and it was perfect.. It was a perfect location for the RDS, Deirdre was very helpful with info parking our vehicle, giving info of public transport and other local info.....
That was a great stay. Deirdre is very hospitable and kind person. Location is very good too. Highly advisable :)
Deidre is a wonderful host and very accommodating.
Great home to stay in
Myself and my daughter stayed with Deirdre while attending the RDS horse show. Deirdre is so pleasant to deal with, had a lovely room, super clean and great location for the RDS.

House and bedroom are cozy and clean, location's very convenient to both the DART and bus (and then it's only a few minutes into town), host Deirdre is very friendly and welcoming, and dog Ben is magnificent.

Deidre & her husband were wonderful hosts.  Had a lovely stay in their cosy home and they are very warm and hospitable people. The location is excellent. Ben their lovely dog was also a very welcoming host! Comfy and clean bed with thoughtful touches.   A short walk to the coast and plenty of public transport options into the city centre. Highly recommended! Thank you

Deirdre is a wonderful airbnb host.  She is friendly and helpful, and maintains an immaculate home.  The location in Sandymount is convenient to the DART and the village has everything that you could need.

Deirdre was a fabulous host. Her house is in Sandymount which is 3 stops outside of Dublin proper on the Dart (takes about 10 minutes). The town is very cute with good restaurants and pubs nearby. The house is beautiful and she provided us with breakfast every morning. The bed was comfortable and Deirdre and her husband Liam had great tips for us as first time visitors in Ireland. Their dog Ben is incredibly sweet and well behaved. I would absolutely recommend staying in Deirdres lovely home!

My husband and I have just had a wonderful stay in Deirdres beautiful home. She was so welcoming and offered lots of useful tips on getting around the local area. The room was really comfortable with an outstanding degree of cleanliness.

My friend and I stayed here from Friday to Monday and we both agreed that this place is worth 5/5. The check in and check out process was super easy. Declan gave us plenty of privacy which we both greatly appreciate. Theres a heater if you ever get cold. The room had some cookies, chocolate, and water waiting for us. In addition, Declan gave us plenty of local tips and suggestions. I strongly recommend this place.

Declans place is wonderful! He is so friendly and hospitable. He provided snacks in our room, and offered for us to help ourselves to coffee and tea in the morning. The location is perfect as well. The bus to city centre is right outside, and we honestly had such an amazing time at the pubs right there in the neighbourhood. Amazing locals and grand times.
Vyborna komunikace a ochota!

Declan's place is really nice and located in a quite and we'll served area: busses to go to the city center, pubs, restaurant and so on. He is a great host, always available for advice and questions. Very adviced place
Nice place with good location, a bus stop right outside the gate. And Declan was so nice and happy to help with any questions, strongly recommend.
Declan replys very vast on your massages. The place was perfect, located close to the Lucas (tram), this was very good for visiting Dublin every day! We had a very nice stay at this place!

Great host, great place, great location, great value. Just a 5 minute walk to the subway! We didnt see Declan other than checking in during our one night stay, but he was super accommodating and made sure that we had everything we needed.  I would warn that the hot water in the shower is short lived, so keep washes quick:) no complaints otherwise. A perfect spot.  I would love to stay here again!

Our stay at Declans was great. He went out of his way to make check in as smooth as possible, provided drinking water in the room and extra towels, and allowed us to use dishes from the kitchen. We didnt meet him at all, but he was very responsive and helpful via messages. Declans place is very close to bus and tram routes, as well as the train station. Would recommend!
Very well located and in a cute condo.

Declan was an excellent host! He made himself available and was easy to reach should we need anything. He provided many local tips and suggestions on what to do. At one point he even called a brewery to check if there was space at a tour for us! The room was stylish and had thoughtful touches such as bottles and glasses for water. The bed is firm but comfortable and he has black out curtains which are very nice. We slept at least 14 hours straight on it the first night! His house is very close to the Luas train which was very easy to use.

A new, beautiful appartment with a comfy bed for 2! Our host Declan was great! He was there at the check in to meet us. The house is around 15 minutes by bus to city center - we had no problems getting around. We recommend this place. Thanks!
Declan was an outstanding host and we would go there again in a heartbeat! Highly recommend
We would not have realized the importance of Kilmainhaim Jail had we not stayed here. Declan's room allowed us to stretch our money while in Dublin and we are grateful for that.
Declan was a great host, he is accomodating and I totally recommand him. Thank you again :)
Declan gave us really clear instructions so it was very easy to get to his place. He was flexible and responded quickly to any questions we had. The room was nice and the bed was very comfortable.
The host canceled this reservation 56 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.

Declan is a fantastic host! Quick replies, so helpful if you have any problems, very friendly. The space is good value for money. Not a huge amount of room for a large suitcase but he didnt mind us using the space outside the bedroom to store it. Bus stop is very close and takes you right into the city! Great option for your Dublin stay :)

Declan's place is nice, comfortable, affordable and feels safe and at home, with all amenities nearby! I had a nice bed, could use the bathroom, have a shower, use the kettle for boiling water and he was open for a chat. Information about Dublin and site seeing didn't apply to me but sure he knows how to go about it when you need it! A genuine, caring young man!

Stylish room; spacious bathroom and toilet; friendly host; leap card provided; allowed our luggage dropping in; convenient public transportation; we had a great stay!

Therere reviews about the location but we like it to be a bit out of centre and experience how locals live. And anyway the public transportation is very easy.
The place was nice and clean. If there was a little extra space in the room it'd be perfect. Declan's information on how to get to the place was really accurate and helpful.
A stylish room with super easy transport links into the centre of Dublin by bus or LUAS. This place was perfect for a weekend in Dublin. Thank you Declan!
A nice place to stay. It takes 20 mins to go to the city centre.
Amazing experience!

We had a lovely stay - very helpful host, easy checkin, lovely stylish and spacious place. Our host met us in person, explained everything nicely and even provided everything we needed for breakfast. Every detail had been thought of and provided for a really lovely stay. Would certainly love to stay again if in the area

The house is very good, bigger than expected and with lot of spaces for 4 people.
Carol is very kind and responsive for any request, tips in the neighbors and suggestions.
Everything  is as described or even better.
Definitively recommended!

Great house and location 
Lots of nice touches
Una casa muy comoda con todo lo que se necesita para una buena (Website hidden by Airbnb) anfitriona muy amable y simpatia.Muy recomendable

Carols place is lovely, clean and nice to have breakfast items provided.  Sitting on the decking with morning coffee and Irish Soda Bread divine.

Great apartment, location (loads of eateries) and host.  Thanks Kt

The house was lovely, very cosy, very clean and very well-equipped. Carol welcomed us when we arrived. She was super friendly and thoughtful, she had even put all the ingredients for a nice breakfast in the fridge. There was a list with loads of helpful advice and Carol maintained contact during our stay to make sure we were okay. The neighbourhood is peaceful and quiet and there's a good pub around the corner. We really had a wonderful time!
Carol has been very flexible and welcoming. The house is cozy and comfortable.

Lovely town house that is close to Dun Laoghaire harbour where we were taking part in a sailing event. Could easily walk it in 15/20 mins. Place was clean and the host, Carol, was very easy to deal with.

Lovely apartment in fabulous location, easy to get into Dublin on the dart but local amenities so good no need to travel.  Carol was brilliant, we got lost so were late but she waited for us. Five star experience.
the apartment is in a really good location and the host is also very friendly and helpful, i would recommend this place!
Marius place was comfortable, clean, and within a short walking distance to the city center. He was an excellent host, both easy to communicate with and very friendly.
Marius is a great host, he is answering very fast and gave clear explanation how to reach the apartment. And we got breakfast!
Very convenient and clean place, close to the tram and to the centre of the city
Wonderful location. Quiet apartment. Marius is very kind, friendly and very prompt in replying to the messages. Breakfast, coffee/tea are a huge plus. Great host.
Great location. 10 minutes walk to OConnell St.
A nice house. We slept there two days and had a lovely time in Dublin. Quite central too as a location
Very close to the center and all the amenities! Good choice for a couple of nights to enjoy Dublin. Smooth communication
Simple, convenient, comfortable lodgings. I would stay again!

The place is more like a hostel with just having your private room. Absolutly not worth it's money. Everything worn out and unclear description that the whole flat is shared with a lot of people.
Communication and check in times are good.
Everything ok
Marius was a pleasant and thoughtful host who seems to genuinely enjoy making his guests comfortable. Thanks Marius!

Marius was a great host.
He is a verry friendly and helpfull person.
To breakfast we had a verry big choice, from any kind of cornflakes to bread with whatever you wanted, even soymilk was there and the bed was so comfortable. 
We can just recommend him for evryone who is searching for a good housing in dublin.

Thank you verry much Marius!

Marius was a great host! Although we only stayed for one night, he was very accommodating and even offered to shop for food we might like for breakfast among other thoughtful details. He was also very friendly and gave us helpful advice about good places to visit and restaurants to eat in. His place was also conveniently located within walking distance to most places we needed to get to.

Because of our short visit we didn't need to use a lot of the amenities but one thing that would have been useful for a longer stay is the fact that he had a washing machine in the apartment so this is great to keep in mind if you're planning a longer stay :)

Thanks again for everything Marius!

Great location. Great host! Very prompt at responding to enquiries.

We both enjoyed our stay.
Good host
Great spot, just a short walk to Temple Bar area, very nice host with a clean room.

You can walk to many local sights, pubs, and restaurants. Per Marius' recommendation, we took the 7‚Ç¨ aircoach bus getting the airport and walked 10 minutes to the place. There is a supermarket less than a 10-minute walk as well. Great location, especially for the price!
Marius was a great host.  Great location.

Marius was an exceptional host. He helped us do laundry, find nearby restaurants, and the bathroom was clean and tidy. Other guests in the home were quiet and the bed was comfy. It is a good spot to crash not far from some good cafes (Blas is good) and super easy to get to city center/temple bar/ shopping.
Cozy space, close to public transport and the city center. Marius is a humble host
A very friendly and open model host. Very convenient location.
Fantastic location. Within walking distance to nearly everything.  Friendly host.
Marius was a nice and welcoming Host.
A Nice central place to stay

A very nice, pleasant, helpful young man, nice clean place, ee could mske coffee and tea, were offered some cereals, juice and fruit. Marius gave us  quick advice on how to navigate in the city. Thank you!
Great location, easy check-in. We could drop our luggage at Marius' appartment whenever we wanted. Nice place, friendly owner!
Prefect for a short trip to Dublin. Great location and price!!

We had a great time in Dublin and in Marius apartment. The bedroom was small (but you can see that on the pictures so this was no surprise) but we had everything we needed. The location is perfect, just a few minutes from OConnell street and a 25 minutes walk to the city center. 
Marius was very welcoming and made sure we had everything we needed and gave us great tips where to go for drinks and food and where we can find nice pubs.
Wed definitely stay there again!
Excellent location, everything is walking distance.  Marius is very attentive and collaborative.
A brilliant host and a homely place
Great place and host. Very easy check in and clean rooms.
This is a decent room in an apartment. The location is good and the host is friendly and nice. The kitchen is spacious for light cooking and eating.
Such a nice stay at Marius's place, thanks again ;)
This appartment was worn out (although nothing was broken).  Our room was clean but very basic. Bathroom was shabby. Marius was very friendly and helpful.

Marius is very responsive person. A check-in time was after 18:00 but we asked him if its possible to put our stuff in the apartment in the afternoon because we came from another country and didnt want to walk with our luggage. And he told us that there is no problem to make like this. So we came in the afternoon and he quickly cleaned everything and let us to check-in. It was very nice. But the only one thing we didnt like is that in bathroom is not very comfortable. It is not sparkling clean in there and there is no bathroom shelf to put our stuff. Also we had to wait when hot water is coming. But it was good place for stay in the apartment in the center of Dublin.
Very basic. Room is in a shared flat so there is a shared bathroom too. Host didnt seem to be interested in contact. Not worth the money I'd say. Room was clean though.
Great location, comfy bed. The room could have done with a bedside light. Marius was a great host.
You can go walking everywhere!
Very pleasant stay in cosy room close to the city center. Marius was very nice and willing. Definitely can recommend. Thank you!!
Marius let us drop our bags off early so we could explore Dublin. Marius additionally worked with us to check in early which was very helpful. Everything was clean and the space comfortable.
The communication was good and the check in flexible!
Buen lugar para pasar la noche. Incluye algunas cosas para desayunar. Cerca del centro. Check in flexible. Se comparte casa con 3 o 4 personas.
Ubicacion muy buena
Nice and neat. Marius and the other house guests were friendly.

We enjoyed our stay at Marius. The location is amazing, we could walk to every place we wanted to go. The bathroom was not very clean unfortunately, however our bedroom was. The bed is nice, the room is simple but okay. For Dublin it's a good price for what you get.
Good welcome, good reactivity and the location is near from the city center, Marius is a kind host ! I recommand his airbnb
A really good location for checking out downtown Dublin, and an affordable price. However, the bathroom and kitchen were not very clean which made them uncomfortable to use.

Great communication beforehand, everything was as described. Marius was a very friendly and welcoming host. We stayed for one night, had everything we needed and had a pleasant stay. Location is very central, perfect for exploring the city. Price is a bit high but I guess normal in Dublin, so close to the city centre.
Perfect central location.  Francesca is a great host and I  highly recommend this listing.
It's a great, clean location that provides easy walks to big Dublin sights like the Natl. Museum and the Gaol. Francesca was very communicative regarding any questions we had.
Francesca was great! Really helpful, communicative, and flexible. Couldnt have ask for more. Thank you Francesca!

The location was great, our host waited for us even though we had an evening flight, there was tea and cookies. The bed sheets and towels were clean.

At the same time it was quite cold (end of May - beginning of June) in the flat even with the heater on. The water pressure in the shower was weak, and it had two separate cranes for cold and hot water (in my country we have one). Sometimes we saw a spider in the kitchen and bathroom. The WiFi connection was a bit low, not strong enough for YouTube. TV had a distorted picture.

Francesca met us with the keys and was very responsive by phone and text throughout our stay when we had questions.   There were maps and guidebooks in the apartment for our use.    There were plenty of towels and linens.   Large modern wardrobe as well as a dresser and bookshelf unit in bedroom provided plenty of convenient storage.   The kitchen was well equipped with everything you would need for a comfortable stay.    Access was easy - no steps.   The neighborhood had convenient shopping for groceries and essentials.   Also some nice local cafes and pubs.    Easy walk down Thomas Street to Dublin center and close to the Liffey, Temple Bar, Guinness factory, etc.    Busses right around the corner.    My sister and I, two women in our mid seventies, had a wonderful week in Dublin.    Would recommend highly!

Great location with a lot of landmarks to help you find your way, convenient to the Brazen Head with some great shops and diners in the area. Francesca apartment was well stocked with kitchen, bath and bedroom necessaries and little extras. She also met us and showed us around the apartment which we greatly appreciated.

A very nice apartment with all you need. Good location, close to the main areas worth visiting in Dublin. The apartment was nice and clean and Francesca was a very good host. Communication was great and fast and overall we are very pleased with our stay in this apartment!

Great weekend in Dublin, the flat is perfectly located within walking distance to most attractions. Francesca is a great host, she was very accommodating and gave us great tips. I would definitely recommend this flat and look forward to visiting again.
A very spacious, comfy, and perfectly-located Airbnb! Francesca was very friendly and welcoming, and we thoroughly enjoyed our stay. We were able to walk to everywherewe wanted to go!
Comfortable place with thoughtful amenities, such as fresh milk, water, coffee and cookies.  Good location!

Francescas apartment is located in a great location, its not in the center of the most populated touristic areas, yet you can easily walk everywhere you need to go. 
The place is spotless, has great light and has a well equipped kitchen. Francesca provided coffee, tea, sugar, milk and cookies. I appreciated that welcoming touch. 
The apartment seems secure as well as the neighborhood. 
There is a small grocery store (Spar) a block away that closes by 8:30 and a Tesco Express a block an one half from the building, as well as a couple of small cafes, restaurants and a pub (kitchen closes at 9) within one block radius. 
My daughter and I enjoyed a lot our stay in Dublin in Francescas place.
Francesca was a great host and the place is beautiful, clean and on a great spot. Highly recommend.

Really cute and very spacious apartment for two people. Felt very safe and it was really quiet. Loved the tea, cookies, milk and cereal you had for us. Location was good for walking to most tourist locations. We were asked to use the low water pressure setting in the shower which made for a light shower but coming from California we are pretty used to water conservation. Thank you for everything!

Francesca was a wonderful host. We took up her recommendation to visit Two Pups which was lovely for breakfast. It was a perfect location and easy to get to all the attractions. We loved our stay in Dublin and will be back soon!
Francesca was a great host and the location is perfect.  Walking distance to many of the key sites in Dublin.   Apartment was comfy and clean.
Nice space.  Francesca met us and made sure we were settled before departing.  Her apartment was a good base for exploring Dublin.  Good experience.

Apartment is in a perfect location. 10 min walk from Temple Bar but quiet enough for a good nights sleep. Clean and neat and looks exactly like the pics. Francesca a fantastic host. Great communication and really helpful and accommodating. DEFINITELY recommend a stay at this place :)
We will be back!!

The apartment was very well situated so that it took only a few minutes to go to the city centre and it was very well equipped. Francesca was very helpful and the communication worked well. We would come back any time!

Wonderful host and wonderful place! Francesca was wonderful to communicate with. My friend and I loved the apartment, and it was within walking distance to most of the main attractions in Dublin. The apartment was very cosy and clean. Highly suggest!
Lovely accommodations with and great host. Francesca was so understanding when we arrived early and left late. Convenient to area of Christchurch   The apt is so comfortable and so are the beds
Great location, amazing host!

Absolutely amazing location! Less than 15 mins walking from so many major Dublin attractions. The space was perfect for my mom and I. We were able to make meals in as opposed to eating out some nights which saved us some money. Francesca was great! She was communicative and thorough with check-in. I would definitely recommend and should I ever go back to Dublin, I would check out Francescas place first!

Brians place is truly in walking distance to everything Dublin has to offer. Cute cozy space & super clean! Also getting in contact with him was super easy & always responded fast. Would most definitely stay here again.
Ideal location, basic apartment but has everything you need. Check-in and check-out was super easy.
Brians place was great. Great condo, clean, and great location in Dublin. Also, Brian is a great communicator, and quickly responds. I would stay here next time in a heartbeat.
We had a great time at Brians place! This is the perfect location, and we were able to walk anywhere we needed to within twenty minutes.
Great host!
The location was everything. Directly across from St. Patrick's Cathedral and ~10 minute walk to Temple Bar. Thanks, Brian!
Very clean private apartment in a great location in Dublin! We felt very secure and safe staying here. Thank you!

Brians apartment is right next to St Patrick's cathedral, only a few minutes walk from the bus stop 747 coming from the airport. The check-in and check-out were very easy and Brian responds very quickly to enquiries & always tries to help. The apartment itself could use some paint updates here & there but it is spacious enough, it is very clean and has everything you will need. The bed is not too big but is very comfortable! The bedroom is situated on the street side so if you're a light sleeper like me be sure to bring earplugs. There is information on what to do in Dublin (even an old Lonely planet) and all the major sites are in walking distance. Good value for money, would stay here again! Some tips; go to EPIC museum (on emigration), Guinness Storehouse, day trip to Belfast & Giant's causeway (Wild Rover) also highly recommended. Food; many restaurants have early bird dinners before 19:00, good value for money (our favorite was Millstone restaurant)
Brian and his help are were responsive, polite and helpful. I forgot an international electric plug converter and Brian had one promptly delivered.

Location location location!!

It is located right across from St Patricks Cathedral!  It has a beautiful 

The apt is very large. Has a full size bedroom as well as a living space and full stocked kitchen. The shower is large as well

As an added bonus it has a washer. Which is wonderful when you pack light

Brian is super attentive and is very quick to respond to any communication sent

In fact, we had gotten ourselves lost trying to find it, and he called in a very calm voice and was willing to come find us. 

Turns out we were 50 feet from where we were to be

Great place to stay
The location can not be beat! With that being said, it is on a noisy road so that will take some getting used to.
Great location and apartment!

Excellent, clean space. Brian is a great host (SUPER responsive) and made checking in a breeze. We loved the view overlooking the park and St. Patrick's Cathedral. Perfect location for every tourist destination we wanted to reach by foot (only needed a cab to get there from the airport). Definitely check out the cafe across the street for breakfast to-go before heading out to the sites.
Great location, comfy bed
Tidy and beautiful apartment in the city centre.
We loved our visit. Location and host were wonderful. VERY clean!

Brian and Fabi were terrific! Fabi helped us get a taxi on our last day, so helpful.
Brian very accommodating! Would stay here again!
Brians place is in a great location- close to everything. He was very quick to respond and helpful. We enjoyed our stay there.
Very nice apartment, very clean and great area! In walking distance of Stephens Green, would absolutely recommend

This flat what exactly what we needed. It is in a great location, relatively quiet, easy to walk to everything. Really liked having the washer and dryer. Brian was great about communicating. Definitely recommend this rental!

This apartment is in a very good location as across the road from St Patricks cathedral green and a quick 5 minute walk from Christchurch cathedral (and Leo Burdocks  the best chipper in Dublin!)
It was difficult to access the gated door (my husbands arm would not fit through to push and release the door) but Brian assures us this is to be repaired ASAP.
It is on a busy road so windows need to be closed at times but is right near everything with a Spar grocery store a few metres down the road and the bus stop very close also. Bed is very comfortable and the apartment is quite spacious with the bedroom separate from the living area kitchen.
Brian was unavailable when we arrived but we had a quick response from his friend Fabi and even though we couldnt check in until the normal time of 1pm she looked after our suitcases and dropped them into the apartment for us which is up a couple of flights of stairs - so much appreciated
Brians apartment is tidy, secure and well appointed.  We were very comfortable.
A great place located within walking distance of everything! Brian was a great host who communicated well before, throughout, and after our stay.

Brains place was perfect! Such an amazing location to everything . The Bite of Life cafe right across the street is a great place to grab breakfast. We were backpacking Europe and of course needed to do laundry . There is a place two doors down that will wash, dry and food for $10. Also, a nice little store with essentials, beer and liquor is a few doors down. Youre in walking distance of everything, although a few nights we did take a taxi because we were a bit tipsy. The apartment was nice, we enjoyed the separate living room space and TV. The kitchen was great so we could heat up leftovers and the frig was nice and cold. Bed was comfy and fits 2 perfectly. We stayed in the beginning of July and even though there was a fan, it did get a little warmer than us Americans are use to. But other than that this place was such a delight. Great way to end our vacation. I would stay here again my next trip to Ireland for sure
Brian was really helpful prior to arriving in Dublin and was incredibly welcoming during check in. Apartment is in a perfect location for exploring the city.
A great place in an excellent location. I would recommend it.
Excellent location - easy to get around from the apartment.

Very clean and accommodating. I had a canceled flight and needed a place to stay in a pinch. Even with these limitations, the host was incredibly helpful. Highly recommended. The location is also very nice and fairly close to everything.

Brian's place was great! The location was just across the road from St Patrick's Cathedral and very close to the downtown.  Grocery stores and restaurants all in walking distance from the apartment. Best of all, Brian has a washer/dryer in the apartment!!! Such a treat to be able to wash our stinky clothes before repacking them for the rest of our journey. Brian was extremely quick to respond to our questions. The apartment was sparkling clean. Thanks to Brian for sharing his place with us.
Brian's place was in a great location.  Walking distance to all major attractions.  Very clean and modern. A great stay!
Brians place was super clean and close to everything! Check in was streamlined and Brian replied to messages very quickly. So glad we found this place for our trip to the city!

Brian's place was just as described, everything was working and the apartment was clean.
The bed was a bit small, but we managed :) 
Brian had given us a great welcome and made sure we know how to enter the apartment and helped us with the suitcases up the stairs.
The location of the apartment is great! Close to everything you need, tourist sites, department stores, bus station, and also great coffee!

This is the perfect location! We were able to walk everywhere we wanted to visit and felt safe! We left some items at Brians once we checked out and he was very responsive and helpful and managed to get our items back to us. We would definitely stay again!

We had a great stay at Brians! The location is ideal - close to everything youll want to do in Dublin. The coffee shop on the corner downstairs was perfect. Washer/dryer combo was very helpful to have. Brian was a great host.
Great place with convenient access to the LUAS and gaiety theatre with plenty of restaurants and bars in the surrounding area

Brian's apartment was clean and in a convenient location, close to Christchurch cathedral and St. Patrick's cathedral. We were greated by the cafe nextdoor and walked over to the apartment to check in. There are a couple of convenience stores nearby, can pick up basic things. Overall, this apartment worked out well for us, we were traveling with a child, had a nice time. Thanks Brian and Fabi!
Brian was fantastic and a great communicator! He was quick to respond and the apartment is in an amazing place! Will for sure contact Brian again on the next trip to Dublin!
Perfect location in Dublin. Nice simple apartment. Brian was great to communicate with and checking in/out was very easy. Thanks!

Great stay at Brian's flat. It's in a great location that's easy to get to and from all of the main sights and amazing coffee and food too! We had a great stay in Dublin and Brian and was very easy and quick to communicate with. His friends checked us in and were very helpful with that process. It was a quick visit for us on the end of our Ireland trip, but I would definitely come back and stay here. The only minor thing I might point out was that I am only 5ft tall and if I was not traveling with my taller friend I might have had some difficulting opening the downstairs gate to get into the flat. It was somewhat comical, but just something I should point out if you are a more petite solo traveler. :) Oh and definitely stop by to grab coffee and breakfast from Two Pups which was only a few blocks away.
Brian's place was adequate.  We especially appreciated the washing machine and the kitchen. There was a cafe across the street, but no places for dinner in easy walking distance.
Convenient location to walk to everything, quick walk to Temple Bar area and the Guinness Storehouse. Brian was quick at responding and easy to communicate with for check in. Thanks for our stay!

We enjoyed our stay at Brians place. We were in town for a long weekend and it was the perfect home base, so close to everything! Would definitely recommend if youre looking for a place thats central and convenient.

This cozy apartment is truly in the best spot possible. It is within walking distance to all the great destinations. It even has a yummy cafe across the street. There is convenience store and pharmacy down the street which was helpful too. It was perfect and Brian was very nice, accommodating, and responsive.
Great location! Within walking distance of everything.

Great location! Very quiet and nice area but also close walk to major places. Clean apartment with good space. The only thing would be we could not get the heater in the room to work but the one in the living room was good to make the whole apartment warm enough.

Superb location, within walking distance of city centre but also with excellent local bars, cafes and shops.
We felt safe, comfortable and relaxed in this friendly, lively city and would recommend both this apartment and Dublin wholeheartedly.
Brians flat is a great base for exploring the more central parts of Dublin. Its a nice, clean space, and we were very happy to come back to it after a day of wandering around the city.
Great stay, Freddie and Jason are very friendly.. Good location too.

Really great location on Ushers quay with an easy access to the city-center and the airport by bus within 3/5 minutes walking distance. 
Freddy is an amazing host and is there to answer any questions you may have and gave us a lovely welcome. My mom and I were very happy of our journey and we can say that we were in good hands.

Freddys place was great! Its in a fantastic location, we walked everywhere in the city! There are a bunch of great places nearby to eat as well. He had a ton of great recommendations as well for us for sights to see and places to eat. 

Please be mindful that this location is great but it is also located on the street. If you are a very light sleeper, I would recommend bringing some earplugs or something of that nature. We didnt have any issues with the noise but I would see anyone who is a light sleeper having an issue. 

Overall, I would recommend staying at their place. Freddy was very nice and accommodating and we loved the location!
We just needed a place to sleep and for this purpose it was good - very central with a direct view in the Liffey and cheap. The mattress was a little saggy though.
Freddy and Jason are very kind, their house is in a strategic position, in the middle between temple bar and guinness storehouse.
Great location and great value! 15 minutes from temple bar district, and 10 minutes from Guinness tour. Very enjoyable stay.
The place was great for our weekend in Dublin: Spacious and clean room and bathroom. In walking distance to the most important sights and with a welcoming host.

Freddy is an amazing host, always available for us and worried with all details to ensure we were confortable and happy!
Great location near the main points of interest!

Very simple clean room on the outskirts of the busy touristy part of Dublin. I wish it had had a side lamp next to the bed though! Very comfortable and cozy bed with nice big window.
