The shower is a bit confusing and the bathroom light switch is OUTSIDE the bathroom and the switch for the shower is INSIDE the bathroom. Confusing for a second but then youll never forget it! Very clean and nice place.

Freddy was very helpful in providing me very accurate directions upon arrival. The space was clean and he had a lot of really helpful tips and recommendations organized in a binder waiting for me. I enjoyed my stay in Dublin and would stay here again.
Freddy and Jason are amazing! They offered amazing suggestions and their house is in the middle of EVERYTHING! I thoroughly enjoyed my stay there
Strict minimum.
Great location.
Just as listed, very convenient location to central old town Dublin.
Nice fella, decent apartment really nicely located
Freddy's place was excellent. The room's location in the city is incredibly convenient, and the flat is kept very clean. Would definitely book again.
We had a good stay.
Freddy is a very friendly host and the apartment room was simple but in a good location, a short walk along the river to Dublin City centre. Its basic but good value. Thanks Freddy for a good stay.

Adrienne was an amazing host. My flight was delayed by two hours, meaning I had to check in after midnight.  She left awesome instructions and was very gracious about my late arrival.  She gave me great tips for things to see and do in Swords.  Her place is lovely; spotless and welcoming.  I highly recommend it!
Lovely quiet area with a wide array of restaurants and shops nearby. Clean and quiet household and therefore great accommodation for business or leisure

Absolutely amazing! Super clean, super friendly and a super sweet family. We absolutely will be back. Adrienne is wonderul. It's too bad we did not have much time to stay and to hang out. Thank you from the bottom of my heart!
Adrienne have a lovely house and she is very reactive ! It was a pleasure to stay at her house.
A quick taxi ride (‚Ç¨15 at 5.45am) from Dublin Airport and close to Dublinbus route from airport. Very comfortable bed and speedy comms.

We found the close proximity to the Dublin airport was great for our needs, the room and bathroom were very clean, our host was easy to communicate with. The room was quite small, especially for two people, but was okay for one night, which is all we needed, as we had an early flight. A nice addition would be access to tea/coffee, as we found the lack of this to be unusual in an Air B and B.  Parking was on the street and was fine for us. The location is quiet and easy to find.

I stayed at Adrienne's with a friend for one night. We arrived at about half 11 at night and left the following morning at 6 for an early flight. Its a great location for anyone traveling to the airport and looking for somewhere to stay.  Adrienne was nice, although we didn't get talking to her much considering the times we were checking in and leaving her house at. She wasn't there when we arrived but gave us info on how to get into the house and where our room was. She usually responds to messages within 12 hours and there is ample parking available along her street where your car would be safe.

This is a beautiful home with a very friendly hostess who gave us a fabulous welcome.  Our room was bright with loads of storage and a comfy bed; the bathroom immaculate, white marble tiled, right outside our bedroom door was perfect. The home is a short walk to Swords, a very interesting town with a huge shopping mall, loads of places to eat and a fabulous castle to roam around.  Unfortunately, we were there for only one night so cant comment on access to kitchen, laundry, etc.
Adrienne is a great host and her home is lovely. The room was just perfect and she was a great help in getting us to Malahide Castle for a concert. Would def recommend.
We enjoyed our stay with Adrienne. The house is close to the airport, but you dont hear anything. Everything was clean. We got good breakfast recommendation.

A great place to stay if you have a flight the next day as it's so close to the airport. I only spent one night, but Adrienne's place was cozy and comfortable, and very clean. My sister and I were offered tea or coffee as soon as we arrived. She even provided power adapters in the rooms for her guests. We really appreciated that Adrienne phoned a cab for us so we could get to the airport the next day.

This was a great find on AirBnB.  Very close to the airport, but also just a short walk away from the cute downtown of Swords.  The place was immaculately clean.  There was even a mini-guide in the room letting us know about wifi passwords, nice restaurants, instructions for getting into the gate.  I was very impressed by the whole stay.

Adriennes place was perfect for getting to the airport. We had a very early flight and Adrienne called us a taxi for the morning. She even gave us local tips for places to eat in the area. Would definitely recommend staying with Adrienne!
A clean and comfortable room, which we unfortunately had to leave early.  Adrienne gave us directions to the town centre only was a short walk which we enjoyed.

Adrienne's house was quite perfect. Located in a nice neighborhood with a park right next to her house. Local directions were given by her with great recommendations. Wish we could have stayed more then one night!

I recommend this place. Its close to the airport and we had breakfast in Swords and it was lovely. Adrienne allowed us to check in late, as our flight arrived at 11pm. The room and bathroom were very clean and had everything you needed.

We were very comfortable, Adrianne and her husband are very welcoming, for those who just arrived from travel and from another country this is great!  Fully clean bathroom with toiletries!  Very good, I will come back whenever you need!
Sauberes nettes Zimmer, Bushaltestelle nicht weit entfernt

Adrienne was wonderful. Super communication throughout. She welcomed us warmly and was really accommodating for a later-than-expected arrival. She was really helpful in giving us directions and guidance to where we needed to go. 
Her home was the perfect location for us - being so close to the airport. It was beautiful, comfortable and clean. She made us both feel very welcomed and comfortable during our stay.

Also, the shower was superb! 

Really would recommend as a lovely and easy place to stay thats close to the airport.
Adrienne was a very friendly and  lovely host. Next time I am in Dublin I would stay with her again.

Das Airbnb liegt 10 Minuten vom Flughafen entfernt. Der Check-In war problemlos, die Kommunikation  super und sehr schnell, das Badezimmer ist neu renoviert. U
Insgesamt ist es das beste Airbnb, das wir jemals hatten.
Very nice and tidy!!
Perfect for our short stay
Wonderful stay in the local neighborhood of Swords close to Dublin and the airport. Amazing hosts and very hospitable!!!
Adrienne has been very kind and gave us some nice tips.
Adrienne's place was clean and warm; she was a lovely lady who was very accommodating. I would stay here again.

This is a lovely, quiet home minutes from both the airport by car or bus, and walking down into town for shopping, meals and a castle that is being restored. I would unreservedly recommend this accommodation.
Great place to stay close to Swords downtown and airport!
Very good place, very clean, Adrienne is very friendly, I highly recommend.
Amazing place to stay close to the shops and airport

Great location and clean/organized place, couldn't recommend it more. She called us a taxi, whi h was much appreciated, cost 15 euro for a Sunday early pickup from her place to the airport as buses in Dublin on Sundau tend to run later in the morning. Would stay here again when I come back to Dublin.
Everything was great! Adrienne is a great host, the house and the room were clean and comfy. I definitely recommed it.
Adrienne is a lovely hostess with a really gorgeous house!
Enjoyable stay
If I could leave more stars I would.

Hi Adrienne
Everything was perfect
Thanks a lot !
Best

The home, room and neighborhood is SUPER quiet and about a 15 min ride from the airport. Super cute and very homie. 
My first encounter was with Adriennes husband who was very kind and helpful, and helped me inside when he saw me outside clueless about where I was.
The room was cozy and a perfect transition from the airport.
The doors room doors dont have locks, but the house felt safe.
The room is cozy, clean, and in a convenient area. A great value!
Great place to stay near the airport
Adriennes place is clean, safe and well located near the airport and near the center of Swords. Easy to get bus or walk to town . A welcome, stable place!

Adrienne was very accommodating, regarding check in and I experienced a very friendly welcome upon arrival . Her place was   
extremely clean and quiet and was very conveniently located near the town . I would definitely recommend to anyone !

Adrienne's home is in a lovely quiet area, which also happens to be very close to the airport (though there was no aircraft noise that I could hear). It's within a short walk (10 minutes) of Swords town centre and Adrienne offered many suggestions of places to go for food. I chose her favourite (the Old School House) and I was not disappointed, it was excellent. 
The bed was really comfortable and the house was spotlessly clean. I'll definitely be looking to book the room again the next time I have an early flight.

Adriennes place is super clean and very good value for money! Its is spacious and set in a quiet neighbourhood. It is very close to Swords pavilion shopping centre and the city centre is very accessible from there. Adrienne is very welcoming and she takes pride in her house. Would be very highly recommend it.
Everything was excellent, I really recommend it. Just one of the bed is quite small to fit along. Without this stuff. All was perfect
Great people, lovely place and very helpful would recommend to any who needs a place to stay.
Nice house, easy bus if you know where you need to go.

Adrienne's place was great for our layover. It was close to the airport and the village of Swords. I didn't have a lot of time to spend in Dublin but Adrienne had a great pub suggestion and  directions on how to get there ready for us. It was clean and Adrienne was very friendly.
We had a wonderful time staying here. We received a warm welcome and were provided with great tips on the best transportation to use and places to explore.
Great place to stay near the airport, directions provided are great, room clean and tidy.

We stayed at Adrienne's place for a quick overnight stay before catching our plane home in the morning.  It was a lovely property...I was sorry we didn't get to spend more time there!  Adrienne was kind enough to arrange our taxi back to the airport in the early morning for us, which was appreciated.  Very comfortable stay!

This is a fabulous space. Adrienne stayed up until midnight to check me in as my flight was delayed. It is a private room with all you need for a nice retreat just a short taxi away from the Dublin Airport. It is truly ideal for a quiet and relaxing space. The hospitality is outstanding and the company is the best. I cannot wait to come back! Thank you Adrienne!!!!
It was really nice to stay at this place. Thank you for your comfortable bed, clean house and for being so sweet! 10/10
Adriennes place was clean and close to town. Would highly recommend.
A  lovely home ,great location ,and convenient for the airport.
Clean bedroom and bathroom. Good kitchen for tea etc, spacious and plenty of parking. Just a few minutes walk to plenty of nice restaurants and shops. Good for airport.

Lovely place, comfortable bed and great shower!! Felt very at home as soon as I walked in as the hosts are lovely and very welcoming. Breakfast and coffee and help to get to the airport was much appreciated. Great value for money

We only met Adrienne for a couple of minutes.
Communication and checking in worked great and Adrienne was very helpful and offered to call a taxi to get to the airport.

The apartment is very close to the airport. (10-15 minutes)
Excellent place to stay

Perfect location for pre-flight out of Dublin airport.  I had some time to kill after arriving and Adrienne drew me a map for the scenic route to close by Malahide.  Beautiful spot.  My plans changed and I arrived earlier than initially projected.  Adrienne obviously changed her day to accommodate.  Comfy bed!  Thank you for everything.
Great stay as always..highly recommend
A clean and convenient place to stay before flying from Dublin Airport. She even arranged our boarding passes and taxi. Very friendly and efficient.
Perfect location for an airport flight in a clean and cosy location

Adrienne and her husband were so hospitable. My flight landed at almost midnight Dublin time and Adrienne was more than accommodating. I felt very safe and welcomed. I would recommend this space to anyone interested!
We had a great stay at Adriennes, the rooms were clean and comfortable and our trip to the airport early in the morning took under 10 minutes, so great location too!

I had a wonderful stay in Adrienne's space! My room was stylish, comfortable and sparkling clean. The bathroom was also impeccably clean and had a beautiful, state of the art shower. Adrienne provided lots of great local tips. Her place is very close to downtown Swords and the Dublin airport. I was headed to the airport the morning after my stay and Adrienne looked up the bus times for me and gave me great directions to the bus stop. She even made me a cup of tea! I absolutely recommend Adrienne's space to anyone! Thank you, Adrienne!

I only stayed here for one night. Adrianne and her husband are very nice persons. The accommondation is super clean. There are also other AirBnB guests upstairs, I think at least 2 more. The bathroom is shared only with the other guests. It's an excellent location close to the airport and the room is very comfortable.
I would definitely stay here longer, next time.
Adriennes home is lovely and easy to reach via bus. It is only a few minutes from the airport. The bed was comfortable and the linens wonderful. I highly recommend Adrienne as a host.
Perfect place to spend a night before a flight out of the Dublin airport. Adrienne was friendly and easy to communicate with, the bed was comfortable, and her house was spotlessly clean. Thank you!
Perfect location :)!

Location is perfect for the airport and Swords has plenty to keep you entertained if you need to kill some time, which is walking distance from the property. Adrienne is friendly and helpful and her house is excellent. Lovely and clean and a comfortable bed for your stop.

Adrienne and Michael are great hosts, very warm and friendly. They make you feel a part of the their family. Adrienne also booked me a cab for the airport too so that I am not hassled the next morning. I was only there briefly before my flight the next Morning...however, their warmth would remain with me for a while.
A great place to stay thats perfect for the airport! Will have to come back in the future to explore Swords castle next time!!
Great place to stay.
The host canceled this reservation 27 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
Adrienne was very welcoming and helpful. The place was cleaned and comfortable and a very nice place to stay.
A nice quiet place to stay within 10 minutes of the airport.
Comfortable bed and good location if you're flying out from Dublin Airport, it was only a 10 minute drive!

What a great place!  Adrienne was a great host, and her place is sparkling clean and not far from the airport.  It was exactly what I needed for a quick overnight.  Also the bathroom was huge and well-appointed, which is a big plus in my book.    Would definitely stay there again if I have the opportunity!
Great experience! Adrienne is a very nice person and everything is perfect.
Nice clean and comfortable room, perfect for an overnight stay before an early start.

I had a great stay with Adrienne. The room and house are both extremely comfortable and spotlessly clean with a very nice shower. Also, the house was very easy to get to from Dublin airport. I would definitely stay here again
My stay was so comfortable. So clean, great night sleep in a comfortable bedroom and a beautiful bathroom. Highly recommend.
I was with Adrienne for the third time! Everything was fine. I would go there again.

A great spot to spend the night near the airport. A short walk to shops and restaurants, yet on a quiet street. It was easy to catch the bus to the Dublin airport (though a taxi is only 10Euro. Very convenient location, great host, room and bathroom were very clean.

A very handy Airbnb close from the airport in a lovely neighborhood.
Perfect if you want to have a good night or more than one.
I recommend it.
Great place near airport!
Super nice place and very easy to get to the airport!
Excellent host, very accommodating to my late check in time.
Very nice place. Friendly host and its very clean!

Lovely stay! Highly recommend to everyone! Located perfectly, close to airport, and every destination point across the Dublin that I needed was reacheable very easily by public transport. Room/house no comments everything is in order and on its place. Adrienne was very helpful and kind and guided me through my journey. Thank you very much!
Even though I only stayed one night Adrienne was very accommodating, especially when I added a second person to my booking rather last minute. She was very helpful in ordering me a taxi!
Adriennes place was perfect for my short stay. The bedroom and bathroom were spacious and comfortable. Everything was spotless with some nice touches added. Great value and would highly recommend.
Comfy bed, clean home, beautiful home, friendly & warm host. I would certainly stay again.
Extremely handy place for Dublin airport

The room, bathroom, and house were extremely clean. I was very comfortable in this home. It was very close to the town where you could get some dinner and groceries. Adrienne was very nice and welcoming. The taxi drive from the house to the airport was 15 euros with about a 10 minute drive.
The house is very quiet, well located near Swords and near the Dublin Airport. Adrienne and her husband are very nice and welcoming.
Adrienne has a lovely, warm, clean house. It is in a quiet residential area, so I got a good night's sleep. I would happily stay again.
Our host was awesome!  The place was very clean with plenty of amenities. Would stay there again.

Amazing apartment everything is as described and better. Caroline is an outstanding host. Public transportation will bring you in 15-20 minutes into the city center. I highly recommend Carolines Apartment and will definitely book again when in Dublin. Thanks Caroline! Dirk

This is a lovely apartment in a quiet residential area, set in a relatively new block, plenty of space for the 4 of us that were staying. The location is great with a bus stop literally just outside that gets you to the centre in about 17 mins or a 5 min walk to the tram which is a little more frequent and a little quicker. The apartment itself was spotlessly clean, there is a relatively busy road in front but you barely hear it and also a small river between, look out for the swans and the heron. All in all it was as described and perfect for our trip, everyone was happy, highly recommended.

Caroline was easy to reach prior to check in.  She provided detailed instructions regarding check in , directions, parking, and more.  The apartment was super clean, the beds were comfortable, and the kitchen was better stocked than the one at home!
Great place and great host

Great place to stay ! Good location for transport into Dublin and within a walk of the Guinness storehouse. Picked up the tour bus here too. 
Unbelievably stocked with all the extras you could need in the kitchen. Plenty of room for 4 adults to sit and enjoy a DVD with a bottle of wine. 
Thank you Caroline x

Caroline was a wonderful host! We would return in a heartbeat. The apartment is clean and well equipped. She provides very clear and easy to follow instructions. Great recommendations for all types of activities. We loved the location as well.
Thank you again Caroline for helping to make our trip even more special.
Great apartment and the whole experience from check in to leaving . Was very happy with everything .

We honestly couldn't say a bad thing about our stay in Caroline's home. She was welcoming, there was great communication throughout, the apartment was lovely and clean and Caroline left some very nice personal touches to make us feel at home. Would absolutely recommend. Thanks Caroline from Liz, Sue and Antony

Carolines place ticked all our boxes. The service and accommodation with comfy beds and thoughtful touches made our first visit to Dublin an outstanding experience. The canal side location was ideal with close access to all public transport & walking distance to all attractions. Carolines communication was thorough and excellent. Carolines place comes with our highest recommendation.

We had a lovely stay at Carolines place. Her place was lovely and in a great location. The beds were super comfortable and she made check-in very easy. Highly recommend staying at her place. You wont be disappointed.

Caroline's place was amazing! Her instructions were very clear and easy to follow. The bus line was right in front of her apartment. Grocery store was in walking distance. It is not walking distance from O'Connell street, but that was not a problem. It was still easy to get to on the bus. Her apartment was clean, modern and very safe. She was very gracious on letting us use anything in the apartment. I wish I could have stayed there longer! Well done Caroline! Thank you for having us as guests!
Caroline is an excellent host and her special touches of hospitality went above and beyond. Her place is clean and in a great location. You won't regret staying there.

So many thoughtful touches! Location either walkable to heart of Dublin, or rail is a few blocks away - we never used our car once parked in secure garage (we ranged ages from 33-66). Great for two couples, restful overlooking little canal, everything you need is in condo, would stay there again in a heartbeat if visited again. Stayed two days at beginning of trip and two days at the end - comparing to other AirBnB stays - this is one of best!!!

Caroline has a beautiful home, that is only about 15 mins on the local buses into the centre. We had everything we needed in the home, plus extra touches, like milk in the fridge and breakfast items for when we arrived. Amazing hospitality and we will definitely be returning. Highly recommend this Air BNB, for value for money, easy access into all the attractions of Dublin and fantastic hospitality and comfort. Loved it. !

Caroline is a fantastic host. The apartment was clean and comfortable, with lots of lovely touches to make our visit enjoyable. There was everything we could have wanted for a great stay.

The apartment isn't far from central Dublin (we got a leap card on Caroline's advice and used the tram all weekend), and is close to some of the main attractions. Caroline provided plenty of tips and advice to help us navigate the city, which we really appreciated.

Thank you! We would highly recommend this as a base to explore Dublin.
Very clean and welcoming
The host canceled this reservation 2 days before arrival. This is an automated posting.
A lovely apartment with an incredibly kind host family. A bit far from the city center but the tram is only an 8 min walk.

Clean and comfortable (especially the bed)!. I was in Dublin for work and this was the perfect spot located near my office, quiet, roomy and with all the accommodations I needed. Would definitely recommend this place!
A great alternative to a hotel in Dublin and a good price as it goes,  for one of the most expensive cities to stay in ever.
Premier Suites was incredible. The staff were lovely and polite. Due to a booking error, they offered us an upgrade at no extra cost for the inconvenience. I definitely recommend them 100%.
Javier was a nice host. Perfect communication and ideal location close to the city center. Many thanks!
La ubicacion es perfecta y Hafida ha sido muy amable. El inconveniente es el ruido, es bastante complicado dormir
Location is great and Javier is a good host. Thanks!

Javi was a superb host. He went above and beyond to ensure we felt welcome and had everything we needed. The bed was comfortable, the kitchen was stocked with breakfast for us and the bathroom was clean. The location was perfect as it was only a ten minute walk from the main bars. I highly recommend this air b n b!

This location is fantastic for Dublin City! Everything is within walking distance (Guinness Factory, Temple Bar area, shopping district), it was very easy for me to get around and should you want to take the bus to get outside of the city your really close to the station. I would highly recommend it! My flight landed at 8:30 am in the morning, so I got the flat by 11:00 am, and his flat mate Hafida was kind enough to let me in earlier than the "expected time." Very much appreciated the accommodation and he was very responsive!
Lovely and cosy place, great location!
The flat is well situated. No need to take the means of transport if you want to go out the night or go to visit the city centre or the Guinness Storehouse.

Alojamiento recomendable para visitar el centro de Dublin. Situado entre las dos catedrales de la ciudad. El anfitrion es una gran persona con la que se puede conversar y aprender mucho de la ciudad. Pasamos enfamilia unos dias muy agradables alojandonos en casa de Javi
It was all perfect! The house is very near to Temple Bar, Grafton street, Trinity college, Guinness Storehouse and many more...! Thank you Javier and Hafida!

The apartment is perfect for a couple . It was clean . Free breakfast of coffee , tea , juices , cereals or bread are always ready ! Javier has fresh fruits ready for us when we arrived and a welcoming delicious chocolates . 
It was a walking distance to the city centre and 2 min walk to St Patrick cathedral . Buses are just outside the apartment to the city centre but walking distance to Temple Bar , Guinness , Main Street , Trinity College .
The apartment is lovely and very close to city centre. Javier is a very nice host.
Javier and Hafida were very friendly and accommodating, and very helpful with local advice etc, would recommend this room! Thanks very much!
This was a great location at the heart of Dublin!
The location is great. It was quit noisy and a little bit cold in the room. Communication was great. The shower gives a little bit of water.

Great location, walking distance from many activities.
Although we did not meet Javier in person, he took great care of us through his excellent and fast communication, and he put us into contact with Hafida who took care of the (flexible) check-in and check-out. We also had these small attentions towards my gluten free diet as soon as he got to know it. That was really appreciative.
The "negative" part of this location was the noise (low isolation of the window-frames) - very busy street, and as far as I'm concerned the bed's mattress was too hard.
But overall, a nice stay! Thanks a lot.

Great place to stay. Close to Dublin Center and the beautiful Howth, wich is realy recommended. Brian and Sheila are really nice and a great host. They really let me feel at home. Even made me a good breakfast at a early tme of the day.
I would stay again if I would visit Dublin again.

Everything about my stay at Brian's was exceptional! The home, the location, my room, the bathroom, cleanliness, the hospitality, the cooked breakfast and good coffee every morning... All of these things made my visit very easy and very comfortable. I would highly recommend you avail yourself of a stay here if you're lucky enough to find a slot available - you will not find better. I will be back!

The reality more than matched the description on the site. Brian is a great host. The cooked breakfast set me up for the day. A clean room in a house near the seafront and close to a Dart metro station to get into Dublin city centre. Great value.

I've been feeling very lucky to be a host in Brian's house where the true Irish hospitality shines.
Brian was so kind to pick me up from the train station and was extremely helpful and kind.  Sheila let me borrow her bike and thanks to her creativity being in the house is like being  to an art exhibition!  The location is amazing, what else to say.. An experience I will cherish forever. 
Thank you  xxx
Nice place and very nice hosts.

Beautiful family home located near the water, convenient bus routes, and spectacular scenery. The bike path nearby linked the city center and towns of Sutton and Howth. The hosts are very gracious in their care of every detail. This is a fabulous place. Thanks for letting me stay with you.

Brian and Sheelagh were great hosts. Easy to talk to and very welcoming to their home. Lovely comfy bed and good facilities. Great location right beside the sea with an amazing walk way. Perfect for an evening stroll or run. I would definitely stay here again.
Very good host who looked after me when I stayed in Dublin. Everything was as described, breakfast was included and lots of tips how to best get around and what to see. Would definitely recommend.
Great place near Bayside. Quiet and conveniently located near bus stops. Awesome hosts who are very welcoming, gracious and accommodating.
Nice house in a quit area. Very friendly hosts
Great place to stay and 15mins walk from City Hotel West if you have an event to attend there. All very clean and comfortable
Sharon made check in easy and was helpful throughout, especially when she rang me telling me I forgot my keys!! thanks Sharon
Very nice welcome, arranging when possible, very clean bathroom and comfortable bed. I strongly recommend.
A lovely place and a great host.  Many thanks.
Great host, very professional and everything was spotless
Good stay
Excellent authentic place!

An amazing space and location!! We thoroughly enjoyed our stay with Wendy!! She is an attentive and kind host! The place is a 20 minute walk to everything in Dublin and 2 blocks away from public transit. We took advantage of lots of adventures during the day î-especially exciting was St Patricks Day parade in Dublin!  Loved, loved having her place as our quieter haven at night. The windows in living room overlook a lovely canal. We also enjoyed snuggling by her cozy fire. Apartment well stockedîeven fresh flowers, fruit and scones upon check in
Hated to leave!
Would definitely recommend this place to everyone!!!
Wendy's place is wonderful as her attention to the details and our comfort. I would love to visit her again in the future.

Wendy's flat is exactly as describe. Everything is brand new and extremely clean. 
Wendy was a fantastic host - even driving my mother to the airport in the morning when she couldn't get a taxi. Cannot thank Wendy enough.

What a wonderful place, and fantastic hosts! Would highly recommend and hope to return ourselves one day. Wendy and Mal are extremely responsive and helpful. They wanted to be sure that we got the most out of our trip, and we enjoyed every moment.
Wendy,will make your stay memorable!

Great spot for visiting Dublin, 20 min walk into the centre of town and great little cafe nearby to start your day with. Very clean, quiet  and well furnished and with a great little view of the loch in front.
The best part was Wendy greeted us on arrival (with scones no less) and gave fantastic recommendations, directions and help. Really set us up for amazing food during our stay.

This place was perfect for our small family. Wendy and Malachy were wonderful hosts. The extra touches and their quick responses made an already welcoming apartment that much more special. We would definitely visit again!

Wendys place was perfect and it had everything that we needed. She is such a gracious host and made us feel very comfortable and provided us with everything we needed. If we ever make it back to this area of Ireland we will definitely look her up and see if her place is available. One block from city transportation and a short 15 minute walk to downtown area.  The only improvement that I could suggest is trying to put in a larger shower, but even that was adequate enough for us.  Thank you so much for everything, you made everything work for us. 
Calvin and Margaret

We enjoyed our stay here, very much. And not just for practical reasons of cleanliness and function (which you hope for in any case). No, there was way more. Things that were anticipated for weary travelers were placed for us. Some milk. Tea to brew and enjoy with the hot scones we discovered. Whoa! LEAP cards to use with local transit (look that one up on Wiki), all the cooking things you might need if that's your mode as it is ours. Plan on an interesting walk to St Stephen's Green or Christchurch cathedral or one of several fascinating museums along the way. And yes, that's an actual factual canal across the  street. Narrowboats weren't out during our stay, but I understand they do ply those calm waters. Company for resident swans.

Wendys place was nothing short of amazing!! She had organized everything from welcome scones, early check in, maps, etc. Super organized, gorgeous, clean place with an amazing host!! Flurry was one of the highlights, he is a sweetheart!!  Wendys place was great! Very classy, well kept and maintained and spotlessly clean! Wendy was an absolute pleasure to deal with! Certainly coming back here when I come back to Dublin!!

We stayed for one night with Wendy and Malachy while attending a concert at Croke Park nearby and really enjoyed our stay. Communication from the hosts was excellent. Malachy was very accommodating with our arrival time and welcomed us to the flat. We really appreciated all the small touches that the hosts provided, and found everything to be very comfortable and clean.

Wendy and Malachy were both amazing and little Flurry was a wonderful welcome back after a long day of sight-seeing. The space was perfect for my mother and I and the amenities were great. The shower is small by American standards but that is to be expected in Europe. 

The only thing I would mention is that we were warned by two separate Uber drivers that we were in one of the roughest areas of Dublin. By no means did we feel unsafe at any times while walking from the flat into the city and this could be due to the fact that we were two women traveling alone but should still be noted. Other than that our stay and the hosts were fantastic!

Wendys place was just lovely. The city center was just a few bus stops away and we appreciated being in such a tasteful place with every comfort we could expect. The fireplace is a particular highlight. Wendy keeps a ton of tips and folders on what to do when in town, which was very helpful to avoid the most blatant tourist traps. We highly recommend having a conversation about what you like... she certainly can guide you to the best places - as evidenced by our fabulous pub crawl. We thoroughly enjoyed our stay.

Wendy was an amazing host! She greeted us with scones, maps to the city, and leap cards. The location was an easy walk from commuting options and the apartment above her home was more than enough to be our home-away-from-home for the week. Plus, Flurry the pup was an added bonus! Highly recommend for travels.
A real hidden gem right in the centre of Dublin with one of the bests hosts weve ever had!
Very nice place, we absolutly recoment Wendie's place!
Wendys place was perfect. Wendy and Malachy weee both very accommodating and pleasent.  Thanks again for making our stay to Dublin incredible
A really beautiful, calm and relaxing place to stay and an easy walk to central Dublin.

We thoroughly enjoyed our stay at this lovely apartment. Great location for Croke Park. The food recommendations were spot on. The personal touches like the fresh fruit scones, jam and butter were much appreciated. Great communication and very helpful. Will definitely return.
Great stay in a Plus apartment. Appreciated the warm scones, milk, etc.

Welcoming, clean, wonderfully light and comfortable and great suggestions and directions.  Every restaurant she recommended was fabulous.  After a long travel day she welcomed us with warm
scones with jam and butter and a lovely pot of tea.  There was nothing I would change.  Wendy and her partner are both brilliant.
Everything was clean and as shown in pictures. Wendy was a very friendly host and gave us some great recommendations for places to go.

Wendy's place is a beautiful apartment, the entire upper floor of a lovely terrace house, and is one of the nicest rentals I have stayed at. The location was perfect for our stay - we were attending a conference and it was a relatively short walk to the conference centre. It was also quiet and not in the thick of the sometimes overwhelming tourist crowds of Dublin, a big bonus! Wendy herself is an excellent host, she was very kind, responsive, and provided us with great tips. We would definitely stay here again.
Wendy was a great host. The apartment is stylish, and very comfortable. The location is ideally situated for Croke Park, and the city centre is just a short walk away.

It was suberb, we really loved staying at Wendys. The location was really good. Wendy is lovely host an always responded very quickly. It felt really good that she let us sign in earlier, as we arrived with an early flight. Everything was perfect and we felt so relaxed at Wendys. Thank you so much Wendy!

Amazing! The warm scones were amazing.  We were at the beginning of our honeymoon and Malachy picked us up at the airport which was so welcomed.   Close to everything and both Wendy and Malachy were lovely and made great conversation :-)

We recently spent 4 nights at Wendys and were made most welcomed into her lovely home. The apartment was quiet and only a brisk 15/20 mins walk into the centre of the city- we loved the views from the high windows and it was great to leave them open and have fresh air . Wendys recommendations of where to shop for basics ,restaurants ,her favourite coffee shop etc made us feel right at home.

Wendys place was perfect for two.  Very clean with all one could ask for.  She supplied coffer, French Press, milk, even two Guinnesses.  Location was perfect, easy walk to all attractions, yet, far enough away that it was very quiet. Highly recommend.

Wendy is an exceptional host and is available for questions any time.   She is also very willing to assist you in whatever she can.  The apartment is located very close to bus stops and train stations making it excellent to get around the whole of Dublin.  Even though it is so close to town the apartment was very quiet.  The apartment was very clean and has all the comforts of home.  Highly recommend anyone wanting to stay in Dublin to book this apartment.
Beautiful apartment within an easy walk to the city centre.

Our stay at Wendy's place was excellent. The space was as advertised and there were no surprises. Wendy was there to greet us and show us around the rental when we arrived. She was also always very responsive in her communications leading up to our stay as well as while we were in Dublin. She had put scones in the oven to bake so they would be hot and fresh for our arrival. In the fridge were butter and milk for the morning as well as cooking oil, sugar, and spices. 

Wendy took the time to discuss our plans while in Dublin and offered several very useful suggestions. The apartment itself was on the 2nd floor of the building and looked out onto the Royal canal across the street. It was very clean and well equipped for our stay. The bedroom was large with high ceilings and a nice comfy queen bed. The bathroom was small but adequate for our needs. She is located a half a block off of a major road that has buses going into the town centre every few minutes. It is a short, 10-15 min walk to the centre of Dublin from her place. All in all I would not hesitate to rebook Wendy's place if I was to return to Dublin again.

Brendan and Bronwyn, Canada

Wendy was extremely helpful and informative. She allowed me to check in early based on my flights arrival time. She made several recommendations regarding what to see and do - and they were all great. We felt very at home here.

This was our first Airbnb experience, and it will be a hard act to follow! The apartment is charming, artistic, and perfectly situated for exploring Dublin. There's a sweet breakfast spot a couple blocks away, too. 

We especially enjoyed the people-watching vantage point (i.e., living room) as walkers, commuters, and even a gaggle of kayakers took advantage of the canal directly in front of the apartment. Wendy was a wonderful host, going the extra mile to help us solve transportation puzzles and allowing us to check in early. It clearly *mattered* to her that we enjoy our stay to the fullest.

Highly recommend!

Wendy was a great hostess.  She sent step by step instructions before we arrived.  His responses have always been very quick and extremely courteous.  Your apartment is perfect, particularly very well located, comfortable, clean and well equipped with everything we need.  The ad faithfully reflects the characteristics of the apartment.  I would definitely recommend this apartment to anyone planning to visit Dublin.
Nicely located in the heart of Dublin. Wendy was very helpful with tips and things to do in the area.

Definitely best Airbnb I stayed in. Wendy was very helpful with check-in even though we arrived at like 1 AM. The house is very beautiful and comfortable. It felt cozy and stylish. Everything we needed was available and we felt like we're at home. I literally have nothing bad to say, everything was just perfect! 

Wendy is a great host. She greeted us after a long day of work and traveling and she is a very nice person overall. We really loved how caring and helpful she is.

Wendy made our stay in Dublin really enjoyable. She helped us to appreciate the city by taking the time to inform us of the various activities according to our interests. She also contacted us frequently so that we find the appartment housing easily. The accommodation is fantastic, very large, very well furnished and located close to the main points of interest and public transport. We highly recommend this accommodation!

Great apartment.  We loved our visit and Wendy was a fantastic host.   About a 20 minute walk into the central part of Dublin. Bus system is great.  Very easy to use.  At night, I would recommend a cab to go back to the apt especially for women traveling alone.  Daylight travel was fine by myself either walking or taking bus.  Lovely apartment!

Oh goodness, where do I even start? Everything was amazing. Above expectations, remarkable, wonderful. Read on for the details:

First of all, Wendy is a fantastic host. She made us feel so welcome, greeting us with scones and tea, personally providing recommendations for city experiences based on our interests, and even helping us with travel arrangements like getting tickets for local museums and calling a taxi for us when we needed to depart for the airport. Highly personalized attention! Absolutely wonderful. 

And then there is the apartment itself! Great kitchen - plenty of room to cook your own meals with a small grocer just up the road within walking distance. Fireplace was such a nice amenity during the chilly October evenings we spent there. Bed was comfy and everything was very clean!

Location is also prime. Enough distance outside of the city that it isnt noisy but close enough that a bus/tram fare into the heart of Dublin will only run you approx. ‚Ç¨2.50 each way. Wendy also provided us with leap cards that made public transit an easy and stress free method of commuting (because taxis are nice but they get expensive!).

10/10 recommend Wendy's place!

Great centrally located apartment from which to explore Dublin. Da Mimmo, the Italian restaurant up the road, is a must. Amazing food and service but best to call ahead for a reservation. 
Wendy is a great host making sure you have everything you need including travel cards to use on public transport. Super comfortable and makes you feel like youre at home.

Everything about this apartment is wonderful.  Wendy is warm, welcoming and very helpful.  The apartment is conveniently located between the airport and downtown.  The neighborhood is very quiet.  It is about a 20 minute walk to Trinity College, but public transportation is close by and taxis are readily available if you do not want to walk.  A taxi to/from the airport takes about 20 minutes and costs less than 25 euro.  Wendy provided breakfast food and snacks along with coffee, tea and juice.   She also provided many excellent recommendations for restaurants and shops.  Cloud Cafe was a great place for brunch, just a short walk away.  Da Mimmo was also great for a pizza when we were tired from a long day of sightseeing.  The fireplace was great, especially since we visited in cool rainy weather.  We will definitely be staying here again and will be recommending Wendys place to all of our friends.
A wonderful place - Wendy was so welcoming and it was a great little stay away from the craziness of Dublin City centre. Thank you!

We really enjoyed our stay. The accommodation is very clean and comfortable and the location is great to either walk in to the city centre, or in the other direction to the Aviva.  We also really appreciated the well stocked fridge and kitchen.

Simon & Emer's home were exactly as described and more! They were very caring and checked up on us to ensure that our stay was as comfortable as possible. The apartment is certainly cozy and in a good location near many good eateries. The kitchen came stocked with food too!

Would definitely recommend to anyone visiting Dublin!
Everything was perfect. The apartment was exactly as described. It was also well located and Simon was always quick to respond.  I would definitely recommend this place for your trip to Dublin.

Great apartment, amazing decoration, classic and elegant style. Tesco is nearby, It's very convenient. The host was very careful and warm. I'm having some troubles , and they're very active in helping me out. Im really grateful. Anyway, I highly recommend here!

Absolutely delightful apartment, and a great home for my week in Dublin. Simon and Emer were amazing hosts and went above and beyond to support my timetable. The location was perfect for me, and the light-filled and spacious rooms were a great space to chill out after several long days. Will definitely look to stay again next time I'm in Dublin.
Very nice place in a great city.  Plenty of room for a couple.
My sister and I had such a wonderful time staying at Emer and Simons home! Great location and amazing hospitality. We will be back!
Simon's apartment is a gorgeous 1 bedroom apartment located within easy walking distance of the city centre. The perfect base from which to explore Dublin's many offerings!

Great location for visiting Dublin, local to RDS for gigs. We arrived to a beautiful apartment with some great little extras. The fridge had some groceries and fruit for us to use as we pleased and an extensive dvd collection for a quite night in after a long day of site seeing.

Simon's place is a masterpiece! Not only is it authentic, but also very artsy and intriguing. The book selection might make you want to stay inside... It's a great way to relax before bed. Also: fresh fruit, milk and bread and all the other important things in life (coffee, tea, etc) waiting for you is an amazing touch.
the apartment was perfect, really luxury, extremely clean, close to central area, even food was provided, we highly recommend this apartment.

Simon was a super host. There were tons of goodies in the fridge and he was quick to answer any questions I had. The neighborhood his house is in is super convenient, quiet and beautiful . Thank you for a wonderful visit.

Our most wonderful airbnb experience. Simon and Emer were amazing hosts. They gave us a flexible check in-out time, make our trip smoother. The apartment was always warm and quiet. Bed was cozy, Kitchen was full equipment. The location was perfect, many cafe and bar in walking destination. 20 mins walk to centre and many buses reach travel points. We are highly recommend.
Lovely clean apartment, spacious and comfortable
A really lovely and stylish home with brilliant hosts.

The perfect place for exploring the sights of Dublin by foot! This lovely historic townhouse is stylish, well equipped and perfectly situated. We especially enjoyed the massive windows and comfortable bedding. Great hosts and a great place!

We stayed here for a month, and loved it.  Emer and Simon are great hosts - very careful and responsive, very keen to ensure that we had everything we needed and more. The flat is in a terrific area, walkable to all the great sites of Dublin, and also close to bus routes that will take you  almost anywhere. The flat is quirky, spacious and well equipped. Highly recommended.
Great location, very friendly host. Basic room and ensuite only, no extras in room.

Excellent value for money  a lovely property  only 20 min bus journey to the centre of Dublin
Very clean and comfortable accommodation along with a lovely breakfast 
 would certainly recommend and would certainly  stay there again
Host was very friendly and accommodated me last minute. She even dropped me to the city ..while showing me around a little.
Great accomodation, spacious, clean and comfortable. Thanks for everything!
Lovely house a fantastic area. Spaceous rooms and great beds for a good nights sleap in a quiet house.
Carmel was very good host very friendly and helpful easygoing ,very good location and nice clean ,quite and comfortable house .
Very nice place in a beautiful big house. Very good beds. Great breakfast. It is in a calm area, but near the city center. Only 15 minutes with bus.
I had a very pleasant stay, it's a nice area, the bed was comfortable and it's convenient to drive to the airport.

The overnight was perfect for me, close to the airport as I had an early flight and I had a very comfortable sleep before a long day flight.  Good parking and and lovely house in a very nice neighbourhood.  I highly recommend this place.
Lovely house and host in quite, nice area. Bus stop round the corner was very handy for getting into town and being so close to Pheonix Park meant you didn't have to wonder far to enjoy the fresh air

I had an amazing stay there. Carmel is a really kind and caring woman. Her house is beautiful and ideally located, in a really nice neighborhood near Phoenix park, and not far from the city center. The room is really big and comfortable and you get to have your own bathroom. Having breakfast included was also a real plus during my stay. Overall I had a really great time and felt at home for the few days I was there.
Great stay again in Carmels beautiful home . Great location & hospitality. Highly recommend.
Had another great stay at Carmels. Great host , beautiful house and super location . Highly recommended
Carmel is a very kind person. The room was clean and the breakfast was very good. Highly recommended!
Great location, beautiful house, super host
Great location, on site parking and a lovely friendly host.  Very comfortable and spacious. A great find.
Highly recommend, beautiful house in a great location, only minutes away from Phoenix park. Great host, breakfast included, no complaints at all.

Lovely room, lovely house, lovely area. Right next to Phoenix Park and handy for buses into City Centre. Nice restaurants and cafes nearby. Carmel is a great host and very welcoming. Highly recommend.
Carmel is awesome host. Quick response, lovely room with beautiful clean bathroom, tasty breakfast and generous host. Highly recommended!
We had a great stay at Eithnes place, she was super accommodating and the house was in the perfect location.
We had a great time staying here. It's a stylish house with a lot of space for a good price. Highly recommend this place!
We stayed at Jennifers house for one night. She welcomed us very warmly! The house is only 15 minutes away from the airport, which was perfect for us to get early our plane.
Not far from the bus stops to get into the city
Close to the airport, more suitable for persons without a car. Very friendly and accommodating host.
She is a very thoughtful host and will go out of her way to make your trip convenient.

Jennifer is fast to respond.  Location is near airport.  She may be able to do airport transportation for a reasonable fee.  
Room was small, but fit our needs. 
House was clean.  Shared a bathroom with the host- no issues at all. 
Def recommend
The experience with Jenny was perfect! She was so helpful and the house was superclean and warm. She and his kid were superfriendly and supernice. I would definetly come back! Thank you :)
Jenny is super nice, her place is cozy and very close to the airport. She's very flexible and will make you feel always comfortable... very recommended!
Great host! Would highly recommend.
We had a wonderful stay at Jenniffers. The place was very clean and comfortable with her lovely cat and her son. The area is calm and very safe. I would definitely stay here again.
Jenniffers place was the perfect place for us because we had to leave early to catch our plane and the house is very close to the airport. Jenny is a very nice host and the communication was easy.

This host was super accommodating with check in.  She is extremely nice and her son is polite and quiet.  The room is as pictured, with 2 bunk beds that were quite comfortable compared to some others we had experienced.  It was perfect for a nights sleep and shower.  Would definitely stay again and recommend to other travelers.
Jenniffer was a lovely host to us. She was very helpful and very sweet! Even drove us to the airport very early in the morning for a little amount of money. Everything was clean! Would recommend.
Jennifer is really kind and friendly, the room was very clean , well connected by public transport and near to the airport. Totally recommended.
accoglienza ecceƒ∫lente e cordiale
Jennifer was a superb great wonderful host. Her place was so warm with all the amenities and the peanuts and chocolates..Was very helpful. the best stay. Also near to airport.
She gave us detailled instruction for the busses from the airport to a pick-up-location where she picked us up by car. She and her son were absolutely friendly and kind - so was their cat ;-)

We had a lovely time in Dublin.  The room was very nice and clean and Helen was so helpful.  She had lots of suggestions what to do in Dublin and even for our further trip in the West of Ireland. Her house is in a very quiet road, bus to Dublin (takes 15 Min.) and leaves around the corner. Breakfast great! Thank you so much Helen.

Great breakfast of homemade bread, peanut butter, jams and marmalade, lots of very interesting books, very comfortable and clean, very helpful, friendly and obliging host(s), a short walk to the train into Dublin center. Highly recommended.

Tony went above and beyond for us during our stay. Breakfast was especially good and our Irish Breakfast on St Paddy's Day was lovely. The room is stylish, and the house has easy access to public transportation. My first trip to Ireland was amazing!

Anthony is a very interesting, welcoming and easy to be around host, and his house is very beautiful and calm to be in. I love the area, the walk to the beach and train, very easy to get into the city if you have to (;
Wonderful house easy walk to the dart. Tony is FULL of amazing info. Great place to stay near Dublin

Tony and Kathy home is a beautiful Georgian villa with some modern finishes. Tony and Kathy are lovely hosts and make you feel welcome and help you out as much as possible. I thoroughly enjoyed my time here and would definitely recommend it to others.

Gavin

Tony was a SuperHost in every way. Prompt and thorough communication all the time. Tips on everything we should do in the surrounding area from sites to see and restaurants to dine at. Hes an amazing host with fabulous knowledge of Ireland. He and his wife have a very beautiful comfortable home and they make you feel so welcomed. Oh and so does their gorgeous dog Barney. Hes delightful too! Our room was clean and cozy with USB ports for our phones and everything you need for reading material on the history and ambience of the beautiful Green Isle!

Beautiful room in a very quiet neighbourhood, perfectly clean with a shared bathroom with the other guests. 
Anthony is an amazing host, he has good advises for everything : places to go to eat (even what to order), places to visit and the better way to go to those places. 
Breakfast is ready when you wake up with fantastic homemade soda bread, jams, marmelade, cereals, berries, and of course coffee or tea. 
I had a perfect experience with this Airbnb and I highly recommand it.

This Airbnb is a little bit different in that it is hosted and you are provided with breakfast. I was accommodated in a very well appointed room with a bathroom directly opposite for my sole use. The quality of the bedding is very good as is the bathroom which has an excellent shower over a sunken bath. 

The breakfast is excellent and on offer is a range of cereals, excellent coffee from a very cool integrated bean to coffee machine. The bread is homemade as is the peanut butter. The host potters around and strikes a perfect balance between leaving guests to enjoy the breakfast while providing useful advice and information on the local area and Dublin.  Anthonys knowledge is great. 

In advance of arrival, Anthonys communication was excellent, relevant and clear. Its hard to see how this hosted accommodation could have been any better. Thank you so much, Anthony.
Very interesting b&b - Special breakfast and friendly atmosphere

Our stay with Anthony lastedfor 3 nights,  and we thoroughly enjoyed it. The room was as described, facilities in good order, and the location fantastic. Our host took special interest in our plans, and went out of his way to help us, displaying his humorous wit and deep knowledge of Ireland's landmarks and history. Breakfast was tasty and nutritious, bedroom was well appointed. We highly recommend Anthony and Cathy's as wonderful hosts.
A wonderful and welcoming couple with a lovely intimidating yet classy home. Delicious help yourself breakfast with comfortable amenities throughout.
Gorgeous quaint rooms with thoughtful details, modern luxurious  bathroom, all spotlessly clean. Host very friendly and interesting. The homemade bread and peanut butter are worth a visit alone!!!
I had a very comfortable sleep. The place was very clean and the breakfast had homemade touches and was quite delicious. Anthony was a superb host and Barney was just the sweetest welcomer.
We had a nice stay at Anthonys. Tasty breakfast and about 1.5h away from Dublin city. Friendly family (and dog) and a nice and clean home.

Hospitable people, lovely breakfast, comfortable & clean room and bathroom, nice and quiet area. A 10 minute walk to the station where the Dart will bring you to Pearse Street station (city center) in 35 minutes. Thank you Anthony and Cathy!
Real nice home and accommodation. Location and environment absolutely spot on.

If you like being pampered you must stay at this place. Tony and his charming wife are going the extra mile for you. They give you all the inside information you need to know about Dublin and surroundings. A lovely 15 minutes walk on foot to public transport and a comfortable 35 min ride into Dublin. Beautiful cosy and stylish house and comfortable bed. Our stay exceeded our expectations!
Had a great stay! Highly recommend

Anthonys place was wonderful.
The homemade bread and conserves amazing
So helpful and generous and a lovely home. Will definitely stay again
Wonderful hosts. Highly recommend for a  visit.  Clean and beautiful room. Gorgeous

If I could rate value as a 10 instead of a 5 I would.  From the home made bread, to the tips on where to go to the feeling of being a part of the wonderful beautiful family and soulful dog Barney that lives in this gorgeous house for the short time that we were there.  Walking distance to the train station... we could go anywhere!  Walking distance to the ocean!   I believe this air b&b is underpriced, but dont tell anyone!  Especially the owners .  If I ever visit Ireland again I would seek this one out.

Anthony and Cathy are very friendly and welcoming. 
Their house is comfortable and very tasteful, with many interesting pieces of art! 
Tonys home made bread is definitely worth going back for!

I highly recommend this accommodation! Tony and Cathy were wonderful hosts and offered good advice. Both were very helpful and kind. The accommodation itself is in a lovely area, with easy access to bus. Kiliney Hill is a must to visit!

Anthony has a beautiful home and great hospitality, he gives excellent recommendations for places to visit and eat around Dublin, and he makes a delicious homemade bread that we got to enjoy for breakfast. Our bed was quite comfortable and the room was clean and tidy. His dog Barney is really friendly and playful.

We had a lovely stay with Tony.  The house is lovely and in quiet location.  There is a relaxed feeling to the place and lots of time for talk and banter! Do stay here and hope you enjoy it as much as we did.

Anthony very kindly accepted me as a last minute booking and picked me up at the train station. The accommodation is very clean and stylish, bed is super comfortable and the bathroom fabulous. Anthony was a wonderful host, very responsive and warm. The location was lovely, it's a nice walk to the train station (15-20 mins) with a cut through to the beach which I happened upon and delighted in each morning on my way to the city for work. Absolutely delightful stay, wonderful accommodation, really great host. I have no hesitation recommending this as your AirBnB of choice and I hope to be able to revisit.

Perfect home away from home. Great hospitality. The location is the most comfortable & peaceful. Easy commute & just a few miles away from entertainment & everything else you could need. Completely recommend this wholesome Airbnb for your next getaway. The hosts are the best hosts Ive ever had!

My stay here was absolutely wonderful - the room was immaculately clean and comfortable, as well as very pretty. The bathroom is a nice size and the shower/water pressure is terrific. The location was fantastic for me as while it was within walking distance from the DART, it also had a great deal of charm to it and felt very idyllic. Breakfast was definitely a highlight as well - I would be remiss not to mention the wonderful homemade bread and peanut butter! They are lovely hosts and are a wealth of knowledge and good nature. I cant think of a more lovely place to stay!

The place is located in a quiet neighborhood, about 20 minutes with public transport away from the city center. 
Checking  in and out was easy thanks to Micheal's quick responses and care.

Michael's bnb was very clean and accommodating during our 11 days there. The location was easy walking distance to public transportation, set in a quiet, safe neighborhood. Michael was quick to respond to the reservation request and all our questions upon arrival.  We truly enjoyed our stay
Micheals place is great, location is perfect only a short tram into the city. Lovely and tidy, everything you need. Had amazing weekend in Dublin.
I highly recommend this accommodation,definitely I will book again if I will work around that area.
Great location a 5 minute walk to the light rail which takes you into the heart of Dublin in 12 minutes or so. Apartment was big enough for our party of 5 .

Michael's place in Drimnagh is great! We had a group of five, and it worked well for all of us. It is located a short walk away from a Luas Red Line stop, which you can use to get into the city center of Dublin. We also had a rental car, so the location a little ways out of the city center was convenient for us to drive to and from as well. 

Michael was quick to answer any questions we had along the way, and he was able to give us an extra set of keys, which made it easier for our group to split up when we wanted.
Nice place. Perfect for our family trip.

We are seasoned airbnb guests and this was, unfortunately, our worst experience. Luckily, the other airbnbs we stayed in for the remainder of our trip were fantastic and super clean.
Our friends said the pictures on airbnb reminded them of online dating - not showing accuracy of how tired the carpet and furniture looked. My first comment of the place was it reminded me of a frat house including the strong smell of marijuana when we got out of taxi.  Our friends said they didn't think the sheets had been washed properly because pillow cases smelled like women's perfume and sheets smelled like they had been in washer too long.  Towels were clean, but old.

We arrived after being up 24 hours from travel and there was one roll of toilet paper for 4 people in a 2 bathroom unit. 

When Micheal showed up at the unit the next day he was highly defensive,  arrogant and rude. He yelled, "Get OUT!"  He could have handled it so much better by asking, "Can you show me what is dirty?"  
His communication was generally quick, but the toilet paper and paper towels didn't show up until we were packed and ready to leave. We stayed less than 24 hours cutting our stay by 2 days. Finding a new place and moving our stuff took valuable vacation time away from the four of us. 
After we complained to airbnb, Micheal said his tenants on first floor complained of loud music. We are in our 60s,  we had been up 24 hours and never even turned the tv on.  Total fabrication.
It was conveniently located close enough to city centre. We walked 5-7 minutes to the Dublin Luas Black Horse station which was a few blocks from property.  
 (Website hidden by Airbnb) 

The distance to the train was accurate and that was helpful. We learned from locals and from researching crime in the area that Drimnagh isn't considered the best area and has had gang crime. You can research this yourself by using search term (Drimnagh Crime.) The impact was cabs wouldn't pick us up. We had 4 cabs cancel on us when they learned pickup address. The girl at the hotel told us she was afraid to park her car in Drimnagh for fear her tires would be stolen.
We knew going in that it was a moderately priced airbnb not upscale. Had it been clean, we would have stayed the entire time.

Very convenient place to visit Dublin City. Luas stop close by and not very expensive. Guinness storehouse very close. More than adequate place for 5 people. Michael was very considerate and prompt in answering questions. Hot water very good and beds good. Just a few upgrades to the fittings will make it a lovely place. Thank you for your hospitality
This flat was in a peaceful area, yet convenient to a grocery store. Thoughtful amenities made the stay perfect. Will definitely recommend.
This host is not cooperative at all and he does not provide the residents all what they need and he doesn't respect the residents
Comfortable flat benefiting from 2 bathrooms . Very easy to get into Dublin as near tram stop.

Lilac Cottage was perfect central hub for my girlfriend and I in Ireland. Free parking right outside and all the amenities you could need in close proximity (grocery store to keep meals cheap or restaurant for a good meal) Fidelma has everything you could possibly need in the cottage and had fantastic communication throughout. Wont hesitate to book with her if we find ourselves in Ireland again.

I would recommend

She has a notebook with local walking places to go and also further places to go in Dublin
It helped us plan our stay

If you're looking for a warm cozy space to spend while you are visiting Dublin, Fidelma's place is the place for you! She is an amazing host and is very helpful when it comes to getting around the city. Her place is very cute, comfortable, clean and she has provided you with many things that you may need, as well on suggestions on places to go. The neighborhood is quiet and beautiful, and the bus stops are just around the corner that take you right into the city center. Our stay here was just amazing! Thank you again Fidelma!!

If you are looking for an amazing place just outside of the busy city, this the place to stay! Fidelma is an amazing hostess and makes sure your stay is the best possible! From a very helpful travelers binder with bus schedules,  taxi numbers, and local restaurants and pubs, to a very open line of communication for anything! She responds fast to questions or concerns! My wife and I would definitely recommend this place to anyone and would stay here again!

Thank you for the lovely stay Fidelma!! Your place was sooo pretty en cosy and we really enjoyed it on the website your place already looked amazing and it was even better in person!! Also very nicely located and close to bus stops and bice restaurants/shops. Xx
This place is so cute and in a great location. I loved staying there and I wish we could have stayed longer! Definitely recommend.
Great little place to stay and we had a lovely meal at one of Fidelma's recommended restaurants.
Amazing place! Really clean and tidy. Fidelma also is great and really helpful and accommodating!

This place is a gem! Just far enough outside of city centre to be quiet and relaxing, but also it is convenient to busses to take you into the city. Fidelma was a lovely host and gave us all the information we needed. And the space itself is absolutely lovely.
Wonderful space. Perfect for what we needed. Very clean, quiet and a great location.

The Lilac Cottage is a gem of a place to stay when in Dublin. Away from the city bustle, but with very easy and convenient access to the heart of Dublins downtown core via one short bus trip. 
Fidelma is a fantastic host. Highly recommend this awesome spot.
Loved it!! Beautiful little cottage!! Did its job. Would recommend 100% :)
Wonderful location, cottage had everything we needed and more!

The Lilac Cottage was wonderful and quite private. Fidelma was a warm and friendly host who went above and beyond to ensure that everything was just perfect. The cottage was just as described with special touches everywhere. We enjoyed our stay and Fidelmas hospitality. If you are traveling to Dublin, I highly recommend the Lilac Cottage for your stay. Thank you for an awesome experience.
The cottage was beautiful and Fidelma offered excellent advice on what to do during our day in Dublin.
Super nice place. We stayed two nights and could explore Dublin perfectly. We will stay here again next time we visit Dublin and recommend to our friends.
Great space with everything you need! Also, really close to the number 9 bus stop that will take you directly into the city center!

Beautiful little niche just outside of Dublin. We were driving distance from town and it was a quiet area. Perfect for a couple on a getaway trip. Walking distance to good shopping and the Hungry Duck has delicious food with great hospitality as well. Fidelma was kind and assisted us when our luggage was delivered from the airport while we were out in the evening. Our first couple of days in Ireland were trying but made easier by our kind hostess. Would book again in a heartbeat.

Great place to stay while
Visiting Dublin.  Short taxi ride to city center.  The amenities were great

The cottage was cosy and we had a great time staying there. The location is perfect for a city trip, via bus it takes 20 minutes downtown and in walking distance are stores and great places to have breakfast or lunch. Fidelma is a great host and was very welcoming. The check in was very easy and if you have a car, parking spaces are right in front of the house.

This cottage is a little gem of a place! Its located in a quiet area with easy access to public transportation. It is clean, comfortable and had everything I needed for my stay. Fidelma is a kind and accommodating host. Highly recommend!

this place is so lovely! very clean and as beautiful as shown in the pictures. Fidelma is very kind and the check-in went down smoothly and fast! the apartment is just perfect and I would recommend it to everyone! 
the bus is near and you can reach dublin in under 25 minutes with it! 
furthermore there are no loud noises nearby and the bed is super comfy!
Excellent accomadation

This cottage has everything needed for a comfortable stay. Every inch of this amazing cottage is effectively used - and everything needed is provided. Fidelima is easy to get in touch with and her response very rapid!

We enjoyed our stay very much. Everything was just as expected & pictured. Cute space and easy access to get to there from bus stops. Just a little more outside of Dublin than expected. But easy to get to city centre by bus. Highly recommend this stay. Fidelma was an outstanding host.

Fidelmas cabin was in a perfect spot! Just close enough to the city to enjoy it but far enough away that you didnt have all the hustle and bustle! 

The cabin was great for winding down at the end of the day and was stocked with DVDs and some books! 

Fidelmas welcomed us not too long after we arrived and let us know that she was there if we needed anything! 

Also her food recommendations were amazing we had stopped at The Hungry Duck when we arrived and The Lovely Food Co. when we left. 

It was a great two days and having this cabin to return made it even better!

It was a perfect cottage with every amenity you could need and easy to get to Dublin center by bus close by. It was perfect and new and cozy , sat outside cottage on bench every morning with my coffee and yard is beautiful too.

Everything was wonderful! Lilac Cottage is just as described and it is the perfect place to rest outside of the craziness of the city centre. The 9 and 83 buses take you right into the middle of the city and it was only ‚Ç¨35 for a cab straight to the airport. We had a lovely stay and would definitely recommend Lilac Cottage to others.

We have come to visit Dublin for the first time, experience the life and get to know a bit about the culture and history as well, however, staying at Fidelma's place was an amazing experience itself. It was such a lovely place! Cottage was sparkling clean, amenities were prepared as stated and extra hospitality was provided. Such a cozy feeling! The best stay ever!!! Thank you once again for everything :)

We stayed at Fidelma's cottage while visiting in Dublin and loved the location. Crumlin was perfect for getting a few groceries and also hopping on the bus to get to Dublin. Fidelma's suggestions made it super easy and stress free! The cottage is quiet and quaint so that we could rest well before moving on to our next destination. Would definitely recommend staying here!
Lugar muy acogedor, con todo lo necesario y con mucha privacidad. Fidelma muy amable y atenta.
Completely private, lovely setting, and a beautiful neighborhood with convenient access to the city.
Exactly what it says on the tin. A friendly welcome and great value.
This was a very cute place to stay .

We had a great stay at the lovely cottage :) 
It had everything we needed and more!
Frequent bus to Dublin takes 20min.

Lilac Cottage in Crumlin Ireland was a special very confortable place to stay while visiting Dublin.  The bus was easy to catch to go to the City Center where there is lots of sightseeing, tours, shopping and pubs.  I would highly recommend Fidelma's Cottage for a stay in Dublin.

Fidelmas cottage is lovely. Perfect for a couple. We were easily able to to prepare breakfast and dinner each day. It is an easy bus ride into Dublin. The grocery store is a short walk with everything you need.

Staying at the Lilac Cottage was a fantastic location and close to Dublin!!! We drove into Dublin in minutes and had no problem finding parking!!! There are also buses within a 5 min walk...Several great restaurants are walkable from the cottage...The lovely Food is definitely a wonderful choice...food and service...perfection!!! It only is about a 20 min walk!!! Our overall experience with Fidelma and her cottage was fabulous and a great value!!! 

Teresa and Steve Callinan

Adorable cottage safely tucked away behind the hosts home.  Staying in Dublin can be quite expensive so this is a great alternative with an easy commute in.  The bus system is fantastic and we had no issues getting anywhere we desired and we even walked all the way to Dublin on a couple occasions.

If you're thinking about staying here- do it!!!! The cottage is lovely with a very west coast vibe- Fidelma is absolutely sweet! It was a really wonderful place to relax from the busy city with all the amenities and more- she even provides a big binder with all the helpful information you need to get around town!
We loved Fidelma's place. It is just adorable, beautifully designed, immaculate and very quiet! Fidelma was very responsive in helping us navigate Dublin as well.
Beautiful little cottage !! Everything we need is there. Quiet place. Easy to get to city center by bus. I highly recommend !
A perfect place to escape the hustle and bustle of Dublin - super clean, well equipped kitchen and easy access by public transport!
Very nice accomodation.
Fidelmas cabin was cute and super cozy. We enjoyed the layout of the cabin and all the features. We enjoyed the tea she provided and the private garden entrance. Its a beautiful place!

Lilac Cottage was absolutely perfect for our little weekend trip to Dublin! It was cosy and had everything you would need for a short stay! The buses to the city centre were frequent and there were plenty of shops nearby! Fidelma is a fantastic host, I cannot recommend this place enough!

This lilac Cottage was amazing and everything that was said in the description.  Its cute, clean, comfortable, easy to find, and close to local shops and restaurants. Its also near bus stops that bring you into Dublin City Center. 
Fidelmas herself was wonderful and friendly. I certainly hope to visit again!!

Thank you so much Fidelma for the absolute perfect place to stay!! Beautiful cottage with everything you will need for the perfect vacation! Take Fidelmas advice on eating she will not steer you in the wrong direction!! I cant express how much we enjoyed our stay!!

This was my sisters & Id first stop in Ireland. We could not have picked a better spot to start. Tucked away in a backyard of a quite neighborhood it was perfect getaway from the hustle and bustle of downtown Dublin. Would stay here again in a heart beat when we come back to Ireland.
Cute little cottage outside of Dublin. Clean and cozy. Convenient buses and great recommendations from the host for local food. Would definitely stay again!
Great space for a couple, close to the main part of the city but a little more peaceful.  All the main sights are a short cab ride away.

Took an 8 day road trip around Ireland & this was BY FAR the best place we stayed. You cant get a better location in the city! Anything & everything you would want to do or see was within walking distance. Paul provided the most detailed & helpful check in info of any air bnb Ive stayed in.
